41010039	Degi Santiago, Juan-ebo, Jesús-abin sogdemalad: —Anmar sunnamala. Geb Jesús amarga sogded: —Eye, nabiri, an-nog-goboed sunna bemar gobmogoed, an-digi-oglegoedgi sunna bemar a-digi oglemarmogoed.
41010040	Ar an-argan-nuedsik, degi, an-argan-sapiledsik-sigeddi an-sogedba uklegosulid, unnila bato dulemarga-uklegoye-soglesmaladga Bab Dummad ukoed.
41010041	E-sapingan-baigan-ambe-guedi, Juan, degi, Santiago, dummadga-gubimalad-egisnai-itosmargu, ese uludmalad.
41010042	Ar Jesúsdi na e-sapinganse gochagu, amarga sogded: “Bemardi nue wismalad, dulemar-we-napneg-dummaganga-gudimaladdi e-sordamarba bur dule-dummad na san imak-daed, degisoggu, bela-ega-ibmar-imakbi abe-damarsunnad. Degine, e-sorbarmalad gandikidba dulemar-barmidaed.
41010043	“Bemardi mer deyob gumalo, ar be dummadga gubiele, maiyob bela be dulemar-bendaker-gebed.
41010044	Ar be dulemar-iduedga gubiele, bela-dulemar-maiga be nanadii-guer-gebed.
41010045	“Ar ani Dule-Machi, we-napnegse an nonigu, mai-nikuega an nonisulid, maiyob dulemar-bendakega an nonikid, degine, an na san-burba-ukegar, adi dule-iskudimalad-anar an burgwegar.”
41010046	Jesús na e-sapinganmala Jericóse nonimalad. Jericógi bangudbargu, e-sapingan, degi, dule-bukidar e-sorba duurmaknadap-gusmalad. Deun dule-aku-ataked, Timeo-machi, Bartimeo-nugad, igarba sii, wilesakwaa mani egissii-gusad.
41010047	Bartimeo itoargu Jesús-Nazaretgined nadapye, binnasur gote, sogded: —¡Jesús, Rey-David-Wagwa, be an-bendake, wile be an-dake!
41010048	Bukidar Bartimeose uluarmalad, boo be sigye ega sogdemalad. Aka-bur-bule Bartimeo binnasur gorsigisad: —David-Wagwa, wile be an-dake.
41010049	Degi Jesús gwisgusgu, sogded: —Ese gornamar. Geb Bartimeose gochamalad, ega sogdemalad: —Bartimeo, be gandik sae, be gwisgu, Jesús bese goled.
41010050	Geb Bartimeo e-suba mide, yog gwisguar, Jesússe nonisunnad.
41010051	Jesús Bartimeoga sogded: —¿Ibi bega imakbi be an-abege? Dule-aku-ataked, abin-sogded: —Odurdaked-saila, ibya an nugubied.
41010052	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Be nae, be an-bengussursoggu, be nugussun. Geb agi Bartimeo yog magasaila atakar naded, degi, Jesúsba nadap-gussunnad.
41011001	Jesús na e-sapinganmala Jerusalén modanimargu, bia neggwebur-Betfagé, degi, Betania sii, yar-Olivos-nugad-abin, a-inikgusgu, Jesús na e-sapingan-warbo-barmisad,
41011002	amarga sogded: —Neggwebur-bipii anmar-asabin-siidse be namar. A-neggweburgi bemar dogdapmalale, moli-bipi-uaya-suid, dule-egi-yo-gwen-siged, be-idu atinnar-nai bemar dakdapoed. Be esikmaloed, geb degi be anse sedamaloed.
41011003	Dule-wargwen bemarga sokalir: ‘¿Ibiga bemar moli-bipi-esiknanai?’ Bemar, abin-sogoed: ‘Ar Dummad we-moli-binasoged. Ebusad-sorba bega yog gannar sedabaloye soged.’
41011004	Jesús-sapingan nadmarsun, geb degi moli-bipi-uaya-suid, igargi neg-dikarba, yawagak-naba atinnai dakdapmalad. A-moli-esiksamalad.
41011005	Dulemar-agi-gunanaid, ega sogdemalad: —¿Ibi bemar imaknanai? ¿Ibiga bemar moli-bipi-uaya-suid-esiknanai?
41011006	Jesús-sapingan-warbogwad, abin-imakdemalad, Jesús ega sogsadba. Geb degi moli-ibed ega moli-barmiarmarsunnad.
41011007	Jesús-sapingan moli-bipi-uaya-suid Jesússe senonimarsunnad. Geb degi moli-birgi na e-mormar ogichamargu, Jesús moli-birgi sigisad.
41011008	Jesús, Jerusalénse nadapgu, dule-bukidar Jesús-idu igargi e-mor ogitemalad, abala ogob-gagangiid-e-gagan gwane-gwane imakdemargu, Jesús-iduar igargi ogitemalad.
41011009	Dule-bukidar Jesús-idu-nadapmalad, degi, sorba-danimalad bela oimakdanimalad: ¡Bab-Dummad-nug odummomar! ¡We-dule Bab-Dummad-nuggi-danikid bela ega ib-nuedga guena-gadin!
41011010	¡Bela ib-nuedga anmarga guena-gadin, anmar-dad-Rey-David yar-ganigusadyob gannar anmarse danigu! ¡Jesús-nug nibneggi ogannomarsun!
41011011	Degi Jesús Jerusalénse dogdapsun, geb agi Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse dogdesunnad. Bela a-neggi ibmar daksagu, ar neg-sedodgussoggu, Betaniase nadsunnad, e-sapingan-ambe-gakabogwadmala.
41011012	Banedgine, Betaniagi noarmargu, Jesús igarba ukur itoalid.
41011013	Dikasur higuera-sapi gagan-aramakbukwa dakargu, ese nade-gusad, dakega e-durba nika-dibeye. Sapi mosgu, san sate dakalid, unnila gaganbi aramakwichi, ar ade durba-nikuedginsulid.
41011014	Degi Jesús higuera-sapiga sogdesunnad: —Be bipisaale bar gwen durbamakosulid. Jesús-degi-sogsad e-sapingan bela itosmalad.
41011015	Jesús, e-sapinganmala gannar Jerusalénse nonimargu, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi dognonimalad. Jesús, dulemar-a-neggi-ibmar-baknanaid, degi, ibmar-ukbukmalad, sabsur onisad. Dulemar-mani-ogwabukmalad-e-mesa binnasur bikiin meted, degi, dulemar-nuu-ukbukmalad-e-gan bar-bikiin metebalid.
41011016	Dule-wargwensaar bipisaar Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi ibmar-seded gwen imaksasulid.
41011017	Agi Jesús dulemar-odurdakde, sogded: —Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Bab Dummad soged: ‘An-neg bela dulemar-soga-ilaba-anse-goled-negye nugguoye.’ ¿Ar ade deyob sognaisursi? Ar emigindi, bemardi atursamalad-negga imaksamargu.
41011018	Dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, escribamar, degi-Jesús-soge itosmargu, igar-amiarmarsunnad, igi-saer Jesús-oburgwemalo-dibeye. Ar ade Jesús-dobe-itomalad, ar ade bela dulemar geger Jesús-dakmalad igi dulemar-odurdakdiid.
41011019	Neg-mutikudgu, Jesús, Jerusaléngi bangudsunnad.
41011020	Jesús na e-sapinganmala wakdar igarba nadapmargu, higuera-sapi bela e-malise-bakar dingugwichi dakarmalad.
41011021	Agi Pedro ebinsaargu, Jesúsga sogded: —Odurdaked-saila, be dake, higuera-sapi-sae-be-ukabsasad, dinguded.
41011022	Jesús ega sogded: “¿Geger be dake? Mer Bab Dummadgi be bengumala.
41011023	Napira an bemarga soged, ar doa-dule we-yarga sog-dibe: ‘Be ainir, demarse be nae,’ a-dule bensulir, e-ibmar-sogedba ega guo daker, ar a-dulega nabir ibmar guodo, yar-ainirodo.
41011024	Degisoggu, bemarga an soged, Bab Dummadse be gorsigusar, bela be-ibmar-egichiid bato begadye be binsae, ar a-ibmar bato Bab Dummad bega ukoed.
41011025	“Bab Dummadse be gotele, dule begi nosale, ies-imaked be sae, adi be-Bab-nibneggi-maid egi-be-nosad nabir bega elimogoed.
41011026	Ar bemar dule-begi-nosad ies be imaksurmalale, ar be-Bab geg be-iskusad bega elimogad.”
41011027	Jesús na e-sapinganmala Jerusalénse gannar nonimarbalid. Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-yaba nadapgu, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, escribamar, degi, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan ese nonimalad.
41011028	Amar Jesúsga sogdemalad: —¿Doa-nuggine wede be we-ibmar-imakdii? ¿Ar doa bega gangued uksasunna, we deyob be ibmar imakegar?
41011029	Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —An bemarse ibmar-soggwen egismogodo. Bemar an-abin imaksale, geb an bemarga sogmogoed, doa we-gangued anga uksa we-ibmar an imakdiid.
41011030	¿Doa Juan-Bautista-barmiar be insae, Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imakega? ¿Bab Dummad barmiali, igi, dulemar barmiali? Anga be sogmalana.
41011031	Degi, Judio-dummagan muchub-muchub na sogdemalad: “Bab Dummad barmiarye anmar sogmalale, anmarga sogdagoed: ‘Degite ¿ibiga bemar Juan-Bautista-bengusmarsunna?’
41011032	Dulemar barmiarye anmar sogbalile, dulemar sunna sabsur anmar-imakmaloed.” Degisoggu, degi-soged dobe itomarbalid, ar ade bela sogmalad, Juan, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged-sunnadye.
41011033	Degisoggu, Judio-dummagan Jesús-abin-sogdemarsunnad: —Anmar wichurmalad, doa Juan-Bautista-barmiali. Degi Jesús, abin-imakdemosunnad: —An bemarga sogosurmarmodo, wede doa-nuggi we-ibmar an imakdii.
41012001	Degi Jesús Judio-dummaganga burbar sunmakdesunnad: “Ibagwengi dule-wargwen nainugi uva-digsado, degi, ber ebilis emaksado, agi abargi uva-egured sobsabardo, geb degi galu sobsabardo, adi agi bela nainugi nakulegegar. Nainu-ibed dulemar-arbamaladga na e-nainu urmaksado, adi a-dulemar nainugi uva wealir, e-ibedga wis ukmogoye, na deyob ebo igar-mesismardo. Nainu-ibeddi dikasur neggwebur-baidse nadsunnad.
41012002	“Uva-weed-ibagan mosgu, nainu-ibed na e-mai nainugi-arbamaladse barmialid, adi uva-na-egadid suegar.
41012003	Ar nainugi-arbamaladdi nainu-ibed-e-mai ese nonigu, sabsur sarsosmalad, geb degi unni-arganagwabi gannar barmismalad.
41012004	“Geb degi nainu-ibed e-mai-baid-barmiarbalid. Ar adi nonogi akwagi maksamalad, geb egi dodosmarbalid.
41012005	A-sorba nainu-ibed e-mai-baid-barmiarbalid, adi oburgwismalad. Deyobi maigan-ichesur nainugi-arbamaladse barmimai-gusad. Nainugi-arbamalad maigan-ese-barmilesmalad gwen-gwen sarsosmalad, agi baigan-oburgwismarbalid.
41012006	“Geb degi napisolabalidgi nainu-ibed na e-machi-sabedi nainugi-arbamaladse barmialid, ar ade binsaded, an-machisoggu, egi-binsaed-nikaa-damaladba gwen oakalogosurmar an insaye.
41012007	“Ar nainugi-arbamalad, nainu-ibed-machi dani dakarmargu, na ega sogdemalad: ‘We-dule-danikidi e-bab burgwisar, nainu bela egadbi guoed, degisoggu, dagmar, we-machi-oburgwemarsun, adi nainu anmargadga guegar.’
41012008	Machigwa-gasmargu, oburgwismalad, geb degi nainu-dikarba metemalad.”
41012009	Jesús dulemar-e-itobukmaladga sogdesun: —¿Degite, nainu-ibed igi dulemar-nainugi-arbamalad-imaknoniko be insae? Nonikogu, dulemar-nainugi-arbamalad-oburgwenonikoed. Geb degi dule-baiganga na e-nainu urmaknonikoed.
41012010	Ar Jesús na ede akwa-nuedyobsoggu, a-ular Judio-dummaganga sogdesunnad: “¿Ar ade Bab-Dummad-Gardagi bemarde absodisurmarsi? Bab-Dummad-Gardagi soged: Dulemar-neg-sobmalad akwa istar daksamalad, a-akwa, akwa-bur-sunsogedga gunonikid.
41012011	¿Ar weyob Bab Dummad akwa-imaksad, Ar anmarde geger dakde?”
41012012	Judio-dummagan Jesús-burbar-ibmar-sogsad mag itosmalad, yamo emarga ibmar sognaid. Degisoggu, Jesús-gabi-guarmalanad, degite, dummagan dulemar-dobedba geg Jesús-oakalogusmalad. Ar ade Jesús-gasmalar, dulemar-bukmalad Jesús-bina uluarmalaled. Degisoggu, Jesús-mete aineba-idu nade-gusmarsunnad.
41012013	Judio-dummagandi, Fariseomar, degi, Herodes-sordamar Jesússe barmiarmalad, adi yamo Jesús-wilubdakegar, e-sunmakedgi gaegar.
41012014	Degi Jesússe nonimargu, ega sogdemalad: —Odurdaked-saila, anmar be-wisdo, be dule-ibmar-napiragwad-soged-duled, baisur be itoged igi dulemar begi binsae, ar ade begardi emarbi dulemar be daked. Degisoggu, Bab-Dummad-igar-maid, napiragwadba be dulemar-odurdakdiid. Emide ¿we igar-nuedi, Roma-Dummad-César-nugad anmargi-mani-gaed-bennuked? ¿Anmar bennukoe, igi, anmar bennukosuli? ¿Igi be sogmosunna?
41012015	Jesús we-dulemar wagar-darbo-damalad mag daksoggu, wisid yamo e-yardakdanimalad. Amarga sogdesundo: —¿Ar ibiga bemar yamo an-wilubdakdanimala? Mani anse be sedamar, adi an dakegar.
41012016	Ese mani senonimargu, Jesús ese egichided: —¿Ar wede we-manigi doa-wagar-wilub sisunna, degine, doa-nug narmakar naibarsunna? Jesús-abin sogdemalad: —Roma-Dummad-César, a-wagar-wilub, degi, a-nug narmakarbalid.
41012017	Jesús, abin-sogdesun: —Ar ibmar Césargadir, Césarba be ibsamardo. Ar ibmar Bab Dummadgadirdi, Bab Dummadba be ibsamardo. Weyob Jesús ega soge itosmargu, dulemar-Jesússe-ibmar-egisnonimalad geger abin-itodmalad.
41012018	Saduceomar Jesússe nonimarmogad. Amarde sogmalad: “Dule burgwisale, gannar geg bar durguye.” Agala Saduceomar Jesússe we-igar-egisdemalad:
41012019	“Odurdaked-saila, Moisés anmarga Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar obesad: Ia mimmi-nikussuli ome-idu burgwisale, e-urba a-ome-nikuoye, adi e-iaga anagan-urbegarye.
41012020	“Dakargu, machimala e-gwenadgan-walagugle-na-gumaladi weyob gusdo. Ia-dummad ome-nikusgu, anagan-urbissuli burgwisdo.
41012021	A-sorbalid a-ome-nikunonimogu, amba e-iayob mimmi-nikussuli burgwismodo. Geb degi a-sorbalid amba a-ome-nikunonimogad.
41012022	Deyob bela-e-walagugled a-ome-nikusmaladbiid, anagan-gwen-obessuli bela burgwismalad. Geb a-sorba ome burgwismosunnad.
41012023	“Ar dule-gannar-durguoed-iba nonikile, a-masmala gannar durgualile, a-omede, ¿wede doa-omega guosunna, bela na e-gugle-nikusmaladbiid?”
41012024	Geb Jesús, abin-imakdegu, Saduceomarga sogded: “¿Bab-Dummad-Garda-narmakar-maid wichulidba, degi, Bab-Dummad-gangued wichulidba, bemar noar sogmarsursi? Eye, a-ular bemar noar sogmalad.
41012025	Ar dulemar gannar durguarmalale, ome-nikunai, degi, sui-nikunai na bar guosurmalad, ar ade angermar-nibnegginmaladyob gumaloed.
41012026	“¿Ar bemar dulemar-gannar-durgued-igar Moisés-gardagi-narmakar-maid absodisurmarsi? Moisés deun sapi-bula-gummakgwichi dakargu, ese nadgu, a-abargi Bab Dummad ega sogsa-gusad: ‘Ani an Abraham, Isaac, degi, Jacob, amar e-Bab-Dummadid.’
41012027	Degisoggu, Bab Dummad dulemar-burgwarmalad-e-Bab-Dummadsulid, Bab Dummad dulemar-dula-gudidimalad-e-Bab-Dummadid. Ar Abraham, Isaac, degi, Jacob, amar burgwismar-inigwele, Bab Dummadgardi amba dula gudidimalad. Degisoggu, bemar nue-noar sogmardo.”
41012028	Escriba-wargwen, Jesús nue-yeer Saduceomar-abin-imaksa itosad, Jesússe egisnonikid: —¿Bab-Dummad-igar-maid, igid bur-biriginedi?
41012029	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Igar-bur-birigined weedo: Israel-dulemar be itomar: Dummad, anmar-Bab-Dummad, abi Dummad-sunnadid.
41012030	Dummad, be-Bab-Dummad, bela be-gwagegi be sabguoed, bela be-san-burbagi, bela be-binsaedgi, degi, bela be-ganguedgi. We bur-igar-biriginedid.
41012031	A-igar-sorbalid amba degisaarbalid: ¡Na be-san-sabgueyob, dule-baid be sabgumogoed! Baid-igarmar weba bur birigined sulid.
41012032	Escriba, Jesús-abin sogded: —Nued, odurdaked-saila, napira be soged, Bab Dummad unnila wargwennaa gued, ayobid baid sulid.
41012033	Bela be Bab-Dummad-sabgued, bela be-gwagegi, bela be-ibmar-mag-ito-guedgi, bela be-san-burbagi, degi, bela be-ganguedgi. Degine, na be-san-sabgueyob dule-baid-sabgued, amar bur-biriginedid Bab Dummadga ibmar-gummakar-ukedba, degine, bela ibmar-baigan-ega-ukedba.
41012034	Jesús, escriba e-abin nue imaksa itosgu, ega sogded: —Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidgi dikasur be gudisulid. A-sorba dule-baid ibmar Jesússe gwen egisbi itonadsurmalad.
41012035	Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi Jesús dulemar-odurdaksigu, sogded: “¿Ibiga escribamar Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule-nik sogsunna, a-dule Rey-David-wagwaye?
41012036	Ar ade Rey-David-sunnad Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-sogedba sogsa-gusad: ¡Bab Dummad an-Dummadga soged: ‘An-argan-nuedsik be sige, be dule-dummadga guegar, bela-be-istarmaladgi nakwedse an be-imakedsegad!’
41012037	Ar David-sunnad Cristoga soged, be an-Dummadye, degite, ¿Cristo igi e-wagwaga gubarsunnoe?” Judio-dummagan gwen Jesús-abin imaksasurmalad. Ar bukidar-Jesús-itobukwa-gusmaladdi, bela nue-yeer Jesús-itobukwa-gusmalad.
41012038	Jesús dulemar-odurdakdegu, sogded: “Escribamargi nue salakarmar, mer amaryob bemar damalo. Ar amardi na yeer-ito damalad mor-oyaarmakdiir, degine, dulemar bela ese ibmar-ukleged-neggi goledbimalale, amba yeer-ito damarbalid.
41012039	Amardi Judiomar-onmaked-neggi dule-dummagan-gan-sigedginbi sigbi-damalad, degine, ibagi mas gullealir, dummagan-gan-sigedginbi sigbi-damarbalid.
41012040	“We-escribamar yamo-yardakar ammamar-ei-sui-burgwismalad ibe neg atursa-damalad, degine, dulemar yeer e-dakegala, yamo suitii Bab Dummadse gorgwis-damalad. Ar we-escribamar bur-bule sabsur-odurdaklemaloed deyob damaladba.”
41012041	Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi, mani-ulu-naba sii, daksii-gualid, dulemar igi ulu-yagi Bab Dummadga mani-urbenoni-damalad. Deun daksabalid mani-ibgan ulu-yagi mani-bukidar egwadnonidamalad.
41012042	Agi mukwa-wileged-wargwen, ei-sui-burgwisad nonimogad, mani-esnon-gwabo wis egwadnonikid.
41012043	Geb degi Jesús na e-sapinganse gochad, ega sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, we-mukwa bur-bule ulu-yagi dule-baiganba mani-egwachad.
41012044	¿Ibiga deyob an bemarga soge? Ar baigandi mani-uksamalad, ei-gwabgusad uknonimalad, we-mukwadi belagwa-na-nika-gudiid, e-wilesagwadgine na bela uknonikid.
41013001	Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi Jesús nodgu, e-sapin-wargwen ega sokalid: —Odurdaked-saila, akwamar-dummagan nue be dake. Bule burwi be dake. Degine, neg yeer-daklebalid.
41013002	Jesús, abin-imakdegu, ega sogded: —Ar we-neg yeer-daklegendo, degite, wemar-neg-dummagan be dakedi, degi, wemar-akwa-dummagan be dakedi, bipisaale akwa-gwagwensaar birgi na askin-askin bar sigosulid, bela egwallegoedbiid.
41013003	Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-ayaroedgi-sunmaksad-sorba na e-sapinganmala Olivos-yarse modapmarsunnad. A-yar Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-asabin siid. A-yargi Jesús sigidapgu, Pedro, Santiago, Juan, degi, Andrés, arbakee ese egichiarmalad:
41013004	—Anmarga be soge, ¿sana degite Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-ayarosunna? ¿Degine, we-ibagan mosar, ibi-wilubgan nibneggi oyoledagosunna? Be anmarga soge.
41013005	Jesús, abin-sogdegu, amarga sogded: “Nue salakarmar, mer dulemar be-yardaked be-imakmalo.
41013006	Ar bukidar yamo anyob imaknonimaloed, sognonimaloed: ‘Ani an Cristo, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule.’ A-dule, dulemar-bukidar-yardakoed, eba bukidar nagudmaloed.
41013007	“Bila-onogedgibi naguar bemar itoar-dibe, degine, bila-onoged daniye, aginbi sunmakmar bemar itoarbar-dibe, mer surbinsa be itomalo, ar wegiid-igargan degi-guedsegad. Degi-inigwele, negdi amba yo dukumoed.
41013008	Dulemar-yar-baid-baidgi-bukmalad na bila ononanai-gudamaloed, degi, reymar na muchub-muchub egi yolenanai na gudamarbaloed. Negabandur-dummagan yar-baid-baidgi nagumai-gudagoed. Ukud-dummad, degi, ibagan-bulegan nai-gudabaloed. Degi-inigwele, we-ibagan-bulegan unnila igi ome gebe e-bonigan-nunmaked itoar-daeyobdo. Ar a-sorbardi bur-bule ibagan-bulegan nonikoed.
41013009	“Degisoggu, nue salakarmar, ar dulemar bemar-ukmaloed Judio-dummagan-igar-nabiromaladse, degine, Judiomar-onmaked-neggine sabsur be-bibyomarbaloed. Ar be an-sapingansoggu, a-ular dummagan-neg-dakmamaidse, degi, reymarse be seledmaloed, adi bemar dummaganga angi sunmakegar.
41013010	Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued bela dulemar-yar-baid-baidgi-bukmaladga sunmaklegweler-gebed, we-ibagan-bulegan-danikoed-idu.
41013011	“Dummaganse bemar ebipiledele, mer bukib binsamalo, ibu an sogo-dibeye. Igar-itolenagusar, Bab Dummad bega binsaed ukoed, a be sogoed. Ar be-itolegedba be sunmakosulid, Bab Dummad Burba Nued beba sunmakoed.
41013012	“Dulemar na muchub-muchub e-gwenadgan-oburgwega na urmaknanai-gumaloed. Bab na mimmigi aibinnai-guoed, degi, mimmigan babgangi gwisgunai-gumogoed, na oburgwenanai-gumaloed.
41013013	Bemar an-sapingansoggu, a-ular bela-dulemar istar be-dakmaloed. Ar ibagan-bulegan-berguedse dule-gwen-galakussuliddina, adi nue abonolegodo.”
41013014	Jesús sogdebar: “Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged, Daniel, wegi-narmaksa, sogsado: Bab-Dummad-ibmar-istar-dakedi, Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse dognonikogu, neg-nued neg-iskanaga imakoed, ar ade a-negse dogedsulinad. Ani Jesús, an bemarga sogdo: Bemar deyob neg dakalile, we Daniel-sogsagusadba gunaido. Emi be-nabir-garda-absodidimalad mag ittos namaloed. Degisoggu, a-ibagi Judeagi be gudiile, yalaganba be wakinsun.
41013015	Ar agi dule-wargwen neg-uas-birgi siile, aidealir mer neg-yaba ibmar-oniega doged-saoed, bur yog wakinnar imakoed.
41013016	Ar dule-wargwen sapurba gudiile, mer gannar mor-sudagegala, negse bar daged-saoed, bur yog wakinnar imakoed.
41013017	“Ar ammamar-gurgin-nika-gudidimalad, degi, mimmigan-gwaruu-onunanaimaladdi a-ibagangi be nue wilemaloed, ar ade geg be abarmak-gumaloed.
41013018	Bab Dummadse be gormarsun, we-ibagan-bulegan mer di-wied-nigi guegar.
41013019	Ar a-ibagangi ibagan-buled, naibi-itoleged naiguoed. A-ibagan naibi-itolegedyobid Bab-Dummad-neg-obinnisad-akar gwen itoledisulid, degi, a-sorba ayobid bar itolegosurbalid.
41013020	Ar Bab Dummad a-ibagan-wileged giar imaksasulina, dulemar a-ibagangi gwen wakinosurmalanad, bela burgwemaloenad. Emigindi Bab Dummad na e-sordamar bato nugsaar-ese-gollesmalad-sabedba a-ibagan giar nasiksad.
41013021	“Degisoggu, dule-wargwen bemarga sokar-dibe: ‘¡Be dakena, wegi gudii Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule!’ Degi, bemarga sokarbar-dibe: ‘¡Be dakena, weba Cristo gudibar!’ Deyob dule-bega-sogedba mer be ibsamalo.
41013022	“Ar ade yamo-binsa-Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-duleyob, degi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbegedyob-na-imakmalad nonimaloed. Amar galagwensuli ibmar-wilubgan imakdamaloed, degi, ibmar-dakledisurmalad imakdamarbaloed, adi dulemar-yardakegar. Amba Bab-Dummad-sunnad-na-nug-imasmaladse-bakar sunna ese yardaklegena ese yardaklesmarmogaled.
41013023	Degisoggu, nue salakarmar, ar bato iduakwaa an bela bemarga sogsamalad, mer yardaklemaloye.”
41013024	Jesús sogdebar: “A-ibagangi, ibagan-naibi-itoleged-sorbardi, dad-ibeler bar gaosulid, nii bar gaosurmogad.
41013025	Niskwamardi nibneggi-nanaid babatidagoed, nibneggi ibmar-dummagan gala-nika-nanaid bela giglimakoed.
41013026	“Geb degine, ani Dule-Machi, mogir-imbaba bela-bela an-ganguedba, degi, bela-bela an-yeer-daklegedba dani an-dakdamaloed.
41013027	Geb degi an-angermar an barmidoed, bela-an-sordamar-bato-nugsalesmalad anga wenaegar. Amar napneg-ugakase, degi, nibneg-ugakase bela duurmaknonimaloed.
41013028	“Sapi-higuera e-wilubgangi be durdakmar. Ar e-anagan dudumaksale, degi, e-gagan aramaksale, bemar nue wisid yor omodanikid.
41013029	Amba deyobmodo, we-ibmarmar an-bemarga-sogsamaladi deyob guar bemar dakalir, bemar wisdo, ani Dule-Machi, an-danikid nue omosad.
41013030	“Napira an bemarga soged, we-dulemar-burgwed-idu, we-ibmargan bela guedsegad.
41013031	Nibnegdi, degi, napnegdi bela berguoed, an-gaya-burbadi gege bergued, adi degi-sadeguoed.
41013032	“Ar an-danikoed-ibadi, degi, a-wachidi dule gwen wichulid. Angermar-nibneggi-bukwamalad, degi, ani Bab-Dummad-Machi, anse-bakar gwen wichurmogad, unnila Bab Dummadbi wisid sana an danikoed.
41013033	An-danikoed-ibagan bemar wichursoggu, be nue atakmar, guagwar ambikumar, be gatik Babse gormar.
41013034	“An-danikoed dule-wargwen dikasur neggwebur-baidse nasokaliyobsundo: Nasokargu, ega-arbamaladga arbaed uksagu, amarga-neg-obes nadsunnad. Degine, yawagak-dakedga sogsabalid, nue nakulegoye.
41013035	“Bemar neg-ibed sana-danikid wichursoggu, nue nakulemar. Neg-ibed sedogwen daniko-dibe, neg-gabgwen-dibe, gebe-gannir-namaksiidgin-dibe, igi, wakdar-dibe.
41013036	Adi ukiar bemargi danikir, mer gabmai be-daknonimalagar, (debayobi an nonimogoed, dule gwen wichulid sana an danikoed).
41013037	An-bemarga-sogedi, bemargarbi an sogsulid, bela-dulemar-baiganga an sogmogad, nue nakulemaloye.”
41014001	Deun Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Iba ibabose guoele, degi, Madu-Inasuli-Niksuli-Gulleged-Ibagi, amba ibabo-napidginmoga, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, escribamar igar-amiarmalad, igi-saele, Jesús anmar yamo-yardakar gao-dibeye, geb degi adi oburgwemalagarye.
41014002	Judio-dummagan na ga sogdemar: “Mer ibagi anmar Jesús-gamalo. Degiir, dulemar Jesúsbina urwedamaloed.”
41014003	Jesús Betania-neggweburgi gudii, Simón-naibe-buna-ya-maleged-nika-gudigusad-negse mas gunnaded. A-neggi mas gunsigu, ome-wargwen gwallu-wawaa-nuedi, nardo-nugad, gargerba-baklegedi, bute akwa-alabastro-nugadgi sii, senonikid. Ome gwallu-wawaa-bute-nono bichisgu, Jesús-nonogi a-gwallu-wawaad eosad.
41014004	Gwenna-gwenna-ome-dakbukmalad uludmalad, na ga sogdemalad: “¿Ibiga binsarsunna gwallu-wawaa-nued we-ome wiosa?
41014005	¿Ar wede we gwallu-wawaad manigi uklesana, dule-wargwen birgagwen-arbanai-bennuklesa-wilub uklesansursi, geb degi wileganga e-mani nabir uklesansursi?” Deyob dulemar omegi sunmaknanai-guarmalad, egi uludmalad.
41014006	Ar Jesúsdi sogded: —Mer ese achamar, we-omese mer urwemar. We-ome ibmar-imaksad dog-nued angi binsasad.
41014007	Dule-wileganadi gusgu bemarba gudii degi-sadeguoed, degisoggu, wilegana sunna an-sorba bemar bendakoed, andi bemarba gudigu sadeguosulid.
41014008	Ar we-ome ibmar-imaksad na sunna-ibmar-imakedba imaksad. We-ome an-diglegoed-iduar gusgu anmar-igar-maidba gwallu-wawagi an-magsad.
41014009	“Napira an bemarga soged, bia an-gaya-burba-nuedgi we-napneggi sunmaklegoe, we-ome-anga-ibmar-imaksadgi sunmaklemogoed, adi we-ome-ibmar-imaksadgi binsamalagar.”
41014010	Judas Iscariote, Jesús-e-sapingan-ambe-gakabogwad-wargwen, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummaganse nade-gusad, adi darba Jesús amarga ukegar.
41014011	Judio-dummagan Judas-itosmargu, weligwar itoarmalad, degi, ega sogdemalad: “Anmar mani bega ukoed.” Degisoggu, Judas igar-amiarsun, igi-saele darba Jesús-uko-dibeye.
41014012	Judio-ibagi, Madu-Ina-Niksuli-Gulleged-Iba gebe-onodedgi, degi, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Ibagi sibad-wawaad-oburgwile-daed-ibagi, e-sapingan Jesúsga sognonimalad: —¿Bia anmar guagwar bega neg-amimaloe, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Ibagi mas-gulleged mas gunnega?
41014013	Degi Jesús na e-sapingan-warbo-barmisad, amarga sogsad: —Neggweburse be namar. Agi bemar dule-wargwen-dakdapoed gwidugi dii semai, a-duleba bemar namaloed.
41014014	A-dule bia dogdapoe, a-neg-ibedga bemar sogmaloed: ‘Odurdaked-saila sogye: Bia an sapinganmala Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Ibagi mas-gunnoed-neg siiye.’
41014015	Neg-ibed neg-dummad guagwar bato nue-saale, niba-ailabirgi bemarga oyogoed. Agi guar bemar anmar-idu mas urbemaloed.
41014016	Jesús-sapingan-warbogwad neggweburse nadmarsun. Neggweburse modapmargu, ar igi Jesús emarga sogsa, deyob dakdapmalad. A-neggi ibagi na mas gunmalaga, bela ibmar guagwar urbismarsunnad.
41014017	A-ibagi neg-mutikudgu, Jesús, degi, e-sapingan-ambe-gakabogwadmala nonimarsunnad.
41014018	Mesa-naba ambikunonimargu, mas gutemalad. Agi Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, bemar-wargwen-anba-mas-gunsiidi darba an-ukoed.
41014019	A-ular e-sapingan wile itodmalad, Jesússe gwenna-gwenna na egisdemarsunnad: —¿Ani an be-ukoye? Sur an insado. Degi baid sogdemogad: —¿Ani an be-ukoye? Sur an insado.
41014020	Jesús, na e-sapingan-abin sogded: —Bemar ambe-gakabogwad-wargwen anba-bategi-madu-wara-saoed, a darba an-ukoed.
41014021	Napira an bemarga soged, ani Dule-Machi, ar igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi angi narmakar nai, ar deyob an guoed, an burgoed. Ar dule-darba-an-ukoeddina nue wilegoed. A-dule gwalulessulina bur nabirindo.
41014022	Mas gunbukmargu, Jesús madu-susgua, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsa-gusad. Geb a-sorba Jesús madu biske-biske imaksad, e-sapinganga ukde, sogded: —Be sumar, we-madu an-sanad. Jesús na e-sapinganmala we-madu guchamarsunnad.
41014023	A-sorba Jesús nog-susbalid. Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsabargu, e-sapinganga ukdebalid, agi e-sapingan bela gobsamalad.
41014024	Geb degi Jesús e-sapinganga sogded: —We, an-abe. An-abe Bab Dummad dulemarbo igar-bini-mesnaid-wilubganad, degi, an-abe dulemar-bukidar-ular milegoed.
41014025	Napira an bemarga soged, emigindi, uva-nisdi we-sorba bar an gobosulid, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse geb an gobdapaloed.
41014026	Bab-Dummad-nuggi namaksamalad-sorba, Olivos-yarse nadmarsunnad.
41014027	Geb degi, Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded: —Belagwapa emi-mutik bemar angi bangudmaloed, ar ade Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid, sognaid: Sibad-wawaad-edarbed an oburgoed, Geb agi sibad-wawaad bela duurmakdoed.
41014028	Jesús sogdebar: —Geb gannar an durgusad-sorba, bemar-idu Galilease an naoed.
41014029	Geb degi Pedro Jesúsga sogded: —Bela begi bangudmalale, andi begi gwen banguosulid.
41014030	Jesús, Pedro-abin sogded: —Napira an bega soged, emi-mutiki, gannir-ilabo-namaked-iduar, ilapaa be an-osulogoed.
41014031	Ar Pedro aka-bur-bule sogded: —Ar an beba burgweye sogele, amba an be-osulogosulid. E-sapingan-baigan bela degibi sogdemalad.
41014032	Jesús na e-sapinganmala Getsemaní-neg-nugadse nonimalad. Agi e-sapinganga Jesús sogded: —Wegi bemar ambikumar, andi Bab Dummadse bina gorgwelo.
41014033	Unnila Pedro, Santiago, degi, Juan, amarbi eba sesa-gusad. Agi Jesús na nue-wilegoedba nue-wile itoalid, degi, nue-surbinsa itoarbalid.
41014034	Agi Jesús na e-sapingan-walapaagwadga sogded: —Andi an ulubgi nue-bukib an itogedba sunna an burgwisar an itoged. Wegi be ambikumar, nue atakmalo, Bab Dummadse be gormalo.
41014035	Jesús sikwas nadgu, yokorgi sindigar napagi dulluu sigdapgu, Bab Dummadse gorsigisad, bitigi ega sunna egi-nunmaked-danikoed ega osulogena-gadinye.
41014036	Jesús Bab Dummadse gorsigu, wegi sogded: “An-Bab, begardi bela ibmar sunna guedbiid. An-idu igar-buled naid, ina-gaibid gobedyob beedse an egi wilegoed, be anga osuloge, degite an-sogedbarsur, unnila, be-sogedbarbi be imaksun.”
41014037	Jesús Bab-Dummadse-gorsiid bergusgu, na e-sapinganse nonikid, daknonikid bela gabmamai. Geb degi Jesús Pedroga sogded: —¿Simón, be gabmai? ¿Wachi-irgwensaar Babse golega wis geg be atake?
41014038	Nue atak, Bab Dummadse be gole, adi iskuedgi wilubdakleged mer bemarse warmakmalagar. An wisi bemar burbadi Babse golega guagwar gudiid, bemar sandi degisulid, adi nolloo gued.
41014039	Jesús gannar nadbargu, gannar Bab Dummadse gotebalid, gannar idu-sogsadgii sogdebalid.
41014040	Jesús Bab-Dummadse-gorsiid bergusgu, gannar na e-sapinganse nonibargu, daknonikid gabmamai, ar ade gabed nue egi obin-itomalad. E-sapingandi nue gabmamai Jesús odaksasoggu, wichurmarsunnad, igi abin-sogmaloe. Geb degi Jesús gannar nadbalid Babse golegar.
41014041	Jesús ilapaagus gannar e-sapinganse nanaedgine, amarga sogdesunnad: —Bemar gabmarsun, bemar obunnomarsun. Bergussun, wachidi omossun. Emigindi, ani Dule-Machi, dulemar-iskudidimaladse darba ukle-sokarsunnad, adi an-oburgwemalagar.
41014042	Degisoggu, bemar gwisgumarsun, namarsun, dule-darba-an-uksaddi bato anmar walikgusad.
41014043	Jesús amba e-sapinganga sunmakgwichi, e-sapingan-warambe-gakabogwad-wargwen, Judas-nugad, ese nonikid. Aba dule-irwa-Babse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, escribamar, degine, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan, dulemar-bukidar-barmiar-gusmalad. We-dulemar-bukidar espunyar-yalaba, degi, suarmar-annik-annik Judasba duurmakdani-gusmalad.
41014044	Judas, Jesús-darba-uksadi, dulemar-nonimalad-ebo igar-nabosad, ega sogsad: “Ar dule-e-wagar an uoed, ega sogegar, be nued sogeye, a-dule be gamaloed, degi, nue a-dule bemar sedmaloed.”
41014045	Judas nonigu, Jesússe naded. Jesús-walik gwisgudapgu, ega sogded: —Odurdaked-saila. Geb degi ei-wagar usa imaksad.
41014046	Degi dulemar Jesússe achadmargu, Jesús-gasmarsunnad.
41014047	Ar e-sapin-wargwen Jesús-naba-gwichidi, espunyar onosgu, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummad-e-mai naibi imaksad, e-uaya ei siksad.
41014048	Jesús dulemarga sogded: —¿Ibiga bemar dule-iskana-ibmar-atursaedyob an-gadanimala, emide espunyar, degi, suarmar-yalaba bemar an-gadanimargu?
41014049	Bane-bane bemarba an gudigusad, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi dulemar-odurdakdii, degite, agindi bemar gwen an-gassurmalad. Emigindi ar igar-maidbali, adi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi-narmakar-naidba guegala, bemar an-gamaloed.
41014050	Degi Jesús-sapingan, Jesús wargwen mete, e-idu bela duurmakdemalad.
41014051	Deun sapingwa-wargwen Jesúsba nadap-gusmogad. A-sapin mor yoi-suli, unnila atuedgi e-san-bipirmakar eba nadap-gusad. A-sapin-gasmargu,
41014052	binnasur guar, atued-mide, nabir aimargi noded, uka-swiri abarmakde-gusad.
41014053	Dulemar-Jesús-gasmaladi dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummadse Jesús-senonimarsunnad. Agi bela dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan, degi, escribamar, bela ambikunonimalad Jesúsga igar-itogegar.
41014054	Pedrodi bannabasaar Jesúsba nadap-gusmogad, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummad-neg-imbase warmakdapid. Pedro suar-ibmalad-imbagi sigdapid, wis na soogi wadapmogad.
41014055	Dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, bela-Judio-dummagan-igar-nabiromalad, igar-aminanai-guarmalad, igi-saele Jesús-nodiid amimalo-dibeye, adi Jesús-oburgwemalagar. Degite gwen amissurgusmalad, bia Jesús nodiid.
41014056	Ar ade bukidar Jesúsgi istar sunmaknanaid, bela yamo-gakansaar ibmar sognanaisoggu, na gwen balillaa sogsasurmalad.
41014057	Gwen-gwen gwisgusgua, yamo-gakansaar sogdemalad:
41014058	—Anmar we-Jesús soge itosmarye: ‘We-neg, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-siid, dulemar-sobsadi an earoye. Geb degi ibapaagi Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg gannar an soboeddina, dulemar-sobsulid an soboye.’
41014059	Ar degi-sognanaimalad na degite balillaa gwen barsogsasurmalad.
41014060	Degi dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummad, dummagan-abargi gwisgusgu, Jesúsga sogded: —¿Be dulemar-abin-imakosuli? ¿Ar wede igi be sogmosunna, begi sunmaknanaidgi?
41014061	Jesús bipisaar gwen abin-imaksasulid, degi, gwen akar sogsasurbalid. Dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummad Jesússe-ibmar-egichided, gannar ega sogded: —¿Ar be Cristo, Bab-Dummad-Bur-Odummolediid E-Machi-sunnadi?
41014062	Degi Jesús, abin-sogded: —An aado. Ani Dule-Machi, bela-Bab-Dummad-gangued-nikad e-argan-nuedsik dule-dummadga-an-sii be an-dakmaloed, degine, nibneggi mogir-imbaba-dani be an-dakmarbaloed.
41014063	Geb degi dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummad e-mor na esirmaksad, oyogegar Jesús-degi-sogsad ede sae-itoye, Bab Dummadgi dodoguye. Degi dummaganga sogded: —¿Ar ibiga e-barsogmalad anmar bar abesunna?
41014064	Ar bemar-sunnad na itosmalad we-Jesús Bab-Dummad-nuggi dodosad. ¿Igi bemar itomarmosunna? Dummagan-igar-itobukmalad belagwapa sogdemalad: —Oburgwed ega igar-maid, degisoggu, nue-oburgwed imakmarsun.
41014065	Gwenna-gwenna Jesúsgi wiakdemalad. Jesús-ibya-edusar, geb bibyosar, ega sogde-damalad: —Ar bela be ibmar wissoggu, emigi be sogena, ¿doa be-sarsosa? Jesúsdi dulemar-gwen-abin-imaksasulid. Agi suar-ibmala wagargi Jesús-bibyonai-gusmarmogad.
41014066	Pedro aila-urba neg-imbagi sii, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummadga-bunagwa-arbaed nonikid.
41014067	Bunagwa Pedro soogi wasii dakargua, nue-nuu dakdegu, ega sogded: —Jesús-Nazaretginedba be gudidamogad.
41014068	Pedro bunagwa-abin-osulod, sogded: —Aku an ito ibi be anga obare, degine, a-dule aku an dakbalid. A-sorba Pedro magaba-noed-yawagakse nadgu, gannir namakded.
41014069	Bunagwa gannar Pedro-dakarbargu, dulemar-bukmaladga sogded: —We-dule Jesúsba-gudii an daksamogad.
41014070	Pedro gannar osulodbalid. Degine, sikwas sanargusadgine Pedro-dikarba-gwigwismalad Pedroga sogdemarmogad: —Napira an bega soged, be Jesús-sordamogad, ar be Galilea-dolad, degi, be-sunmakedi a-dulemargii be sunmakmogad.
41014071	Geb degi Pedro ukabsaar ibmar sokalid, degi, sogdebalid: —Bab-Dummad-nuggi napira an bemarga soged, we-dulegi-bemar-sunmaknanaid an aku daked.
41014072	Degi-sogsagu, ilaboguddo gannir namaked. Agi Pedro ebinsaas-naded igi Jesús ega ibmar sogsad: “Gannir-ilabo-namaked-iduar, ilapaa be an-osulogoye.” Pedro deyob Jesús-ega-sogsad insadgu, ise-boar naded.
41015001	Wakudaryalaba, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, Judiomar-girmar-dummagan, degi, escribamar, bela Judio-dummagan-igar-nabiromalad igar-itosmargu, argan-edinnar Jesús-sesmalad. Geb degi Pilatoga Jesús-uksamarsunnad, ega igar-itogegar.
41015002	Geb Pilato Jesússe egichided: —¿Ar be Judiomar-E-Rey? Jesús, abin-imakdegu, ega sogded: —Ar bede soged.
41015003	Dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan sognanai-guarmalad, Jesús igar-iskana imakdiiye.
41015004	Pilato gannar Jesússe egichided, ega sogded: —¿Be dulemar-abin imaksuli? Be dake bule begi sognanai, bede ibmar-iskana imakdiiye.
41015005	Degite, Jesús bipisaale gwen abin-imaksasulid. Degisoggu, Pilato geger daksunnad, ar ibiga-wede Jesús dulemar-abin imaksuli.
41015006	Dakleargu, ibagi Pilato gusgu Judiomar-egismaladba dule-wargwen-eskaryagi-mellesiid ega ono-daed.
41015007	Agine, dule-wargwen, Barrabás-nugadi, e-sordamarmala eskaryagi deun mellesii-gusad. Ar ade amar Roma-dulemargi gwisgusmargu, neg-oimakdii dulemar-oburgwis-gusmalad.
41015008	Dulemar-bukidar Pilatose nonimalad, ese egisnonimalad, dule-wargwen-eskaryagi-mellesiid igi gusgu Judiomar-ibagi ega ono-dae, deyob ega onobaligar.
41015009	Pilato dulemar-abin-imakdegu sogded: —¿Judiomar-E-Rey bemarga onobi be an-abemala?
41015010	Ar ade Pilato wisid, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan binsa Jesúsgi-nobmaladbali ega uksamalad.
41015011	Dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagandi mer-Jesús-onogegala yamo dulemar-ibe-binsaed-gasmalad, adi Barrabás-onomalagar.
41015012	Pilato dulemarse gannar egisdebarsunnad: —¿Judiomar-E-Reyye bemar biedi igi imakbi be an-abemarsunna?
41015013	Dulemar Pilato-abin-oimakdemalad: —¡We-dule nakrusgi bioke!
41015014	Pilato, dulemar-abin-sogded: —¿Ar degite, we-dulede ibu-ibmar-iskana wede imaksunna? Agi dulemar bur-bule oimakdemalad, sogdemalad: —¡We-dule nakrusgi bioke!
41015015	Pilato nabir-dulemar-ito imakbisoggu, Barrabás ega onossunnad. Jesúsdi sabsur-bibyosad-sorba suar-ibmalaga uksasunnad, adi nakrusgi bioknamalagar.
41015016	Degi suar-ibmala Jesús-sesmarsunnad Pilato-neg-Pretorio-nugad-imbase. Agi suar-ibmala bela e-sordamar-danagwenad Jesússe ambikunonimalad.
41015017	Geb degi suar-ibgan mor-suir-akwagiid, reygadgiid, geb Jesúsga yosmalad, degi, e-nonogi iko-gurgin-sobaled sismarbalid.
41015018	Geb degi yamo Jesúsgi dodonagusmalad, binnasur gotemalad: —¡Be Judiomar-E-Rey, suibaksaar be ani gudigusana-gadin!
41015019	A-sorba nonogi suargi Jesús-sarsosmalad, degi, egi wiaksamarbalad, agi yamo yokorgi sindigar Jesús-abin signoni-damalad, yamo e-nug odummonaiyob.
41015020	Suar-ibgan Jesúsgi-dodosmalad-sorba, mor-suir-akwagiid ega esusmalad, adi e-mor ega gannar yomalagar. Geb degi Jesús-sesmarsunnad, nakrusgi biokmalagar.
41015021	Suar-ibgan igarba Jesús-semaigu, dule-wargwen Jerusalénse-dani abinguarmalad. A-dule dakargu, Simón, Cirenegined. A-dulede Alejandro, degi, Rufo-e-bab. Suar-ibgan a-dule gannar-obirismalad ise-barmiar Jesúsga nakrus-seega imaksamalad.
41015022	Gólgota-neg-nugadse Jesús-sesmarsunnad. Gólgota sogleged, Dule-Nonogar-Nega.
41015023	A-negse modapmargu, vino ina-gaibidgi oburaledba suar-ibgan Jesús-ogobdemalad, adi dogdar mer wis nunmaked itogegar, ar Jesúsdi gwen abin-gobsasulid.
41015024	Suar-ibgan nakrusgi Jesús-bioksamargu, Jesús-morgi dodoarmalad, na wilubdaknai-guarmalad, igid Jesús-mor na emargadga guo-dibeye.
41015025	Dakargu, deun dad-abar-dummad-gusad, Jesús nakrusgi bioksamargu.
41015026	E-nakrus-birgi narmaksamalad, ibiga Jesús burgwenai. Narmakaled weyob sognaido: |scWE, JUDIOMAR-E-REY|d.
41015027	Geb degi suar-ibgan dulemar-atursamalad-warbo nakrusgi bioksamarmogad. Wargwen Jesús-nakrus-argan-nuedsik ogwichismalad, baiddi Jesús-nakrus-argan-sapiledsik.
41015028	Igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi Jesúsgi narmakar nai, degi-sognaidba gunonikid: Dulemar-gwage-iskudimaladyob we-dule-dakmaloed.
41015029	Dulemar-Jesús-dikarba-nasdamalad ise-dodoar egi nas-damalad, yamo ega nono-ege-ege gunadap nas-damalad, ega sogde-damalad: —¡Yaped! Be Babse-goled-neg-e-aroedi, degine, ibapaagi-gannar-sobbaloedi,
41015030	na be-dukin bendak-den, nakrusgi-naid be aideda-den.
41015031	Amba deyob dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, escribamar Jesúsgi dododmarmogad, na ga sogdemalad: —We-Jesús, dule-baigandi nabir bendaksad, edi dukin na geg bendaked.
41015032	Ar ede Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dulele, Israel-Dulemar-E-Reyle, nakrusgi-naid aideda-den, adi anmar dakegar, geb agi anmar egi benguosulid. Jesúsba-nakrusgi-bioklegar-naimarmogadse-bakar egi dodonanai-gusmarmogad.
41015033	Dad-yorukugusgu, bela-napneggi neg-sichid nagunonikid, wachi-irbaase naigusad.
41015034	Wachi-irbaa gusgu Jesús binnasur gote, sogded: —|iEloi, Eloi, ¿lama sabactani?|r A-sogleged: An-Bab-Dummad, An-Bab-Dummad, ¿ibiga be angi bangusa?
41015035	Jesús-nakrus-walik-bukmalad gwena-gwena Jesús degi-soge itosmargu, sogdemalad: —Be itomar, wede Elíasse gornaid.
41015036	Degi dule-wargwen abarmakded, vino-gaibidgi ibmar-buta-butadi owardikusad, geb suar-dukugi edichagu, Jesúsga ukded, adi suk-suk saegar. Geb degi dule sogded: —Mer ese achamar, dakmalo, bule Elías odenoniko-dibe.
41015037	Geb Jesús napi binnasur gotegu, burkwis naded.
41015038	Deun Jerusaléngi, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi, Neg-Islidikid-irwa mor-naid niba achirmakde urbalidse-bakar gusad.
41015039	Degi, Roma-suar-ibed, sordamar-dulatar-sediid, daksad Jesús binnasur-gochad-sorba igi burgwisa, a-dule sogded: —We-dule, nue Bab-Dummad-Machi-sunnadid.
41015040	Bannabasaar omeganmo Jesús-dakbuk-gusmarmogad. Amar-omegan-abargi gwichi-gusmogad: María-Magdalena, degi María, Santiago-bipigwad-e-nan, a, José-e-nanbalid, degi, Salomé, geb omegan-baiganmo.
41015041	We-omegan, Jesús-Galileagi-gudidagu, gusgu Jesúsba gudidamarmogad, degi, ega ibmar-imakdii-gusmalad. Degi, bukidar omegan-baigan-Jesúsba-Jerusalénse-nonimalad, dakbukwa-gusmarmogad.
41015042	Deun a-ibagi Ibmar-Guagwar-Sied-Ibad, bato obunnoged-iba warmakdanisoggu, neg-sedodgu,
41015043	José, Arimatea-neggweburgined, Pilatose nade-gusad. A-Joséde Judio-igar-nabiromaladgi nue nug-nikmogad, Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid nue edarbedimogad-dulemogad. Joséde Pilatose dobsuli nonikid, Jesús-e-mui-egisnonikid, adi neg-uanse dignaegar.
41015044	Pilato, abin geg-itoded, bato Jesús burgwisad. Degisoggu, Roma-sordamar-dulatar-sediidse gochasunnad, agi ese egichided, bato Jesús burgwis sogeye.
41015045	Roma-sordamar-dulatar-sediid, Pilatoga bela ibmar sogsagu, Pilato Joséga igar-uksasunnad, Jesús-mui-sedegar.
41015046	Degi, José atued-binid baksagu, Jesús-mui nakrusgi-naid odesad, geb degi atued-sipugi nue obipirmaksad. Geb degi José akwa-gwisar-neg-uanga-siid-yaba Jesús-mesisad. Geb degi José akwa-dummad neg-uan-yawagakse obaparmasgu, akwa-dummad yawagak-idu sisad.
41015047	María-Magdalena, degi, María, José-e-nan, daksamalad bia Jesús diglesad.
41016001	Obunnoged-iba nasgu, María-Magdalena, degi, María, Santiago-e-nan, agi Salomé, amar gwallu-wawagwad-nuegan baksamalad, adi Jesús-muigi eomalagar.
41016002	Itoged-iba-gebe-nagudedgi, wakudaryalaba, geb dad-nakwialidgi, neg-uanse omegan nadmalad.
41016003	Igarba na sunmaknadapmalad: —¿Wede doa anmarga akwa-dummad, neg-uan-yawagakgi-siid onirosunna?
41016004	Neg-uan mosmargu, dakarmalad bato akwa-dummad-neg-uan-yawagakgi-siid onirar-sii.
41016005	Omegan neg-uan-yaba dogdemargu, sapin-gwensak Jesús-mai-gusad-argan-nuedsik sii dakarmalad, mola-sibu-suid-yoi sii. Deyob dakarmargu, omegan egi gwakidmalad.
41016006	Sapingwa omeganga sogded: —Mer bemar dobgumar, an wisi bemar Jesús-Nazaretgined-nakrusgi-biokles-gusad-amidanimalad. Jesús wegi bar maisulid, bato gannar durgusad. Bemar dakena, bia Jesús-mai-gusad e-gannar.
41016007	Bemar namar, e-sapinganga sognamar, Pedroga: ‘Jesús bemarga sogsadgii, bemar-idu Galilease nadye. Ede agi bemar dakoye-sogsa nadye.’
41016008	Omegan neg-uangi noarmargu, duurmakdemalad, ar ade wawanmakdemalad, gwakidmalad. Ar nue-dobe itomarsoggu, dulemarga gwen sogsasurmalad, Jesús-durgusad-igar. [
41016009	Jesús wakudaryalaba durgusad-ibagi, gebe-itoged-iba-nagudedgi, gebesaila María-Magdalenase na san magarosad. A-omega Jesús nia-walagugle-onos-gusad.
41016010	A-ome nadgu, dulemar-Jesúsba-bipirmakdigusmaladse modapgu, a-dulemar bukib-binsabukwa, degi, bobukwa, dakdapid. Geb María-Magdalena amarga sogded, Jesús durgusye.
41016011	Ar amar Jesús dulaye itoarmargu, degi, an daksaye María-Magdalena amarga soggu, bengudmalad.
41016012	A-sorba Jesús, e-sapingan-warbo-sapurba-nadapidse na e-san-gwagsad magarosbalid.
41016013	Amar-warbogwad, Jerusalénse gannar nonimargu, e-sapingan-baigan-owisononimalad, Jesús-ese-magarosad-igar. Degite e-sapingan amarse-bakar gwen itossurmalad, ar bengudmalad.
41016014	Degid-sorbali e-ambe-gakagwensakad mas-gunbukwadgine, Jesús na san magaro nonibarsunnad. E-sapingan amba aku-itomarsoggu, degi, bengusmarbarsoggu, Jesús amarga ibmar binnasur sogdesunnad, ar ade dulemar-Jesús-gannar-durgusad-daksamalad bengusmalad.
41016015	Jesús e-sapinganga sogdesunnad: “Bela dulemar-we-napneggi-bukmaladse be namar, bela dulemarga Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi angi bemar sunmaknamarsun.
41016016	Ar dulemar angi bensulidba an-abingasmalale, degi, digi-ogleged-igar imaksamalale, amar abonolemaloed. Ar dulemar-angi-bengusmaladdi, degi, an-abingassurmaladdina, adi e-san-burba degi-odurdakle-sii na sadeguoed.
41016017	“Dulemar-angi-bengussurmalad-ular, amardi we-ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad imakoed. Amardina an-nuggi niamar-onioed, degi, gaya-gwapid nabir-sunmak-gumaloed.
41016018	Dule-an-bensurmalad sunna naibe-bulegan gae-gumaloed, ar degi, ina-sunna-dule-ibloged gobsamalale, a-ina amar-gwen-oburgosurmalad. Dulemar-gegumalad-birgi e-argan-mesisale, a-dulemar yog nuguar-gumaloed.”
41016019	Dummad-Jesús degi-sunmaksad-sorba, Bab-Dummad-negse nakwid-gusad, degi geb Bab-Dummad-argan-nuedsik dummadga sigidapsunnad.
41016020	Degine, Jesús-sapingan nadmargu, geb neggwebur-iliba Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmakdemalad. Dummad-Jesús nue amar-bendaksad, degine, ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad nue oyodmalad, adi dulemar mag dakmalagar, we-igargi-sunmakdimalad igar-napiragwadye. Be itomargua.]
42001001	Ar dule-bukidargus bato nue-inikii igar-napiragwad anmar-abargi-gusad narmaksaye sogdidimalando,
42001002	ar gebesaila Jesús-sapingan na e-sunnad Jesús-daksamalad, igi anmar-odurdaksamala, amarde, Bab-Jesús-igargi sunmakdii-gusmalad.
42001003	Dummad-Teófilo, nue an baiganse egichisad-sorba, an dakmogua, ib-nueddo, Jesús-igar gebesaila onoded-akar, nue ilekwaa bega an narmaker,
42001004	adi be nue wisgumogagar Jesús-igargi-be-odurdaklesad we napiragwadid, gakansulid.
42001005	Rey-Herodes, Judea-yargi neg-dakmaigu, deun dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-wargwen, Abías-sikid, mai-gusad. A-dulede Zacarías-nugad, e-omedi Aarón-wagan-sikidid, Elisabetye-nugad.
42001006	Emide ebobela Bab-Dummad-asabin dule-igar-napiragwadba-damalad gumalad, degine, Bab Dummad egi ibmar akar-soged sated. Bab-na-e-igar-uksadba, degine, Bab-Dummad-sogsadbali-nanadimalad-dulemalad.
42001007	Ar amarde mimmi-satemalad, ar ade Elisabet geg mimmi-baked, degine, bato amarde sered gusmarbalid.
42001008	Ibagwengine, Abías-sikmaladga wilub nonikid Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi arbaegar. Deunni, Zacarías Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-golega arbanonimogad.
42001009	Na gusgu igi dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormala, deyob Zacarías nugsalealid, Bab-Dummad-Neg-Islidikidgi dogegar, ina-wawadikid ase obupurmaknaegar.
42001010	Degine, ina-wawadikid-ogumaked-wachigi, deun bela-dulemar magaba Bab Dummadse gorbukwa-gusmalad.
42001011	Zacarías Bab-Dummad-Neg-Islidikidgi ina-wawadikid ogumaknaidgi, Bab-Dummad-anger-wargwen, Zacaríasse ukiar magargunonikid, daklealid ina-wawadik ogumakleged-galu-naba, argan-nuedsik gwichi.
42001012	Zacarías deyob Bab-Dummad-anger-dakargu, gwakided, bela nue-dobee ito naded.
42001013	Ar angerdi ega sogded: “Zacarías, melle dobgu, ar Bab-Dummadse-be-goledi Bab Dummad be-itosad, be-ome-Elisabet bega machi-wargwen-bakoed, e-nug Juanye be onugsao.
42001014	Be machi-nikuoedba, be yeer itogoed, be weligwar itogoed, degine, be-machi gwalulenonikir, bukidar egi weligwar itomarmogoed.
42001015	“Ar be-machide Bab-Dummad-asabin dule-dummadga guoed. Vino, degi, inna-gaibid gobosulid, degine, amba muu-neggi mai, bato Bab Dummad Burba Nued bela-bela nika-guoed.
42001016	Deginbali, we-machi gannar Bab-Dummad-Jehováse, Israel-dulemar-bukidar obirnai-guoed.
42001017	Ar be-machi-Juan, Dule-Dummad-idu nadap-guoed, Elíasyob. Deyob Bab-Dummad-Burba, degi, Bab-Dummad-gangued nika-gumogoed, adi babgan gannar na e-mimmigangi binsa imakegar, sabguegar, degi, dulemar-galagwensuli-gudimalad dulemar-nuegan-binsaed-nikaa-damaladga imakegar, degine, adi, dulemar guagwar urbegar, Bab-Dummad-abingamalagar.”
42001018	Degi Zacarías angerga sogded: —¿Degite igi an wisguosunna be-anga-soged we deyob guoed? Ar ande seredgusad, degi, an-omede bato seredgusmogad.
42001019	Anger, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Ani an Gabriel, Bab-Dummad-asabin an gwichid, Bab-Dummad-sogedba an ibmar imakegar. Ani an barmilealid, bega sunmakegar, bega we-gaya-burba-nued sogegar.
42001020	We-ibmar-an-bega-sogsad e-ibagan mosale, we deyob gunonikoed. Ar be an-bengussoggu, geg bar sunmak be guoed. Be-machi-gwalulesad-sorba geb be gannar sunna sunmak-gunonibaloed.
42001021	Ar dulemardi magaba Zacarías-edarbebukmalad, geger dakarmalad, ibiga dikasurgus Bab-Dummadse-goled-Neg-Islidikidgi Zacarías gunaid yoggud-dibeye.
42001022	Zacarías agi noargu, geg emarga sunmaked. Agi mag daksamala, we Bab-Dummadse-goled-Neg-Islidikidgi wis ibya-apurus danikir-gebye. Zacarías dulemarga sunmaksasulid, unnila argangi emarga wis sunmaksad.
42001023	Geb Zacarías dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-goled-imaked bergusgu, na e-negse nadsunnad.
42001024	Geb a-ibagan-sorbali, e-ome-Elisabet gurgin-nika gunonikid. Agine, Elisabet nii-walatar bar nodsuli na neg-yaba megisad. Agi sokalid:
42001025	“Bab Dummad nabir an-daknonikid, an mimmi sulidba, adi dulemar mer istar bar an-dakmalaga anga mimmi-uknonikid.”
42001026	Elisabet nii-walanergwagus bonigwar gudiidgi, Bab Dummad, anger-Gabriel-barmialid, Galilease, Nazaret-neggweburse,
42001027	yagwa-gwensak María-nugadse. A-yagwade, dule-wargwen, José-nugad-ebo igar-nabosad, na nikumalagar. Joséde Rey-David-wagwad.
42001028	Bia-María-maidse anger dognonigu, ega sognonikid: —¡Na, degite! ¡Bab Dummad begi nabir binsasad! Bab Dummad beba gudiguad. Baigan-omeganba Bab Dummad bur nued begi binsasad.
42001029	Ar Maríadi anger-dakargu, ibmar-ega-sogedba dobe ito naded, binsaded, wede anger weyob anse gornonikid ibi obarsunye.
42001030	Degi anger ega sogdesunnad: —María, mer be dobgu, ar Bab Dummad nabir begi binsasad.
42001031	Ar emigindi, be gurgin-nika gunonikoed, mimmi-gwensak be nikuoed, Jesúsye a-machigwa be onugsaoed.
42001032	We-machide dule-dummad guoed, Bab-Dummad-Bur-Dummadid a-e-Machiye soglegoed, degine, Bab Dummad, anmar-Dummad, igi epenne Rey-David, reyga mai-gusa, deyob e-wagwa-imakmogoed.
42001033	Degine, we-Jesús, Israel-neggwebur-neg-dakmai degi-sadeguoed, e-neg-dakmai-guoedi gwen bar berguosulid.
42001034	Geb degi María angerga sogded: —¿Ar wede igi guosunna? Ar amba an yaagwad.
42001035	Anger abin-imakdegu ega sogded: —Bab Dummad Burba Nued begi aidenonikoed, Bab-Dummad-Bur-Dummadid a-e-gangued be-edunonikoed. Degisoggu, Dule-gwage-swilidikid-gwalulegoed, soglenonikoed, Bab-Dummad-Machiye.
42001036	Emi be-gwenad-Elisabet, bato sered gusadgi, geg mimmi-bakye-nik sogmaladi bonigwar gunonikid. Emide nii-walanergwagus gurgin-nika gudiid.
42001037	Ar ade Bab Dummadgardi ibmar-geg-gued nik-deeye soglesulid, ar bela ega ibmar nabir guedbiid. Deggisoggu, a-ular an bega sogsadyob bega gunonimogoed.
42001038	Geb degi María sogdesun: —Ar andi Bab-Dummad-mai gued, ar be-ibmar-sogedba be anga imakdo. Degi anger Maríagi banguded.
42001039	A-ibagangi, María Judá-yalaganba, a-neggwebur-gwagwense gwae nade-gusad.
42001040	Zacarías-negse dogdapgu, Elisabetse gordapid.
42001041	Elisabet itosgu, María ese gole, dule-e-sapi-dukugi-maid ber dulagwar itoded, degi, Elisabet bela-bela Bab Dummad Burba Nued nika-gunonikid.
42001042	Degine, Elisabet binnasur gote, sogded: —Baigan-omeganba Bab Dummad begi bur nued binsasad, degine, be-anagi bur-nued egi binsasbalid.
42001043	¿Ar wede ibiga weyob angi nued binsalesa, emide, an-Dummad-e-nan anse ataknonigu?
42001044	Ar be anse gornonikid an itodeyalaba, an-sapi-dukugi-maid weligwar-itogedba ber dulagwar naded.
42001045	Ar be we-ibmar bengussulidba begi nued-binsalesad, ar Bab-Dummad-bega-ibmar-sogsadba we-ibmar bela bega guoed.
42001046	Geb degi María sogdemogad: An ulub-akar an Bab-Dummad-nug odummosun.
42001047	Degine, an-burba, Bab-Dummad-an-abonogedgi weligwar an itosun,
42001048	ar an e-mai-bundor-binsalegwad-inigwele, Bab Dummad an-sunonikid, nued angi binsanonikid, ar emigindi, bela dulemar angi sogmaloed, nued egi binsalesad duleye.
42001049	Ar Bab-Dummad-Na-Gangued-Bela-Nikad, anga ibmar-dummagan imaksad, e-nug, ber swilidikidye nugad.
42001050	Ar Bab Dummad dulemar-e-dobee-nanadimalad wile daked, degine, a e-waganse-bakar, a-wile-daked eba sadegumogoed.
42001051	Bab Dummad e-gangued na e-arbaedgi oyosad, dulemar-na-san-dummarba-imakdimalad-osulosad.
42001052	Bab Dummad dule-dummagan-neg-semamaid-obelosad, degine, dulemar-na-san-bipii-imakdimalad-odummosad.
42001053	Degine, dulemar-ukumesdimaladga ibmar-bukidar uksad, degine, dulemar-mani-ibgan, ibmar-sate barmisad.
42001054	Bab Dummad na e-mai-Israel-dulemar-bendaksad, deun amar-wile-daked gwen iessurgu.
42001055	Ar Bab Dummad deyob anmar-dad-Abrahamga sogsad, degi, e-waganga sogsa-gusad, e-wile-daked degi-sadeguoye.
42001056	María, Elisabet-walik nii-walapaa megialid, geb a-sorba na e-negse gannar ali-gusad.
42001057	Elisabet e-ibagan warmaknonigu, mimmi-nikunonikid, machigwa ega uklenonikid.
42001058	E-neg-dikarba-mamaid, degine, e-gwenadgan itoarmargu, Bab Dummad Elisabetgi nabir binsasye, degi, nue wile daksaye, Elisabetba wergudmarmogad.
42001059	Degine, ibabaabakgus susugwa-gwalulesad-sorba senonimalad, e-abgan-duku sikegar, adi Moisés-igar-maidba imakegar. Degine, e-bab-Zacaríasba mimmi nug-imakarmalad.
42001060	Ar e-nan sunmakdegu, sogded: —Suli, degi nugguosur. Juanye nugguoed.
42001061	Elisabetga sogdemalad: —¿Ibiga degi be onugsabie? Ar be-gwenadgan degi-gwen-nugsurmalad.
42001062	Geb degi e-babse egichiarmalad, argangi sunmakar, igi machigwa onugsaoye.
42001063	Zacarías urgo-bipigwa egichisad, agi machigwa-nug narmaksad, Juanye nugguoye. Bukmaladi bela geger dakdemalad, deyob onugsabied.
42001064	Geb degi Zacarías nabir sunmakded, e-gwabin bipinmakded. Sunmakdegu, Bab-Dummad-nug ogannoded.
42001065	Bela-e-neg-dikarba-mamaid dobe itonadmalad. Bela Judea-yalaganba we-ibmar-deyob-gusadi gaya mimmileded.
42001066	Ar bela-we-gayagan-itoarmalad na nue e-gwagegi binsadmalad, sogdemalad: “¿Ar we-mimmide doaga guosunna?” Dulemar daksamalad, a-mimmiba Bab-Dummad-gangued gudigu.
42001067	Degi Zacarías, Juan-e-bab, Bab Dummad Burba Nued bela-bela nika gunonikid, degi, Bab-Dummad-nuggi sunmakdesunnad, sogded:
42001068	Dummad, Israel-e-Bab-Dummad, a-e-nug odummomarsun, ar ade e-dulemarse na ataknonikid, degine, iskuedgine anmar-onononikid.
42001069	Bab Dummad e-mai-David-wagwa anmarga barminonikid, anmar-Abonoged gandikidba anmarga ogwisnonikid.
42001070	Ar igi gebesaila anmarga sunmaksa, na E-gaya-burba-berbemalad gwage-swilidikmaladba.
42001071	Istar-anmar-dakdimalad, degi, sae-anmar-dakdimaladgi anmar-bendakoye.
42001072	Adi Bab Dummad anmar-babgan wile dakega, degine, amar-ebo igar-swilidik-mesisad insaegar.
42001073	Bab Dummad na e-nuggi anmar-dad-Abraham-ebo napiragwadgi igar-mesisad, we-igar ede imakedseye.
42001074	Istar-anmar-dakdimaladgi Bab Dummad anmar-onogoye, adi dobsuli anmar ega arbamalagar.
42001075	Nue gwage-swilidikidgi, degi, nue-napiragwadgi anmar burgwedse ega arbaegar,
42001076	Mimmi-bipi, bedina, Bab-Dummad-Bur-Dummadid a-E-gaya-burba-berbegedye be bilegoed. Ar bede, Dule-Dummad-barmiledagoye-sogsad-idu nadap-guoed, adi e-iduar igar mayegar.
42001077	Adi na e-neggwebur abonoged-igargi odurdakegar, adi na e-iskudimaladgi abonogegar.
42001078	Ar anmar-Bab-Dummad nue-wilesakwaa anmar-dakedba, neg-meegwadyob anmarga dule-barmialid, nibneggi neg-meegwadgi danikidid.
42001079	Adi dulemar-Bab-Dummad-wichurmalad neg-sichidgi bukmaladyob, amar Bab-Dummad-wisgumalagar, gwallu mee imakedyob. Degi, dule burgwed-dobmalad ega osulogegar. Adi anmar igar-bogidikidgi nanadii-gumalagar.
42001080	Degine, machigwa dungumai, e-burba gangumai gusad. Nega-dule-sulidganba gudigusad, Israel-dulemarse na san magaros gusadse, Bab-Dummad-igargi sunmakegar.
42002001	Amba yo Jesús gwaluleged-idu, deun Augusto-César saila-dummadga Romagi maigu, igar mesialid, bela-dulemar-bukwad-ebisoye, igi mergu-dibeye.
42002002	We gebe dule-ebisleged imaklesdo, deun Cirenio dummadga Siria-yargi neg-dakmaiun.
42002003	Bela ebislemalagala na e-neggwebur-e-neggweburse nade-gusmalad.
42002004	José, Galilea-yargi, Nazaret-neggweburgi gudiid ali-gusmogad, Judea-yarse, Rey-David-neggweburse, Belén neg-nugadse, ade José, David-e-wagwad, aga Belénse nonisundo,
42002005	adi a-neggweburgi e-ome-Maríamala ebislemalagar. Deun bato igar-maid ebo nikuoye, degine, deun María bato gurgin-nika gudiid.
42002006	Belén-neggweburgi gudimala, María-ibagan warmaknonikid, goe-baked-iba.
42002007	Degine, machigwa gebe ega uklenonikid, agi samorgi obirmas, degi, moli-omaed-urgi mimmi-mesisad, ar ade emarga gabed-neg sate gusad.
42002008	Deun a-ibagi Belén-neggwebur-dikarba, sibad-wawaad-edarbemalad, e-sibad-wawaad mutik edarbebukwa-gusmalad.
42002009	Agine, Bab-Dummad-e-anger-wargwen amarse ukiar nonikid, degine, Bab-Dummad-e-yeer-dakleged-gaed bela emar-ebilis ibegwar ganonikid. Degine, sibad-wawaad-edarbemalad gwakiarmalad.
42002010	Ar angerdi amarga sogded: —Mer be dobgumar, ar bemarga gaya-burba-nued, bela dulemar-weligwar-saed an sedanikid.
42002011	Rey-David-gwalulesad-neggweburgi, Beléngi, emi-ibagi bemarga Cristo gwalulesad, dule-Abonoged, Dule-Dummad, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule.
42002012	Weyob be wilubdakmaloed: Mimmi samorgi-anwar moli-omaed-urgi mai be dakmaloed.
42002013	Degine ukiar, we-anger-abargi bukidar-angermar-nibnegginmalad-baigan daklealid, Bab-Dummad-nug ogannonanai, sognanai:
42002014	¡Nibneggi Bab-Dummad-nug ogannomarsun, degine, we-napneggi neg-bogidikid gusun, dulemar-nuegan yeer binsadimaladga!
42002015	Degine, nibnegse gannar angermar nadmarbargu, sibad-wawaad-edarbemalad na ga sokarmalad: —Ar anmar Belén-neggweburse namarsun, degi-neg-gusad daknamarsun, Bab Dummad anmar-owisosadba.
42002016	Sibad-wawaad-edarbemalad gwae-gwae armarsunnad. Daknonimalad, José, María, degi, mimmi, moli-omaed-urgi mai.
42002017	Degi-dakarmargu, sibad-wawaad-edarbemalad sogdemalad, igi angermar mimmigi ega sunmaksamala.
42002018	Ar bela-dulemar sibad-wawaad-edarbemalad ibmar sogsa itosmalad, geger itomalad we-ibmar sogmalad.
42002019	Ar Maríadi bela na e-gwagegi wargwen sedii-gusad, agi binsadii-gusad.
42002020	Ar sibad-wawaad-edarbemalad, ega ibmar soglesadba bela gusad daksamalad, degi, bela itosmalad-ular, gannar armargu, Bab-Dummad-nug odummodani, degi, ogannodani-gusmalad.
42002021	Jesús ibabaabakgus gwalulesadgi, Judiomar-igar-maidba imakegala, e-abgan-duku siksamalad, ega nug Jesúsye uksamalad, ar igi anger amba yo María bonigwar-gued-idu bato nug imaksadba.
42002022	Moisés-igar-mesisadba imakegala, María goe-nikusad-sorba ibagan nonisun, na san nudakmalagar. A-ular José, María-ebo, Jerusalénse Jesús-senonimalad, Bab Dummadga ukegar.
42002023	Ar igi Bab-Dummad-igargi narmakar mai: Ar gebesaila machigwa-inse nangi aidenonikile, Bab Dummadga be ukoed, adi, unnila egadga guegar.
42002024	Degine, ar igi Bab-Dummad-igargi narmakar naibali, Bab Dummadga ukoye: Sapur-nuu-gwabo, ar degisulile, wag-nuu-mimmigan-gwabo. We sognaidba imakegala, María nonimogad.
42002025	A-ibagangine, Jerusaléngi, dule-wargwen, Simeón-nugad, gudigusad. A-dulede dule-gwage-nuedid, Bab-Dummad-dobee-nanadiid, na Israel-bendakleged-edarbedimogad-duled. Bab Dummad Burba Nued a-duleba gudiguad.
42002026	Bab Dummad na E-Burba-Nuedba Simeónga sogsad: “Be burgosurye, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule-dakedseye.”
42002027	Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse Jesús-e-babgan na mimmi-senonimargu, Moisés-igar-maidba imakegala, deun Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-sogedba, Simeón Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse nonimogad.
42002028	Simeón na e-swidawargi machigwa-mesisgua, Bab-Dummad-nug odummoded, sogded:
42002029	Bab-Dummad-Bela-Neg-Semaid, an be-mai. Emigindi bogidikidgi be an-sedsun, ar iduar be ibmar anga sogsadyob.
42002030	Ar ade an-ibyagwar Bab-Dummad-dule-abonogoed-barmialid an daksad.
42002031	We-mimmi, Bab Dummad guagwar barmialid, bela-dulemar-bukwad-abargi,
42002032	dulemar-Judiosurmaladga be oyogegar, be doa-dule gue, igi gwallu neg-sichidgi neg-mee imakedyob. Degi, we-machi dulemar abonogoedba be-Israel-dulemargi nued sunmakmalagar.
42002033	José, degi Jesús-e-nan, María, geger itomalad, Simeón bela weyob Jesúsgi sognaid.
42002034	Geb degi Simeón, Jesúsga sogsagu, Bab Dummad begi nued binsaoye, a-sorba machigwa-e-nanga, Maríaga sogded: —We-machigwa sulesad Israel-yargi dulemar-dummagan-bukidar onogegar, degi, dulemar-binsarmalad dummaganga imakegar. We-machigwa Bab-Dummad-wilubga guega nonikid, oyogegar, Bab Dummad sunna nabir dulemar-abonoye. Ar degi-inigwele, dulemar-bukidar machigwa-abingaosurmalad.
42002035	We-machiba bukidar-dulemar-gwage-binsananaid mag daklegoed. María, ar begardi be-san-burbagi espunyar-yolenaiyob be nunmak itogoed.
42002036	Agine Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged-wargwen, Ana-nugad, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi gudimogad. A-omede, Fanuel-sisgwad, Aser-e-wagwasik danikid. Anade bato nue seredgusad, unnila birga-gugle sui-nika gudigusad,
42002037	degine birga-dulabake-gakabakegus ei-sui-burgwisad. A-mukwade Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi gudigu-daed, ibginedba, degi, mutikidba Bab Dummadse gordii, degi, mas-gunsuli, Bab-Dummadse-golega-gudii-daed-duled.
42002038	Simeón deyob sunmakgwichidgi, Ana nonimogad. A-mukwa Bab Dummadga Jesúsgi dog-nuedye sogsa-gusad, degi, bela Jerusaléngi dulemar-Bab-Dummad-abonogoed-edarbedimaladga machi-bipigi ega sunmakde-daed.
42002039	José, María-ebo bela Bab-Dummad-igar-maidba ibmar-imaksad-sorba, gannar Galilease nonimalad, na e-neggwebur-Nazaretse.
42002040	Degine, machi-bipidi dungumai, gangumai, degine, nue-binsaed-ibed-gumai-gusad. Ar Bab Dummad a-machi-bipigi nue nabir binsadii-gusad.
42002041	Birga-irba Jesús-e-babgan Jerusalénse nad-damalad, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Ibagi.
42002042	Jesús birga-ambe-gakabo-nikadgi, e-babganba Jerusalénse nonimogad, ar igi gusgu na ibagi igar-maidba imakmaladba.
42002043	Ibagan bergusgu, Jesús-babgan gannar Nazaretse armargu, machigwa-Jesúsdi Jerusaléngi besad. José, degi, e-nan-María, amardi wichurmalad Jesús-besad.
42002044	E-babgandi dulemar-danar-danimaladba Jesús daniye bimalanad. Ibagwengus-nanaedgine e-gwenadgan-abargi, degine, mag-dakmalad-abargi Jesús-amiarmalad.
42002045	Ar amissurmarsoggu, gannar Jerusalénse Jesús-aminonimalad.
42002046	Degine, ibapaagwad-sorba amidapid, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi, Moisés-igar-mesisad-nue-wisimalad-abargi sii, amar-itosii, degi, amarse ibmar egissii.
42002047	Ar bela-itobukmalad geger dakmalad Jesús nue ibmar wisi, degine, nue-imas Moisés-igar-nue-wisimalad abin-imaked.
42002048	E-babgan Jesús-dakarmargu, geger dakdemalad dummagan-abargi siid. E-nan Jesúsga sogded: —Machi, ¿ibiga we deyob be anmar-imaksa? Emide be-bab, degi, andi surbinsa anmar be-amidigu.
42002049	Geb degi Jesús abin-imakdegu, sogded: —¿Ar be wichurmarsi an-Bab-arbaedgi an arbaer-gebed?
42002050	Ar e-babgandi aku itosmalad ar ibi ega obarisa.
42002051	Jesús e-babganba arsunnad, gannar Nazaretse nonisunnad, na e-babgan-sogedba gudiguarsunnad. Ar e-nandi bela we-ibmarmar na e-gwageginbi sedii, egi binsadii-gualid.
42002052	Ar Jesúsdi ibmar-nue-wisidgi, e-dunguedgi, degine, Bab-Dummad-nue-nabir-egi-binsaedgi, degi, dulemar-nued-egi-binsaedgi dungumai-gusad.
42003001	Deun birga-ambe-gakatar gus Tiberio-César Romagi neg-dakmaidgi, Poncio-Pilato deun Judea-yargi dummadga maid, degine, Herodes Galilea-yargi dummadga maid, e-urba-Felipe Iturea-yargi, degi, Traconite-yargi dummadga maid, degine, Lisanias dummadga Abilinia-yargi maid.
42003002	Deunni Anás, Caifás-ebo dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummadga maid. A-ibagangine, Bab Dummad Juanse gornonikid, Zacarías-e-machise. Deun Juan-Bautista nega-dule-sulidganba gudiid.
42003003	Juan-Bautista nade-gusad, bela Jordán-diwar-dikarba, Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igargi sunmakdii, dulemar na e-iskumaladga bukib binsaegar, adi e-daed gwagmalagar, adi iskuedgi abonomalagar. Agi Juan sunmakdii-gualid.
42003004	Juan-ibmar-imaknaid deyob gusad, ar igi epenne Isaías, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged narmaksa-gusa, deun sogsa-gusgu: Dule-wargwen nega-dule-sulidganba binnasur sunmaknonikoed, dulemarga sognonikoed: “Dule-Dummad-idu igar-mayemar, igar-swilidik mesmar.
42003005	Bela nebagan swilidik guoed, yarmala, degine, neg-mullugana omatolegoed. Igar-bire-bire-mamaid inikii imaklegoed, degine, igar-muru-muru-mamaid oswirmaklebaloed.
42003006	Bela dulemar Bab-Dummad-abonoged-wisgumaloed.”
42003007	Dulemar-bukidar Juan-Bautistase duurmaknoni-damalad, Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imakegar; Juan amarga sogde-daed: “¡Ar bemar naibe-bulegan-mimmiganyob gumalad! ¿Ar doa bemar-odurdaksa, Bab Dummad nue-urwe-danikoed-idu wakinned? Bab-Dummad-digi-oglegedgi bemar nuguosurmalad.
42003008	Degisoggu, be-daedgine na be oyomar, bemar nue gwagsamalad, be-iskuedga na be bukib binsasmalad. Mer unnila na be sogmalo: ‘Anmar Abraham-wagan gumar. A-ulale Bab Dummad anmargi nabir binsaer-gebed.’ Suli, degisuli. Ar be Abraham-wagwa-sulile, akarsulid, ar Bab Dummad sunna we-akwamar Abraham-e-waganga imaked.
42003009	“Deginbali, ar bato akan guar sapi-maligi yoid. Ar degisoggu, sapi nue sanmaksulile, a-sapi siklegoed, soogi melledoed, ogumaklegegar. Deyob Bab Dummad dulemar-imakmogoed.”
42003010	Ar degi dulemar Juan-Bautistase egichiar dasunnad, ega sogde-damalad: —Degite, ¿ibu anmar imakmarsunnoe?
42003011	Juan, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Dule suba-gobo nikale, dule-suba-sulidga gogwen ukmogo. Amba deyob mas-gunnedsik imakbaloed.
42003012	Dulemargi-Roma-dummadga-mani-gaedgi-arbamalad Juanse nonimarmogad, Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imakegar. Amar ega sogdemarmogad: —Odurdaked-saila, ¿anmardi ibi imakmarmogoe?
42003013	Juan amarga sogded: —Bemar melle dulemargi wilub-obichaa mani gamalo, ar unnila bemarga igar-uklesadba be mani gamaloed.
42003014	Degine, suar-ibmala ese egichiarmarmogad: —Anmardi ¿ibi imakmarmogoe? Juan, abin-sogded: —Mer emar-annik gannadba mani suo, degine, mer binsa aimar-ogakansao. Ar bemar na be-bennuklegedgi, gusbin be itoge-wilubmalad.
42003015	Dulemar-Juan-itobukmalad Cristo-edarbebukmarsoggu, na e-gwagegi binsabukmalad, we Juan-Bautista, Cristo sogeye. Cristo sogleged, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule.
42003016	Juan abin-imakdegu, bela dulemarga sogded: “Ar andi napiragwad, Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar-imakedi, an unnila digi ogdiid, ar dule-baid-danikiddi, ar anba bur dule-dummadsoggu, e-sapat-dubse-bakar geg an ei esiked. Ar a-duledi Bab Dummad Burba Nuedgi, degi, soogi be-ognonimaloed.
42003017	“Igi dulemar oros-gwag egwamala, deyob we-a-dule, dule-dummadid, bato guagwar e-argangi bigbi-gani gwichid, oros-gwag na egwaegar. Degi, na oros-gwag nued na nue e-urbedgi na urboed, e-ukadi soogi ogumakoed. Ar we-soode geg soo-ginnedid, degi-gasii-sadeguad sood.” We sogledo, dule-dummad oros-gwagyob dulemar-imakmogoye.
42003018	Weyob bukidar Juan dulemar-unadii-gusad, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi dulemarga sunmaksagu.
42003019	Herodes dummadga maigu, Herodías-nikusad-ular, Juan sabsur Herodesga ibmar sogsad, ar ade Herodíasde e-urba-Felipe-omenad. Bela-ibmar-iskanamar Herodes imaksadi,
42003020	a-ukine, Herodes we imaknonibardo, Juan eskaryagi metenonikid.
42003021	Degidgine, bela dulemar Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imaknanaigua, agi Jesús Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imaksamogad. Jesús Bab Dummadse gotegu, nibnega argade-gusad.
42003022	Jesúsgi Bab Dummad Burba Nued aidenonikid, sanale, nuuyobi aidenonikid, degi, nibneggi gaya-burba gollar-gusad, sogded: —Be An-Machi-sabed-sunnad gued, beba weligwar an itoged.
42003023	Jesús na e-arbaed imakdegu, deun birga-durgwen-gakambe nikad. Jesús, José-e-machiye bimalanad, degi, Josédi, Elí-e-machimogad.
42003024	Elídi Matat-e-machid, Matatdi Leví-e-machid, Levídi Melqui-e-machid, Melquidi Jana-e-machid, Janadi José-e-machid,
42003025	Josédi Matatías-e-machid, Matatíasdi Amós-e-machid, Amósdi Nahum-e-machid, Nahumdi Esli-e-machid, Eslidi Nagai-e-machid,
42003026	Nagaidi Maat-e-machid, Maatdi Matatías-e-machid, Matatíasdi Semei-e-machid, Semeidi José-e-machid, Josédi Judá-e-machid,
42003027	Judádi Joana-e-machid, Joanadi Resa-e-machid, Resadi Zorobabel-e-machid, Zorobabeldi Salatiel-e-machid, Salatieldi Neri-e-machid,
42003028	Neridi Melqui-e-machid, Melquidi Adi-e-machid, Adidi Cosam-e-machid, Cosamdi Elmodam-e-machid, Elmodamdi Er-e-machid,
42003029	Erdi Josué-e-machid, Josuédi Eliezer-e-machid, Eliezerdi Jorim-e-machid, Jorimdi Matat-e-machid,
42003030	Matatdi Leví-e-machid, Levídi Simeón-e-machid, Simeóndi Judá-e-machid, Judádi José-e-machid, Josédi Jonán-e-machid, Jonándi Eliaquim-e-machid,
42003031	Eliaquimdi Melea-e-machid, Meleadi Mainán-e-machid, Mainándi Matata-e-machid, Matatadi Natán-e-machid.
42003032	Natándi David-e-machid, Daviddi Isaí-e-machid, Isaídi Obed-e-machid, Obeddi Booz-e-machid, Boozdi Salmón-e-machid, Salmóndi Naasón-e-machid,
42003033	Naasóndi Aminadab-e-machid, Aminadabdi Aram-e-machid, Aramdi Esrom-e-machid, Esromdi Fares-e-machid, Faresdi Judá-e-machid,
42003034	Judádi Jacob-e-machid, Jacobdi Isaac-e-machid, Isaacdi Abraham-e-machid, Abrahamdi Taré-e-machid, Tarédi Nacor-e-machid,
42003035	Nacordi Serug-e-machid, Serugdi Ragau-e-machid, Ragaudi Peleg-e-machid, Pelegdi Heber-e-machid, Heberdi Sala-e-machid,
42003036	Saladi Cainán-e-machid, Cainándi Arfaxad-e-machid, Arfaxaddi Sem-e-machid, Semdi Noé-e-machid, Noédi Lamec-e-machid,
42003037	Lamecdi Matusalén-e-machid, Matusaléndi Enoc-e-machid, Enocdi Jared-e-machid, Jareddi Mahalaleel-e-machid, Mahalaleeldi Cainán-e-machid,
42003038	Cainándi Enós-e-machid, Enósdi Set-e-machid, Setdi Adán-e-machid, Adándi Bab-Dummad-machid. Wemar, Jesús-e-dadgan gumardo.
42004001	Jesús, Bab Dummad Burba Nued nue-nika gudii, Jordán-diwargi banguded. Geb degi, Bab Dummad Burba Nued nega-dule-sulidganba Jesús-sesa-gusad.
42004002	Agi iba-dulabo, nia-saila Jesús-wilubdakdii-gualid. A-ibagangine, Jesús mas-gunsuli gudigusad, degisoggu, ukuur itoalid.
42004003	Agi Jesúsga nia-saila sokalid: —Ar be Bab-Dummad-Machi-sunnadile, we-akwaga be soge: ‘Maduga be binyeye.’
42004004	Jesús, abin-imakdegu, nia-sailaga sogded: —Noar be soged, ar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burbagi narmakar naid: Dule maduginbi dula gudiguosurye, [bela Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-itogedgi dula gudigubaloye].
42004005	Geb degi nia-saila yar-matusulidse Jesús-sesad. Agi belagwable-napneg-naid-ugakse ega yog irgwen oyoar imakdapid.
42004006	Agi nia-saila Jesúsga sokalid: —We-neggweburgan-an-bega-oyosad bela e-gangued, degi, e-yeer-daklebalid bela an bega ukoed, ar bela wemar anga uklesad. Degisoggu, ar doaga an ukbie, aga an ukoed.
42004007	Be yokorgi sindigar, igi Bab Dummadse gorlege, e-nug odummogegar, deyob be anse golele, we-neggweburgan bela begadga guoed.
42004008	Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Nia-saila be angi bangu, ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Ar Dummad be-Bab-Dummad, asebi be goloed, e-nug odummogegar, unnila agarbi be arbaoed.
42004009	Geb degi nia-saila Jerusalénse Jesús-sesbalid, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-uas-birgi ogwisdapgu, Jesúsga sogded: —Ar be Bab-Dummad-Machi-sunnadile, be napase ichomakdo.
42004010	Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Na e-angermar bega barmidagoye be-edarbegar.
42004011	Degine, angermar e-argangi be-gamaloye, adi melle be-nag akwagi yolegegar.
42004012	Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Nabir be sogendo, ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar sognaibalid: Melle Dummad, be-Bab-Dummad, be wilubdakoye.
42004013	Ar nia-saila bela Jesús-wilubdaked bergusgua, sikwas wis egi bangud gusad.
42004014	Jesús gannar Galilease nonigu, nue Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-gangued-nikadba nonikid, degi, bela neggweburmar-dikarba-nanaid wisguarmalad Jesús ibmar imakdiid.
42004015	Jesús Judiomar-onmaked-neggi dulemar-odurdakdii-gualid. Bela Jesús-nug odummogedbi-gusmalad.
42004016	Jesús Nazaretse nonikid, bia na e-dungusadse. Obunnoged-ibagi, Jesús na gusgu e-daedba Judiomar-onmaked-negse dogdapid. Agi gwisguded, Bab-Dummad-Garda absogegar.
42004017	Ar ade Jesúsga uksamalad Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged, Isaías, a narmaksad. Jesús garda egasgu, egasad, narmakar naidgi:
42004018	Bab Dummad Burba Nued anba gudiid, ar an-susad, adi dulemar-wileganaga gaya-burba-nued an sogegar. An barmilesad, dulemar-gwage-nunmak-itodimalad-nudakegar, dulemar-galebukmaladga binnasur sogegar, bemar ainimarye, dulemar-ibya-suli-gudimaladga ibya ukegar; dulemar-baiganse-wiledimalad onogegar,
42004019	Bab-Dummad-e-birga-nuedgi sunmakegar.
42004020	A-sorba Jesús Bab-Dummad-Garda obipirmasgu, Judiomar-onmaked-neg-daked-dulega garda uksagu, sigisad. Agi-bukmalad bela Jesúsginbi atakbukwa-gusmalad.
42004021	Geb degi Jesús sogded: —Emi-ibagi bemar-abargi we Bab-Dummad-Gardagi-narmakar-naid sanar-gunonikid.
42004022	Bela-dulemar-bukmaladi Jesúsgi nuedbi sunmakedbimalad. Geger nue dakmalad, ibiyobi Jesús sunmaked yeer nue sunmake. Degine, sogdemalad: —¿Ar wede José-e-machisursi?
42004023	Jesús amarga sogded: —An wisdo, wegi-sogleged sunna be anga sokarmalaled: ‘Ina-duled, na be dukin san nudake, adi anmarga oyogegar be nue ibmar wisid. Ar bukidar Capernaum-neggweburgi-ibmar-imaksad anmar be-itosmaladi, wegi be-neggweburgi be imakmoga.’
42004024	Degi Jesús sogdebalid: “Napira an bemarga soged, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged-wargwensaar na e-neggweburgi geg e-nug odummoleged.
42004025	Napira an bemarga soged, Elías maigusgu, Israel-yargi, bukidar mukwamar-ei-sui-burgwismalad gudigusad. Deun dii birgapaa-abala gwen wissurgu, agi we-napagi bela ukud-dummad nagunonikid.
42004026	Degite Elías a-mukwamarse gwen barmilessulid, bur barmiles-gusad, Sidónse, Sarepta-neggweburgi mukwa-wargwen-ei-sui-burgwisadse, a-mukwa ega mas ukegar.
42004027	“Deginbali, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged, Eliseo-nugad, maigusgu, Israel-yargi dulemar-naibe-buna-ya-maleged bukidar nika-gusmalad, degite, amar gwen nudaklessulid, bur nudaklesad, Sirio-dule, Naamán-nugad.”
42004028	Ar weyob Jesús-ibmar-soge itosmargu, Judiomar-onmaked-neggi-bukmalad bela sae-itodmalad.
42004029	Dulemar gwisgudmargu, Jesús-gasmalad, geb degi neggwebur-magaba ise-onoar, yar-mulluse Jesús-sesmalad, ar ade a-yar-mullugi neggwebur siid. Ase Jesús-sesmalad, adi gulluba egwanmalagar.
42004030	Ar Jesúsdi emar-abargi ganna-ganna noded, emar-abargi bangudsunnad.
42004031	Jesús Galilease nonikid, neggwebur-Capernaum nugadse. Agi obunnoged-ibagi dulemar-odurdaksii-gualid.
42004032	Jesús dulemar-odurdaksigu, geger dakmalad igi dulemar-odurdaked, ar ade Jesúsde nue-igar-wisi sunmaked.
42004033	Agi Judiomar-onmaked-neggi dule-wargwen, niaburba-iskana-nikad-siid binnasur goted,
42004034	sogded: —Jesús-Nazaretgined, mer anmarse be achao, ¿ibiga be anmar-wiodaniki? ¿Be anmar-obelogega daniki? An be-wisi be doa-dule, be-dule-gwage-swilidikidid, be Bab-Dummad-nuggi-danikid-duled.
42004035	Jesús niase uluded, ega sabsur ibmar sogded: —Mer be sunmak, dulegi-maid be noe. Geb degi nia emar-abargi dule-omukusgu, a-dule gwen akar imaksasuli nia a-dulegi node-gusad.
42004036	Degi-gusad bela geger dakdemalad, agi sogdemarsunnad: —¿Wede igidbarsunna, nue burba nika, gandik niaburbamarga ibmar soged, degine, niaburbamar eba ibmar-imakde-damalad?
42004037	Degi bela Galilea-yalaganba wisguarmalad igi Jesús dulemar-nudakdiid.
42004038	Geb degi Jesús gwisgudgu, Judiomar-onmaked-neggi-siidgi nodsunnad. Geb Jesús, Simón-negse dogdapid. Simón-sakbundor ise-uelegar mai dakdapid. Jesúsgi wilenagusmalad, adi Simón-sakbundor-nudakegar.
42004039	Degi Jesús Simón-sakbundor-walik gwisgunonigu, sabsur uelegedga ibmar sogded. Agi ueleged yog berguar naded. Geb Simón-sakbundor yog gwisguar imaksad, geb a-sorba emarga yog ibmar imakar gussunnad.
42004040	Dad-argwategu, obunnoged-iba bergusgu, bela galagwensuli-ueleged-nikmalad Jesússe senonimalad. Jesús na e-argan uelemaladgi mesisgu, bela amar-nudaksad.
42004041	Deginbali, Jesús bukidar niamar-onisbalid. Niamar ainider, binnasur gote, sogde damalad: “¡Be Bab-Dummad-Machid!” Ar Jesúsdi niamarse ulud-daed, osunmakega gwen imaksasulid, ar ade niamar wismalad, we Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-duled.
42004042	Ar bato oibosgu, Jesús nadsun, nega-dule-sulidganba. Dulemar Jesús-amidii-guarmalad. Dulemar Jesús-amismargu, egi wilenagusmalad, mer egi naegar.
42004043	Ar Jesúsdi amarga sogded: —Ar neggwebur-baiganse Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued, na e-neg-dakmaidgi an sunmaknabalir-gebed, ar a-ular an wese barmilealid.
42004044	Galileagi Judiomar-onmaked-neg-simaladgi Jesús Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmakdii-gusad.
42005001	Degi Jesús mata-dummad-Genesaretgi-naidgi gudii, dulemar-bukidar ese nonimalad. Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba itomalagala na barmesnanai-guarmalad.
42005002	Agi Jesús dakalid ur-warbo gakagi nai. E-ibmaladi urgi aides bukwa, saki enukbukwa.
42005003	A ur-wargwengi Jesús nakwisad. Dakleargu, a-ur Simón-ur. Jesús Simónga sogded: —Wis be-ur matasik be onoge. Jesús a-urgi sigisad, agi-sii dulemar-bukidar-gakagi-bukwad-odurdakded.
42005004	Jesús sunmaked bergusgu, Simónga sogded: —Matasik be-ur be sede, be agi saki mie, ua-gaegar.
42005005	Simón, abin-imakdegu, ega sogded: —Odurdaked-saila, anmar oiboalid ua-gananai, degite, anmar ua gwen gassurmalad. Degi-inigwele, be-sogedba an saki miodo.
42005006	Ar Simón degi-saki-mismargu, ua-bukidar-gasmalad, a-ular saki achirmakbi-gualid.
42005007	Geb degi Simón na e-aimar-ur-baidgi-gunanaidse achasmalad, adi emar-bendakdamalagar. Ese nonimargu, ur-warbo-bela ua enosmargu, ua-enadba ur-dogbi-gualid.
42005008	Simón-Pedro ua-bukidar gasa dakdegu, Jesús-abin yokorgi sindigar sigided, ega sogded: —Dummad, angi be bangu, ar an iskudiid-duled.
42005009	Ar ua-bukidar-gasadba, Simón, degine, bela-eba-gunanaid dobe itodmalad.
42005010	Degine, Simón-e-aimar, Zebedeo-machimala, Santiago, Juan-ebo, dobee itonadmarmogad. Ar Jesúsdi Simónga sogded: —Mer be dobgu, igi bemar ua-gae, abayobi dulemar napneggi gaega emigindi, an be-odurdakmaloed, adi dulemar anba nagumalagar.
42005011	Simón, degi, e-aimar gakase ur senonimargu, bela ibmar obesmalad. Degi geb Jesúsba nadmarsunnad e-sapinganga guegar.
42005012	Neggwebur-gwensakgi Jesús gudigu, dule-wargwen naibe-buna-ya-maleged-yaisur-nikad ese nonikid, yokorgi sindigar Jesús-asabin signonikid. We-dule Jesúsgi wilenagusad, ega sokalid: —Dummad, an wisi, sunna be an-nudaked, be an-nudakbier.
42005013	Geb degi Jesús e-argan ese achadgu, dule-ebusad, geb degi ega sogded: —Nugubi an be-abe. ¡Be nugusun! Degi, dule-boni-nikadi yog nuguar naded.
42005014	Jesús dule-nugusadga sogded: —Mer dulemar-baiganga be sogo, an be-nudaksad. Unnila be nae, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-goledse, be aga oyona be nugusad. Degine, be swilidik guegala, Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-ukleged be uko, Moisés-igar-mesisadba imakegar, adi amar wisgumalagar be nue nugusad.
42005015	Ar degi-inigwele, bela Jesús-nug dungumai gualid, bela wisguarmalad Jesús ibmar-imakdiid. Dulemar-bukidar duurmaknoni-damalad Jesús-itogegar, degine, na uelediid e-nudakegar.
42005016	Ar Jesúsdi Bab Dummadse golega nega-dule-sulidganba dulemargi bangud-daed.
42005017	Ibagwengine, Jesús dulemar-odurdaksigu, Fariseomar, degi, Judio-igar-nue-wisimalad bukwa-gusmogad. Amar bela Galilea-yargi, degi, Judea-yargi, degi, neggweburmar-nanaidgi danimalad. Degine, Jerusalén-neggweburgi danimarbalid. Agi Bab-Dummad-gangued Jesúsba gudigusad, dulemar-gegumalad-nudakegar.
42005018	Degi daklealid, machergan e-ai-wargwen abgan-burgwar-nikad e-gabedgi-mai sedanimar. Amar Jesús-siidse neg-yaba e-ai-odobimalad, adi Jesús-asabin mesmalagar, ega nudakegar.
42005019	Ar dulemar bukidarsoggu, geg odogedbali, neg-birgi nakwismalad. Uas-egasmargu, agi dule-abgan-burgwaled e-gabedgi-mai dulemar-abargi odesmalad, Jesús-siid-inik.
42005020	Jesús a-dulemar egi gwen bensuli dakdegu, dule-gegumaidga sogded: —Dule, be-iskudii-gusad, be nugussun.
42005021	Degi escribamar, degi, Fariseomar, na e-gwagegi binsadmalad, sogdemalad: “¿Wede doa-dule, emide Bab Dummadgi dodogu? ¿Unnila Bab Dummadbi sunna dulega iskued elisursi?”
42005022	Ar Jesús sunna ulubgi dulemar-binsaed mag daksoggu, dummagan-abin imakdegu, amarga sogded: —¿Ibiga be-ulubgi be degi-binsabukmarsunna? ¿Geg iskued osulo be an-insae?
42005023	An dule-bonigwaledga sog-dibe: ‘¡Be-iskunaid an bega osulos!’ Ar igi an sogbarsun-dibe: ‘¡Be nugu, be gwisgu, be nae!’ Degite, ¿igid bur-baisursunna imaklesunna? Suli, ebobela baisursunna imaklesuli.
42005024	Degisoggu, ani Dule-Machi, dule-bonigwaled an nudakoed, adi bemar wisguegar, igi dule-bonigwaled sunna an nudake, debayobi we-napneggi dule-gwage-iskunaid sunna an nudakbalid. Jesús dule-abgan-burgwar-nikadga sogdesun: —Ani an bega soged, be gwisgu, be-egi-maid na be sede, be-negse na be nasun.
42005025	Degi dule-bonigwaled yog nuguar-gusgu, emar-abargi yog gwisguar imaksad, degi, na e-gabedgi-maid na susgua, e-negse nadsunnad, Bab-Dummad-nug-odummonadap-gusad.
42005026	Agi belagwapa geger dakedbimalad, bela Bab-Dummad-nug odummodmalad. Nue dobe itomala, sogdemarsunnad: —Emi-ibagi ibmar-geger-dakleged an daksamalad.
42005027	Jesús dule-nudaksadgi-gwichi nadgu, agi dule-wargwen Roma-dummadga-mani-gaedgi-arbaed dakalid, Leví-nugad, mani-galeged-neggi sii, mani gasii. Jesús Levíse gote, ega sogded: —Anba be dage, an-sapinga guegar.
42005028	Degi Leví gwisgusgu, bela ibmar obes, Jesúsba naded, e-sapinga guegar.
