43003023	Deun Salim-walik, Enón-neg-nugadgi, Juan-Bautista Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imaknai-gusmogad, ar ade agi dii wilarbad. Dulemar Juan-Bautistase noni-gusmalad, Bab-Dummad-digi-oglegegar.
43003024	Ar ade deun amba yo Juan eskaryagi melleged.
43003025	Agi Juan-sapingan Judiomar-ebo abin-abin imakarmalad, dule-swilidik-ibmar-imaked-igargi.
43003026	E-sapingan, Juanse nonimalad, ega sognonimalad: —Odurdaked-saila, dule Jordán-diwar-obakar beba gudigusad, egi nued be sunmaksad, a-dule Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imaknaimogad, degine, dule-bukidar ese duurmaknadapmalad, degisoggu, be sordamar-sate guoed.
43003027	Juan, e-sapingan-abin imakdegu, sogded: “Ar dule gege ibmar-abingaed, ar nibneggi ega ibmar danisulir. A sogledo, ani Juan, degi, Jesús, anmar anbobela, Bab Dummad anmar-barmiarye. Ar Bab Dummad soger, Jesús anba bur dule-dummad guoye, ar deyob guodo.
43003028	Ar bemar-sunnad an itosmalad, an sogsagu: Ani an Cristosur, andi unnila e-idu-barmilealidid, ega igar-mayegar.
43003029	“Ar dule ome-nikunaidyobdo, dule-ome-nikunaid, a-ome a-dule-omega gunonikoed. Ar machered-e-aidi, e-dikarba gwichid, unnila sui-e-sunmaked itogwichid, weligwar itogwichid, sui ibmar soggwichid. Ar an dule-ome-nikunaid-e-aiyobmogad, emigindi nue an weligwar itomosundo.
43003030	Jesús bur nug-dungue-wilubbid, andi bur nug-bipii gue-wilubbid.”
43003031	Juan-Bautista sogdebar: “Ar Jesús-nibneggi-danikid bela dulemargi obined. Dule-napneggineddi, unnila napnegginedid, napneggined-ibmarbi sunmaked. Ar dule-nibneggi-danikiddi bela dulemargi obined.
43003032	“We dule-nibneggi-danikid nibneggi-ibmar-daksadba, degi, nibneggi-itosadba, sunmaked, degite, dulemar a-dule-gwen-itobisurmalad.
43003033	Ar dule, dule-nibneggi-danikid-sunmaked abingaele, we sognado, Bab-Dummad-ibmar-soged napiraye.
43003034	Ar Bab Dummad we-dule-barmiarsoggu, a-ular we-dule-nibneggi-danikid Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba sunmaked. Ar Bab Dummad na E-Burba-Nued ise-obinagwar uked, ise-wilubsaar uksulid.
43003035	“Ar Bab Dummad nue na Machi-sabsoggu, bela ibmar E-Machiga na uksasunnad.
43003036	“Ar doa-dule Bab-Dummad-Machi-bensuli-gunonikile, a-dule burba-geg-bergued nikuoed. Ar dule Bab-Dummad-Machigi bengunonikirdi, burba-geg-bergued gwen nikuosulid, agardi Bab Dummad dulemar-sabsur-odurdakoed-igar bato guar ega maid.”
43004001	Dummad-Jesús wisguar, Fariseomar itoarmarye dulemar sogdimarye: “Jesús, Juan-Bautistaba bur-bule dulemar-Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-imakdiiye, degi, bur-bule sapingan-nikbarye.”
43004002	(Ar Jesús Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imakdisulindo, e-sapingan imakdiinad.)
43004003	A-ular, Jesús Judeagi bangudsunnad, gannar Galilease nade-gusad.
43004004	Ase naegala, Samaria-yargi naer-gebed.
43004005	Samaria-yalase, neggwebur-Sicar-nugad-dikarse Jesús nonisun, bia dad-Jacob na e-machi-Joséga nainu-uksad-walik.
43004006	Agine Jacob-dia-akwisad siid. Jesús nanaedba yegussoggu, a-dia-dikarba sigisad, obunnogegar. Deun bato yoruku gusad.
43004007	Ome-wargwen, Samariagined, a-diase nonikid, dii suegar. Jesús a-omega sogded: —Anga be dii-gobed wis udage.
43004008	Ar ade Jesús-sapingan neggweburse naded, mas-bakegar.
43004009	Judiomar, degi, Samaria-dorgan na geg sunmakmarsoggu, ome-Samariagined, Jesús-abin sogded: —¿Ibiga bede Judio-duledde, andi ome-Samariaginedidde, anse be dii-gobed egise?
43004010	Jesús, abin-imakdegu, ega sogded: —Ar Bab-Dummad-ibmar-uked be wisina, degine, doa-dule bega soge: ‘Anga dii-gobed be udaye,’ be ese dii egisoenad, degine, na e bega ukoenad, dii-burba-nikad.
43004011	Ome, Jesús-abin sogded: —Dummad, be dii-weed-ibmar sated, degine, dia-yaa matusurbalid, degite ¿igi be dii-burba-nikadi onogosunna?
43004012	¿Ar bede anmar-dad-Jacobba bur dummadsi? Anmar-dad we-dia anmarga uksad, we-dii na gobsad, e-mimmigan, degi, e-molimar, we-dii gobsamarmogad.
43004013	Jesús, ome-abin imakde, sogded: —Ar doa-dule we-dii-gobsa-dibe, gannar uku-uku itobaloed.
43004014	Ar dii-an-ega-ukoed gobsardi, bar gannar uku-uku itogosulid. Ar dii-an-ega-ukoeddi, dii napa-urba aryomaiyobi, e-ulubgi megoed, adi burba-geg-bergued nikuegar.
43004015	Ome Jesúsga sogded: —Dummad, we-dii be anga udage, adi melle gannar bar uku-uku an itogegar, degine, adi melle gannar bar wese dii an wedagegarbar.
43004016	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Be nae, be-suise be gornae, degi, gannar be dagbaloed.
43004017	Ome, abin-imakde, sogded: —An sui sated. Jesús, abin-imakded: —Nabir be soged: ‘An sui sateye.’
43004018	Ar sui walatargus be nikued, emi sui be nikumaidi be-sui-sulid. Ar nabir be-sogsad.
43004019	Ome, Jesús-abin sogded: —Dummad, an be-dakgua, be Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged an be-dakdo.
43004020	Anmar-dadgan, Samaria-dulemar we-yargi Bab Dummadse gochamalad, e-nug odummogegar. Ar bemar-Judiomardi soged, Jerusaléngi, agi Bab Dummadse goler-gebye e-nug odummogegar.
43004021	Jesús omega sogded: —Omegwa, napira an bega soged, mer be an-bengu, ibagan dani, we-yarginsur, degine, Jerusalénginsurbar, be Bab Dummadse goloed e-nug odummogegar.
43004022	Bemar-Samaria-dulemar wichurmalad, doase gornai e-nug odummogegar, anmar-Judiomardi wismalad, ar doase gornai e-nug odummogegar, ar ade dulemar-abonoleged Judiomargi danikid.
43004023	Ar ibagan danikoed, emigindi ibagan nonisunnad, dulemar Bab Dummadse gollalile, nue burbar, degi, napiragwadgi ese gormaloed e-nug odummogegar. Ar Bab Dummad dulemar-degi-ese-goled amidimogad.
43004024	Bab Dummad, burbaled. Ar dule Bab Dummadse goledi, burbar, degi, napiragwadgi ese gormogar-gebed.
43004025	Ome, Jesúsga sogded: —An wisi, yoedse Mesías, dule-wargwen barmiledagoye soglesad, Cristo-nugad nonikoed. A-Cristo nonikile, a anmarga bela ibmar sognonikoed.
43004026	Jesús, ome-abin sogded: —Ani an a-duled, bebo sunmaksiid.
43004027	Agi e-sapingan nonikid, amar geger dakdemalad, Jesús, ome-ebo sunmaksiid, degi-inigwele, gwen ega sogsasurmalad: “¿Ibu omese be egissii? ¿Ibiga ome bebo sunmaksii?”
43004028	Degi ome e-gwidu-mete neggweburse nadsunnad. Neggweburse modapgu, macherganga sogdapid:
43004029	—Be dagmar, dule-wargwen bela-an-ibmar-imaksad-anga-sogsad be dakdamar, ¿abakalegi we-dule Cristo-sua?
43004030	Degi dulemar neggweburgi ainiarmargu, bela Jesússe nonimalad.
43004031	Degi-gunaigua, e-sapingan Jesúsgi wilenai-gusmalad, ega sognai-guarmalad: —Odurdaked-saila, wis mas be gungwele.
43004032	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Andi mas-gunned an nikad, ar a-mas-gunnedi bemar wichurmalad.
43004033	Degi e-sapingan na ega muchub-muchub sokarmalad: —¿Ar dule-wargwen mas-gunned ega senoni-sua?
43004034	Jesús, abin-sogded: “Dule-an-barmialidba ibmar-imaked, degi, a-e-arbaed-obeloged, a an-mas-gunnedid.
43004035	¿Ar bemarde sogsursi: ‘Amba nii-walabake napye ibmar-gwag-weed-iba?’ Andi an bemarga sogdo, nue be atakmar, nainu be dakmar, dulemar-bukidar-duurmakdanimalad, we-dulemar ibmar-gwagyobdo, weegala bato guagwar naid.
43004036	“Ar dule ibmar-gwag-weedgi arbaedi bennukledo, degine, ibmar-gwag-weoedi burba-geg-berguedga weoed, adi dule-ibmar-gwag-digedi, dule-ibmar-gwag-weed-ebo na wergumalagar.
43004037	“Ar we-ibmar-sogleged nue-napira sogleged: ‘Dule-gwensak ibmar-gwag-diged, dule-baid, ibmar-gwag-wee-daed.’
43004038	An bemar-barminanaid, bemar ibmar-gwaggi-arbassurmalad weega. Dule-baigan arbasmalad, bemar a-arbasadgi dogdemalad.”
43004039	Bukidar Samaria-dorgan, Sicar-neggweburginmalad Jesús-bengussurmalad, ar ade ome Jesúsgi sogdiid: “Bela an-ibmar-imaksad anga sogsaye.”
43004040	Degine, bukidar Jesússe Samaria-dorgan duurmaknonimalad, egi wilenagusmalad: “Anmar-walik be beeye.” Amar-walik Jesús ibabo megissunnad, dulemar-odurdakegar.
43004041	Jesús-ibmar-sogsadgi bur-ichesur Jesúsgi bengussurmalad, ome-ibmar-sogsadba.
43004042	A-ulale omega sokarmalad: —Anmar-Jesúsgi-bensulidi unnila be anmarga ibmar sogedginsulid. Ar anmar-sunnad itosmarmogad. Anmar nue-wisid, we-dule napneggi dule-iskubukmalad-abonoged-sunnadid, we-dule Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmiledagoye-sogsad-duled.
43004043	Jesús Sicar-neggweburgi ibabo megisad-sorbali, Samaria-yargi node-gusad, Galilease naegar.
43004044	Ar Jesús na e-sunnad sogsa-gusmogad: “Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbegedi na e-neggweburgi geg e-nug odummoleye.”
43004045	Jesús Galilease nonigu, Galilea-dorgan nued abingasmalad, ar ade ibase arbimarmosoggu, agi daksamalad, igi Jesús Jerusaléngi ibmar imaksad.
43004046	Degisoggu, Jesús gannar Galilea-yarse nonigu, Caná-neggweburse nade-gusad, bia dii vinoga obinnisadse. Deun Capernaum-neggweburgi dule-dummad, Reyga-arbaed-e-machi uelemaid.
43004047	We-dule itoargu, Jesús Judea-yarba-gudiid Galilea-yarse noniye, Jesússe nade-gusad. Jesúsgi wilenai-guar, adi e-machi ega nudaknaegar, ar ade e-machi burgwedani maid.
43004048	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad, degi, ibmar-geger-daklemalad bemar daksasulina, be an-benmalanad.
43004049	Dule-dummad, Reyga-arbaed, sogded: —Dummad, an-machi-burgwed-idu gwae anba be dage.
43004050	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Be nae, be-machi dula gudiid. Reyga-arbaed Jesús-degi-ega-sogsad gwen bengussulid. Degisoggu, na e-negse nade-gusad.
43004051	Negse monadapgu, e-maigan abin-noarmalad. E-dummad-abingusmargu, ega sogdemalad: —Be-machi bato nugus.
43004052	Degi, dummad e-maiganse egichiar, igi-wachigi e-machi nuguarye. Abin-sogdemar: —Sae, wachi-irgwengi ueleged gichaye.
43004053	Machigwa-e-bab mag itosad, a-wachigi Jesús ega sogsa-gusad: “Be-machi dula gudiiye.” Machigwa-e-bab, degine, bela e-negginmalad, Jesúsgi bensuli-gunonimarsunnad.
43004054	Jesús Judea-yargi-gudiid Galilea-yarse nonigu, we-ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid ilabogus wegi-imaknonido.
43005001	We-ibmar degi-gusad-sorbali, Judiomar-iba nonikid. Agi Jesús Jerusalénse nonimogad.
43005002	Jerusaléngi, Sibad-Wawaadye-Yawagak-nugad-naba, dii-wilasar-naid, Hebreo-gayagi Betesdaye bileged. Agi neg-imba-dummagan-gwaatar siid.
43005003	A-neg-imbamargi uelemalad-bukidar maimalad, ibya-surmalad, geg-nanamalad, bela-abgan-burgwarmalad. Amar dii-sukamaked edarbe mamaimalad.
43005004	Ar ade imbagwenar anger aidenoni-daed, dii-wilasar-naid osukamakegar. Ar doa-dule-insa a-dii-wilasar-naid sukamaksad-sorba aidesale, ibi-ueleged nik-dibe, yog nuguar-daed.
43005005	Agine, machered-wargwen birga-dulagwen-gakambe-gakabaabakgus uelemaid mai-gusmogad.
43005006	Jesús a-machered-meremai dakalid. Jesús wisguargu, we-machered dikasurgus uelemaiye, a-macheredga sogded: —¿Be nugubie?
43005007	Dule-uelemaid, abin-imakde, sogded: —Dummad, dii-sukamaksad-sorba dule a-dise an-odeged sate daed, ar an-aideged-idu an-iduar bato dule aides-daed.
43005008	Jesús ega sogded: —Be gwisgu, be-egi-gabed na be sede, be nae.
43005009	Jesús-degi-sogsad-sorba, dule yog nuguar naded, e-gabed na susa, nadsunnad. A-ibagi deun obunnoged-iba gued.
43005010	Agi Judiomar dule-nugusadga sogdemalad: —Emi-ibagi obunnoged-iba naid, degisoggu, be-egi-gabed na be sededsulid.
43005011	Dule-nugusad, abin-sogded: —Dule-an-nudaksad, ar a anga soged: ‘Be-egi-gabed na be sedye, be naye.’
43005012	Degi dule-nugusadse egisdemarsunnad: —¿Ar doa bega sogsa: ‘Be-egi-gabed na be sedye, be naye?’
43005013	Ar dule-nugusad, wichulid, doa ega sogsa, ar Jesúsde bato dulemar-bukidar-gunanaid-abargi banguded.
43005014	A-sorbali Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi Jesús dule-nugusad-dakargu, ega sogded: —Be dake, be nugusad. Degisoggu, mer be bar iskuo. Degir, aka-bur-bule boni-dummad begi danikile.
43005015	Dule-nugusad nade-gusad, Judiomar-owisodapid, Jesús e-onudaksaye.
43005016	A-ulale, Judiomar Jesús-bareginnarmarsunnad, oburgwebi-guarmalad, ar ade obunnoged-ibagi we-ibmarmar imakdiid.
43005017	Degi Jesús, abin-sogded: —An-Bab gusgu arbanaiguad, degisoggu, a-ular an arbamosundo.
43005018	A-ulale Judiomar bur Jesús-oburgwebi-guarmalad, ar ade Jesús unnila obunnoged-ibabi biskedisulid, Bab Dummad na ebo emar imakdibalid, na sogsadba, Bab Dummad an-Bab-sunnadye.
43005019	Jesús geb degi abin-imakdesun: “Napira an bemarga soged, Bab-Dummad-Machi gege na wargwengi ibmar imaked, unnila e-Bab-dakedba ibmar-imaked. Ar e-Bab bela ibmar-imakedi, E-Machi a sunnaa bela ibmar imakmogad.
43005020	Ar Bab na Machi-sabsoggu, ibmar-imakedi bela E-Machiga na oyoged. Ar weba bur-bule ibmar-dummagan Bab ega oyogoed, adi bemar bur-bule geger dakmalagar.
43005021	Ar igi Bab dule-burgwar-maid gannar oduloge, ega san-burba-dula-gued uke, amba E-Machi deyobmodo, ar doaga san-burba-dulad ukbie, ega ukodo.
43005022	Ar Bab emigi bar dulemarga igar-itogosulid, ar ade na E-Machiga we-igargan uksad,
43005023	adi bela dulemar E-Machi-nug ogannomogagar, ar igi E-Bab-nug oganno-damarmoga. Ar dule Bab-Dummad-Machi-e-nug odummosulile, E-Bab-nug odummosurmodo, ar ade Bab na E-Machi-barmialid.
43005024	“Napira an bemarga soged: Ar dule an-sunmakedba daele, degi, Bab-an-barmialidgi bengusulile, a-dule burba-geg-bergued nikuodo. A-dule bar sabsur odurdaklegosulid, ar burgwar-gudiidgi nosad, dula gudii-gunonisunnad.
43005025	Napira an bemarga soged: Ibagan danikoed, emigindi ibagan nonisunnad, dulemar-burbar-burgwarmalad Bab-Dummad-Machi-e-gaya-burba itononikoed, ar dulemar-a-gaya-burba-itosmalad durgunonikoed.
43005026	Ar igi Bab na-dukin-na-dulad-nika gudii, amba deyob na E-Machiga na-dukin-na-dula-gued uksamogad.
43005027	Deginbali, ar ade Dule-Machisoggu, amba ega igar-uksabalid, dulemarga igar-itogegar.
43005028	We-igar mer geger be itomar, ar ibagan danikoed, dulemar-neg-uangi-burgwar-mamaid, bela Bab-Dummad-Machi-e-gaya-burba-itomaloed.
43005029	Ar dule-ibmar-nued-imaksamalad gannar durgunonimaloed, burba-dulad nikuegar, ar dule-ibmar-iskana-imaksamaladdi, gannar durgunonimarmogoed, odurdakleged-negse naegar.”
43005030	Jesús Judiomarga sogdebar: “Geg na dukin wargwen na ibmar imaked, unnila an-Bab-anga-sogedba an dulemarga igar-itoged. An-igar-itogedi, igar-napiragwadgi an itoged, ar wargwen an-itolegedba an ibmar-imaksulid, an-ibmar-imakedi, dule-an-barmialid-sogedba an ibmar-imaked, an-Bab-sogedba.
43005031	“Ar an na dukin ibmar barsogele, an-ibmar-sogedi, igarga gussuliled.
43005032	Emigindi dule-baid an-barsoged, a-ular an wisid, dule an-barsoged, napiragwadba an-barsogdiid.
43005033	Bemar Juan-Bautistase dulemar-barmiar-gusmalad, egisega, be Mesías sogeye. Juan dulemar-abin imaksagu, napiragwadgi angi sogsa-gusad, ani an Mesíasye.
43005034	Ar we-napneggined-dulemar an-barsoged an amidisulid, degi-inigwele, we Juan-sogsad an bemarga sogmalad, adi bemar-abonolemalagar.
43005035	Ar igi acha-gwallu gummake, degine, mee-gae, ayobi Juan-Bautista gunonikid. Ar bemar unnila ichesaar a-gwallugine yeer-itodii-gudigusmalad.
43005036	“Ar Juan angi sogdigusadba bur-bule an-ibmar-imakdiidba an bemarga oyonaid, an doa-dule gue. Ar arbaegala Bab arbaed anga uksad, ar arbaed an imakdiid, a bato oyonaid, Bab an-barmiarye.
43005037	Deginbali, Bab-an-barmialid, bato angi sunmaksa-gusad. Bemardi bipisaale e-gaya-sunmaked be itodisurmalad, degine, e-dakleged be dakdisurmarbalid.
43005038	Deginbali, Bab-gaya-burba bemargi gwen naisurbalid. Ar Bab na dule bemarse barmialidi, bemar a-dule-benmalad.
43005039	Bab-Dummad-Garda-narmakar-naid nue be baramimar, ar agi burba-geg-bergued baramilesiye be sogmalad. Ar a-Gardagi angi sunmaknaid, an doa-dule gue.
43005040	Ar degite anse bemar yapa dagmalad, adi burba-geg-bergued bemar nikuegar.
43005041	“Dulemar an-nug-odummoged, an abingasulid.
43005042	Ar an bemar-wisid, bemar Bab-Dummad-sabsurmalad.
43005043	An-Bab-nuggi an bemarse nonikid, degite be an-abingasurmalad. Ar dule-baid na dukin e-nuggi danikoeddi, adi bemar a-dule-abingamaloed.
43005044	¿Ar igi bemar Bab-Dummad-bensuli-gumalosunna, ar unnila na be muchub-muchub san-ogannodimalad, ar Bab-Dummad-unnila-wargwenna-guedgi nug-gangued-danikid bemar amisurmalad?
43005045	“Mer bemar binsamalo, ani an-Bab-asabin bemargi gwisgumaloye. Suli, dule bato nika bemargi-gwisgumaloed, Moisés. Ar a-dulegi bemar sogmalad, a-igar-mesisadgi anmar-nanaedba an nibnegse dogmaloye. Bemar-iskudimaladba a-Moisés bemargi Bab-Dummad-asabin gwisgumaloed.
43005046	Ar Moisés-ibmar-sogsad be bengusurmalana, be an-bensurmalando, ar Moisés-ibmar-narmaksad angi narmaksad.
43005047	Ar Moisés-ibmar-narmaksad be benmaladde, degite, ¿igi an-ibmar-sogedgi bensuli be gumalosunna? Be an-bengumaloe.”
43006001	We degi-gusad-sorbali, Jesús Galilea-mata-dummad-obakar nade-gusad. We-mata-dummad Tiberias-mataye-nugbalid.
43006002	Dulemar-bukidar Jesúsba nade-gusmalad, ar ade ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid dule-uelemaladgi-imakdiid daksamalad.
43006003	Agi Jesús yar-birse nakwisgu, e-sapinganmala agi sigdapmalad.
43006004	Deun Judiomar-iba, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Iba bato omosad.
43006005	Jesús atakdegu, dakded, dulemar-bukidar ese nonimala. Agi Felipega sogded: —¿Wemar madu gunmalagar, wede bia anmar madu bakoe?
43006006	Unnila binsa Felipe-wilubdakega Jesús weyob Felipega sogsa-gusad, ar edi na bato wisid igi imakoe.
43006007	Felipe, Jesús-abin sogded: —Dule-wargwen nii-walabaabak-arbana-bennukleged, a-manigi madu baklesale, amba unnisuliled, belagwapa wis madu bipi-bipi gunmalagar.
43006008	Geb degi e-sapin-baid, Andrés, Simón-Pedro-e-urba, Jesúsga sogded:
43006009	—Wegi machigwa-wargwen cebada-madu-gwaatar wis sediid, degine, ua-burwigana wis ukabo sedibalid, degite, ¿ar wede unniosi, ar dule bukidarad?
43006010	Jesús degi sogded: —Nabir. Dulemar be urbemar. A-degi-gunanaidgine, gagan bukidar naid. Agi dulemar ambikusmargu, miliatar-wilub machergan mergu daklealid.
43006011	Jesús madu susgua, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsagu, e-sapinganga madu uke-uke imaksad. Geb e-sapingan dulemar-gagan-birgi-bukmaladga ukdemogad. Jesús amba deyob ua-imaksabalid, ar bule-mergu abemaladba ega uksamalad.
43006012	Bela dulemar immelesmargu, Jesús e-sapinganga sogded: —Bela gwabgusmalad be wemar, adi mer binsa mas milegegar.
43006013	Cebada-madu-gwaataled bela guchamalad-sorba, gwabgusmalad wesmargu, garba-gwaambe-gakabo-mergu enosmar daklealid.
43006014	Ar dulemar Jesús-madu-gwaataled-omelosad-daksamalad, sogdemalad: —We inso Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged we-napnegse-nonikoed-sunnadye.
43006015	Ar ise-ebipiar reyga-guega e-imakdanimalo, Jesús dulemar-daksagu, e-iduar yarse walagwen banguded.
43006016	Dad argwategu, Jesús-sapingan demar-gakase aidenonimalad igi ega Jesús-sogsa-gusadgii.
43006017	Urgi nakwismargu, mata-dummad obakdemalad, Capernaumse. Deun bato neg nue mutikgusad, Jesúsdi e-sapinganse amba yo nonikid.
43006018	Ar burwa binnasur gormaisoggu, demar dunguded.
43006019	Jesús-sapingan kilómetro-atargus, igi, nergwagus gammimaladgine, dakarmalad, Jesús demar-birgi nanadani, e-urse warmakdani. Deyob dakarmargu, dobguarmalad.
43006020	Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded: —Ani an gudii, mer be dobgumar.
43006021	Degi e-sapingan weligwar urgi Jesús-abingasmalad, degine, bia-na-nadapmaladse warmaksamarsunnad.
43006022	A-banedgine, dulemar-bukidar-Jesúsba-mata-obakar-gudimaladi dakarmalad unnila ur-wargwen-nai-gusadi, sate. A-urgi Jesús na e-sapinganba nakwissulid, unnila e-sapinganbi nade-gusmalad.
43006023	Ur-baigandi Tiberias-neggweburgi-danimalad nagunonimalad, bia Dummad-Jesús Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye-sogsad-sorba madu-omelosad guchamaladgi.
43006024	Ar dulemar Jesús-daklesur dakargu, degi, e-sapingan satemoga, Jesús-amiegala, urgi nade-gusmalad, Capernaumse.
43006025	Dulemar mata-dummad-obakar Jesús-amismargu, ega sogdemar: —¿Odurdaked-saila, sana wese be noniki?
43006026	Jesús, abin-imakdegu, emarga sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, be an-amimaladi, an-ibmar-dakledisulid-imaksadba be an-amisurmalad, ar bemar madu-immedik-guchadba be an-amimalad.
43006027	Mas-baisursunna-bergumaladga mer be arbamar. Be arbamar, mas anmarga burba-geg-bergued-uked-degi-sadeguoedga. Ar a-masdi sunna bemarga, ani Dule-Machi, an ukoed, ar agala Bab Dummad bato angi e-wilub nasiksad, we angi burba-geg-bergued nikumalagar.
43006028	Degi, Jesús-abin sogdemarsun: —¿Degite, igi an imakmalosunna Bab Dummadga ibmar-imakega?
43006029	Jesús, abin-imakde, emarga sogded: —Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-imaked wedo, Bab-Dummad-bemarga-na-dule-barmialidgi, mer agi be bengumar.
43006030	Jesús-abin sogdemalad: —¿Degite, ibi-ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid be anmarga imakosunna, adi anmar dakega, begi anmar mer benguega Bab Dummad be-barmialid? ¿Ibi-ibmar be imaksunna?
43006031	¿Bedi ibi anmarga ukosunna? Ar anmar-dadgan nega-dule-sulidgangi maná-guchamalad, ar Bab-Dummad-Garda sognaid: Ede dadganga madu-nibneggi-danikid uksaye, gunnegar.
43006032	Jesús amarga sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, Moisés bemarga madu-nibneggi-danikid uksasulid, ar an-Bab madu-nibneggi-danikid-sunnad bemarga uked.
43006033	Ar Bab-Dummad-madu, we-dule-nibneggi-aidenonikid, we-napnegginmaladga burba-dula-gudiguedi uked.
43006034	Jesúsga sogdemalad: —Dummad, madu-degiid be anmarga ukdigu-sae.
43006035	Jesús, abin-sogded: “Ani an madu-burba-duladid. Ar dule anse danikile, bar gwen ukumesosulid. Ar dule an-bengusulile, bar gwen uku-uku itogosulid.
43006036	“Ar an bemarga epenne bato sogsamalad, ibmar-dakledisulid-imaksad be an-daksamar-inigwele, degite amba be an-benmalad.
43006037	Ar bela Bab dulemar-anga-ukedi, anse dagoed anba naguegar. Ar dule anse danikile, gwen an barmetosulid.
43006038	“Ar nibneggi an danikid, an-itoleged na ibmar-saega an danisulid. An nonikid, dule-an-barmialid-sogedba ibmar-imakegar.
43006039	Bab-an-barmialid we abemaid: Bela dulemar-anse-nonikid gwen wargwensaar oyoggubisur an-abeged, adi ibagan-napi-naguoedgi a-dulemar an gannar odulogegar.
43006040	“Dule-an-barmialid we abemaid: Bela dulemar-E-Machi-dakedi, degine, egi bensuli-gunonikile, burba-geg-bergued nikuoed. Degine, ani, ibagan-napi-naguoedgi a-dule an odulogoed.”
43006041	Degi Judiomar Jesúsgi sunmakedbi-guarmalad, ar ade Jesús sogsad: “Ani an madu-nibneggi-aidenonikidye.”
43006042	Judiomar Jesúsgi sogdemalad: —¿Ar wede Jesússursi, José-machisursi, degine, e-bab, degi, e-nan anmar mag daksursi? ¿Ar degite ibiga sogsunna, nibneggi an aidenoniye?
43006043	Jesús amar-abin imakde, sogded: —Mer na be muchub-muchub angi istar sunmakmar.
43006044	Dule-wargwensaale gege anse daged, ar Bab-an-barmialid, a anse-dagega imaksulir, ibagan-napi-naguoedgi, ani an a-dule-odulogoed.
43006045	Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad-gardagi narmakar naid: Bab Dummad na e-igargi bela dulemar-odurdakoye. Degisoggu, bela Bab-itosmalad, degi, egi durdaksamarbalid, amar anse danimaloed anba naguegar.
43006046	“Ar an sogsulid, dule-wargwensaar Bab-daksa-deeye. Suli, unnila dule-Bab-Dummadgi-danikid, abi unnila Bab-daksad.
43006047	Napira an bemarga soged: Ar dule angi bengusulile, a-dule burba-geg-bergued nikad.
43006048	“Ani an madu-burba-duladid.
43006049	Ar be-dadgan nega-dule-sulidgangi maná guchamar-inigwele, amar bela burgwismalad.
43006050	“An bemarga madu-nibneggi-aidenonikidgi an sunmakedi, a-madu dule guchale, adi geg bar burgwed.
43006051	Ani an madu-duladid, nibneggi-aidenonikidid. Ar dule-wargwen a-madu guchale, bar burgosulid, degi-dula-sadeguoed. An madu-ukoedi, we an-sanad. An a-madu ukoed, adi we-napneg-naidgi dulemar-bukmalad dula gudiguegar.”
43006052	Agi Judiomar na abin-abin imakarmalad, sogdemalad: —¿Ar wede anmar e-san-gunnega anmarga na e-san ukode? Adi surbali.
43006053	Jesús amarga sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged: Ar bemar Dule-Machi-e-san-gunsulile, degine, e-abe gobsurbalile, bemar burba-dulad-satemalad.
43006054	Ar dule an-san gunnele, degi, an-abe gobele, a-dule burba-geg-bergued nikado, degine, ibagan-napi-naguoedgi, ani an a-dule-odulogoed.
43006055	Ar an-sana, mas-gunned-sunsogedid, degine, an-abe, gobed-sunsogedbalid.
43006056	Ar dule-an-san-gunmalad, degi, an-abe-gobmalad, anginbi gudigumalad, degine, an egi gudigumogad.
43006057	Ar igi Bab-dula-gudiid an-barmiali, degine, igi an Babgi an dula gudimoga, dule an-san guchale, deyob a-dule angi dula gudigumogoed.
43006058	Ar ani an madu-nibneggi-aidesadid. Be-dadgan-maná-guchadyobsulid, ar amardi burgwismalad. Ar madu-nibneggi-aidesadi, dule a-madu guchardi, adi burgosulid, degi-sadeguoed.
43006059	Jesús we-ibmar-sogsagusadi, Judiomar-onmaked-neggi sogsa-gusdo, deun Capernaumgi dulemar-odurdaksigusgu.
43006060	Bukidar-e-sapingan Jesús weyob-soge itosmargu, sogdemalad: —We-ibmar-sogedi gwen nollo sogsulid. Degisoggu, we deyob-sogedba, ¿ar doa eba ibsaoe? Anmar eba ibsaosurmala.
43006061	Ar Jesús na wissoggu, e-sapingan na muchub-muchub we-igargi sunmaknanaid, amarga sogdesun: —¿Ar we-an-bemarga-sogedi, be istar itomala?
43006062	Degite, ¿igi be sogsamalarsunna, ar Dule-Machi nibneggi-bia-mai-gusadse gannar nakwemai be dakarmalar?
43006063	Ar Bab-Dummad-Burbabi dula gudigued uked, dule-sandi binsaledid. An-bemarga-ibmar-sogsadi, we burba-napiragwadid, degine, dula gudiguedbalid.
43006064	Ar bemar gwenna-gwennagwa an-benmalad. Ar Jesús bato gebesaila-akar wisid doamala e-benmala, degine, doa darba e-ukoe.
43006065	Jesús sogded: —A-ulale an sogsad, dule anba naguegala gege anse dagye, ar Bab anse sedasulir.
43006066	Degidgine, bukidar e-sapingan Jesús-metemalad, bar Jesúsba gudigussurmalad.
43006067	Geb degi Jesús na e-sapingan-warambe-gakabogwadga sokar: —¿Ar bemar nabimarmoga?
43006068	Simón-Pedro, abin-sogded: —Dummad, ¿doaba anmar naosunna? Ar bebi unnila igar-napiragwad nikad, dulemar burba-geg-bergued nikuegar.
43006069	Ar anmar begi bensulid, degine, anmar wisid, be Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-duled, Bab-Dummad-Dula-Maid-E-Machi-sunnadid.
43006070	Jesús, Pedro-abin sogded: —¿Ar warambe-gakabo an be-susmarsursi, ar bemar-gwensak niasursi?
43006071	Judas-Iscariote, Simón-e-machi, a-nik Jesús deyob sogsa-gusad, ar a-dule Jesús-darba-uknai-guoedid, e-sapingan-e-ambe-gakabogwad-wargwen.
43007001	We degi-gusad-sorba, Jesús Galilea-yalaganba bipirmakdii-gusad, ar ade yapa Judeagi gudigued, ar Judiomar e-oburgwebimalad.
43007002	Deun Judiomar-iba bato mosadgined, Obunnoged-Neg-Sobarmalad-Ibagi.
43007003	E-urbamar Jesúsga sokar: —Wegi be node, Judease be nae, adi be-sapingan be-ibmar-imaked be-dakoed.
43007004	Ar dule-wargwen na mag-dakle imakbiele, geg odukuar ibmar-imaked. Ar ibmar-dakledisulid be imakdisoggu, bela dulemar-wagab be imakdo.
43007005	E-urbamar weyob Jesúsga sogsamardo, ar ade e-urbamarse-bakar Jesús-benmalad, we Mesíasye.
43007006	Degi Jesús e-urbamarga sogdesun: —An Jerusalénse-naed-ibagan angardi amba yo moed, ar bemargardi ibagan bato gusgu guagwar-nai daed.
43007007	Ar we-napneg-naidgi-dulemar-bukmalad geg istar bemar-daked, andi istar an-dakmardo, ar andi ega sogdiid, be-ibmar-imakdimalad iskanaye.
43007008	Ar bemardi ibase namardo. Andi amba naosurgweled, ar yo angardi an-ibagan moed.
43007009	Deyob e-urbamarga sogsagu, Jesúsdi na Galileagi bessun.
43007010	Jesús-urbamar ibase naded-sorba, Jesús ibase nade-gusmogad. Jesús arbakee nade-gusad, emar-wagab nadsulid.
43007011	Ibagi Judiomar Jesús-amidii-guarmalad, sogdemalad: —¿Wede bia dule nade?
43007012	Agine dulemar-bukidarad-abargi Jesúsgi uurmakarmalad, gwenna-gwenna sogdemalad: “We-Jesús, dule-nuedid.” Baigandi sogmarmogad: “Suli, we dule-yardakdiid-duled.”
43007013	Ar dulemar Judiomar-dummagan-dobedba, bakar-buud Jesúsgi gwen sunmaksasurmalad.
43007014	Ar Obunnoged-Neg-Sobarmalad-Iba negabar-gusgu, Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse nonikid, agi dulemar-odurdaksigusad.
43007015	Judiomar-dummagan geger Jesús-dakdemalad, sogdemalad: —Ar we-dule dummaganse-ibmar-gwen-durdaksasulid, ar degite, ¿ibiga ibmar-nue-wisi dulemar-odurdake?
43007016	Jesús amarga sogdesun: “An-ibmar-odurdaked angadsulid, Bab-Dummad-an-barmialid-sogedba an dulemar-odurdaked.
43007017	Ar Bab-Dummad-sogedba dule nanabiele, mag dakoed, an-ibmar-odurdakdiid Bab Dummadgi dani-dibe, igi, an-ibmar-odurdakdiid an na dukin onos-dibe.
43007018	Ar dule na wargwen e-sogedba ibmar sogdiile, unnila a-dule na dukin nug-dungued-amidiido. Ar e-barmialid-nug odummogega gudiirdina, adi we napiragwaddo, a-dulegine, gakan naisurdo.
43007019	“¿Ar Moisés bemarga igar uksasursi? Degite a-igargi bemar nanadisurmalad. ¿Ibiga be an-oburgwebimarsunna?”
43007020	Dulemar, Jesús-abin sogdemalad: —Nia begi nai. ¿Ar doamar be-oburgwebimala?
43007021	Jesús amarga sogded: “Ibmar-dakledisulid obunnoged-ibagi unnila gwennaa an imaksadde, degite ¿geger be an-dakmarde? Emide be sogmargu, an dule-iskanaye.
43007022	Moisés bemarga abgan-duku-siked-igar mesismalad. Ar Moisés bemarga uksasulindo, ar dadgan-akar-danikid. Obunnoged-ibagi bemar abgan-duku-siked-igar imakbukdo, igar-mai-inigwer, mer arbaoye.
43007023	Melle Moisés-igar-mesisadgi annaegala, amba obunnoged-iba-dibe, bemar abgan-duku-siked-igar imakbukwad, degite, ¿ibiga obunnoged-ibagi dule an nudaksad, sae be an-dakmarsunna?
43007024	Dulemar-ibmar-imaked mer askinbi be dako. Nue igar-amisadgi geb be we-dulegi sogoed, we dule-nued-dibe, igi, dule-iskana-dibe.”
43007025	Degi Jerusalénginmalad gwenna-gwenna sogdemalad: —¿Ar dummagan we-dule-amidimarsursi, oburgwemalagar?
43007026	Emide be dakena, bela-dulemar-abargi sunmakgwisgu, degite, gwen ega akar sogsurmalad. ¿Ar dummagande nue mag itononimarsi, we, Cristo-sunnadid, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-duled?
43007027	“Ar wedi anmar wisid, bia daniki, degisoggu, we-Jesús geg Cristoga gued. Ar Cristodi nonikile, anmar wisguosulid, bia danikid.”
43007028	Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi dulemar-odurdaksigu, binnasur sunmakde, sogded: —Bemar mag an-dakmalad, degine, be an-wismarbalid an bialidi. An-itolegedba wargwen an danisulid, ar Bab Dummad an-barmialid, adi napiragwadid. A-duledi bemar aku-dakmalad.
43007029	Andi a-dule mag an daked, ar agi an danikid, ar a an-barmialid.
43007030	Agine, dummagan Jesús-gabi-guarmalanad, degite, bipisaale gwen gassurmalad, ar ade yo e-burgwed-ibagan omoged.
43007031	Dulemar-bukidar Jesúsgi bengussurmalad, sogdemalad: —Bab Dummad sogsad, yoedse dule-wargwen an bemarga barmidagoye. A-dule nonikile, be insagua, ¿bur-bule we-dulebali ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid imako be insae? Gwen deyob imako an insasurdo.
43007032	Fariseomar itosmalad, igi dulemar Jesúsgi Mesíasye sunmaknanaid. Degisoggu, Fariseomar, degine, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan suar-ibmala-barmismalad, Jesús-gaegar.
43007033	Geb Jesús dulemar-e-itobukwadga sogded: —Napi ichesaar an bemar-abargi gudiid, an naesokalid dule-an-barmialidse.
43007034	Be an-amimalo-inigwele, gwen be an-amimalosulid. Ar bia an gudiguoedgine, geg ase be namalad.
43007035	Degi Judiomar na ga sokarmarsun: —¿Ar wede bia naoe, anmarde bar amiosurmalad? ¿Ar wede Griego-dulemar-abargi-Judiomar-aisakis-bukmaladse naosi, Griegomar-odurdakegar?
43007036	¿Wede ibi obarsunna, we sogsad: ‘Be an-amimalo-inigwele, gwen be an-amimalosurye. Ar bia an gudiguoedgine, geg ase be namarye?’
43007037	Napi-iba-naidgi, a-iba bur iba-dummadid, a-ibagi Jesús gwisgusgu, binnasur sunmakded, sogded: —Ar dule-wargwen uku-uku itodiile, anse dage, anse dii gobdado.
43007038	Ar dule an-bensulile, ar igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognai, e-ulubgi diwar-burba-nikad aryomai-guoye.
43007039	Jesús sogsa-gusad, diwar-burba nikadye, we Bab Dummad Burba Nued dulemar-egi-benguosurmalad abingaoedgi sogsa-gusad. Ar ade amba yo Bab Dummad Burba Nued nonikid, ar Jesús amba yo bela-bela e-nug ogannoleged.
43007040	Bukidar-dulemar weyob-Jesús-ibmar-soged-itosmargu, sogdemalad: —Ar we-dule, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged napiragwad-sunnadid.
43007041	Baigandi sogmalad: —We, Cristo, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule-sunnadid. Degine, baiganmo sogmarmogad: —¿Ar ade Galileagi Cristode danikosi? Suli, agi daniko suli.
43007042	¿Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaisursi Cristo Davidgi danikoye, Belén-neggweburgi, bia David epenne gwalulesadgi?
43007043	Ar dulemar Jesús-ulale na muchub-muchub uludmarsunnad.
43007044	Degine, gwen-gwen Jesús-gabimalan-inigwele, gwen gassurgusmalad.
43007045	Suar-ibmala-barmilesmalad gannar nonimalad, dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummaganse, degi, Fariseomarse. Fariseomar ega sogdemalad: —¿Ibiga bemar Jesús-sedanisurmala?
43007046	Suar-ibmala abin-imakdemalad: —¡Dule-wargwensaale weyob gwen sunmakdisulid, nue yeer sunmaked!
43007047	Degi Fariseomar, abin-imakdemalad: —¿Ar bemar ese yardaklesmarmoga?
43007048	¿Ar bemar dakgua, dummagan, degine, Fariseomar, a-dulegi bensurmar be daksii? Benmala.
43007049	Ar dulemar-baigandi Moisés-igar-mesisad-wichurmaladba Jesúsba nagudmalad. Degisoggu, bato amar nue-ukabsales bukmarsundo.
43007050	Nicodemo, Fariseomogadi, dule ibagwengi mutik Jesússe nonigusadi, e-sordamarga sokalid:
43007051	—¿Ar anmar-igar-maidgi sunna dule-wargwenga amba yo igar-itoged-iduar bato soglesi, be dummad-nosye, degisoggu, bega sabsur odurdakleged-igar maiye? Suli, degisuli.
43007052	Fariseomar, Nicodemo-abin imakdemalad: —¿Ar be Galileaginmogadi? Bab-Dummad-Garda-narmakar-naidgi nue be baramie, be dakodo, bipisaale Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged gwen Galileagi danisulid. [
43007053	Degi dummagan na e-neg-e-negse nadmarsunnad.
43008001	Degi Jesús Olivos-yarse nadsunnad.
43008002	Banedgine, waidaryala Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-negse gannar nonigu, dulemar-bukidar ese nonimalad. Jesús sigisgua, dulemar-odurdaksigusad.
43008003	Deun escribamar, degi, Fariseomar, ome-wargwen neg-sichigi-yolenai-galesad, Jesússe senonimalad. Dummagan dulemar-abargi ome-ogwisnonimargu,
43008004	Jesúsga sogdemalad: —Odurdaked-saila, we-ome e-sui-sulid-ebo na neg-sichigi-yolenai gasmalad.
43008005	Emi Moisés anmarga igar-mesisad, omegan-degimalad akwagi makoye, oburgwegar. Degite, bedina, ¿igi be sogmosunna?
43008006	Ar yamo Jesús-wilubdakegala Fariseomar ese deyob egichismalad, adi Jesúsgi sorba gwisgumalagar. Ar Jesúsdi, napase dulluu atakdegu, e-gogi napa narmak-narmak imaksigisad.
43008007	Ar Fariseomar Jesús e-abinsaegala ese egisnanai-guarmarsoggu, Jesús gannar nue sigisgu, abin-sogded: —Ar bemar-wargwen na be iskuedsuli-itogele, a-inse akwa omegi metagodo.
43008008	Jesús gannar napase dulluu atakdebargu, gannar napagi narmaksigisbalid.
43008009	Ar Fariseomar degi-Jesús-soge itosmargu, mag na ulubgi e-iskudiid itosmarsoggu, wargwen-wargwen ainidmalad, dummagan-inse, geb degi a-sorba yaigana. Geb Jesús unnila ome-negabargi-gwichid-ebo bessunnad.
43008010	Jesús gannar nue sigisbargu, dakdegu, dulemar sate, unnila omebi gwichi, omega sogded: —Omegwa, ¿bia dulemar-begi-gwisgunanaid nadmala? ¿Wargwensaar be-odurdakye sogsasurmala?
43008011	Ome, abin-sogded: —Dummad, dule-wargwensaar angi gwisgussulid. Degi Jesús omega sogdemosun: —An begi gwisguosurmogad. Be nae, mer be bar iskuo.]
43008012	Gannar Jesús dulemarga sunmakdebargu, sogded: —Ani an we-napneg-naid gwallu-meegwadid. Ar dule anba dagele, neg-sichidgi nanaosulid, gwallu-meegwad nikuoed, a-gwallu-meegwad burba-geg-bergued dulemarga uked.
43008013	Degi Fariseomar Jesúsga sogdemalad: —Be-ibmar-sogedi, na be dukin barsogsoggu, a-ular be-ibmar-sogedi, geg anmar abingaed.
43008014	Jesús, Fariseomar-abin sogded: —Ar an-ibmar-sogedi, na dukin an sog-inigwele, an-ibmar-soged napiragwad an soged, ar an wisid, bia an daniki, degine, bia an nabaloe. Ar bemardi wichurmalad, bia an daniki, degine, bia an nabaloe.
43008015	Ar bemardi unnila we-napneg-igar-maidba sogmalad, we dule-iskanaye, igi, we dule-nuedye. Andi an sogsulid we dule-iskanaye, igi, we dule-nuedye.
43008016	Ar dule-wargwengi an sogele, igar-naboegalad, we deyob an imaked andi napiragwadba soged, we dule-nuedye, igi, we dule-iskanaye, ar wargwen an sogsulid, an-Bab-an-barmialid, a-anbo soged.
43008017	Bemar-igar-maidgi sogmaid, dule-warbo barsoged-nikale, we napiragwadye abingalegoye.
43008018	Ani an-ibmar-sogedi, an na dukin angi an soged, degine, Bab-an-barmialid, angi sogmogad. Degisoggu, an-ibmar-sogedi napiragwaddo.
43008019	Degi Jesúsga sogdemarsun: —¿Bia be-Babde maisunna? Jesús, dulemar-abin sogded: —Aku be an-dakmalad, degine, an-Bab aku be dakmarbalid. Ar mag be an-dakmalana, an-Bab mag be dakmarmogando.
43008020	Weyob Jesús sunmaksa-gusad, deun Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi, mani-weleged-naba-sii dulemar-odurdaksigu. Dule-wargwensaale gwen Jesús-gassurmalad, ar ade amba yo e-galeged-wilub omoged.
43008021	Jesús gannar Judio-dummaganga sogdebalid: —An naesokar. Be an-amimalo-inigwele, be an-amimalosulid. Bemardi be-iskuedgi na be burgwemaloed. An-bia-naedse, geg bemar ase warmaked.
43008022	Degi Judio-dummagan sogdemar: —¿Ar ede na dukin oburgosi? Ar soged: ‘An-bia-naedse, geg bemar ase namarye.’
43008023	Jesús amarga sogded: —Bemar we-napnegginedid, andi nibnegginedid. Bemardi we-napnegginmaladid, andi we-napnegginedsulid.
43008024	A-ular an bemarga sogsa-gusmalad, be-iskuedgi na be burgwemaloye. Ar be an-abingasurmalale an doa, na be-iskuedgi be burgwemalodo.
43008025	Judio-dummagan Jesúsga sogdemarsun: —¿Ar be doa-sunna? Degi Jesús, abin-sogded: —Ar iduar bato an bega sogsamalad, an doa-dule.
43008026	Emi bemar-noar-nanadiidbali ibmar-bukidar an bemargi-soged nikad. Ar dule-an-barmialiddi napiragwadbi ibmar soged. Andi, an a-itosadba, we-napneggi-bukmaladga an sogdimogad.
43008027	Ar Judio-dummagan aku itosmalad deun Jesús sogsa-gusgu, an-barmialidye. E-Babgi ega sunmaked.
43008028	Degi Jesús sogdebar: —Ar ani Dule-Machi, bemar nakrusgi-biokegala niba an-onakwismalale, geb bemar wisgunonimaloed, an doa-dule, degine, an-itolegedba an ibmar-imakdisulid. Ar an-Bab an-odurdaksadba, deyob an sunmakdiid.
43008029	Ar an-Bab-an-barmialid anba gudiid, wargwen an-metedisulid, ar ade an bela-ibmar-imakedi, an-Bab-nabir-itogedi an imaked.
43008030	Jesús weyob sunmakedba, bukidar egi bensuli-gunonimalad.
43008031	Jesús Judiomar-egi-bengussurmaladga sogded: —Ar bemar an-gaya-burba-sunmakedgi nue eba nanaele, nue bemar an-sapingan-sunnadga gumaloed.
43008032	Degine, bemar igar-napiragwad wisgunonimaloed, degine, igar-napiragwad iskuedgi bemar-ollorsanonikoed.
43008033	Judiomar, Jesús-abin sogdemalad: —Anmar Abraham-e-wagan gumalad, anmar aimar-maiga gwen gudisurmalad, degite, ¿ibiga be anmarga sogsunna: ‘Bemar ollorgunonikoye?’
43008034	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, dulemar-iskuedgi-gudimaladi, we-iskuedse mailedimalad.
43008035	Dule-maiga-arbaedi geg neg-yagi gudigu-sadeguad. Ar neg-ibed-e-mimmirdi neg-yagi gudigu-sadeguodo.
43008036	Degisoggu, ar Bab-Dummad-Machi iskuedgi be-onononikir, geb be nue-napiragwad ollorgumaloed.
43008037	An wisi bemar Abraham-wagan gumalad, degi-inigwele be an-oburgwebimalad, ar ade an-ibmar-sogsad be abingasurmalad.
43008038	An-ibmar-sogedi an-Bab-walik an ibmar-daksadba an sunmaked, ar bemardi be ibmar-imakedi be-bab-ibmar-itosadba be imakmarmogad.
43008039	Judio-dummagan Jesús-abinsadmargu, sogdemalad: —Abraham anmar-dadad. Jesús, abin-sogded: —Bemar Abraham-wagan-sunnadina Abraham-ibmar-imaksadyob bemar ibmar-imakdimarmoganad.
43008040	Ar Bab-Dummadgi-an-ibmar-napiragwad-itosad an a bemarga sogsad-ular, emigindi be an-oburgwebimalad. Dad-Abrahamdi gwen deyob gussulid.
43008041	Ar bemardi be-bab-Satanás-ibmar-imaked be imakmalad. Degi Judiomar Jesúsga sogdemalad: —Anmar dule-neg-sichigi-gwalulesad-surmalad. Anmar bab-nika-gwalulesmalad, Bab Dummad anmar-babad.
43008042	Degi Jesús amarga sogded: “Ar Bab Dummad bemar-babana, be an-sabmalando, ar Bab-Dummad-akar an danikid, degine, agi wese an nonikid. Ar na dukin an-itolegedgi an danisulid, Bab Dummad an-barmialid.
43008043	¿Ibiga nue-akusunna an-ibmar-soged be itomala? Ar ade an-ibmar-soged be itobisurmaladba, be aku itomalad.
43008044	Ar nia-saila bemar-babad, degine, be-bab-ibmar-abegedba be damalad. Ar gusgu, gebesailaunni nia-saila dule-gindakedid, degine, igar-napiragwadgi banguded, ar igar-napiragwad nia-sailagi naisulid. Ar nia-saila gakansaar sunmakdele, gusgu na e-daedba sunmaked, ar ade gusgu gakansaerbad, degine, dulemar-gakansaed-e-babad.
43008045	Ar andi ibmar-napiragwad sogsoggu, a-ulale be an-abingasurmalad.
43008046	“¿Ar doa-dule angi sogoe, an iskudiiye? Ar igar-napiragwad an sogele, degite, ¿ibiga be an-abingasurmarsunna?
43008047	Ar dule Bab Dummadgadile, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba sunmaked itoged. A-ulale, bemardi Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-itosulid, ar bemar, Bab Dummadgadsulid.”
43008048	Degi Judiomar Jesús-abinsadmalad, ega sogdemalad: —Ar anmar nabir sogmalad, be Samaria-dulemar-iskanayobmogad, degine, nia begi naid.
43008049	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Nia angi naisulid. An-Bab-nug bur an odummodiid, bemardi an-nug-ichodimalad.
43008050	An na dukin nug-odummoged an amidisulid. Ar dule-wargwen an-nug-odummoged maid, a sogoed, an dule-nued-dibe, igi, an dule-iskana-dibe.
43008051	Napira an bemarga soged, an-gaya-burba-sogedba dule daele, we-dule burgosulid.
43008052	Degi Judiomar Jesúsga sogdemalad: —Emigindi anmar nue wisdo, nia begi naid. Abraham, degi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemaladdi burgwismalad, emide bedi soged: ‘Ar dule-wargwen an-gaya-burba-sogedba daele, burgwed itogosurye.’
43008053	¿Ar bede anmar-dad-Abrahamba bur dummasi? Ar dad-Abrahamdi burgwisad. ¡Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad burgwismarmogad! ¿Ar be doaye na sogsunna? ¿Ar be-bur amarba bur dummadsi?
43008054	Jesús, Judiomar-abin sogded: —Ar na dukin an na san-odummogele, an na san-odummogedi, binsaleddo. Bab Dummad bemar-Bab-Dummadye be sogmalad, a-Bab-Dummad an-Babad, a an-nug odummoged.
43008055	Bemardi a-Bab-Dummad-aku-dakmalad, andi a-Bab-Dummad-mag-daked. Ar bemarga an sog-dibe, a-Bab-Dummad aku an dakye, bemar-sunnaa an gakansasmogardo. Andi a-Bab-Dummad mag an daked, degine, e-gaya-burbaba an nanadibalid.
43008056	Anmar-dad-Abraham, an-danikoed-dakoedba weligwar itosad. An-nonikid daksagu, geb agi nue-weligwar itononisunnad.
43008057	Degi Judiomar ega sogdemalad: —Amba be birga-dulabo-gakambe niksulidde, ¿degite, Abraham be daksade? Be daksasuli.
43008058	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Napira an bemarga soged, amba yo Abraham gwalulege, bato ani an gudiid.
43008059	Degi Judiomar akwa gadebinmalad, akwagi Jesús-makegar. Jesúsdi emar-idu dukusad, degi, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi nodsunnad. Degi emar-abargi nodgu, nadsunnad.
43009001	Jesús nadapgu, machered-wargwen gusgu muu-neggi ibya-suli-gwalulesad dakalid.
43009002	Jesús-sapingan Jesússe egichiarmalad: —Odurdaked-saila: ¿Ar we doa-iskusadba ibya-suli gwalulesa? ¿E-babgan iskusa, igi, ar na e iskusa?
43009003	Jesús na e-sapingan-abin sogded: —We, degine, e-babgan, amar iskussurmalad. We ibya-suli-gwalulesad, adi Bab-Dummad-ibmar-imaked we-dulegi oyolegegar.
43009004	Igi dulemar ibgi arbae, ar mutik nonikir, geg dule bar arbaed. An deyobmodo, amba ibgi ibagan-naidgi dule-an-barmialid-arbaed an imaker-gebed. Ar an bemargi bangudogu, mutikidyob guoed, bar an ibmar-imakosulid.
43009005	Ar emigi we-napneggi an gudiidgi, ani an we-napneggi-dulemar-bukwadga igar-napiragwad oyonaid, gwallu-meegwadyob an gued.
43009006	Jesús degi-sogsad-sorba, napagi wiaksagu, napa olli-olli wiigi imaksad, degine, e-gogi olli-ollid wesgu, dule-ibyagi mage-mage imaksabalid.
43009007	Geb degi Jesús dule-ibya-sulidga sogded: —Dii-wilasar-naidse, Siloé-nugadse be ibya na enukna. (Siloé sogleged, Barmilenaid.) Degi dule-ibya-sulid nadsun ibya enukega. Ibya enuksagu, nonikid bato sunna mag-atake.
43009008	E-neg-dikarba-mamaid, degine, dule-ibya-suli-gudidaed-mag-dakmaladi sogdemalad: —¿Ar we dule-ibya-suli, degine, wilegedi, mani aimarse egisdidaedsursi?
43009009	Abar sogmalad: —We a-duleye. Baigandi sogmarmogad: —Surye, binsa we sunnaa dakleye. Degi, na e-ibeddi soged: —Ani an a-duleye.
43009010	Ese egichiarmarsunnad: —¿Igi nabir mag be atakgusa?
43009011	Dule-nugusad, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Dule-wargwen, Jesús-nugadi, napa olli-olli imaksad, an ibyagi mage-mage imaksabalid, geb degi anga sokalid: ‘Siloése be nae, be ibya enukna.’ Agi an ase nade-gusad, an-ibya an enuksad, geb degi mag-atak an gunonisunnad.
43009012	Geb degi ega sogdemalad: —Ar degite, ¿bia Jesús nadsunna? Dule-nugusad abin-sogded: —An wichuli, bia Jesús nade.
43009013	Fariseomarse dule-ibya-suli-gudigusad senonimalad.
43009014	Deun obunnoged-ibagi Jesús napa olli-olli imaksa-gusad, dule-ibya-sulid a-ibagi onudaksa-gusad.
43009015	Fariseomar dule-ibya-suli-gudigusadse egisdemarmogad: —¿Igi nabir be ibya nugusa? Dule-nugusad, abin-sogded: —Jesús an-ibyagi olli mage-mage imaksad, degi, ibya an enuksagu, mag-atak an gunonikid.
43009016	Degi abar Fariseomar sogdemalad: —We-dule Bab Dummadgi danisulid, ar ade we-dule obunnoged-ibagi dule-nudaksad. Fariseo-baigandi sogmalad: —¿Ar dule iskudiile, we sunna ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad imakosi? Suli, geg imake. Na Fariseomar abin-abin imakarmarsunnad.
43009017	Degi Fariseomar gannar dule-ibya-suli-gudigusadga sokarmalad: —Dule-bega-ibya-nudaksadgi ¿igi be sogmosunna? Dule-nugusad, abin-sogded: —Andi an soged, we Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged-duleye.
43009018	Ar Judiomardi we-dule-ibya-suli-gudigusad, ibya-emigindi-nikusad benmalad. A-ular dule-ibya-suli-gudigusad-e-babganse gochamarsunnad.
43009019	Ese egisdemalad: —¿Ar we be-machi-sunnadi, we ibya-suli gusgu gwalulesadi? ¿Ar degite ibiga emigindi nabir ataksunna?
43009020	E-babgan sogdemalad: —Anmar wisi, we anmar-machid, ibya-suli gwalulesad.
43009021	Ar emigindi mag-atakeddi an wichurmalad, ibiga nabir mag-atake. Anmar wichurbalid, ar doa ega nabir ibya nudaksa. Ar bato dummadsoggu, ese be egismar, na e bemarga sogoed, doa ega ibya nudaksa.
43009022	Dule-ibya-suli-gudigusad-e-babgan Judiomar-dummagan-dobedbali weyob sogsagusmardo, ar ade Judio-dummagan bato igar-itosmalad, ar dule-wargwen sog-dibeye Jesús we-dule-Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-duleye, Judiomar-onmaked-neggi onomaloye.
43009023	A-ulale dule-ibya-suli-gudigusad-e-babgan sogsa-gusmalad: “Bato dummadsoggu, ese be egismar, doa e-onudaksa.”
43009024	Degine, Fariseomar dule-ibya-suli-gudigusadse gannar gochamargu, ese egisdemalad, ega sogdemalad: —Bab-Dummad-asabin napiragwadba be anmarga sogmalo igi be nugusa. Anmardi wismalad we-dule, dule-iskanad. ¿Bedi igi be sogmosunna?
43009025	Degi, dule-nugusad, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —An wichulid, we dule-iskudiid-dibe. Unnila ibmar-soggwennaa an wisid, iduardi aku an atakenad, emigindi mag an ataked.
43009026	Fariseomar gannar dule-ibya-suli-gudigusadse egichiarmarbalid: —¿Igi-be-imaksa? ¿Igi nabir bega ibya nudaksa?
43009027	Dule-nugusad, abin-sogded: —Ar bato bega an sogsamalad, be an-itosurmalad. ¿Degite ibiga gannar be itobimarsunna? ¿Ar bemar e-sapinganga gubimarmosi?
43009028	Fariseomar dule-ibya-suli-gudigusadse uluarmalad, ega sogdemalad: —Bedi Jesús-e-sapindo, anmardi Moisés-e-sapinganmalad.
43009029	Anmardi wisid, Bab Dummad Moisésga sunmaksad, we-duledi, anmar wichulid, bia daniki.
43009030	Dule-ibya-suli-gudigusad abinsadgu, sogded: —¡Ar deyobi! ¡We ibmar nue aku-itolegeddo, bemardi wichurmalad we-dule bia daniki, degite angardi ibya nudaksad!
43009031	Ar anmar wisid, Bab Dummad dule-iskudimalad ese gollalile, itosur-daed. Ar dule-wargwen Bab-Dummad-dobee nanadiirdi, degine, Bab-Dummad-sogedba ibmar imakdiirdi, Bab Dummad a-dule ese gollalile, adi ito-daed.
43009032	Ar bipisaale, gebe-negasailaunni, gwen itoledisulid, dule-gusgu-muu-neggi ibya-suli gwalulesad, dule-wargwen a-dulega ibya nudaksa-deeye.
43009033	We-Jesús Bab Dummadgi danisulina, gege deyob ibmar imakenad. Ar emigindi deyob ibmar-imakdisoggu, we-Jesús Bab-Dummad-akar danido.
43009034	Fariseomar abinsadmargu, ega sogdemalad: —Be dule, be iskuedgi gwalulesadde, ¿be anmar-odurdakde? Be anmar-odurdakedsulid. Degi, Judiomar-dummagan dule-ibya-suli-gudigusad, Judiomar-onmaked-neggi onosmarsunnad.
43009035	Jesús itoargu, Fariseomar Judiomar-onmaked-neggi dule-ibya-suli-gudigusad-onosmarye, Jesús a-dule-amisgu, ega sogded: —¿Bab-Dummad-Machigi be bensuli?
43009036	Dule-nugusad, abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Dummad, ¿doa-dule-sunna, adi an mer egi benguegar?
43009037	Jesús, abin-sogded: —A-dule be daksad, bebo sunmakgwichid, ani an Bab-Dummad-Machid.
43009038	Dule-ibya-suli-gusad, abin-sogded: —Dummad, an begi bensulid. Geb degi yokorgi sindigar Jesús-abin sigisgu, igi Bab Dummadse gollege e-nug odummogegar, deyob Jesús-nug odummodmogad.
43009039	Jesús sogded: —We-napnegse an nonigu, dulemar bachik-bachik-urbega an nonikid. Dulemar-aku-atakdimalad mag-atak saegar, degi, dulemar-mag-atakdimalad, aku-atak imakegar.
43009040	Degine, Fariseomar-gwenna-gwenna Jesús-walik gwichimalad, Jesús degi-soge itosmargu, ega sogdemalad: —¿Ar anmarmode, aku atakmarmosi?
43009041	Jesús, amar-abin sogded: —Bemar aku atakena, be iskued surmalanad. Emigindi bemar soged: ‘Bab-Dummad-igar-maid nue mag an dakmarye,’ degisoggu, a-ular be-iskued begi nanaimarsundo.
43010001	Jesús sogdebar: “Napira an bemarga soged: Ar sibad-wawaad-galu-emakaled-yawagakgi dule dogsulile, yarganba dukuar dogele, we-dule sibad-wawaad-atursaeddo, degi, dule-atursili-sunnaddo.
43010002	Ar dule yawagak-siidgi dogerdi, we-dule sibad-wawaad-e-ibed-sunnaddo.
43010003	“Yawagak-daked we-dulega yawagak-egaogu, sibad-wawaad na e-edarbed gaya-burba mag itoged. Sibad-wawaad-edarbed e-sibadse na nugar-nugar gordo, degine, galu-yaba-bukwad onogodo.
43010004	Sibad-wawaad-edarbed bela e-sibad-wawaad na onisale, na e idunadap-daed. Sibad-wawaad eba nadapmalodo, ar ade na e-edarbed-e-gaya-burba mag itomalad.
43010005	Ar e-edarbedsulidbardi naosurmalad, aka bur e-idu duurmakdemaloed, ar ade e-gaya-burba aku-itomalad.”
43010006	Jesús weyob dulemarga odukuar-ibmar-sogsadi, aku-ito-gusmalad, ibi ega obarisa.
43010007	Jesús gannar emarga sogdebarsun: “Napira an bemarga soged: Ani an sibad-wawaad-galu-emakaled-e-yawagak-sunnadid.
43010008	Dulemar-odurdakega an-idu-nonimalad, amar atursamaladid, degi, gandikidgi-atursamalad. Sibad-wawaad amar-gaya-burba itossurmalad.
43010009	Ani an yawagak; ar dule angi dogele, a-dule abonolegoed, degi, dogogua, gannar nobaloed, degine, angi mas-gunned amioed.
43010010	“Dule-atursaed danikile, sibad-wawaad-atursaegalad, oburgwegalad, degine, osulogega unnila nonidamalad. Andi an nonigua, burba-dula-gudigued ukega an nonikid, degine, bela ulubgi yeer-itodii guegar.
43010011	Ani an sibad-wawaad-edarbed-nuedid. Sibad-wawaad-edarbed-nued e-san-burba, sibad-wawaad-ular na uked, e-anar burgwegar.
43010012	“Ar sibad-wawaad-edarbed-nuedsuliddi, unnila bennuklegega-arbaeddi, sibad-wawaad-egadsulidba, achu-burburud danikir, sibad-wawaad-mete idu nad-daed. Degisoggu, achu-burburud sibad-wawaad-ganonikogu, sibad-wawaad-oduurmaksundo.
43010013	Degisoggu, dule-manigi-arbaed wakite-daed, ar ade unnila bennuklegega arbaed, degisoggu, sibad-wawaad baisur daksundo.
43010014	“Ani an sibad-wawaad-edarbed-nuedid. An-sibad-wawaad mag an na daked, degi, mag an-dakmarmogad,
43010015	igi Bab nue an-wisi, deyob an Bab-wismogad. Degine, an-san-burba an-sibad-wawaad-ular an na uked, e-anar burgwegar.
43010016	Sibad-wawaad-baigan an nikbalid, we-galu-yabalidsulid, ainebalidid. Amar anse an sedamogar-gebed, amar an-gaya-burba-itomaloed. Unnila sibad-wawaad dangwennaa guoed, degine, e-edarbed wargwennaa gubaloed.
43010017	“Burgwega an-san-burba an uked, adi gannar an subaligar. A-ulale, Bab nue an-sabed.
43010018	Gege dule an-san-burba angi sued, ar ade an-sunnad na wargwen na uked. Ar ani gangued an nikad na an-san ukega, degi, an na gannar subaligar. We-igar an-Bab anga-uksadba an imaked.”
43010019	Ar Jesús-wegi-sogsad-ular Judiomar na muchub-muchub abin-abin na imakarmalad.
43010020	Bukidar Jesúsgi sogdemalad: —We nia-nika gudiid, we akargualid: ¿Ar ibiga be itomala? Mer be itomala.
43010021	Baigandi sogmogad: —We-ibmar-sogedi, we nia-gayasulid. ¿Ar niade sunna dule-ibya-surmaladga ibya nudaksi? Suli, degisuli.
43010022	Deun Jerusaléngi Bab-Dummadse-Goled-Neg-Gannar-Nudaklesad-Iba naid. A-ibagangine, di-wied-nii yoid.
43010023	Deun Jesús Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg-ubebba, Salomónye-nugadsik, bipirmakdiid.
43010024	Judiomar bela Jesús-ebilis ambikusmargu, ega sogdemalad: —¿Bule-sui undar yoote be anmar-obinsa imakmaloe? Ar be Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dulele, anmarga bakar be soge. ¿Ar be Cristo-sunnadi?
43010025	Jesús, amar-abin sogde: —Ar bato an bega sogsamalad, bemar an-itobisurmalad. An-Bab-nuggi ibmar-saedi, a bemarga sognaid, an doa-dule gue.
43010026	Ar bato an bemarga sogsamaladyob, ar bemar an-sibad-wawaadsursoggu, a-ular be an-itosurmalad.
43010027	An-sibad-wawaad an-gaya-burba mag-itomalad, mag an daked, degine, anba nad-damalad.
43010028	Ani an burba-geg-bergued ega uked, bipisaale amar gwen berguosurmalad, degi-sadegumaloed, degine, bipisaale dule gege angi an-sibad-wawaad sued.
43010029	An-Bab sibad-wawaad-anga-uksadi, a-Bab bela dule, degi, niamarba bur dummad, degine, bipisaale dule-baid gege an-Babgi an-sibad-wawaad sued.
43010030	Ani, degine, an-Bab, anmar wargwenna gumalad.
43010031	Degi Judiomar gannar akwa susmalad, Jesús-makegar.
43010032	Jesús Judiomarga sogded: —Ibmar-nuegan-bukidar an-Bab-nuggi an bega oyosmalad, degite, ¿igid-imaksad-ular akwagi be an-makbimarsunna?
43010033	Judiomar, abin-imakdemargu, sogdemalad: —Be-ibmar-nued-makdiid-ular anmar akwagi be-makbisurmalad, anmar akwagi be-makbiedi, be Bab-Dummad-nuggi dododid-ular. Ar be we-napnegginedidde, emide degite Bab Dummadga na be imaked.
43010034	Jesús, abin-sogde: —¿Ar bemargi Moisés-igargi-narmakar naisursi? An bemarga sogsad, bemar bab-dummagan gumarye.
43010035	Ar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasmaladse, be bab-dummaganye Bab Dummad gocha-gusad. Ar Bab-Dummad-Garda geg anmar bisked. Degisoggu, noar an sogsasurdo.
43010036	Ar Bab ega-arbaega an-susad, degine, we-napnegse an-barmialid. ¿Anga bemar sogode: ‘Be Bab-Dummad-nuggi dododiiye,’ an sogsad-ular: ‘Ani an Bab-Dummad-Machiye?’
43010037	Ar an-Bab-ibmar an imakdisulile, mer be an-ibmar-soged abingamardo.
43010038	Ar an-Bab-ibmar an imakdiirdi, ar be an-benmar-inigwele, an-ibmar-imakdiidgi mer be bengumardo, adi bemar wisgumalagar, degine, mer bengumalagar Bab angi gudiid, degine, an Babgi gudimogad.
43010039	Agine, Judiomar gannar Jesús-gabi-guarmalanad degi-inigwele, Jesús egi nabir wakicha-gusad.
43010040	Jesús gannar Jordán-diwar-obakar nade-gusad, bia Juan iduar Bab-Dummad-digi-ogleged-igar imaknai-gusadgi. Agi Jesús megidapid.
43010041	Ase dulemar-bukidar Jesússe duurmaknoni-gusmalad, sogdemalad: —Ar inso Juan-Bautista ibmar-wilubgan-imakledisulid imaksasur-inigwele, bela we Jesúsgi ibmar sogsad, napiragwad sogsad.
43010042	Agine bukidar Jesúsgi-bensuli-gunonimarsunnad.
43011001	Dule-wargwen Lázaro-nugadi, Betaniagined, deun uelemaid. We-Betania-neggweburde María, degine, e-ior-Marta e-neggweburmogad.
43011002	We-María, gwallu-wawaadgi Bab-Jesús-magsa-gusad, na e-sailagiagi Dummad-Jesús-e-nag odingusii-gusadid. We-María-e-sus Lázaro deun uelemaid.
43011003	Degisoggu, Lázaro-e-bunmar dulemar-barmismalad, Jesúsga sogegar, Dummad, ar dule-nue-be-sabedi, uelemaiye.
43011004	Jesús, degi-itosgua, sogded: —We-Lázaro-uelemaidi, burgwegarsulid, Bab-Dummad-nug-odummogega we-uelemaid, adi we-uelemaidgi Bab-Dummad-Machi-e-nug odummolegegar.
43011005	Dakargua, Jesús, nue Marta, e-urba, degine, Lázaro-sabed.
43011006	Jesús wisgusgu, Lázaro uelemaiye, bia-na-maidgi ibabo amba megis-gusad.
43011007	Geb a-sorba, Jesús na e-sapinganga sokalid: —Gannar anmar Judease namarye.
43011008	E-sapingan ega sogded: —Odurdaked-saila, emide Judiomar akwagi be-makbi-gusmaladde, ¿degite gannar be nabarde?
43011009	Jesús, abin-sogded: —¿Ar neg-ibgined wachi-irambe-gakabo niksursi? Ar dule neg-ibgi gudiile, geg yoleged, ar we-napneggined neg-meegwadba gudiid.
43011010	Ar dule neg-mutikidgi gudiirdi, yoledo, ar agindi gwallu-meegwad sulid. An-burgoed-iba-nonikidse geb an burgoed, emigindi an-oburgosurmalad, ar ibginedyob an gudiid.
43011011	We-degi-sogsad-sorba Jesús na e-sapinganga sogdesunnad: —Anmar-ai-Lázaro gabmaid, an ese naer-gebed odakegar.
43011012	E-sapingan ega sogdemalad: —Dummad, ar Lázaro gabmaile, nuguodo. Degite, ¿ibiga be nabisunna? Mer be nae.
43011013	Ar Jesús we-degi-sogsa-gusadi, sognaindo: “Lázaro burgwar maiye.” Ar e-sapingandi, gabed-sunnad ega obarye bienad.
43011014	Geb degi Jesús bakar-buud sogdesunnad: —Lázaro burgwis maiye.
43011015	Bemar-ular yeer an itoged, ar Lázaro-walik an gudigussurgu, adi bemar mer angi bengumalagar. Degisoggu, anmar Lázarose namargwelo.
43011016	Degi Tomás, Dídimoye bimarbalid, e-sordamarga sogdesunnad: —Anmar Jesúsba namarmodo, adi anmar eba burgwemarmogagar.
43011017	Degi Jesús Betaniase nonigu, daknonikid, Lázaro ibabakegus bato neg-uangi digles-mai.
43011018	Betania dakargu Jerusaléngi itakaa siid, unnila wachi-abala nanae-wilub.
43011019	Lázaro-burgwisad-ular, Judiomar-bukidar Martase, degi, Maríase nonigusmalad, adi wis e-gwage odimakegar.
43011020	Marta itosgu Jesús daniye, e-abin nade-gusad, Maríadi neggi besa-gusad.
43011021	Degi Marta Jesúsga sogded: —Dummad, be wegi anmar-abargi gudigusana, an-sus burgwissulinad.
43011022	Emigi an wisbardo, ar ibu Bab Dummadse be egisele, Bab Dummad bega ukoed.
43011023	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Be-sus gannar durguoed.
43011024	Marta, abin-sogded: —An wisi, ibagan-bergusar, an-sus dulemar-gannar-durguoed-ibagi gannar durguoed.
43011025	Jesús, abin-sogde: —Ani an gannar sunna dule-odurguedid, degi, ani an burba-geg-bergued ukedbalid. Ar dule angi bensulile, ar burgwar mai-inigwele, gannar durguoed.
43011026	Ar bela-dula-gudidimalad angi bensulile, bar e-san-burba berguosulid, degi-sadeguoed. ¿Ar we an-bega-soged be bensuli?
43011027	Marta, Jesús-abin sogded: —Dummad, eye, an bensuli, be Cristo, Bab-Dummad-Machi, we-napnegse be danikoye be sogles-gusadid.
43011028	Marta deyob sogsad-sorbali, e-urbase gornaded, ega arbakee sogdapid: —Odurdaked-saila noni, bese gole.
43011029	Deyob ega soge itosgu, María yog gwisguar imaksad, Jesússe nade-gusad.
43011030	Jesús deun amba yo neggweburse doged, ar bia-Marta-e-abingusadgi amba gudiid.
43011031	Judiomar wis María gwage odimakegala, e-neggi-eba-bukmaladi, daksamargu, María gwae gwisgus node, eba nodmarmogad. Amar sogdemalad: —María neg-uanse naded, ase bonaded.
43011032	María, Jesús-siidse modapgu, Jesús dakdegu, e-abin yokorgi sindigar sigdapid, ega sogded: —Dummad, be wegi anmar-abargi gudigusana, an-sus burgwissulinad.
43011033	Jesús dakdegu, María ise-boale, degine, Judiomar-wis-María-gwage-odimakega-nonimalad ise-boarmarmoga, na ulubgi nue-nunmak ito-nadmogad, degi, nue-María-wile-dakded.
43011034	Jesús Maríaga sogded: —¿Bia bemar Lázaro-digsamala? Jesúsga sogdemalad: —Dummad, be dage, be dakdage, bia digar mai.
43011035	Degi Jesús boded.
43011036	Degi Judiomar sogdemarsunnad: —Nue be dake, ibiyobi Jesús Lázaro-nue-sabena.
43011037	Degi Judio-baigan sogdemarmogad: —Ar we-Jesúsde, dule-ibya-sulidga ibya-egasadde, ¿ar sunna wede Lázaro oburgwesuli geg imakgussi? Deyob imake-wilubbinad.
43011038	Jesús nue ulubgi bukib itodbargu, neg-uanse nonikid. Dakargua, gusgu na Judiomar mui digdamalad akwa-yaa-ollogwad-yaba, geb akwa-dummad e-doged-idu sii-damalad.
43011039	Jesús dulemarga sogdesunnad: —Akwa-dummad-onirmar. Marta, dule-burgwisad-e-bun, sogded: —Dummad, ¿Ibiga akwa be onirbie? Bato ibabakegus diglesad, degisoggu, ¿bato nun yapansursi?
43011040	Jesús, Marta-abin sogded: —¿An bega sogsasursi, be bensulile, Bab-Dummad-gangued be dakoye?
43011041	Degi geb bia dule-burgwisad-diglesadgi akwa-dummad-idu-siid onirismalad. Geb degi Jesús niba atakdegu, sogded: —Baba, dog-nuedye an bega soge, be an-itosgu.
43011042	Andi an wisid, be gusgu an-ito daed. Ar we-ibmar an sogsadi, dulemar-an-dikarba-bukwamalad-ular an sogsad, adi mer bengumalagar be an-barmialid.
43011043	Jesús degi-sogsad-sorbali, binnasur goted: —¡Lázaro, magaba be nodage!
43011044	Lázaro dule-burgwis-gusadi, noargu, bela naga, degine, arganmar morgo-bipirmakedgi ise-atinnar noalid, degine, e-wagar ise-morgogi bipirmakarbalid. Jesús dulemarga sogded: —Be Lázaro esikmar, degi, naega be imakmarsun.
43011045	Bukidar-Judiomar-Maríaba-nonimalad, Jesús Lázaro-gannar-odulosad daksamargu, Jesús-bensuli-gunonimalad.
43011046	Ar gwenna-gwennadi Fariseomarse nadmalad, ega sogdapmalad, igi Jesús Lázaro-odulosad.
43011047	Degine dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, Fariseomar, amar igar-itogega dummagan-onmaknonimargu, sogdemalad: —¿Igi an samalosunna? Ar we-dule ibmar-wilubgan-imakdisulid bukidar emide imakdiid.
43011048	Ar we-Jesús ibmar-dakledisulid gatik imakega anmar imakmalale, bela eba nagudmaloed. Geb degi Roma-dummagan nonimaloed, anmar-Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg, degi, anmar-yar osulononimaloed.
43011049	Degi Judio-dummagan-wargwen, Caifás-nugadi, deun a-birgagi dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummadga gumaid, e-sordamarga sogded: —Bemar nue ibmar wichurmalad.
43011050	Ar bemar aku itomarsi, bela dulemar-anar dule-wargwen bur burgwed nabirid, adi melle bela dulemar-a-yargi-bukmalad obelolegegar.
43011051	We-Caifás degi-ibmar-sogsadi, na wargwen e-itolegedba ibmar sogsasulid, ar ade a-birgagi dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-bur-dummadsoggu, iduakwaa sogsa-gusad: “Jesús bela Judio-dulemar-anar burgoye.”
43011052	Jesús unnila Judio-dulemar-anarbi burgosulid, burgwebaloed, adi bela Bab-Dummad-mimmigan aisakis-bukmalad na danakwaa urbegar.
43011053	Degisoggu, Judio-dummagan a-iba-akar na sogsamardo, Jesús-oburgwemaloye.
43011054	Degisoggu, Judiomar-abargi bar Jesús ise-na-san-oyoar gudigussulid. Judea-yargi node-gusad, naded, nega-dule-sulid-dikarba, neggwebur-Efraín-nugadse. Jesús a-neggweburgi na e-sapinganmala megidapsunnad.
43011055	Deun Judiomar-iba Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Iba bato omosad. Bukidar neggwebur-baid-baidginmalad Jerusalénse iduakwasaar nonimalad, adi na san swilidik imakmalagar.
43011056	A-dulemar Jesús-amiarmarsunnad, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi bukmargu, na muchub-muchub egisnanai-guarmalad: —Be dakgua, ¿Jesús ibase nonikosur be dake?
43011057	Dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan, degi, Fariseomar, igar-mesismalad, ar doa-dule wis-dibeye bia Jesús gudiiye, sogmaloye, adi Jesús-gamalagar.
43012001	Iba-nergwase, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Iba naguoele, Jesús Betaniase nonikid, bia Lázaro maidse. We-Lázaro burgwis-gusgu, deun Jesús gannar we-dule-odulosad-duled.
43012002	Agine, Jesúsga sedo mas-gunned imaksamalad. Marta deun ega mas daknai-gusad, Lázarodi Jesús-mas-gunsiidgi sii-gusmogad.
43012003	Agi María, bute-gwagwen gwallu-wawaad-nued, nardo-nugad, ber gargesailad, Jesússe senonikid. Geb degi María Jesús-naggi a-gwallu-wawagwad eosad, degi, na e-sailagiagi Jesús-nag odinnosad. Gwallu-wawagwad-e-yapanned bela neg gasa sigisad.
43012004	Jesús-sapin-wargwen, Judas-Iscariote, Simón-e-machi, ar darba-Jesús-ukoed-dule, sokalid:
43012005	—¿Ibiga we-gwallu-wawagwad denario-dulataled-ilapaa gargegu uklessuli, adi a-mani wileganaga ukega?
43012006	Ar Judas degi-sogsa-gusadi, dule-wilegana-sabedbali deyob sogsasulid, ar ade dakargua, dule-atursilisoggu, mani-sagu na e sedisoggu, mani-agi-urbilemaid arbak atursadii-daed.
43012007	Geb degi Jesús, Judas-abin sogded: —Mer Maríaga akar-soge. We gwallu-wawagi an-magsadi, an diglegoed-ular an-magsad.
43012008	Ar bemar-abargi wileganadi gusgu gudiguoed, andi bemar-abargi sadeguosulid.
43012009	Judiomar-bukidar wisguarmargu, Jesús Betaniagi gudiiye, ese duurmaknonimalad, unnila Jesús-dakegarbisulid, Lázaro-dakegarbalid, ar ade Jesús Lázaro burgwar-mai odulosad.
43012010	Dule-irwa-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad-e-dummagan igar-amismarbargu, igar-mesismalad, Lázaro-oburgwemarmogoye.
43012011	Ar ade Jesús, Lázaro-odurgusad-ular, Judiomar-bukidar Judio-igar-odurdakmaladgi bangudmalad, Jesúsgi-bensuli-gunonimalad.
43012012	A-banedgine, dulemar-bukidar-ibase-nonimalad itoarmargu, Jesús Jerusalénse daniye,
43012013	ogob-gagangiid-e-gagan gwachamalad, degine, Jesús-abin nadmalad, Jesús-nug odummogegar. Jesús-dakarmargu, binnasur gotemalad, sogdemalad: ¡Bab-Dummad-nug odummomar! ¡We-dule Bab-Dummad-nuggi-danikid, bela ega ib-nuedga guena-gadin, Israel-e-Reygi!
43012014	Jesús moli-uaya-suid-e-mimmi-amisad, egi birgi sigisad, ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi egi narmakar naidyob:
43012015	Mer be dobgu, Siongi-bukmalad, emigi be-rey bese danikid, moli-uaya-suid-e-mimmi-birgi sii.
43012016	Ar gebesaila Jesús-sapingan aku-itosmalad, wede ibi-obare. Ar Bab Dummad Jesús-nug-ogannosad-sorbali, geb e-sapingan insadmalad, we Jesúsgi bato Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid, degi-narmakar-naidba ega imaksamarbalid.
43012017	Dulemar Jesús-daksamalad, igi deun Lázaro-neg-uan-yaba-maigu ese gocha, gannar odulosa, amar baiganga sogedbimalad we-igargan.
43012018	A-ulale dulemar-bukidar Jesús-abin noni-gusmalad, ar ade itosmalad, igi Lázaro gannar odurgus-gusad.
43012019	Ar Fariseomardi na ga sogdemalad: —Dulemar mer Jesúsba naguegala, anmar gwen oakalogosurmalad. Ar be dakena, ar bela dulemar eba duurmakmaid.
43012020	Griego-dulemarmo, Bab-Dummadse-golega, Judiomar-ibagi Judiomar-abargi nonimarmogad.
43012021	Amar, Felipese nonimalad. Felipe, Betsaida-Galileaginedid. Griego-dulemar Felipegi wilenai-gusmalad, ega sogdemalad: —Dummad, anmar Jesús-dakbimalad.
43012022	Felipe nadgu, Andrésga sogdapid. Degine, Felipe, Andrés-ebogwa Jesúsga sogdapmarsunnad.
43012023	Jesús, abin-imakdegu, sogded: “Emigindi iba nonisun, adi ani Dule-Machi, an-nug odummolegegar.
43012024	Napira an bemarga soged, ar ibmar-gwag napagi argwansulile, e-uka nungu sulile, unnila na ebi gudii-daed. Ar e-uka nunguerdi, adi bukidar sanmakodo.
43012025	“Ar amba deyobmodo dule na e-san-burba na sabele, binsa oyogguodo. Ar we-napneggi e-san-burba na sabsulile, burba-geg-berguedga sabogodo.
43012026	Ar dule anga arbabiele, anba dagodo, an-sogedba nanaegar. Ar bia an gudiguoedgine, dule-anga-arbaedi agi gudigumogoed. Ar dule anga arbaele, an-Bab a-dule-nug odummogoed.”
43012027	Jesús sogdebar: “Emigindi an ulubgi surbinsa itoged, degite, ¿igi an sogosunna? ¿An sogoe, ‘Bab Dummad, emigindi we-ibmar-nunmaked-dummad be anga osuloye?’ Suli, degi-an-sogosuli, ar aga we-napnegse an nonikid, burgwegar.
43012028	Bur an sogodo: Bab Dummad, be-nug be odummoge.” Degi nibneggi gaya-burba gornonikid: “Bato an-nug an ogannosad, degi, an-nug gannar an ogannobaloed.”
43012029	Dulemar-bukmalad, gaya-burba-sunmak-itosmaladi, sogdemalad: —Mar gochaye. Baigandi sogmalad: —Anger-wargwen ega sunmaksaye.
43012030	Jesús sunmakdegu, sogded: —We-gaya-burba-be-itosmalad anga nonisulid, bemarga nonikid.
43012031	Emigindi we-napneggi dulemar-bukmalad sabsur-odurdakleged-iba nagunonikid. Emigindi nia-saila we-napneg-dummadga-gudiid, a-onoleged-iba nonisunnad.
43012032	Ar ani, ar napneg-naidgi an onakwilesale, bela dulemar anse an ebioed anba nagumalagar.
43012033	We Jesús degi-sogsa-gusadi, mag itoledo, sognaid, ede nakrusgi biokar burgoye.
43012034	Dulemar, Jesús-abin sogdemalad: —Anmar wismalad Moisés-igargi sognaid, Cristo, Bab-Dummad-dule-wargwen-barmidagoye-sogsad-dule nonikir, burgosulid, degi-sadeguoed. ¿Ar ibiga bedi sogsunna, Dule-Machi onakwileger-gebye, nakrusgi biokar burgwega? ¿Ar we doa-sunna Dule-Machi?
43012035	Geb degi Jesús, abin-sogded: —Emigindi ani gwallu-meegwadga ichesaar amba bemar-abargi an gudiid. Gwallu-meegwad amba bemar-abargi-gudiidgi eba be nanamar, ar melle neg-sichid ukiar be imakmalagar. Ar dule neg-sichidgi nadapile, wichur daed bia nadapi.
43012036	Ar emigindi amba be gwallu nikmarsoggu, gwallugi mer be bengumar, adi bemar neg-meegwad-mimmiganga gumalagar. Jesús degi-ibmar-sogsa-gusad-sorba nadsunnad. Emar-idu dukusad, mer e-amimalagar.
43012037	Ar Jesús emar-wagab ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad bukidar imaksa-inigwele, dulemar amba Jesúsgi bengusmalad.
43012038	Ar ade epenne Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbeged, Isaías sogsa-gusadyob guegala, deyob gunonikid, deun Isaías sogsa-gusgu: Bab Dummad ¿doa anmar-ibmar-sogsa-gusad bengussuli? Bela bengusadbimalad. ¿Doasega Bab Dummad na e-gangued oyosa? Amba a-dulemargardo.
43012039	A-ulale dulemar Jesús-abingassurmalad, ar ade Isaías amba sogsa-gusbalid:
43012040	Bab Dummad amar-e-ibya aku-dake imaksad, degi, amar uayasur-daega imaksabalid, adi melle na e-ibyagi mag dakmalagar, degi e-gwagegi melle mag itomarbaligar. Ar degiile, abonolemalo-itole. Ar degiile, amar an nudake dakledago-itole.
43012041	Isaías weyob sogsa-gusad, deun Jesús-e-gangued daksagu, agi egi sunmaksa-gusad.
43012042	Ar degi-inigwele, dummagan-bukidar-neg-dakmamaid, ulubgi Jesús-gwen-bengussurmalad, degite bakar-buud amar gwen sogsasurmalad, emarde Jesúsba naimoye, ar ade dobmalad, adi melle Fariseomar Judiomar-onmaked-neggi emar-onomalagar.
43012043	Deginbali, ar dummagan dulemar-na-e-nug-odummoged bur-nabir itomarbalid, Bab Dummad e-nug odummogedbar.
43012044	Jesús binnasur sunmakde, sogded: “Ar dule an-bensulile, anbi an-bengusulid, Bab-Dummad-an-barmialid-bensurbalid.
43012045	Ar dule mag an-dakale an-doa-dule, dule-an-barmialid-mag-dakbardo.
43012046	Ani, we-napnegse gwallu-meegwadga, an nonikid, adi bela-angi-bensurmalad, mer bar neg-sichidgi gudigumalagar.
43012047	“Ar dule an-gaya-burba-itogedi, ar aba dasulile, ani an sogosulid, be dummad-nosye. Ar we-napnegse an nonigua, dulemarga sogega an nonisulid, be nue iskusmarye. Ar an nonikidi, dulemar-abonogegalad.
43012048	Ar dule an-abingasulile, degine, an-gaya-burba-sunmaked abingasurbalile, amargardi soglegodo, be dummad-nosye. Ar ibagan-napi-naiguoedgi an-ibmar-sogsadba dulemar-an-abingassurmaladga soglegoed, ‘Be Bab Dummadse sabsur odurdaklegoye.’
43012049	“Ar an sunmaksad an-itolegedba an ibmar sogsasulid. Bab Dummad an-barmialid, a, igar anga uksad, igi an sogoe, degi, igi an sunmakbaloe.
43012050	Ar an wisdo, Bab-Dummad-igar-anga-uksadi, dulemar-anba-nagumaloedga burba-geg-bergued uked. Degisoggu, ibmar an sunmakedi, ar igi Bab Dummad anga sogsa, deyob an sunmaked.”
43013001	Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-Iba bane-nagudoed-iduar, Jesús deunni Jerusaléngi gudiid. Jesús na wisid, we-napneggi gudiid e-Babse gannar-naed-ibagan warmaksad. Ar Jesús na e-sapingan we-napneggi-bukwad nue sabgussoggu, na nue bela-bela sabgussunnad, e-burgwedse.
43013002	Jesús na e-sapinganmala sedo mas gunbukwagua, nia-saila bato Judas-Iscariotegi burba-iskana oubosad Jesús-darba-ukega. We-Judasde Simón-e-machid.
43013003	Jesús na wisid, e-Bab bela ega igar-uksad bela ibmar imakegar. Degine, Jesús wisbalid, na Bab Dummadgi danikid, degi, na Bab Dummadse gannar nabaloed.
43013004	A-ulale, Jesús na mas gunsigua gwisgus imaksad, e-suba esusad, degine, toalla susgua, na e-sadergi edichad.
43013005	Degi Jesús bormo-yagi dii eosad, e-sapingan-nag enukegar. Geb degi toalla e-sadergi-naidgi ega nag odinnoarbalid.
43013006	Geb degi Jesús Simón-Pedrose nonikid, geb Pedro ega sokalid: —¿Dummad, be anga nag enukoe? Suli, be anga nag enukosuli.
43013007	Jesús, abin-sogded: —An-emi-ibmar-imaknaid aku amba be itoged, geb sorba mag be itodapoed.
43013008	Pedro, Jesúsga sogded: —An-nag be enukosurguoed. Jesús, abin-sogded: —An bega nag enuksulile, geg be an-sapinga gued.
43013009	Geb degi Simón-Pedro Jesúsga sogdesunnad: —Dummad, ar be deyob sogele, an-nagbi be anga enukosulid, an-argan, degi, an-nono be anga enukbalir-gebed.
43013010	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Ar dule bato obsamalad bar obed abesulid, unnila e-nagbi napi-enuked abeleged, ar ade bato guar swilidik gudiid. Ar bemar bato swilidik gudimalad, ar bela bemar swilidik gudisurmar-inigwer.
43013011	Ar ade Jesús na wisid doa darba e-ukoe, a-ulale sogsa-gusad: “Bela bemar swilidik gudisurmarye.”
43013012	Degisoggu, Jesús e-sapinganga na nag-enuksad-sorba, gannar e-mor na yosgu, mesase gannar signonikid. Geb degi e-sapinganga sokalid: “¿Bemarga-an-nag-enuksad mag bemar itomala, we ibi obare?
43013013	Ar bemar Odurdaked-Sailaye, degine, Dummadye be anse gormalad, ar nabir deyob be anse gormardo, ar an adid.
43013014	Ar ani, an Dummadid, degine, an Odurdaked-Sailadde, degite bipii na san imaksad, bemar-nag an enuksadde, bemar na muchub-muchub nag na ga enuke-wilubmarmodo, na maikwaa na san sae-wilubmarmodo.
43013015	Ar bemarga an na oyosad, ar igi bemarga an be-imaksamala, deyob bemar na imake-wilubmarmodo.
43013016	Napira an bemarga soged: Dule maiga-arbaed, e-dummadba geg dummad gued, degine, gege dule-barmilenaid e-barmisiidba bur dummad gued.
43013017	Ar we-ibmar bemar bato wismarsoggu, ar aba bemar imakele, bemargi nued binsalegodo.
43013018	“Ar bemar belagwapaga an sogsulid. Ar an wisid doamar an susa, adi Bab-Dummad-Garda-narmakaledba guegala, bemar-wargwen dikarba an-ukoed, ar Bab-Dummad-Garda-narmakaledgi sognaid: Ar dule anba madu gunsiidi, angi aibinnoniye, an-istaradga gunoniye.
43013019	Deyob gued iduar, an bemarga soged, adi degi-gunonikile, bemar mag-ittos-namalagar, ani an Cristod.
43013020	Napira an bemarga soged: Ar an dule-barmidoed-abingamalale, an-abinganaid. Ar dule an-abinganaile, Bab-Dummad-an-barmialid a-abinganamogad.”
43013021	Jesús degi-sogsad-sorba, e-ulubgi bukib-binsa-naded, degi, e-sapinganga sogdesunnad: —Napira an bemarga soged, bemar-wargwenadi darba an-ukoed.
43013022	Degi e-sapingan na muchub-muchub dakdemalad, na wichurmalad doagi Jesús degi-soge.
43013023	E-sapingan-wargwen, ar Jesús na nue sabedi, e-dikarba sii-gusad.
43013024	Asega, Simón-Pedro arbak achasad, adi Jesússe egisegar, doa-dulegi wede deyob soge.
43013025	Degi a-dule, Jesús-binasgar-walik biligwa maid, Jesúsga sogded: —Dummad, ¿doa-dule arbak be-ukoe?
43013026	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Ar doa-dulega madu-waraa an ukoe, a-dule, darba an-ukoed. Jesús madu owardikusgu, Judas-Iscariote, Simón-e-machi, aga madu uksad.
43013027	Judas, madu-bipi ega uklesad guchagu, nia-saila-Satanás egi dognonikid. Geb degi Jesús Judasga sogdesunnad: —Ar ibmar-be-imakoedi, gwae bur be imaknasun.
43013028	Ar e-sapingan mesa-naba-bukmaladi aku itosmalad, ar ibiga Jesús deyob Judasga sogsa.
43013029	Ar abar binsadmalad, Judas mani-saboged-e-sagu sedisoggu, Jesús Judasga sogdakleye: “Anmar-ibmar-ibaga-abegedi be baknaye,” ar ega sogbar-dibe: “Wileganaga wis be mani uknaye.”
43013030	Ar Judas madu guchagua, yog noar-imaksad. Ar nodgua, bato deun neg-mutikid.
43013031	Degine, Judas-naded-sorba Jesús sogdesunnad: “Ar emigindi ani Dule-Machi, an-nug odummolesunnoed, degine, anba Bab-Dummad-e-nug odummolemosunnoed.
43013032	Ar ani Dule-Machi, angi Bab-Dummad-nug odummolegele, Bab Dummad an-nug odummomogoed, degi, ar emiskwaa an-nug odummogoed.
43013033	Mimmigan, wis ichesaar amba an bemar-abargi gudiguoed. Be an-amimalo-inigwele, ar igi Judiomarga an sogsa, deyob bemarga an sogmarmogad. Ar bia an nasokalidse, geg be anba namalad.
43013034	“Igar-binid an bemarga ukmarsunnad, na be muchub-muchub na be sabgumar, ar igi an be-sabgusmarmoga, na deyob be muchub-muchub sabgumarmosun.
43013035	Agi bela mag be-dakmaloed, bemar an-sapingan gumalad, ar na be muchub-muchub nue sabgumalar.”
43013036	Simón-Pedro Jesúsga sogded: —Dummad, ¿bia be nae? Jesús, abin-sogded: —An-emi-nasokalidse, emigindi geg be anba daggweled, sorbardi geb be anse naoed.
43013037	Pedro ega sogded: —Dummad, ¿ibiga emigindi geg an beba nae? An be-ular an burgweye sogele, an guakwaa gudiid.
43013038	Jesús, abin-sogded: —¿Be guakwaa gudii an-ular burgwega? Suli, be guakwaa gudisuli. Napira an bega soged: Gannir-namaked-iduar, ilapaa be an-osulogoed.
43014001	Jesús na e-sapinganga sogded: “Mer surbinsa be-gwagegi be itomalo. Bab Dummadgi mer be bengumalo, degine, mer angi be bengumarbalo.
43014002	An-Bab-neggi neg-nuegan-bukidar nikad, ar degisulina, deyob an bega sogsasurmalanad. Ar emigindi an nae, bemar-idu bemarga neg guagwar sinaegar.
43014003	An bemar-idu namalad, bemarga neg guagwar sismalale, gannar an danibaloed, bemar-sudagegar, adi bia an gudiguoedgi, agi bemar anba gudigumogagar.
43014004	Ar bemar wismalad bia an nasokali, degine, igar-maid bemar wismarbalid.”
43014005	Tomás Jesúsga sogded: —Dummad, ar anmar wichulid bia be nasokali, degite, ¿igi anmar wisguosunna, bia igar maid?
43014006	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Anbi unnila Bab Dummadse be-sedoed, ani an napiragwadid, degine, dula gudigued angi danikid. Dule-wargwensaale geg Bab Dummadse warmaked, ar angi nasulir.
43014007	Ar mag be an-dakena, an doa-dule, an-Bab mag be dakmarmoganad. Ar emigindi bemar mag an-Bab-dakmaloed, ar ade bemar bato an-Bab-daksamalad.
43014008	Felipe Jesúsga sogded: —Dummad, Bab Dummad be anmarga oyoge, geb agine anmar gusbin itogoed.
43014009	Jesús, abin-sogded: —Felipe, ar dikasurgus an bemar-abargi gudiidde, degite, ¿amba be aku an-dakde? Ar dule an-daksale, a-dule bato an-Bab-daksamodo. Degite, ¿ibiga be anse egissunna: Bab be anga oyoye?
43014010	¿Ar be bensi, Babgi an gudiid, degine, Bab angi gudimogad? Ar ibmar an sogedi, an-itolegedba wargwen an sogsulid, ar Bab-angi-maiddi, a angi ibmar imaked.
43014011	Mer be bengumar, an-Babgi an gudiid, degi, Bab angi gudimogad. Ar degisulile, an-ibmar-imakedgi be dakmar, mer be an-bengumar.
43014012	Ar napira an bemarga soged: Ar dule angi bensulile, an-ibmar-saedi, imakmogoed. Degine, a-dule bur-bule ibmar-dummagan imakoed, ar ade an-Babse an naesokalid.
43014013	Ar bela an-nuggi an-Babse be ibmar egisele, an bega imakoed, adi Bab na E-Machigi nug-ganguegar.
43014014	Ar ibmar-gwensak an-nuggi be egisele, an bega imakoed.
43014015	Jesús sogdebar: “Ar be an-sabmalale, an-igar-mamaidba be damaloed.
43014016	An-Babse an bemarga egisoed, adi be bendaked-baid, bemar-Gwage-Armaked, bemarga barmidagega, ar adi degi-sadegu bemarba gudiguegar.
43014017	We-Burba-Nued napiragwadbi Bab Dummadgi sunmaked. We-napneggi dulemar-Bab-Dummad-wichurmalad we-Burba-Napiragwad geg abingaed, ar ade daksurmalad, deginbali, amba aku dakmarbalid. Ar bemardi we-Burba-Napiragwad-mag-daked, ar bemarba gudiid, degine, bemargi gudigubaloed.
43014018	“Wargwen, nusgana-babgan-sulidyob, an bemar-metosurmalad. An bemarse gannar danibaloed.
43014019	Ar amba emi bipisaale, we-napneg-naidgi-bukmalad bar an-dakosulid, ar bemardi an-dakmaloed, ar an dula gudisoggu, bemar dula gudigumosunnoed.
43014020	A-ibagine bemar mag itogoed, an-Babgi an gudiid, bemar angi gudimogad, degine, an bemargi gudimogad.
43014021	Ar dule an-igar-mamaid sediile, degine, ar aba gudiile, we-dule nue-an-sabed. Ar dule an-sabele, an-Bab sabgumogoed, degine, a-dule an sabgumogoed, degine, an ese magarobaloed an doa-dule gue.”
43014022	Jesúsga Judas sogded (Judas-Iscariotesur:) —Dummad, ¿igi nabir anmarse be magarogoe, ar dulemar-beba-naisurmaladsedi be magarogosulid?
43014023	Jesús abin-imakdegu, sogded: —Ar dule an-sabele, an-gaya-burba-sunmakedba daoed, degine, an-Bab a-dule-sabgumogoed, degine, anmar a-dulese danikoed, a-dulegi megegar.
43014024	Ar dule an-sabsulile, an-gaya-burba-sunmakedba daosulid. Ar bemar-an-sunmaked-itosmaladi, an wargwen ibmar sogsasulid, an-Bab-an-barmialidi, a-sogedba ibmar an soged.
43014025	“We-ibmar-an-bemarga-sogsadi, bemar-abargi gudigu, an bemarga sogsamalad.
43014026	Ar Dule-Bemar-Gwage-Armaked, Bab Dummad Burba Nued, an-nuggi Bab barmidagoedi, a bela bemar-odurdaknonikoed, degine, bela-an-ibmar-sogsad gannar insaega bemar-imakoed.
43014027	“Ulubgi-bogidik-itogega an bemar-imaked, an na ulubgi-bogidik-itogedyob an bemar-imakmogad. Ulubgi bogidik itogega an bemar-imakedi we-napneg-naid imakedyobsulid. Mer be surbinsa be-gwagegi be itomar, mer be dobgumarbar.
43014028	Ar an-bega-sogsamalad bemar itosad: ‘An nae, gannar an bemarse danibaloed.’ Ar bemar an-sabmalana weligwar be itosmalanad, ar bemarga an sogsad an Babse an naye, ar an-Bab anba bur dummad.
43014029	Ar emigindi idu bemarga an sogsad, adi deyob gunonikile, mer be angi bengumalagar.
43014030	“Bemarga bar suitii an sunmakosulid, ar we-napneggi-dummadga-gudiid, nia-saila danikid, ar angi e-gangued obinsur-inigwele, deyob guer-gebed.
43014031	Adi we-napneggi-dulemar-bukmalad wisguegala, an Bab-sabed, degine, Bab Dummad an-barmialidba an ibmar imaked.” Jesús bela weyob odurdaksad-sorba e-sapinganga sogded: “Gwisgumar, wegi anmar namarsun.”
43015001	“Ani an uva-e-saila-sunnadyobid, an-Babdi agi-arbaedyobmogad.
43015002	An-dub-gigwengi sanmaksulile, siklegoed. Ar an-dub-gigwengi sanmakerdi, nue nudakleged, adi bur-bule sanmakegar.
43015003	Ar bemar bato gwage-nudakles bukmalad, an gaya-burba sunmaksadgi.
43015004	Angi be akamar, an bemargi akamarmogoed. Ar igi uva-dubmar e-sailagi akanaisulile, geg wargwen sanmake, ar bemar ambamodo, bemar angi akanaisulile, bemar geg an-Babga ibmar-nuegan imaked.
43015005	“Ani an uva-e-saila-sunnadid, bemar e-dubgii gumalad. Ar dule angi akanaile, degine, an egi akanaimogale, we-a-dule ibmar-nuegan imakerbad. Ar bemar angi ollormalale, gege be ibmar-nuegan Babga imakmalad.
43015006	Ar angi dule akanaisulile, melledoed, igi uva-dub-giagan miled-daedyob. We-uva-dub-giagan dingudoed, geb degi dulemar wemaloed, geb degine soogi midmaloed ogumakegar.
43015007	“Ar bemar angi akanaile, degine, an-gaya-burba an-bemarga-sogsadba be damalale, ar bemar ibu Babse egisbimala, bela bemarga guoed.
