45006010	Ar Cristo burgwisgua, iskued eliega unnila irgwen burgwisad. Ar emi Cristo dula gudiiddi, Bab Dummadga dula gudiid.
45006011	Degisoggu, deyob bemar binsamosundo, iskuedga an burgwar gudimarye, an dula gudiiddi, anmar-Dummad-Cristo-Jesúsba Bab Dummadga an dula gudimarye.
45006012	Degisoggu, iskued be-san-sunna-berguedgi mer obined be imakmar, galagwensuli-isku-dule-saed imakbiedba, mer be adi eba damalagar.
45006013	Deginbali, melle be-san-eba-akanimalad ibmar-iskana-imakegala be imakmar. Bur be Bab-Dummad-urbaligwaa be nanamar, dule burgwis gannar durgusadyob. Deginbali, be-san-eba-akanimalad Bab Dummadga ibmar-nuegan imakegala be imakmarbar.
45006014	Ar iskued bar bemargi obinosurmalad, ar ade bemar Moisés-igar-mesisadba bar gudisurmalad, Bab-Dummad-nabir-dulemargi-binsamaid-igarba be gudimalad.
45006015	¿Degite, igi an sogmalosunna? ¿Ar anmarde Moisés-igar-maidba bar gudisurmarsoggu, Bab-Dummad-dulemargi-nabir-binsamaid-igarba anmar emigindi gudimarsoggu, a-ular anmarde iskumarsunde? Suli, degisuli.
45006016	¿Ar bemarde wichurmarsi, ar dule-wargwen-sogedba bemar nanadiile, e-maiyob eba be ibmar saele, bemar a-dule-sogedba-be-nanadiid-e-maiga be gunoni-damalad? A-ulale, iskued-sogedba be nanadiile, be burgwemalodo, ar Bab-Dummad-sogedba be nanaerdi, dule-inikigwadga be gumalodo.
45006017	Ar Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye anmar sogsun, ar bemar iskued-maiga gudiinad, degite igar-nued-bemarga-soglesad, a-igarba napiragwadba bemar nanaded.
45006018	Degine, iskuedgi bemar onolenonimargu, bemar igar-inikii-imaked e-maiga gunonimarsunnad.
45006019	An-bemarga-sunmakedi, ar bemar aku-itomalad-ular dulemar-sunmakedyob an sunmaked. Igi ibmar-iskanaga be-san-eba-akanimalad be ukdii-gusmala, ibmar-sunnasulid imakega, degi, ibmar-iskana gatik imakega, deyob emigi be-san-eba-akanimalad be ukmarbar, igar-inikigwad-maidba bemar ibmar-nuegan imakmalagar, adi na be san-swilidik gumalagar.
45006020	Ar bemar iskued-maiga gudimargua, igar-inikii-imakedgi deun bemar bachik gudigusmalad.
45006021	Degite, ¿ibi-nued egi be amismarsunna, emi egi be bingegudimaladgi? Ar wemardi unnila burgwedse dule-nimalad.
45006022	Emigindi iskuedgi be onolenonimalad, Bab-Dummad-maiga be gunonimaladgi, bega wedi ibmar-nuedga gunonimardo, be san-swilidikid gunonimarsundo, adi burba-geg-bergued bemar nikumalagar.
45006023	Ar ade iskued anmar-bennuked, burgwedgi. Bab-Dummad-nabir-anmargi-binsamaiddi, anmar-Dummad-Cristo-Jesúsgi burba-geg-bergued anmarga uked.
45007001	Gwenadgan, dulemar-Moisés-igar-maid-wismaladga an soged: We-Moisés-igar-maid, dule dula gudiirbi a-igar-maidba nanaoed.
45007002	Ome sui-nikadyobdo, sui dula gudiile, sui-nikued-igarba suiba nanaoed. Ar sui burgwenonikirdi, sui-nikued-igar-maidgi bachik gunonikoed, bar a-igarba nanaosulid.
45007003	Degisoggu, amba e-sui dula gudiidgi machered-baid-nikunonikile, we soglegodo, ome igar-suli neg-sichigi e-sui-dikarba yolediiye. Ar e-sui burgwisardi, we sui-nikued-igar-maidgi ollor gunonido. Degisoggu, ar sui-baid-nikunonikile, we-ome neg-sichigi yoledisurdo.
45007004	Gwenadgan, bemar amba deyobmodo, Cristo burgwisgu, bemar eba burgwisadyob gunonimarmogad. A-ular Moisés-igar-maidgi bemar ollorgunonimodo, adi bemar dule-baidgadga guegar, dule-burgwis-gannar-mai-durgus-gusadgadga guegar, adi Bab Dummadga ibmar-nuegan bemar imakmalagar.
45007005	Ar anmar-san ibmar-iskana-imakbied-sogedba an dula gudimargua, Moisés-igar-maid-ular, ibmar-iskana-imaked-an-sangi-naid an imakde-daed, we a burgwedse an-nissunnad.
45007006	Ar emigindi Moisés-igar-maidgi an ollolesmalad, ar igar-anmar-ganikidgi an burgwismalad-ular. Degisoggu, a-ular Bab Dummadga burba-dulaled-binidgi burbaledgi an arbamarsundo, Moisés-igar-sered-narmakar-maidginsurdo.
45007007	¿Degite, igi an sogmalosunna? ¿Moisés-igar-maid wede iskuedi? Suli, degisuli. Degite, Moisés-igar-maid maisulina, we-iskued an wisguosulinad. Ar an wisguosulinad dule-baid-ibmar-bina yaisur soged, Moisés-igar-maid sognasulina: “Mer dulemar-baid-ibmar-bina yaisur sogoye.”
45007008	Ar iskued, igar-maid susgua, bela dulemar-baid-ibmar-bina-yaisur-soged angi nasiksad. Ar Moisés-igar maisulina, iskued gangued sulinad, an-ichogegar.
45007009	Ani, epennedi an Moisés-igar-maid-suli an gudigusad. Moisés-igar-megnonigu, iskued-angi-naid durguded, degine, an burgwenonisunnad.
45007010	Degine, an daknonisunnad, an dula gudiguegala we-igar-uklesad, we-igar anga burgwedga naded.
45007011	Ar ade iskued, igar-maid susgua, an-yardaksad, agi an-oburgwenonisunnad.
45007012	Degisoggu, Moisés-igar-maid nue-swilidikidid. A-igargi Bab-Dummad-igargan-mesisad nue-swilidikidid, igar-inikigwadid, degine, igar-nuedid.
45007013	¿Degite, wede ibmar-nuedidde, burgwedga we-ibmar-nued anga gunonisunde? Suli, degisuli. Iskued oyogegala, we iskuedye, anga ibmar-nuedba burgwed uknonikid, adi igar-maidba oyolegegar, we iskued bela-bela iskanaye.
45007014	Ar anmar wismalad, Moisés-igar-mesisad, we igar-nuedid, burbaledid. Ar an-burbadi we-napnegginedsoggu, iskuedse ukles-gudiid, e-maiga guegar.
45007015	Ar ade an ibmar-imaked aku an itoged, ar an ibmar-imakbied an imak-dasulid, ibmar istar an daked bur an imakde-daed.
45007016	Ar an ibmar-abesulid an imakele, an sognaido, we-Moisés-igar-maid nuedye.
45007017	Degisoggu, an-sunnad an ibmar-imaksursundo, ibmar-imakedi, iskued-angi-naid, a ibmar-imakdo.
45007018	Degine, an nue wisdo, we angi, an-sangi ibmar-nued naisulid. Ar ibmar-nued an imakbien-inigwele, imakeddi geg an imaked.
45007019	Ar ade ibmar-nued-an-imakbied an imaksulid, an bur imaked, ibmar-iskana-imakbisulid, a bur an imakde-daed.
45007020	Ar an ibmar-imakbisulid an imakele, ani an bar ibmar-imaksurdo, ibmar-imakedi, iskued-angi-naid, a ibmar-imakdo.
45007021	Degisoggu, weyob igar mai an daksundo, ibmar-nued an imakbien-inigwele, iskued angi nai.
45007022	Ar an-san-burba-ulubgindi, Bab-Dummad-igar-maidgi an nue yeer itoged.
45007023	Degine, an-sangi baid-igar-mai an dakbardo. We-igar, an-binsaedgi yolenoni-daed. Iskued-an-sangi-naid-igarse an gales-gudisunnad.
45007024	¡Degisoggu, nue an dule-wilesdo! ¿Doa-wede we-burgwed-an-sangi-naid anga osulogosunna?
45007025	Degisoggu, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye an sogsundo, ar Bab Dummad, anmar-Dummad-Jesucristoba anmar-abonoged, mer anmar iskuedgi bar nanamalagar. Degisoggu, an-sunnad an-binsaedgi Bab-Dummad-igar-maidba an mailedisunnad, ar an-sangindi, iskued-igar-maidba an mailediid.
45008001	Degisoggu, dule-Cristo-Jesúsgi-akanimaladga bar odurdakleged-igar maisulid, na-e-san-sogedba-bar-nanadisurmaladga, Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nuedba-nanadimaladga.
45008002	Ar Bab Dummad Burba Nued Cristo-Jesúsba dulemar-oduloged. A-Burba iskued-igar anga osulosad, degine, burgwed-igar anga osulosbalid.
45008003	Ar anmar-san nollosoggu, Moisés-igar-maid gwen unnigussulid anmar-abonogegar. Degisoggu, Bab Dummad sanar na E-Machi dulemar-sunnadyobi we-napnegse barminonikid, dulemarga iskued bennukegar. Deyob Bab Dummad Cristo-sangine iskued sabsur odurdaksasunnad,
45008004	adi anmargi inikii-igar-maid-e-igar nabir guegar, ar anmar na anmar-san-sogedba gudisurmaladga, anmar Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-sogedba gudimaladga.
45008005	Ar dule-na-e-san-sogedba-nanadimaladi, na e-san ibmar-abegedgi binsa-daed. Ar Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-sogedba-nanadimaladdi, adi ibmar-burbamaladgi binsa-daed.
45008006	Ar dule na e-san-sogedba binsadiile, we burgoed. Ar dule Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-sogedba binsadiirdina, adi dula gudiguoed, degine, ulubgi bogidik na itogoed.
45008007	Ar dule na e-san-sogedba nanaele, we-dule Bab-Dummad-e-istaradid, ar ade Bab-Dummad-igar-maid-sogedba nanabisulid, ar degine, geg gubalid a-igarba nanaed.
45008008	Degine, dulemar-na-e-san-sogedba-nanadimalad geg Bab-Dummad-yeer-ito-imaked.
45008009	Ar bemardi na be-san-sogedba be nanadisurmalad, Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-sogedba bemardi nanadimalad, ar Bab Dummad Burba Nued bemargi mair. Ar dule Bab-Cristo-Burba nikasulile, we-dule, Cristogadsulid.
45008010	Ar Cristo bemargi maile, be-san iskuedse burgwismalad, be-burbadi dula gudiid, Bab Dummad iskussuliyob bemar-imaksad-ular.
45008011	Ar Bab Dummad Jesús-burgwar-maigu-odulosad. E-Burba bemargi maimogale, Bab-Dummad-Cristo-Jesús-burgwar-maigu-odulosadi, E-Burba-bemargi-maidba bemar-san-sunna-burgoed gannar odulomogoed.
45008012	Degisoggu gwenadgan, anmar-ibmar-imaked unnila soggwennaa imake-wilubdo, anmar-san ibmar-iskana-imakbiedbarsurdo, adi aba anmar nanamalagar. Suli, abarsuli.
45008013	Ar na be-san-sogedba be nanaele, be burgoed. Ar Bab Dummad Burba Nuedba be-san-ibmar-bina-sogedi be obelogega-saerdi, adi be dula gudiguoed.
45008014	Ar bela dulemar Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-e-iduedga-imakmaladi, we Bab-Dummad-mimmigan gumalad.
45008015	Ar bemar burba-abingasadi, maiga-gued burbasulid, adi bemar gannar dobgudii-gumalagar. Bemar Burba-abingasadi, Bab-Dummad-mimmiga-gued e-burbad. A-ulale, anmar binnasur gorsunnad: ¡Abba! A sogleged, babye.
45008016	Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-sunnad anmar-burbaga oyonaid, anmar Bab-Dummad-mimmigan gumarye.
45008017	Degine, ar anmar Bab-Dummad-e-mimmigan gumarsoggu, eba anmar ibmar-gamogoed. Bab-Dummad-ibmar-nikad anmargadga gumogoed, degine, Cristoba-mesa anmar ibmar-nikumogoed, ar anmar Cristoba wilemalar, Cristo-nug-dunguoedbali, anmar-nug dungumogoed.
45008018	Ar an nue wisid, emi an wilediid dogdar-beedsesur an daked anmar-yoedse-nug-ogannolegoedba, ar ade we bur ibmar-nuedid, wilegedba.
45008019	Ar Bab-Dummad-bela-ibmar-nasiksad bato guakwaa edarbebukmalad, Bab-Dummad-mimmigan oyolegoed.
45008020	Ar bela ibmar-obinnilesad bela ibmar-iskanaga gunonikid, ibmar-obinnilesad na-e-sogedba deyob gussulid, Bab Dummad deyob imaksad, dule-iskusad-ular, degi-inigwele, ibmar-obinnilesad ibmar-nued-bina-soged nue bensuli edarbedii imaksad.
45008021	Ar ade bela ibmar-obinnilesadse-bakale, we-ibmar-iskana-maiga-gudiidgi ollorgunonikoed, Bab-Dummad-mimmigan ibmar-nuedga-gunonimogadyob gunonimogoed.
45008022	Ar anmar nue wismalad, bela ibmar-obinnilesad agiginbukwad emi-iba-naidse, igi siamar na e-boni-itoalir nunmaked itodamaladyob.
45008023	Unnila ibmar-obinnilesadbisulid, anmarmo deyob anmar-ulubgi agigindimogad, anmar Bab Dummad Na-E-Burba-Nued-inse gebe-anmarga-uksad nikmalad, anmar Bab-Dummad-e-mimmiganga-gued bensulidgi edarbedimalad, anmar-san-galesiid onolegegar.
45008024	We deyob anmar nue-wisi Bab-Dummad-bensulidgi-edarbediidba anmar abonolenonikid. Ar anmar-ibmar-edarbediid bato an daksamalale, we bato bar edarbosulid. Ar dule ibmar-dakele, ¿ibi bar edarbosunna? Suli, bar edarbosuli.
45008025	Ar an ibmar-daksulid bensulidgi edarbedimalale, gwae-gwae-itogedgi an edarbedisurmalad, binnalle bensulidgi an edarbedimalad.
45008026	Degine, amba deyob Bab Dummad Burba Nued anmar-nollogwadgi anmar-bendaked, ar anmar wichulid Bab-Dummadse-goledgi igi bur nabir ibmar egisoe. A-ular Bab Dummad Burba Nued ise-gormaknai, gayagi-geg-soglegedba, anmar-ular Bab Dummadse ibmar-egised.
45008027	Ar Bab Dummad dule-gwage-ulubgi ise-amiar ibmar-imaked, adi wisid, Bab Dummad Burba Nued igi nue soge, ar ade Bab-Dummad-ibmar-abegedba, Jesucristogi-akananaimaladga egised.
45008028	Degine, anmar wisid, Bab-Dummad-sabmalad, Bab-Dummad-sogedba-ese-gollesmalad, amarga bela ibmar-gued Bab Dummad ibmar-nuedga ega imakde-daed.
45008029	Ar Bab Dummad bato-idu-wismalad, amar E-Machiyob-guegala bato-idu-nug-imaksad, adi na-E-Machi na-e-urbamar-abargi na-e-urbamar-iduedga guegar.
45008030	Ar bato-idu-nug-imaklesmaladse, Bab Dummad amarse gochabalid. Dulemarse-gollesmaladse, Bab Dummad amar iskussulidyob imaknonibalid. Dulemar-iskussulidyob-imaklenonimaladse, Bab Dummad amar-nug-ogannononibalid.
45008031	¿Degite, agi igi an bar sogmalosunna? Ar Bab Dummad anmarba naile, ¿doa anmargi gwisguosunna? Ar anmargi gwisguele, akarsurdo, ar anmargi nakosurmalad.
45008032	Ar Bab Dummad na-E-Machi-bela mer uko-deeye gwen sogsasulid, bela anmar-ular uksa-gusad, ¿degite igi anmarga E-Machiba bela ibmar-ukosur be itoge? Bela ukoe.
45008033	¿Degite, Bab-Dummad-na-dulemar-susmaladgi doa sogosunna, be iskudiiye? Suli, sogosuli. Ar Bab Dummad dulemar iskussuliyob imaked.
45008034	¿Ar degite Bab-Dummad-na-dulemar-susmaladga doa sabsur-odurdakleged-igar ega mesosunna? Suli, dule ega mesosuli. Ar Cristo amar-ular burgwisad, ar amba a-Cristo burgwar-maigu durgusbalid, deginbali, Bab-Dummad-argan-nuedsik sibalid, degine, Cristo anmar-irwa gwisgubalid, mer anmar odurdaklegegar.
45008035	Cristo anmar-sabed, ¿igi guedgi Cristo bar anmar-sabsur be insae, naibi-itogedi, suli-suli-itogedi, baregilegedi, ukumesedi, mor-sate gudiguedi, bonigan-abargi gudiguedi, igi, burgwedi?
45008036	Ar weyob Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Be-ulale anmar guagwar burgwed-abargi gudiid, sibad-wawaad-e-oburgwed-negse seled-daedyob anmar nugsales gudimalad.
45008037	Ar bela wemargi anmar obicha-gudiid, Cristo anmar-sabgusad-ular.
45008038	Degisoggu, a-ulale nue an wissunnad, gege Cristo-sabguedgi anmar-obanmalad, burgwed-dibe, dula gudigued-dibe, angermar-dibe, burbar dummaganga-gumaid-dibe, burbar gandikidba-gangued-nikmalad-dibe, emi-ibmar-gudiid-dibe, yoedse-ibmar-danikoed-dibe,
45008039	nibgued-dibe, neg-urbar-matusulid-dibe, degine, ibmar-bela-obinnilesad-dibe, amar bipisaale Bab-Dummad-sabgued-anmar-Dummad-Cristo-Jesúsgi-oyolesadgi anmar-gwen-obanmalosulid.
45009001	Cristo napira sogedyob an sogmogad, an gakansasulid, degine, an-ulubgi Bab Dummad Burba Nued anga sogbalid, an napira ibmar sogye:
45009002	An-Israel-dulemar bela Cristoba naisurmarsoggu, a-ular an nue-bukib-binsadiid, degine, an-gwagegine nue-nunmak an itodibalid.
45009003	Ar an-sunnad an ukabsales-gudisunnana-gadin, an-gwenadgan-sabed-ular, we an-gwenadgan-sanaled-sunnadid. Ar Cristogi an banguer, geb agi an-gwenadgan abonoleye sogele, Cristogi an bangusaled, adi an-gwenadgan abonolegegar.
45009004	Amar we-Israel-dulemar gumalad, Bab Dummad amar na e-mimmiga imaksad, amar-abargi na e-yeer-daklegedba gudigusad, amarbo Bab Dummad igar-mesisad, Moisés-igar ega uksad, Bab-Dummadse-goled-igar ega uksabalid, degine, amarga sogsabalid, an napira bemarga ibmar ukoye.
45009005	Agi anmar-dadgan-gebe-neg-sesmalad nonikid, geb degine, Cristo anmar-Israel-dulemargi sanar nonimogad. We-a-Cristo Bab-Dummad-sunnadid, degine, bela-ibmarmar-e-dummadga maibalid. A-e-nug birga-irba-degi-sadegu ogannolesun. Ar deyobdo.
45009006	We soglesurdo, Israel-dulemar Cristo-abingassursoggu, Bab-Dummad-sunmaksadba we ibmar-gussurdeeye. Ar ade Israel-dulemar, belagwapa Israel-wagan-sunnadsurmalad.
45009007	Degine, Bab Dummad bela Abraham-wagan sussulid, ar ade sogleged: Be-machi-Isaacgine be-waganye soglegoye.
45009008	Weyobsundo: We-dule Abrahamgi-gwalulesadba Bab-Dummad-mimmi-deeye soglesulid, ar ade Bab Dummad sogsad, machi-wargwen an bega ukoye, a-sogedba-gwalulesmalad, amar Abraham-wagwaga gunoni-daed.
45009009	Ar Bab Dummad weyob Abrahamga sogsad: A-ibagangi gannar an danikoed, geb agi Sara susugwa-nikuoed.
45009010	Ar webisurdo, Rebeca-machimala bab-emarbi nikusdo, anmar-dad-Isaac.
45009011	Degisoggu, Bab Dummad na-ibmar-abeged, adi na e-sogedba dulemar-suedba guegala, na doase-gorbiedbali goled, dule-ibmar-imakedgi Bab Dummad dule-susulid. A-ular, amba yo masmala-warbogwad gwaluleged-iduale, amba yo ibmar-iskana, igi, ibmar-nued-imakmalad-iduale,
45009012	Bab Dummad Rebecagala sogsad: Machi-dummad, machi-bipigwadga mailegoye.
45009013	Ar igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naibali: Bab Dummad soged: “Jacobdi an sabgusye. Esaúdi istar an daksaye.”
45009014	¿Degite, igi an sogmalosunna? ¿Bab Dummad igar-inikii imaksurye? Suli, geg an degi-sogmala.
45009015	Ar Bab Dummad Moisésga sogsad: Dule wile an dakbiedi, wile an dakoye. Degine, wile an dakedba dule an bendakbiedi, an bendakoye.
45009016	Ar degisoggu, na dule-ibmar-abegedbarsurdo, degine, na e-ibmar-imakedbarsurbardo, Bab Dummad na wile-dule-dakedba dulemarga ibmar-imakdo.
45009017	Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid, deun Bab Dummad Faraónga sogsa-gusgu: A-ulale dummadga an be-imaksad, adi begi an-gangued an oyogegar, degine, bela we-napneg-naidgi an-nug ogannomalagar.
45009018	Degisoggu, Bab Dummad ar doa wile dakbie, a wile dakodo, degine, doa uayasuli imakbie, a-uayasuli imakodo.
45009019	Degile, sunna be anga soged: “Ar dule wargwensaale Bab Dummad na e-ibmar-sabied-abin geg gwisguedde, ¿degite ibiga Bab Dummad dulegi ataksunna we iskudiid?”
45009020	Ar bede, ¿be doa-sunna, emi be Bab-Dummad-abin imakbigu? Ar napsa-metega-sobaled, dule-e-sobsadga sogosi: “¿Wede ibiga deyob be an-sobsa?”
45009021	¿Ar dule-napsa-sobed, wede na e-itolegedba geg napsa imaksi? Sunna we napsa-mete nued-ebulegega sobed, degine, sunna mete baisursunna-imaklegega sobbalid.
45009022	Degite, Bab Dummad dulemar-sabsur-odurdakoye sogsad, oyogegala, degine, e-gangued na sabsur oyobaligala, dulemar-odurdaklemaloed bato idu guakwaa urbisad. Bab Dummad amar nue-binnaa edarbedii-gusad, ¿ar wede akarsi? Suli, akarsuli.
45009023	Deginbali, e-gangued-yaisur-nikad ise-oyoar imakegala, Bab Dummad dulemar-wile-daked, na dulemar-wile-dakbiedga oyosad, amar Bab Dummad idu bato na guakwaa urbisad, adi amar-e-nug-odummolegegar.
45009024	Amarse Bab Dummad gochad, we-a sogledo, anmarse. Unnila anmar-Judiomarsebi gochasulid, Judiosurmaladse gochamogad. ¿Ar ade deyob gussursi? Deyob gusa.
45009025	Degine, Bab Dummad, E-gaya-burba-berbeged-Oseasba, weyob sogsabalid: Iduardi an-dulesulid, ase an goloed, an-dulemarye. An sabed-egi-niksulidse, an goloed, an be-sabye.
45009026	Deginbali, Oseasgi sogbalid: Ar bia ega soglesadgi: “Bemar an-dulesurye,” agi ega soglegoed: “Bemar Bab-Dummad-Dula-Maid-e-mimmiganye.”
45009027	Amba Isaías Israel-dulemargi sogmogad: Ar Israel-dulemar demar-ukubyob merguele, degite, unnila ichee wis gwabgumaloedbi abonolemaloed.
45009028	Ar Bab Dummad igar-inikigwadgi-ibmar-saedi we-napneggi gwae-gwaegwadgi bela ibmar obeloged.
45009029	Degine, Isaías idu weyob sogsa-gusbalid: Ar Bab-Dummad-Bur-Gandikidba-Maid, anmarga anagan-obessulina, Sodoma-neggweburyob, degine, Gomorra-neggweburyob anmar bergumogoenad.
45009030	¿Degite, igi an sogmalosunna? Judiosurmalad, iskussuliyob-dakleged-amidisurmalad, iskussuliyob-dakleged aminonimalad, Jesucristogi bensulidba.
45009031	Israel-dulemardi, Moisés-igar-maid-imakedba iskussuliyob-dakleged-amidigusmaladdi, amardi iskussuliyob-dakleged-igar amissurmalad.
45009032	¿Ibigarsunna? Ar Bab-Dummad-bensulidgi baramissurmalad, amidii-gusmalad, Moisés-igar-maidba ibmar-imakedba, degisoggu, akwamur-yoleged-idu-siidgi yoledapmarsundo, we-akwa obaredi, we Cristodo.
45009033	Ar weyob Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Bab Dummad soged: “Emigi Siongi akwamur-yoleged an sied, degine, akwa-dummad dule egi aimukued. Ar dule a-akwagi bensur abingasale, agi egi gwen bingeguosulid.”
45010001	Gwenadgan, napiraa an-gwagegi an ibmar-bina-sogedi, degine, an Bab Dummadse Israel-dulemarga an goledi, bitigi wemar abonolesmalana-gadinye an binsaed.
45010002	Ar an nue wisid, ar an nue bemarga sogmalad, we-Israel-dulemar Bab-Dummad-bina nue-sogmalad, degite, bina-sogedi we ibmar-nue-wisidba bina sogsurmalad.
45010003	Ar Israel-dulemar wichurmalad, Bab Dummad iskussuliyob dulemar-imaked, a-ulale, Israel-dulemar na e-ibmar-imakedba na iskussuliyob-gued na amididimarsunnad, degisoggu, Bab Dummad ibmar-inikii-imakedba dasurmarsunnad.
45010004	Ar Moisés-igar-mesisad, we Cristose bergumaid, adi bela dulemar-Cristogi-bensurmalad Bab Dummad iskussuliyob amar-dakegar.
45010005	Ar Moisés igar-maidgi Bab-Dummad-dule-iskussuliyob-dakedgi soged: Ar dule we-igar-maidba inikii-daele, dula gudiguodo.
45010006	Ar Cristogi-bensulid-ular dule-iskussuliyob-gunoni-daedgindina soged: Mer be-gwagegi be soge: “¿Doa wede niba nakoe?” (Ar adi Cristo napnegse sedagegar.)
45010007	Mer be sogbalo: “¿Doa wede napa-urba aidegoe?” (Ar adi Cristo dulemar-burgwarmalad-abargi onakwegar.)
45010008	Degite, ¿igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sogsunna? Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba be-walikagwad, we-Gaya-Burbadi be-gayagi, degine, be-gwagegi naid. We-Bab-Dummad-gaya-burbagi Cristogi-bensulidgi anmar sunmakdimalad:
45010009	Ar dulemarga bela be sogele, “Jesús, Bab Dummadye,” degine, be-gwagegi be bensulile, Bab Dummad we-Jesús burgwarmalad-abargi gannar odulosad, be abonolegodo.
45010010	Ar gwagegi be Jesúsgi bensuli guer-gebed, iskussuliyob be daklegegar. Be-abonolegegardi gayagi be soger-gebed, Jesús, Bab Dummadye.
45010011	Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi soged: Bela dulemar-egi-bensurmalad gwen bingeguosurmarye.
45010012	Ar Judio, degi, Judiosurmalad Bab Dummad amar akar-akar daksulid, emarbi daked. Ar Bab Dummad na ebi wargwenna bela dulemar-e-dummadga maid, bela unnitiba dulemar-ese-goledga ibmar-imakmaid.
45010013	Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaid: Bela dulemar-Bab-Dummadse-gormalad, amar bela abonolemaloye.
45010014	¿Ar Jesucristogi amba benmalar, degite, igi ese gormalosunna? ¿Ar degite, igi Jesucristogi bensuli gumalosunna, ar itodisurmalar, doa Jesucristo? ¿Degite, igi itomalosunna doa Jesucristo, ar dule ega Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmaksulir?
45010015	¿Ar degite, igi Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi dule ega sunmakosunna, ar dule ese barmiledsulir? Suli, ega sunmakosuli. Ar weyob Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Ibibayobi nuedi, we-dulemar-gaya-burba-nuegan-berbemalad, sogdanimalad, Bab Dummad dulemar-ebo igar nudakye.
45010016	Ar degite, bela Israel-dulemar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-sogedba imaksasurmalad. Ar Isaías soged: Bab Dummad, ¿wede doa anmarba ibsasmala, anmar ibmar sogmaladba? Ichee wis anmarba ibsasmalad.
45010017	Degisoggu, ar dule e-uayagwar itoger-gebed, geb agi Jesucristogi bensuli-gunonikoed. We itogedi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba itoger-gebed.
45010018	Ar an egismosundo: ¿Wede Israel-dulemar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba itossurmarsi? Itosmala. Ar Bab-Dummad-Garda soged: Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-barsogmalad, e-sunmaksamalad bela napneg-naidse barmilesye, ar sukun gwen bessuli e-gaya-burba barmilesye.
45010019	Degine, an egisbarsundo: ¿Wede, Israel-dulemarde we gaya-burba wisgussurmarsi? Wisgusmala. Ar Moisés-insa gebe soged: Bab Dummad sogye: “An-dulesulid an sabguoye, adi bemar a-dulemargi nobgumalagarye, An dulemar-binsaedsulidgi nabir binsaoye, adi bemar-ourwemalagarye.”
45010020	Degine, Isaías bur-bakar-buud soged: Bab Dummad sogye: “Dulemar-an-amidisulid, an-aminonimalad, dulemar-an-egisdisurmaladse an na oyononikid, an doa-dule gue.”
45010021	Ar Israel-dulemargindi Isaías weyob soged: Bab Dummad sogye: “Dulemar-uaya-surmaladse, degine, non-serganse, an argan-wakudar-yala an oyoalid, deyob an osedosad ese gornai, anse dagmalagar. Degite, gwen anse nonisurmalad.”
45011001	Degisoggu, an sogsundo: ¿Bab Dummad na e-dulemar metesunde? Suli, degisuli. Ar be dakdo, ar amba an Israel-dulemogad, Abraham-e-wagwad, Benjamín-sikidid, ar Bab Dummad an-abonosad,
45011002	degisoggu, Bab Dummad na e-dulemar metesurdo, ar bato iduar na susad. ¿Ar be wichurmarsi, igi Elíasgi Bab-Dummad-Garda soge? Deun Bab Dummadse Elías gotegu, Israel-nik sogdegu:
45011003	“Bab Dummad, we-Israel-dulemar be-gaya-burba-berbemalad-oburgwismalad, degine, bega-ibmar-gummakar-ukleged-galumar earismarbalid. Deginbali, beba-nanaid anbi walagwen an besad, emigi an-oburgwebimarmogad.”
45011004	Degite, ¿igi Bab Dummad Elías-abin sogsasunna? Ega sogsado, Machergan-miligugle an na sabosad, wemar, bab-dummadga-imaklediid, Baal, a-asabin Bab-Dummadyob-dakega yokorgi-sindigar-sigissurmalad-dulemalad.
45011005	Emi-ibagi amba deyob Bab Dummad ichesaar Israel-dulemar susa-bukwad. We dulemarde, Bab Dummad sue-wilubsulinad, ar na e wile-dakedba susad.
45011006	Ar Bab Dummad na e subiedbali dule-susale, dulemar-ibmar-nued-imaksadba dulemar sulessurdo. Ar degisulile, Bab Dummad dulemar-sued, na e subiedbarsurdo. Ar Bab Dummad dulemar-ibmar-nued-imakedba dulemar-suele, Bab Dummad dulemar-na-e-subiedbali dulemar-gwen-susurdo. Ar Bab Dummad dulemar-ibmar-nued-imakedba dulemar-susulile, dulemar-ibmar-nued-imaked gwen ib-nuedga guosurdo.
45011007	¿Degite igi gussunna? Israel-dulemar iskussulidyob-dakleged-amidii-gusadi gwen abingassurmardo, ar Bab Dummad na susmaladdi adi abingasmardo, baigandi Bab Dummad amar uaya-suli imaksad, adi egi bengumalagar.
45011008	Weyob dulemar-uayasurmalad Bab Dummad imaksaye, E-Gardagi sognaid: Bab Dummad dulemar-e-burba nolloo imaksad, e-ibya aku-dake imaksad, degine, e-uaya aku-ito imaksabalid. Emi-ibase amba deyob gudimalad.
45011009	Degine, Bab-Dummad-Gardagi David sogmogad: Weligwar e-mas-gunbukmalad egi aibinena-gadin, degine, sakigi igi dule egi galege, deyob galegena-gadin, adi amargi yolegegar, degine, egi odurdaklemalagar.
45011010	E-ibya murdik guena-gadin, adi mer dakmalagar, Degine, nue-wilediidba e-yargan dure degi-sadegu guena-gadin.
45011011	Degine an egisbarsundo: ¿Israel-dulemarde Bab-Dummad-abingassurmarsoggu, degi-sadegu bar Bab-Dummad-abingaosurmarsunde? Suli, degisuli. Israel-dulemar-yolesadba Judiosurmalad abonolenonimalad, adi Judiomar amargi nobgumalagar.
45011012	Ar Israel-dulemar Bab-Dummad-abingassurmalad-ular, dulemar-we-napneggi-bukmaladga ibmar-nuedga gunonikid, degine, Israel-dulemar igarga-gussurmalad-ular Judiosurmaladga ibmar-nuedga gunonikid. Degisoggu, Judiomar gannar bela Bab Dummad sunonikir-bursunna, bela bur-bule ibmar-nuedga guodo.
45011013	Ar bemarga, bemar-Judiosurmaladga an sunmaked. Ar ande Judiosurmaladse Bab-Jesús-nuggi sunmakega an barmilessoggu, an-arbaed an nue ogannosunnad.
45011014	Ar an nabir an-na-ablis-mesamalad, bemar-Judiosurmaladgi sunna nobgued an odakele, adi amar-abar abonolemogagala, nuedirdo.
45011015	Ar Bab Dummad Israel-dulemar-barmeted-ular, dulemar-baigan we-napneggi-bukmalad nabir Bab-Dummad-ebo igar-nabogega gunonikidde, degisoggu, ¿Bab Dummad gannar Israel-dulemar-sunonikir-bursunna? Judiomar burgwar-maid-abargi gannar durgunonimalodo, dula gunonimalodo.
45011016	Ar madu-gebe-soblesad Bab Dummadga uklesale, we-madu-gwagwaled-besadi amba Bab Dummadgadbardo, bela nuedbido. Ar sapi-mali nuedile, amba sapi-e-anagan nuedmodo. We sogledo, Israel-dulemar-gebemalad ar Bab Dummadgadile, Israel-sorbarmalad amba Bab Dummadgadmoye.
45011017	Ar Israel-dulemar sapi-olivo-anaganyobid. We-sapi-anagan-abala siklesad. Bemar-Judiosurmaladdi olivo-sapi-binsa-sapurbalidyobid. Sapi-anagan-napiragwad-siklesad-ular bemar e-war-sunnadgi gwadilenonimalad. Emigindi e-mali, degine, e-gichi-sunnad-bakadga be gunonimarsunnad.
45011018	Degisoggu, sapi-e-anagan-sunnadba mer san-dummaa na be imakmar. Ar na be san-dummarba saele, be insao, be sapi-mali ganisulid, sapi-mali be-ganikid.
45011019	Sunna be sogo-dibe: “Sapi-anagan siklesad, adi ani an e-war-sunnadgi nabir gwadilegegar.”
45011020	Nabir be sogendo. Emar Bab-Dummad-abingassurmaladba siklesad, bedi Jesúsgi-bensulidba egi be akanaid. Melle san-dummarba na be imakmar, bur be dobee itoge-wilubmalad.
45011021	Ar Bab Dummad sapi-ana-sunsoged-bela siksadde, be-bursunna, be-ana sikmogoe, be egi benguder.
45011022	Degisoggu, nue be dakmar, Bab Dummad ibmar-nuegan dulemarga imaked, degine, Bab Dummad sabsur dulemar-odurdaked. Bab Dummad nollosur dulemar-galakusmaladga ibmar-oyoged, begardi e-ibmar-nuegan-imaked oyoged, ar a-e-ibmar-nuegan-imakedgi be nanadiir. Ar degisulile, amba be oballemogodo.
45011023	Ar Israel-dulemarmoga, Bab-Dummad-bar-bengunonisurmarmogale, abonolenonimarmogoed, igi sapi-anagan-sunnad sunna gannar gwadilege, deyob gunonimarmogoed, ar ade Bab Dummad sunna gannar sapi-ana sapigi gwadibalid.
45011024	Ar bedi olivo-sapi-binsa-sapurbalid be siklesad, igar-maisulidba degite olivo-sapi-nuedgi be gwadilesadde, degisoggu ¿Israel-dulemar-bursunna, ar wemardi e-anagan-sunnadidde, e-olivo-sapi-sunnadgi gannar gwadilegosur be insae? Sunna gannar gwadilegoe.
45011025	Gwenadgan, an abesurdo, we-igar-dukuar-maid bemar wichuli-gudigued, adi melle na be ibmar-nue-wisi na dukin san-dummarba itomalagar: Israel-dulemar abala uayasuli imaklesmalad, adi bela Judiosurmalad-nabir-abonolemaloed abonolemaladse.
45011026	Geb a-sorbali, Israel-dulemar bela abonolenonikoed, Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naidyob: Sion-sik Dule-Bendaked danikoed, Israel-dulemar bar ibmar-iskana-imakbisuli imaknonikoed.
45011027	Bab Dummad sogbalid: “An Israel-dulemarga iskued elisar, geb weyob an amarga igar-mesoed.”
45011028	Degisoggu, Israel-dulemar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-sunmaklegedgindi Bab-Dummad-istaraddo, adi bemar abonolemalagar, ar Bab-Dummad-na-susadgindi nue-sabgualeddo, ar e-babgan-sulesad-ular.
45011029	Ar Bab-Dummad-ibmar-ukedi gannar dulemar-annik wichur sued, degine, dulemar-susale, geg gannar bar mete-daed.
45011030	Ar bemar-Judiosurmalad iduardi deun Bab Dummadba uaya gwen-niksur-gudigusmarmoganad, emigindi Bab-Dummad-wile-dulemar-daked bemar abinganonimalad, Judiomar uayasuli gunonikid-ular.
45011031	Amba deyob Judiomar emi-ibagi uaya gwen-niksur-gunonimarmogad, adi Bab Dummad wile bemar-daksadba, nabir Bab Dummad amar-wile-dakmogagar.
45011032	Ade Bab Dummad bela dulemar uayasuli daksad, adi bela Bab Dummad dulemar emarbi wile dakegar.
45011033	¡Ibibayobi Bab Dummad bela-bela binsaed nika, degine, bela-bela ibmar-wisbalid! Bab-Dummad-ibmar-imaked dule bela mag itogosurguoed, degine, e-ibmar-imaked amba aku-itobalid, ibiga wede deyob imake.
45011034	Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaid: ¿Doa Bab-Dummad-binsaed bela mag itosa? ¿Degine, doa Bab Dummadga binsaed-ukedga gussunna?
45011035	¿Degine, doa Bab Dummadga na-e-inse gebe ibmar-uksa, adi Bab Dummad a-dulega ibmar-ukmogagar?
45011036	Ar ade bela ibmarmar Bab Dummadgi danikid, degine, bela ibmarmar Bab Dummadba danibalid, degine, bela ibmarmar Bab Dummadgadga gubaloed. Bab-Dummad-nug degi-sadegu ogannolemai-gusun. Ar deyobdo.
45012001	Degisoggu gwenadgan, Bab Dummad dule-wile-daked-ular wilesakwaa an bemarse egismarsun, ib-durgan-Bab-Dummadga-gummakar-uklegedyob bemar-san na be duladgi, swilidikidgi, degi, Bab Dummad na yeer be-dakedgi ega be ukmar. Ar weyob Bab Dummadga be-san be ukele, we ib-nuedid.
45012002	Dulemar-we-napneg-naid-damaladba mer be damar. Suli, degisuli. Bemar binsaed-gwaimaidba be-daed be gwagmai imakmar, adi bemar mag dakega, Bab Dummad na e-sogedba igi ibmar abemai, ar adi ib-nuedid, yeer-itolegedid, degine, adi swilidikidbalid.
45012003	Bab Dummad nabir angi binsae-wilubsulinad, degite nabir angi binsasad, a-ular anga igar-uksad, adi bemarga sogmalagar. A-ular an bemarga sogsun, bemar wala-walagwensaar, melle na be dukin wilub-obis na be itomalo. Suli, degisuli. Na be itoakwaa binsamalo, Bab Dummad egi-bensuli-gued bega uksadba.
45012004	Ar igi anmar-sana gwennaa-guen-inigwele, degite, e-bakamalad bukidar egi akananaid, degine, we a-e-bakamalad bela emarbi ibmar-imaksulid.
45012005	Ar anmar Cristoba-nanaimalad deyobmodo, anmar ichesur-gumar-inigwele, Cristogindi anmar san-wargwennaa gued, degine, anmar unnila san-wargwengi bela na akananai-gumalad.
45012006	Degisoggu, anmar gurgin-burbaled akar-akar nika-gumalad, Bab Dummad Burba Nued anmargi dog-nued binsasadba. Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-barsoged-gurgin-burbaled be nikale, Bab Dummad egi-bensuli-gued bega uksadba be ebusundo.
45012007	Dulemar-baid-bendaked-gurgin-burbaled be nikale, dulemar-baid nued be bendakodo. Ar dulemar-odurdaked-gurgin-burbaled be nikale, dulemar nued be odurdakodo.
45012008	Dulemar-Bab-Jesús-igargi-ogannoged-gurgin-burbaled be nikale, be dulemar-ogannogodo. Be dulemarga ibmar-uked-gurgin-burbaled be nikale, nabir gatik ibmar ise-ukar be imakodo. Be dulemar-idued-gurgin-burbaled be nikale, nuedgi be dulemar-iduodo. Be dulemar-wile-dakedba be bendaked-gurgin-burbaled be nikale, weligwar-itogedgi be dulemar-bendakodo.
45012009	Napiragwadgi na be sabgumar, mer yamo daedgi. Ibmar-iskana sae be-dakmar, unnila ibmar-nuedbarbi be nanamar, mer igar-nued be metemar.
45012010	Na be muchub-muchub sabgumar, na gwenatigwale be sabgumar. Dule-baid beba bur dummad be dakmar.
45012011	Be arbaedgi mer be wiegumar. Yeer-itogedgi Bab Dummadga be arbamar.
45012012	Bab Dummad ibmar-nued yoedse bemarga ukoed-ular, bemar nue-weligwar itomarsun. Be nue naibi-itodiidgi burdied be imakmar. Bab-Dummadse-gordigu be imakmar.
45012013	Jesucristogi-akananaimalad ibmar-sate be dakele, be-ibmar-nikadba ega be ukmar. Aimar bese atakdanikir, nue ogabed be imakmar.
45012014	Dulemar-be-baregindimaladga be sogo, bela bega ibmar-nueganbi guena-gadinye, mer amar be ukabsamalo.
45012015	Dulemar-weligwar-itodimaladba be wergumar, dulemar-bodimaladba be bomarmo.
45012016	Bemar na be bulakwaa nuedgi binsabukwa-gumar. Mer san-dummarba na be imakmar. Suli, degisuli. Mer dummaganbarbi be akao, dummagansulidba be akabar. Mer be binsamar, be-ibmar-sogedbi bur-nabirye.
45012017	Dule ibmar-iskana begi imakele, bedi mer a-dulegi ibmar-iskana imako. Nue salakarmar, bela dulemar-abargi ibmar-nueganbi imaked be imakmar.
45012018	Ar sunna deyob guele, ar begi siile, dulemar-baiganbo urwed-suli be nanamar.
45012019	Gwenadgan-sabemalad, dule be-oakalosale, melle buged-mai be imakmar. Suli, degisuli. Bab Dummad a-dule sabsur-odurdaked be imakmar. Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Bab Dummad soged: “Buged-mai-imaked angadid, ani an buged-mai imakoed.”
45012020	Degisoggu: Be-istarad ukumada itogele, mas-gunned ega be uke. Uku-uku itogele, be ogobe. Ar deyob be imakele, adi a-dule nue be obingesaoed.
45012021	Ibmar-iskana mer begi nakwed be sae, ibmar-nued-saedgi ibmar-iskanagi nakwed be imake.
45013001	Bela dulemar dummagan-neg-dakmamaid-urba nanae-wilubid, ar ade Bab Dummad belagwapa na e dummagan-urbed. Ar dummagan-mamaidi, we Bab-Dummad-sogedba mamaid.
45013002	Degisoggu, dule-wargwen dummad-maidba dasulile, Bab Dummadgi yolenaido, degine, dulemar dummaganba-ibsasurmalad, we na dukin sabsur odurdaked na amimaloed.
45013003	Ar dummagan-neg-dakmamaid dulemar-ibmar-nued-imakdimalad ogwayega maisulid, we maidi, dulemar-ibmar-iskana-imakdimalad ogwayegalad. ¿Degisoggu, dummad-neg-dakmaid be dobgubisuli? Degir, ibmar-nued be imakdo, adi amar be-nug ogannogoed.
45013004	Ar ade a-dummagan Bab-Dummadga-arbamalad-gued bemarga ibmar-nuegan imakegar. Ar be ibmar-iskana imakele, be dobgumalodo, ar ade binsa gangued nikasulid, igar nikad, sabsur dulemar-odurdakegar. Ar Bab-Dummadga-arbaed-dule-gued, dule-ibmar-iskana-imakdiid buged-imakega maid.
45013005	Degisoggu, a-ulale anmar dummagan-urbaligwaa gudiguer-gebed, adi anmar mer sabsur-odurdaklegegar. Unnila agarbisurdo, ar anmar dummagan-urbaligwaa nanaer-gebed, adi anmar ulubgi akarsur itobaligar.
45013006	Ar degine, a-ular dummagan bemargi mani-gaalile, bemar bennukmarbalid, ar amar Bab-Dummadga-arbamalad gumalad, degine, amargi na arbadidii-namalad.
45013007	Igargan-mamaidba bemar bela dummaganba imake-wilubbid: Mani-weleged-bennuked be bennukmar; neggweburgi mani galeged-dibe, be bennukmar; dummadgi binsaed-nikaa daed-dibe, egi binsaed-nikaa be damar; dummad-e-nug ogannoged-dibe, be e-nug ogannomardo.
45013008	Melle dule-baidgi mani-gani-gudii be imakmar. Suli, degisuli. Bur na be muchub-muchub sabgumar, ar ade be dule-baid sabele, Moisés-igar-maidba be imaksamardo.
45013009	Ar igar maid: Mer abirgunagwarsuli na be dikarba yolemaloye. Mer na be oburgwemaloye. Mer atursamaloye. Mer binsa gakansaar ibmar be sogmaloye. Mer dulemar-baid-ibmar-bina sogmalo. Degine, igar-baid igi-maibar-dibe, bela irgwen-sogar weyob soglesiido: Dule-baid na be be-san sabguedyobi be sabgumogoye.
45013010	Ar be dule-baid-sabele, geg egi ibmar-iskana be imaked. Degisoggu, dule-baid-sabguedi, we igar-maidba nanaeddo.
45013011	Degisoggu, na be sabgumar, ar anmar wisid ibagan-iskana-naid. Emigi wachi bato omossoggu, anmar gabmaid gwisgumarsun, ar emigindi anmar bela-abonolegoed-iba bur-nue walikgusad, anmar deun gebe-idu Jesúsgi bensuli-gunonikidba.
45013012	Neg-mutikid bergudanikidyob, we-napneg bergudanimogad, degine, neg-ibgued bato warmakdanikidyob Jesús-gannar-danikid bato warmakdanimogad. Degisoggu, neg-sichidgi-ibmar-imakleged anmar mimarsun, sordamar urwed-mor-yoedyobi, neg-meegwadgi anmar Bab-Jesús-igargi nanamarsun.
45013013	Neg-ibgi nanalegedyob an nanamarsun, ibmar-nued imakdii. Mer dogdar-mas-gunnedginbi be nanamar, mer mungudii be nanamar, mer galagwensuli abirgunagwarsuli neg-sichigi be nanamar, degine, mer be-abgangi bingesuli be nanamar, mer na urwedgi be nanamar, degine, mer na nobguedgi be nanamar.
45013014	Suli, deyobsur. Bur be nanamar Dummad-Jesucristoga na be san uksadyob, adi Dummad-Jesucristo-daedyob nanaegar. Deginbali, melle be san-iskubiedba be nanamar.
45014001	Ar dule-gwensak Jesúsgi-bensulid nollogwale, be abingao, melle ebo abin-abin imaknai be guo.
45014002	Ar Jesúsba-nanaid-gwensakdi binsaed, bela ibmar nabir gulleye, baiddi, amba nollogwad unnila ibmar-durbabi gunned.
45014003	Dule-ibmar-gunnedi, dule-ibmar-gunsulid mer istar dako, degine, dule-ibmar-gunsulidi, mer dule-ibmar-gunnedgi yolego, ar ade Bab Dummad we-ebobela abingasad.
45014004	Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad Bab-Dummad-mai-gumalad, degisoggu ¿ar bede doa-dule-sunna, be dule-baid-maigi sunmaked? Ar na e-ibedga we nabir imaksale, igi, noar imaksa-dibe, we-e-ibed na ega sogoed. We-dule Bab-Jesús-igargi gwen galakuosulid, ar ade Bab Dummad na gangued nikad deyob dule-imakegar.
45014005	Dule-wargwen ibagwengi iba-baidba bur-nued daked. Dule-baiddi ibamar ber emarbi daked. Na we wala-walagwen na e-binsaedgi binsaer-gebed, e-bur-nabir binsaye.
45014006	Ar dule iba-naid bur-nued dakele, we Bab Dummadga nued iba dakdo. Ar dule iba-naid baisur dakele, we Bab Dummadga baisur iba dakdo. Ar dule mas gunnele, Bab-Dummad-nug ogannogega mas gunned, ar ade Bab Dummadga soged dog-nuedye. Ar dule mas gunsulile, Bab-Dummad-nug ogannogega mas gunsulid, degine, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye a-dule sogmogad.
45014007	Ar ade anmar dula gudiid, na anmarga dukin dula gudisulid, degine, anmarga na dukin burgwesurmarbalid.
45014008	Ar an dula gudimalale, Bab-Jesúsga an dula gudimalad. An burgwemalale, Bab-Jesúsga an burgwemalad. Degisoggu, ar an dula gudimar-dibe, igi, an burgwemar-dibe, anmar Bab-Jesúsgadga gumalad.
45014009	Ar a-ulale Cristo burgwisad, gannar durgusad, degine, gannar dula gudi-gunonikid, adi Cristo dulemar-burgwismalad, degine, dulemar-dula-gudidimalad e-Dummadga guegar.
45014010	Ar degite, bedi ¿ibiga be-gwenadgi be sunmaksunna, we nodiiye? Deginbali, bede, ¿ibiga be-gwenad ibgwensur be daksunna? Ar bela anmar Bab-Dummad-asabin ambikudapmaloedbiid, adi Bab Dummad anmarga igar-itogegar.
45014011	Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Bab Dummad soged: “Ar an dula gudiid, an-asabin bela dulemar yokorgi sindigar sigmaloedbiid, Degine, bela dulemar anga sogmaloed, be Bab Dummadye.”
45014012	Degisoggu, anmar na wala-walagwen Bab Dummadga sogmaloed an ibmar-imaksamalad, ibiga deyob an imaksamala.
45014013	Degisoggu, melle anmar bar na muchub-muchub egi sogmar, we iskudiiye. Anmar bur imake-wilubbid, gwenad melle yoleged, melle iskued.
45014014	An wisdo, Dummad-Jesúsgi an bensurdo, we-mas-gunned bipisaar ised sated. Ar dule binsaedga we-mas iseye, ar agardi we-mas isedo.
45014015	Ar be mas-gunnedba be-gwenad be bukib-binsa be imakele, ar bar be sabguedgi nanadisurdo. Be mas-gunned-ular melle be-gwenad iskued be imakoed, ar a-gwenad-ular Cristo burgwismogad.
45014016	Degisoggu, ibmar-bega-nuedid, agi melle baigan istar egi sunmaked be imakoed.
45014017	Ar Bab-Dummad-na-neg-dakmaid, ade mas-gunnedsulid, degine, gobedsulid. We-Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid-igardi Bab Dummad Burba Nuedgi inikii ibmar saedid, ulubgi bogidik-itolegedid, degine, weligwar-itolegedid.
45014018	Ar weyob dule Cristoga arbadiile, Bab Dummad yeer daked, degine, dulemar nabir dakmogad.
45014019	Degisoggu, a-ular urwedsuli nanaed, degine, na muchub-muchub ogannoged be imakmarsun.
45014020	Bab-Dummad-ibmar-imaksad mas-gunned-ular mer ichoged be imakmar. Ar nue napiragwad, bela mas-gunned nueganbid, ar degi-inigwele, dule-baid-iskuega dule na e-mas-gunnedgi imakele, wedi ib-nuedsulid.
45014021	Ar deyobile, bur-nuedid, san gunsulir, vino gobsulir, degine, ibu-imakedgi be-gwenad iskuedgi yole-dibe, bur amar melle be imakodo.
45014022	We-igar-an-bega-sogsadgi ar igi na be itoge, unnila Bab Dummad bebo deyob na be wisii-gudo. We-dulegi nued binsalesdo, dule na e-ibmar-imaked ulubgi itosulid, we noar ede imasye.
45014023	Ar dule na ibmar-gunnedgi wis naibaisaar itogele, we bato nue nosdo, ar ade benedgi mas guchad. Ar bela ulubgi benedgi ibmar-imakele, we iskueddo.
45015001	Degisoggu, anmar Jesúsgi-bensuli-gannarba-gudimalad gwenadgan-Jesúsgi-bensulid-nolloo-gudimalad bendake-wilubmar, mer na dukin anmar na yeer-itogedginbi binsamar.
45015002	Anmar na wargwen-wargwen gwenad-baid ibmar-nuedgi yeer-ito-imaked imakmar, adi anmar a-gwenad e-ulubgi ogannogegar.
45015003	Ar Cristo-bela ibmar na dukin yeer-itogega imaksasulid. Ar igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar nai, deyob gusad: Dulemar begi istar sunmaknanaid angi yolenonimogad.
45015004	Ar ade anmar-iduar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi ibmar-narmaklesmaladi, anmar-odurdakegala narmaklesad, adi anmar Bab-Dummad-Garda wisidba, anmar gwae-gwae itosulidgi, degine, anmar-gwage ogannolegedgi, anmar bensulidgi ibmar edarbedii-gumalagar.
45015005	Bab Dummad gwae-gwae itosuli anmar-imaked, degine, anmar-gwage ogannoged, a-Bab-Dummad bemar-abargi bemarga bela emarbi itoged imakena-gadin, Cristo-Jesús nanasadyob.
45015006	Adi bemar bela bulakwaa, unnila gaya-gwennayobi, Bab Dummad anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo-e-Bab, a-e-nug odummomalagar.
45015007	Degisoggu, a-ular na be muchub-muchub abingamar, ar igi Cristo anmar-abingasmoga, adi Bab-Dummad-nug ogannolegegar.
45015008	An bemarga sogsun, Cristo-Jesús Judiomar-maiga-guega nonikid, adi Bab-Dummad-napira-ibmar-saed oyogegar, Bab Dummad anmar-dadganga sogsad an bega ibmar-nuegan imakoye. Deyob guegala Cristo nonikid.
45015009	Degine, Cristo nonibalid, Bab Dummad Judiosurmalad-wilesakwaa-daked-ular, Judiosurmalad Bab-Dummad-nug ogannogegar, ar igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar nai: Degisoggu, Judiosurmalad-abargi an be-ogannogoed, degine, an be-nug odummogega an namakbaloed.
45015010	Amba Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaibalid: Bemar-Judiosurmalad, Bab-Dummad-dulemarba bemar wergumarmoye.
45015011	Degine, Bab-Dummad-Garda amba sognaibalid: Bela Judiosurmalad, bemar Bab-Dummad-nug ogannomarye, degine, bela dulemar-abe-akar-akarmalad, bemar Bab-Dummad-nug odummomarye.
45015012	Amba Isaías weyob narmaksamogad: Igi sapi-saila nie, deyob Isaí-e-wagwa nodamogoed. Degine, we-dule, belagwapa napneg-naid-ugakase neg-dakmai guoed. Degine, Judiosurmalad, a-dulegi nue bensuli edarbedii-gumaloed abonolemalagar.
45015013	Bab Dummad ibmar bensuli edarbedii anmar-imaked, bemar egi-bensuli-gunonikidba bela weligwar itogega, degine, ulubgi bogidik itogega bemar-imakena-gadin, adi Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-gangued-nikadba, bur-bule bemar Bab-Dummadgi-bensuli edarbedii-gumalagar.
45015014	Bemar an-gwenadgan, bemargi an bensurdo, bemar-sunnad ibmar-nued sabied, degine, bemar Bab-Jesús-igar nue wismalad. Degisoggu, sunna na be muchub-muchub ogannomardo.
45015015	Degi-inigwele gwenadgan, Bab Dummad nabir angi binsae-wilubsulinad, degite nabir angi binsasad, a-ular anga igar-uksad. A-ular, an bemarga gannabasaar narmaksado, adi bemar insamalagar.
45015016	Judiosurmaladga-sunmakegala Jesucristoga-arbaedga an nugsalesad. Degisoggu, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi an sunmakdisunnad, adi Judiosurmalad Bab Dummad Burba Nuedba swilidik amar-imaksadba, Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-nued-uklegedyob guegar.
45015017	Degisoggu, Bab Dummadga an Cristo-Jesúsba ibmar-imakedgi an bela-bela yeer itoged.
45015018	Ar degisulile, an sunmakbi an itossuliled. Emigindi an sunmakdo, igi angi Cristo Judiosurmalad Bab Dummadbali ib-saegala imaksa, an sunmaksadgi, degine, an ibmar-imaksadgi.
45015019	Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-ganguedba ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisulid, degine, ibmar-geger-daklemalad an imaksad. Degisoggu, Jerusalén, degine, a-neggweburmar dikarbarmalad-akale, Ilíricosega, bela Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-Cristogi-soglesadgi an sunmaksad.
45015020	Weyobi Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmakegala, gatik alamaknai an gudigusad, bia amba Cristogi yo sunmaklegedgi, adi melle dule-baid Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmaksad-sorba an sunmakegar.
45015021	Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naidyob: Dulemarga-Bab-Dummadgi-sunmaklessurmaladi, amar Bab-Dummad-itononimaloed. Degine, dulemar-Bab-Dummad-gwen-itodisurmaladi, mag itononimaloed.
45015022	A-ular geg an bemarse nue nae an guar daed, ar bemardi bato Cristo-gaya-burba itosad.
45015023	Ar emigindi, wegi anga arbaed bergunonisoggu, degine, birga-dikasurgus an bemarse ataknabi-gudisoggu,
45015024	Espa~nase an ataknadele, bemarse an nadapoed. Bemar-walik an weligwar gudigusad-sorba, bemar an-bendako an insado, adi Espa~nase bemar an-barmidmalagar.
45015025	Emigindi Jerusalénse an naesokalid, Jesucristogi-akananaimalad-agi-bukmaladga mani berbenaegar.
45015026	Ade gwenadgan-Macedonia-yarginmalad, degine, gwenadgan-Acaya-yarginmalad nue-yeer itosmalad, Jesucristogi-akananaimalad-Jerusaléngi-bukmalad-abargi wilegana-gudimaladga mani weed.
45015027	Ar we-gwenadgan nue yeer itosmardo, ar ade wilegana emarde bendaker-gebye binsamalad. Ar Judiosurmalad Judiomarba nabir ibmar-burbaledgi itosmarsoggu, Judiosurmalad Judiomarga ibmar-sanaled ukmogar-gebed.
45015028	Degisoggu, we-ibmar-imaked an obelosale, we-mani an uksad-sorbali an bemargi Espa~nase nasmalodo.
45015029	An nue wisdo, an bemarse modapile, Cristo-gaya-burba-nuedgi an bemarga sunmakdele, Bab Dummad bela-bela anmargi nued binsamaloed.
45015030	Degi-inigwele, gwenadgan, bemarse nue-ise-wilesakwaa an egis, anmar-Dummad-Jesucristoba, degine, Bab Dummad Burba Nuedba bemar an-sabed-ular, be an-bendakmar, Bab-Dummadse-anga-goledgi,
45015031	adi Judeagi Bab-Jesúsba-ibsabisurmalad melle angi yolemalagar, degine, an mani-semaid, Jerusaléngi Jesucristogi-akananaimalad-bukmalad nuedgi abingamalagar.
45015032	Adi an bemarse warmakdapir, weligwaledgi Bab-Dummad-sogedba an modapi-guegar, adi bemarba-mesa an obunnomalagar.
45015033	Degine, Bab Dummad ulubgi bogidik itogega anmar-imaked, a-Bab-Dummad bela bemarba gudiguena-gadin. Be itomargua.
45016001	Anmar-buna-Febe, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-Cencreagi-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-bendakedga gudiid. An bemarga soge,
45016002	a-buna Bab-Jesús-nuggi be nue abingamalo, igi Jesucristogi-akananaimalad gusgu-igar-maidba nued abingalegedyob. Degine, ibi-ibmar Febe abealile, bemar bendakmalo, ar ade we-ome dulemar-bukidar-bendaksad, degine, anse-bakar an-bendaksamogad.
45016003	Priscila, degi, Aquila, amar anba Cristo-Jesúsga-arbamalad gumalad, amarga sogo, bemar nued sogeye.
45016004	Wemar an-ular burgwednaga gusmalad. Amarga anbi dog-nuedye an sogsulid, bela Judiosurmalad Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad dog-nuedye Priscilaga, degi, Aquilaga sogmarmogad.
45016005	Degine, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-amar-neggi-danar-ambikunoni-damaladga be sogbalo, bemar nued sogeye. Degine, Epeneto, an nue sabed, we insale Acayagi Cristoba-nagus-gusad, aga sogbalo, be nued sogeye.
45016006	María, bemar-abargi nue arbasad, aga sogbalo, be nued sogeye.
45016007	Andrónico, degine, Junias, an-gwenadgan, degine, anmar-dare eskaryagi mellesii-gusad. Gwenadgan-Jesús-nuggi-barmilearmalad we-a-dulemar-warbogwad nue-egi-binsaed-nikaa damarmogad, degine, we-gwenadgan-inse an-idu Cristo-abingas-gusmalad. Amarga sogo, bemar nued sogeye.
45016008	Amplias, nue Bab-Jesús-nuggi an sabedid, aga sogo, be nued sogeye.
45016009	Urbano, Cristo-Jesúsgi anmarba arbaed, degine, Estaquis, an nue sabed, amarga sogo, bemar nued sogeye.
45016010	Apeles, Cristogi nue bensuli na oyosad, a-dulega sogo, be nued sogeye. Aristóbulo-negginmaladga sogo, bemar nued sogeye.
45016011	An-gwenad-Herodiónga sogo, be nued sogeye. Narciso-negginmalad Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad, amarga sogo, bemar nued sogeye.
45016012	Trifena, degine, Trifosa, amar Bab-Jesúsga-arbamalad gumalad. Amarga sogo, bemar nued sogeye. Pérsida, Bab-Jesús-igargi nue arbasmogad, a anmar nue sabmalad, aga sogmogo, be nued sogeye.
45016013	Rufo, Bab-Jesús na susad, Bab-Jesúsgi nue nug nikamogad, degine, a-e-nan, an-nanyobi an dakmogad, amarga sogo, bemar nued sogeye.
45016014	Asíncrito, Flegonte, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes, degine, gwenadgan-amarba-gudimaladga sogo, bemar nueganbimar sogeye.
45016015	Filólogo, Julia, Nereo, Nereo-e-bun, Olimpas, degine, bela Jesucristogi-akananaimalad-amarba-gudimaladga sogo, bemar nueganbi sogeye.
45016016	Na be nue-angaagwaledgi na be muchub-muchub sogmar, na be nued sogeye. Bela Cristoba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad bemarga sogsiid, bemar nued sogeye.
45016017	Gwenadgan, wesikdi an bemarga soged, nue salakarmar, dulemar-danar-danar-sordamar-gamaladgi, degine, Bab-Jesús-igar-banguega dulemar-imakedgi, ar bemar ibmar-durdaksad weyob durdaksasurmalad. A-dulemargi bemar bangumar.
45016018	Ar dule-degi-damalad we anmar-Dummad-Jesucristoga arbadisurmalad, wedi e-sabangi-binsaedba arbamalad, degine, binnaa sunmakedgine, degine, yamo-binsa-nued-sunmakedgine, dulemar-binsaedsurmalad binsaed-gaddamalad.
45016019	Ar ade bemar Bab-Jesús-sogedba-ibsaedi bela dulemar be wisgumamaid, degisoggu, bemarba weligwar an itosundo. Degisoggu, ibmar-nuedgala bemar binsaed-nikaa-gubi an abedo, ibmar-iskanagardi baisur-binsaed.
45016020	Degine, Bab-Dummad-ulubgi-bogidik-itogega-anmar-imaked, a emiskwasaar nia-saila-Satanásgi-nakwed be-imakmaloed, bemar be-naggi nia-saila-birgi annasayobi be gumaloed. Anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo bitigi nued bemargi binsamalana-gadin.
45016021	Timoteo-anbo-arbaed, Lucio, Jasón, degine, Sosípater, an-gwenadgan, amar bemarga sogsiid, bemar nued sogeye.
45016022	Ani Tercio, we garda an-googi an bemarga narmaksad, Bab-Jesús-nuggi an bemarga soged, bemar nued sogeye.
45016023	Gayo, e-neggi an-ogabed, degine, bela Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad, amar bela bemarga sogmarmogad, bemar nued sogeye. Erasto, neggweburga-mani-saboged-dule, degine, gwenad-Cuarto bemarga sogsimogad, bemarde nueganbi sogeye.
45016024	Anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo bitigi nued bela bemargi binsamalana-gadin. Ar deyobdo.
45016025	Emigi Bab-Dummad-nug ogannomarsun, ar Bab Dummad sunna gandik bemar-imaked, an gaya-burba-nued Jesucristogi an sunmakdiidyob. We-igarde iduar gusgu gebe-negasailaunni odukuar mainad.
45016026	Emigindi we-igar-osanalenonikid. Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad Bab-Dummad-Gardagi Bab-Dummad-geg-bergued-sogsadba narmaksamalad, adi bela dulemar-yar-baid-baidgi-bukmalad Jesucristogi mer bengumalagar, eba uaya-nikaa damalagar.
45016027	Ar unnila Bab Dummadbi wargwennagwad, degine, bela-ibmar-wisi maid, a-e-nug Jesucristoba, degi-sadegu ogannomarsun. Be itomargua.
46001001	Ani Pablo, Bab -Dummad-sogedba anse gollesad, Jesucristo-nuggi-barmilealidga guegar. Gwenad-Sóstenes anbo bemarse garda narmaksiid.
46001002	Bemar Bab Dummadgadid, bemar Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-Corintogi-danar-ambikunoni-damalad, bemar Cristo-Jesúsgi gwage-swilidik gunonimalad. Bab Dummad bemarse gochad, belagwapa dulemar bela neg-sukungan-gwen-bessuli Dummad-Jesucristose gorbukmaladba mesa egi akananai-gumalagar. A-Jesucristode amar-Dummadga gunonikid, degine, anmar-Dummadmogad.
46001003	Bab Dummad, anmar-Baba, degi, Dummad-Jesucristo, amar bitigi bemargi nued binsamalana-gadin, degine, ulubgi bogidik bemar-itogega imakbalina-yerban.
46001004	Bemarga gusgu dog-nuedye an Bab Dummadga an sog-daed, ar Cristo-Jesús-nuggi Bab Dummad bemarga binsaed-nuegan uksadba.
46001005	Ar Jesucristo-nuggi belagwapa ibmar-burbaled bemar nikunonikid, bela yeer-sunmaked, degi, bela ibmar-wisi-gued.
46001006	Degisoggu, Cristogi-gaya-burba-nued-sunmakleged bemargi oyolenonikid, we napiragwadye.
46001007	Deginbali, Bab Dummad bemarga belagwapa gurgin-burbarmalad-nuegan-ukedi, be galaku-deeye binsasurmalad, bela be nikmalad, unnila anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo-danikoed-e-ibagan edarbedii be gumarsun.
46001008	Bab Dummaddi burgwedse be bendakdii-guoed, mer iskuedse be galakuegar, adi anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo-e-ibagangi, bega igar-itolealile, be ibmar-gwen-oakalossuliyob daklegegar.
46001009	Ar Bab Dummad na e-ibmar-sogsadba na imaksoggu, bemarga ibmar-sogsad na imakodo. Bab Dummad na e bemarse gochad, adi E-Machiba, anmar-Dummad-Jesucristoba, anmar nue ailegegar.
46001010	Gwenadgan, an bemarse nue wilesakwaa anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo-nuggi gorsun, mer na be akar-akar sunmakmar, bela balibi na be imakmar, na bela be-damaladgi, degi, na be-binsamaladgi balibi bukwa be gumarsun.
46001011	Gwenadgan, weyob an bemarga soged, ar ade Cloé-neg-yaginmalad anga sogedba an bemar-itoged, bemarde na abin-abin imakdimarye.
46001012	An bemarga sogsun, ar bemarde abar sogdimalad: “Andi Pablo-sordaye,” baigandi sogmogad: “Andi Apolos-sordaye,” degi, baigandi sogdimogad: “Andi Pedro-sordaye,” deginbali, abar baigandi sogbalid: “Andi Cristo-sordaye.”
46001013	¿Ar ade Cristode danar-danar sordamar-seedsi? ¿Pablode bemarga nakrusgi burgwissi? ¿Ar ade bemarde Pablo-nuggi digi oglessi? Degisuli.
46001014	Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye an sogsundo, Bab-Jesús-digi an bemar-ogsasurmargu. Unnila Crispo, degi, Gayo, amarbi an Bab-Jesús-digi ogsad.
46001015	Degisoggu, geg bemar sogmalad: “An Pablo-nuggi digi oglesye.”
46001016	Deginbali, Estéfanas-neg-yagi-bukmalad an Bab-Jesús-digi ogsabalid, ar baigandi an insasulid an Bab-Jesús-digi ogsabar-dibe.
46001017	Ar ade Cristo an-barmissulid Bab-Jesús-digi dulemar-ogegar. Cristo an-barmisurbalid, dulemar ibmar-wisii sunmakedgi sunmakegar. Cristo an-barmisad, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-egi-soglesadgi sunmakegar. Ar deyobsulile, Cristo-nakrusgi-burgwisad-e-igar gangued-gwen-niksur imaklego-itole.
46001018	Ar dulemar-yoggus-gudimaladgardi, Cristo-nakrusgi-burgwisadgi-sunmakleged-igar, we agumaked-igar gued, ar anmar-abonolesmaladgardi we Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmaked, na Bab-Dummad-e-gangued anmarga oyoged.
46001019	Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Bab Dummad soged: “Dulemar-binsaed-ibegan-e-binsaed an osulogoed, degi, dulemar-ibmar-mag-ito-gudimalad ibmar aku-itoge an imakoed.”
46001020	Degite, ¿bia dule-binsaed-ibed nadsunna? ¿Bia escribamar nadsunna? ¿Bia dule-we-napneggi-igar-dummagan-mamaid-wisimalad nadsunna? ¿Ar we-napneggi-ibmar-wisimalad, Bab Dummad ibmar-wichulidyob imaksasursi? Eye, deyob imaksa.
46001021	Bab Dummad na bela e-ibmar-wisid dulemar-we-napnegginmalad na-e-binsaedgi e-amiega gwen imaksasulid. Ar bur e-gaya-burbagi-sunmakar dulemar-egi-bensurmalad abonogega imaksad, ar e-gaya-burba binsa-agumakedyob dakle-inigwer.
46001022	Ar Judiomardi ibmar-wilubgan-dakledisurmalad ega oyobi abemalad, Griegomardina ibmar-wisi-gued amidimalad.
46001023	Ar anmardi, Cristo-nakrusgi-burgwisad-igargi sunmakdiid. We-igar Judiomarga igar-nabiridsulid, Judiosurmaladdi, binsa igar-agumaked dakmalad.
46001024	Bab-Dummad-dulemarse-gochamaladgardi, Judiomarse, degi, Griegomarse, we Cristo, Bab-Dummad-e-ganguedid, degine, bela e-ibmar-wisidbalid.
46001025	Ar Bab-Dummad-igar dulemarga binsa-igar-agumakleged-daklegedi, we-binsaed dulemar-binsaedba bur binsaed-biriginedid, degine, Bab-Dummad-ibmar-saed bur nolloo-dakle-inigwele, degite, dulemar-ibmar-saedba bur gangued nikad.
46001026	Degisoggu gwenadgan, nue na be itomalana, dulemar-we-napnegginmalad bemar-dakmalad, Bab-Dummad-bemarse-gochamalad-abargi bemar ichee dulemar-binsaed-ibegan nikmalad, bemar ichee dulemar-dummagan nikmarbalid, degine, bemar ichee dulemar-nuga-nikamalad nikamarbalid.
46001027	Ar bur Bab Dummad we-napneggi dulemar-ibmar-wichurmaladse gochad, adi dulemar-ibmar-wismalad-obingesaegar, degine, we-napneggi dulemar-nollomaladse Bab Dummad gochad, adi dulemar-nollosurmalad-obingesaegar.
46001028	We-napneggi dulemar-baisur-dakledimalad, degi, dulemar-istar-dakledimalad Bab Dummad a-dulemar bur susad. Bab Dummad ibmar-sulid susad, adi ibmar-nikmalad osulogegar,
46001029	adi melle dule bipisaale Bab-Dummad-asabin na dukin san-odummomalagar.
46001030	Ar Bab-Dummad-sunnad Cristo-Jesúsgi bemar-oakanonikid, degi, bemar-imaknonikid, Cristo anmar-ibmar-nue-wisidga, iskussulidyob anmar-imaknonikid, anmar-gwage-swilidik-imaknonikid, degi, Cristogi anmar-baknonikid, anmar-abonogegar.
46001031	Adi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naidyob guegar: Ar dule na san-dummarba itobiele, Bab-Dummad-nuggi bur san-dummarba na itodo.
46002001	Nabirdo gwenadgan, Bab-Dummad-igar-napiragwad-maid-sogega an bemarse arbimargu, nabir yeer ibmar-soglegedba, degi, an ibmar-wisidba an bemarga gwen sunmaksasurmalad.
46002002	An bemar-abargi gudigusgu, ibmar-baidgi an gwen sunmakosurye an sogsad, unnila Jesucristoginbi bemarga an sunmakoye, bur-bule Jesucristo-nakrusgi-burgwisad-igargi.
46002003	An bemar-abargi gudigusgu, an na wargwen unnisur-itogedgi, dobedgi, degi, ise-wawanmakaledgi an bemar-abargi gudigusad.
46002004	An bemarga sunmaksagua, degi, an bemarga Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued bisgua, ibmar-wisidba, yamo bemar-binsaed-gaega an sunmaksasulid. Suli, degisuli. Bab Dummad Burba Nued, degi, E-gangued-nikadba bemar mag itosad, agala bemar Bab-Jesúsba-nagusmalad,
46002005	adi bemar Jesúsgi bensulid melle dulemar-ibmar-wisid-sogedba bensuli be gumalagar. Suli, degisuli. Unnila Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-ganguedba Jesúsgi bensuli be gumarsun.
46002006	Degi-inigwele, anmar nue-binsaed-nikaa sunmakdimalad gwenadgan-Bab-Jesúsgi-bensulidgi-nue-nasgusmalad-abargi. Binsaed-nikaa anmar sunmakedi, we-napneggined-binsaedbarsulid, degi, we-napneggi dulemar-dummagan-neg-dakmamaid binsaedyobsurbalid. Ar a-dulemardi bergudoed.
46002007	Anmardi Bab-Dummad-binsaed-nuedgi, epenne dukuar-maigusadgi an sunmakmalad. Amba yo we-napneg-nague Bab Dummad bato anmarga we-binsaed-nued sabosad, adi anmarga ib-nuedga guegar.
46002008	We-napneggined-dummagan we-binsaed-nued aku daksamalad. Ar we binsaed-nued mag itosmalana, we-Jesús-nibneg-yeer-dakleged-e-Dummad nakrusgi oburgwissurmalanad.
46002009	Ar weyob bato iduar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar sognaid: Bab Dummad ibmar-nuegan guagwar na e-sabmaladga bato nasiksaye. We-ibmarmar dule gwen dakdisulid, dule gwen itodisurbalid, degine, dule gwen egi bipisaar binsadisurbalid.
46002010	Ar Bab Dummad anmargardi e-binsadiid odalosad, na E-Burba-Nuedba. Ar Bab Burba Nued bela ibmar baramied, Bab Dummad ulubgi binsadiidse-bakar.
46002011	¿Ar doa-dule, dule-ulubgi-binsanaid wisguo be insae? ¿Ar unnila na e-san-burbabi e-ulubgi dule-binsanaid wisgusursi? Amba deyobmodo, unnila Bab Dummad Burbabi wisdo, Bab Dummad na igi binsanaid.
46002012	Anmarga we-napneggined-burba uklessulid, anmarga Burba Bab-Dummadgi-danikid uklesad, adi anmar wisguegar, ibu Bab Dummad anmarga uksa.
46002013	Nabir-dulemargi-binsaed-nued-amilegedba anmar sunmaksulid. Suli, degisuli. Anmar sunmakedi, Bab Dummad Burba Nued anmarga binsaed uksadba, degi, E-Burba-Nued anmar-odurdaksadba. Deyob dulemar-Bab-Dummad-Burba-nikmaladga ibmar-burbarmalad an odulodimalad.
46002014	Ar dule Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-niksulile, geg Bab-Dummad-igarmar abingaed, ar binsa ee gordiiye daked. Deginbali, a-dule amba aku itobalid, ar ade Bab-Dummad-igar, burbar mag be itoger-gebed.
46002015	Ar dule burbar-duladdi bela mag itoged, igid nuedi, degine, igid ichakwabali. Degisoggu, baigan a-dulegi geg soged, be nosye.
46002016	Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi soged: ¿Degite, doa Bab-Dummad-binsanaid wissunna? ¿Doa Bab-Dummad-odurdakosunna? Suli, dule geg deyob imake. Anmardi Cristo-binsaed nikmalad.
46003001	Degisoggu gwenadgan, Bab-Jesús-igargi geg an bemarga sunmakgusad, dulemar bela-bela Bab Dummadgi burbar nanadimaladyob. An bemarga sunmaksamalad unnila dulemar na dukin na e-sangi binsadimaladyob, amba Cristogi-mimmigan gumaladyob.
46003002	An bemarga Bab-Jesús-igargi sunmaksamargu, mimmi-bipi amba nunis gobnaidyob an bemarga sunmaksad, san-selellegedgi an be-oguchasurmaladyob. Ar deun amba bemar Bab-Dummad-Burbagi mimmiganyob geg san-dutusulid gunmalad, ar amba emibela san-dutusulid geg bemar gunmarbalid.
46003003	Ar amba bemar dule-napnegginedyob binsamalad. Na be muchub-muchub nobmalad, na be muchub-muchub urwemalad, degine, na be danar-danar sordamar-gamalad. Ar degi-be-damaladde, ¿amba dulemar-we-napnegginedgii be damar-itolesunna?
46003004	Ar gwenna-gwenna bemar soged: “Andi Pablo-sordaye;” baigandi sogmogad: “Andi Apolos-sordamoye.” Ar degisoggu, ¿amba dulemar-we-napnegginedgii be damar-itolesunna? Ar deyobdo.
46003005	¿Ar Pablode, doasunna? ¿Ar Apolosde, doamosunna? Anmar unnila Bab-Jesúsga-arbamalad gumalad. Bab Dummad anmarga arbaed uksadba, anmar bemarga Bab-Jesús-igargi-sunmaksagu, bemar Bab-Jesúsgi-bensuli gunonimalad.
46003006	An-inse bemarga Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmaksad, dule ibmar-gwag digedyob we gusad. Apolos, an-sorba bemarga Bab-Jesús-igargi sunmaksamogad, dule ibmar-gwag digi ogedyob we gusmogad. Ar ibmar-gwag-odungu-daeddi we Bab Dummad ibmar-gwag odungued, deyobi na e-gaya-burba Bab Dummad bemargi onasgumai-imaksad.
46003007	Degisoggu, dule-ibmar-digedi dule-dummadsulid, degi, dule-digi-ibmar-ogedi amba dule-dummadsurbalid, unnila Bab Dummadbi dule-dummadid, ar ade Bab Dummadbi ibmar-gwag-odungued.
46003008	Dule-ibmar-diged, degine, dule-ibmar-gwag-digi-oged, degisoggu, emarbi gumarsundo. Ar na e-ibmar-imaksadba wala-walagwen ibmar-nuegan abingamaloed.
46003009	Ar anmar unnila Bab-Dummadga-bulakwaa-arbamalad gumalad. Bemar Bab-Dummad-nainuyob gumalad, bemar Bab-Dummad-neg-sobnaidyob gumalad.
46003010	Bab-Dummad-sogedba, akwa-neg-sobed-igar-nue-wisidyob an e-saila-mesega Bab Dummad an-imaksad, dule-baid a-birgi sobmogoed. Degisoggu, gwenna-gwenna birgi sobmaloed, nue salakarmar na igi be sobmaloe. We sogledo, Bab-Jesúsgi dulemar-odurdakoedgi nue salakarmarye.
46003011	Ar neg-sailaga-gued bato maisoggu, dule-baid geg neg-saila-baid mesed. Ar ade we-Jesucristo e-saila-sunnadid.
46003012	Ar dule we-neg-saila-megisad-birgi olo, mani, akwa-nuegan, degi, urgo, gagan-dinnagwad, oros-gagangiid sunna sobmalad.
46003013	Belagwapa wargwen-wargwen dulemar-e-arbaedi neg-magadse oyolenonikoed Bab-Jesús-dulemarga-igar-naboged-ibagangi. A-ibagi soogi daklenonikoed, dulemar na ibmar-imaksamalad bule nued arbasmar-dibe.
46003014	Ar dulemar na neg-sobed e-saila-birgi neg-sobsamalad ei gummaksasulile, a-dulemar ibmar-nuegan abingamalodo.
46003015	Ar dule-wargwen na neg-sobsad ei gummaksar, ibmar sate guoed, ar na e-san-sunnaddi abonolegoed, igi dule soogi wakichadyob.
46003016	¿Ar na be wichurmarsi, bemar Bab-Dummadse-goled-negga gumalad, Bab Dummad Burba Nued be-ulubgi maimalad?
46003017	Ar dule-wargwen Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg obelogele, Bab Dummad a-dule-obelomogoed, ar ade Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg swilidikidid, ar bemar Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg gumalad.
46003018	Mer na be dukin yardakmar. Ar bemar-abargi dule-wargwen we-napneggi-binsaed-ibedye sogdiile, binsaedsulidyob na imakgweler-gebed, adi nue-binsaed-ibedga guegar.
46003019	Ar we-napneggined-binsaed-nued, Bab Dummaddi binsa binsaed-agumaked daked, ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaid: Dulemar-na-binsaed-nikaye-sogdimalad, Bab Dummad a-dulemar na dukin yardakega imak-daye.
46003020	Degine, amba Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaibalid: Bab Dummad, dulemar-binsaed-nue-nikaye-sogdimalad-e-binsaed nue wisid, ar amar-binsaed binsaled-daked.
46003021	Degisoggu, dule, dule-wargwenba nadapile, na be san-dummarba sae-wilubsulid, ar bela bemargadga gued.
46003022	Degisoggu, Pablo-dibe, Apolos-dibe, Pedro-dibe, we-napneg-naid-dibe, bemar-san-burba-dula-gudiid-dibe, burgwaled-dibe, emiskwagwad-dibe, yo ibmar danikoed-dibe, wemar belagwapa bemargadga guoedbiid.
46003023	Deginbali, bemar Cristogadid, degine, Cristo, Bab Dummadgadmogad.
46004001	Degisoggu, bemar anmar-dake-wilubbid, unnila Cristoga-arbamalad-dulemar. Ar anmar unnila Bab-Dummad-igar-dukuar-maidgi-arbamalad gumalad.
46004002	Emigindi degisoggu, dule-baidga-arbamaladi na oyoger-gebed, ede nue-inikigwadba arbaye.
46004003	Angardi gwen akarsulid, igi be angi sogbimar-dibe, an nued arba-dibe, igi, an ichakwa arba-dibe. Amba akarsurbalid, we-napneggi-igar-nabiromalad igi angi sogmogoe, an nued arba-dibe, igi, an ichakwa arba-dibe. An na dukinse-bakar, geg na sogmogad, an nued arbaye, igi, an ichakwa arbaye.
46004004	Ar ulubgi an na itogua, gwen akar an itolesulinad, degi-inigwele, geg an soged, “Ibmar gwen an oakalossurye.” Ar unnila Bab Dummadbi sogoed, an ibmar-nued imaksa-dibe, igi, ibmar ichakwa an imaksa-dibe.
46004005	Degisoggu, Bab-Jesús-igar-nabogoed-ibagan-danikoed-iduar mer be sogmar: “Dule-wargwen nued arbasye,” igi, “Ichakwa arbasye.” Bab-Jesús-danikid be edarbemar, ar a sognonikoed, ibmar-neg-sichidgi-bukwad gwallu-meegwadse onononikoed. Bab-Jesús osanalogoed dulemar-gwagegi-binsanaid. Geb degi wala-walagwen Bab Dummad amarga sogoed, “Be nued arbasye,” geb agi e-nug odummogoed.
46004006	Agala gwenadgan, bemarga ibmar-nuedga guegala, an bemarga soged, adi bemar angi, degi, Apolosgi durdakmalagar, Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naidyob, mer dogdar dule-dummagan wilub-obichaa be dakoed, adi mer dummad-wargwen bur dummarba be dakegar, degi, baiddi mesagwar be saegar.
46004007	Degite, ¿ar doa dummarba dule-baiganba be-imaksunna? ¿Ar ibu be niksunna, Bab Dummad bega uksasulid? Bab Dummad ibmar bela bega uksad, degite, ¿ibiga na be-san dummarba be imaksunna, na wargwen be ibmar na-be-ganguedgi amisayob?
46004008	Ar bemar bato unnitiba ibmar nikmalad, ar bato bemar mani-ibedmalad, anmar be-bendaksuli bato bemar reyga gunonimalad. ¡Bitigi bemar rey-sunsogedina nabirin, adi anmar bemarba neg-dakmogagar!
46004009	Degisoggu, anmar Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilesmalad, an dakgua, solaba Bab Dummad an-obesmaladyob an dakdo, dule-wargwen oburgwile-sokali gueyob. Ibmar-akargunaid oyolenaidyob anmar bela napneg-naidga oyolenaid, degi, angermarga, degi dulemargarbar.
46004010	Anmar Cristo-sabedba dule-ibmar-wichulidga an gunonimalad, bemardi Cristoba dule-ibmar-nue-wisidga gunonimalad. Anmar dule-nolloganaga gunonimalad, bemardi dule-gannarbagwadga gunonikid. Bemar nug nue odummolesmalad, anmardi mesagwar gunonikid.
46004011	Emi-ibaginedsega anmar ukumesdimalad, uku-uku itodimalad, degi, mor-sate an gudimalad, dulemar sabsur an-imakdimalad, degi, neg-sate an gudimalad.
46004012	Degi, anmar-sunnad na dukin ise-arbaar na imakdimalad. Ise-ukabsaar dulemar anmargi ulualir, anmar gaya-nuedgi abinsadimalad. Anmardi emarse baregillediid, degite anmar baisur itodiid.
46004013	Anmargi binsa istar sunmaklealir, anmardi binnalee, ise-itoagwar aimar-abinsadimalad. Emi-ibagi we-napneg-naid-ibmar-iskanayob anmar-dakmalad, degine, we-napneg-naid-ibmar-mileganayob anmar-imakdidimarbalid.
46004014	We-garda an-bese-narmakedi bemar-obingesaegarsulid. Suli, degisuli. Bemarga binsaed-ukegalad, ar bemar an-mimmigan-sabemalad gumalad.
46004015	Ar bemar miliambe Cristogi bemarga sunmakmalad sunna be nikumar-inigwele, bemar bab-sunnaddi geg ichesur be nikumalad. An Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmakedgi Cristo-Jesúsgi an be-babga gunonimalad.
46004016	Degisoggu, an bese wilesakwaa an egismarsundo, be an-daedba be damarsunye.
46004017	A-ulale an bemarse Timoteo-barminadapid. We-Timoteode Cristogi an-machi-sabedid, degine, Bab-Jesúsgi-nue-akanaid-dulebalid. An wisdo, we-dule anga galakuosulid. Timoteo bemar-gannar-insaega imakoed, igi Cristogi an nanadii, degi, igi an bela neggweburmargi odurdakdibali, bela Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad danar-ambikunoni-damalad-abargi.
46004018	An itogua, bemar gwenna-gwenna na be dukin san-ogannodimar an itoged, an bemarse nao-suliyob be angi binsamalad.
46004019	An bemarse emiskwasaar ataknadapoed, ar Bab Dummad deyob abeger. An bemarse omosar, dule-dummarba-na-itodimalad an daknadapoed, bule amar Bab-Dummad-gannalegedgi nanadimar-dibe, igi, unnila binsa gayaginbi askinnee gordimar-dibe.
46004020	Ar Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaid unnila gayaginbi sunmaklesulid. Suli, degisuli. Bab-Dummad-e-ganguedgi nanaleger-gebbalid.
46004021	Degite, ¿ibi be abemarsunna? ¿An bemar mosale, sabsur bemar-odurdakbi be an-abemala? igi, ¿sabedgi, binnalee bemarga sunmakbi be an-abemala? Be-itolegedmardo.
46005001	Emi an wisgusdo, bemar-abargi dule-wargwen e-omesulidba neg-sichigi yolediiye. A-dule e-bab-ome na e-omega imakdiid, igar-gwen-nabiridsulid. Judiosurmaladse-bela weyob gwen nanadisurmalad.
46005002	¿Degite bemar na san dummarba samarde? Bemar we-iskuedba bur-wile itoge-wilubbinad. Ar dule-degi-gusadi, bemar-abargi bemar onoge-wilubbinad.
46005003	An bemar-abargi sanagwar gudisurmar-inigwele, an bemar-abargi gudiyob be angi binsamaloed. An bemar-abargi sanale gudiyob, dule-degi-gusadi, andi bato ega igar an itosad.
46005004	Anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo-nuggi bemar danar ambikumaloed, an bemar-abargi burbar simogoed, degine, Bab-Jesús-e-gangued bemarba gudigumogoed.
46005005	We-dule-degi-iskudiid nia-saila-Satanásga bemar urmakmalo, e-san oichimakegar, adi Dummad-Jesús-danikoed-ibagi e-burbadi abonolegegar.
46005006	Degisoggu, gwen nabirsulid, bemar na san dummarba saed. ¿Ar bemar wichursi, madu-ina bipii wis egwachale, bela madu omued? Ar deyobmodo, dule-wargwen iskudiid, bela sunna dulemar-ichoged.
46005007	Degisoggu, madubur-ina-sered-mieyobi be-ichoged be mimar, adi bemar madu-bur-binidyob be gumalagar, e-ina suli, ar bemar deyobid. Ar Cristo, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-E-Iba e-sibad-wawaad-sunnadid. Ar a-sibad-wawaad bato anmarga burgwisad.
46005008	Degisoggu, Bab-Dummad-Israel-Dulemar-Egiptogi-Wilebukwa-Onosad-E-Iba anmar onomarsun, madubur-ina seredginsur, degi, madubur-ina iskana-binsaedginsurbar. Iba onomarsun, madu madubur-ina-sulidgi, nued-binsaedgi, nue napiragwadgi.
46005009	An bemarga garda-iduar-narmaksadgi an sogsamalad: Mer bemar dulemar-na-abirgunagwar-suli-neg-sichigi-yoledimaladba akaoye.
46005010	An bemarga sogsurdo, dulemar-yo-Bab-Jesús-amimalad, abirgunagwarsuli-neg-sichigi-yoledimaladba, dulemar unnila maniginbi binsadimaladba, atursamaladba, binsa bab-dummadga-imakleged e-bab-dummadga imakdimaladba, amarba mer be akamarye. Ar degi an bemarga sogele, we-napneg-naidgi be nomalar-gebed.
46005011	Unnila an bemarga sogdo, dule-wargwen, Bab-Jesúsba-naiye sogdiid, degite abirgunagwarsuli-neg-sichigi-yolediid, maniginbi binsadiid, binsa bab-dummadga-imakleged e-bab-dummadga sadiid, gadi gakan-berbeged, gadi mungued, gadi atursaed, amar-dulemarba mer be akamarye, degi, mer eba be mas gunmarye.
46005012	Amba-yo-Bab-Jesús-amimaladga geg an ega igar-itoged. Ar bemar dulemar-Bab-Jesús-amismaladgardi ega igar itoger-gebed.
46005013	Ar dule-yo-Bab-Jesús-amimaladi Bab Dummad ega igar-itogoed. Degisoggu, a-ulale, Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaidyob be imakmarsundo: Dule-iskana bemar-abargi be onomarsunye.
46006001	Emi na be abin-abin imakarmalar, ¿ibiga dummagan-Bab-Jesús-wichurmaladse bemar igar-nabironad-damala? ¿Bemar Jesucristogi-akananaimaladse geg igar-nabironamarsi?
46006002	¿Ar bemarde wichurmarsi, Jesucristogi-akananaimalad dulemar-we-napneggi-bukmaladga igar-nabirogoed? Ar bemar we-napnegginmaladga igar-nabirogoedde, ¿degite geg we-igar-burwiganade nabomarde?
46006003	Deginbali, ¿ar bemar wichurmarbarsi, anmar angermarga igar-nabirogega gumaloed? Degisoggu, we-napneggined-ibmar-bursunna, sunna be igar nabomardo.
46006004	We-napneggined-igargangi na be abin-abin imakarmalale, ¿ibiga dulemar-Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-e-sordasurmalad bemarga igar-nabogega be imakdamala?
46006005	Bemar-obingesaegala an bemarga soged. ¿Ar bemar-abargi gwenadganga igar-nabogegala gwenad-wargwensaar nue-binsaed-nikaa-daedi sursi?
46006006	Emide, bemar igar-nabogegala dulemar-Bab-Jesúsba-naisurmalad-asabin na gwenadgan-gwenadgan abin-abin na imakmargu. Mer deyob be damala.
46006007	Ar na be abin-abin-imaknanaid dummagan-Bab-Jesús-wichurmaladse be igar-nabonadmalale, bato na be nue nosmalad. ¿Bur nabirsursi, binsa dule be-wioarmalar? ¿Bur nabirsursi, binsa dule yardakar begi ibmar atursasmalar?
46006008	Emide bemar gwenadgangi binsa yoledimargu, degine, yardakar ibmar atursadidimargu. ¿Deyob bemar gwenadgan-imake-wilubmala? Suli, degi-wilubsuli.
46006009	¿Ar bemar wichursi dulemar-igar-napiraa-imaksurmalad Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse dogosurmalad? Degisoggu, mer be yardaklemar: Dulemar yo-abirgin-niku neg-sichigi-yoledimalad, binsa bab-dummadga-imakleged e-bab-dummadga imakdimalad, ome-dikarba, degi, sui-dikarba yoledimalad, omegangii-damalad, machergan na machered e-omega imakmalad,
46006010	atursamalad, dogdar maniginbi binsamalad, munguerbamalad, gadi dulemar-ukabsamalad, dulemar yardakar mani-atursamalad, amar Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse gwen dogosurmalad.
46006011	Bemar epenne gwenna-gwenna deyob nanadii-gusmalanad, emigindi bemar, gwage uruklesmalad, gwage-swilidik-gusmalad iskussuliyob Dummad-Jesús-nuggi, degi, Bab Dummad Burba Nuedgi bemar gunonimarsunnad.
46006012	Sogmardo: “Belagwapa sunna ibmar an saedbiye.” Ar nabirindo, degi-inigwele, belagwapa anga ibmar-nueganbi guosulid. Ar belagwapa sunna ibmar an sae-inigwele, mer ibmar maiga-an-imaked an imakoed.
46006013	Sogmarbardo: “Mas-gullegedi sabangarye, saban, mas-gullegedgarmoye.” Ar degi-sogmalad nabirindo. Ar saban, degine, mas-gulleged, Bab Dummad ebobela osulogoed. Anmar-sandina, neg-sichigi abirgunagwarsuli yolegegarsulid. Suli, agarsuli. Ar anmar-san, Bab-Jesúsga arbaegalad, degi, Bab-Jesús anmar-sangi na e-nug ogannolegegalad.
46006014	Geg anmar soged, Bab Dummad anmar-san-osulogoye, ar igi Bab Dummad, Bab-Jesús-burgwar-maigu gannar odulosa, abayobi gannar na e-ganguedgi Bab Dummad anmar-san odulomogoed.
46006015	¿Ar bemar wichursi, bemar-san Cristogi akanaid? ¿An-san Cristogadid, degite, Cristogi an-san an suode, ome-gamba-nuchuga ukega? Suli, degisuli.
46006016	¿Ar amba be wichurmarbarsi, dule ome-gamba-nuchu, na e-omega imaksar, ebogwad na san-wargwennagwadga gunoni-daed? Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaid: Ome na sui-ebogwad dule-wargwennagwadga gunoni-daye.
46006017	Ar dule Bab-Jesúsgi akanonikile, wargwennaa e-san-burba Bab-Jesúsba gunoni-dasunnad.
46006018	Degisoggu, abirgunagwarsuli-neg-sichigi-yolegedgi be wakinmarsun. Ar iskued-baidgi dule-wargwen iskusar, e-sangi iskussulid. Ar abirgunagwarsuli-neg-sichigi-yolegeddi na dukin e-sangi iskudiid.
46006019	¿Ar amba bemar wichurmarsi, bemar-san, Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-e-negad? Bab Dummad, E-Burba-Nued bemarga uksad. Emigindi, E-Burba-Nued bemargi maid. Degisoggu, bemar na bemargadsulid, bemar Bab Dummadgadid.
46006020	Ar Bab Dummad gargedgi bemar-baksad. Degisoggu, bemar-sangi, degi, bemar-burbagi, Bab-Dummad-nug odummomarsun, ar sogbobela, be-san, degi, be-burba, Bab Dummadgad gued.
46007001	Be anse igar-soggwen-egichismalad an be-abin imakmardo. Ar nuedindo, dule ome-nikusulir,
46007002	degi-inigwele, ar neg-sichigi-yolemalad dogdar nikasoggu, bur-nabirdo dule na ome-nikued, degi, ome, na sui-nikumogad.
46007003	Sui na e-ome-ebogwa abirgunagwar nanae-wilubbid, degi, ome na e-sui-ebogwa abirgunagwar nanae-wilubmogad.
46007004	Ar ome na e-san bar egadsulid, e-suigadid, degi, e-sui na e-san bar egadsurmogad, e-omegadid.
46007005	Degisoggu, mer na egi be nallegumar. Ar bebogwa igar-nabosmalardi nabirdo, abakalegi bemar gatik ise-bagaagwar Bab-Dummadse-gorbied-ular deyob be imaksamalale. A-sorbali na be ese gole-wilubmalad, abakalegi degiir na be wichur-san-bargamaladba nia-saila-Satanás iskuega be-imakarmalale.
46007006	We an-bemarga-sogedi, nui an bemarga soged, deyob be imakmarye an bemarga sogsulid.
46007007	Ar degite bitigi bela machergan anyob gusana-gadinye an binsaed, ar degi-inigwele, Bab Dummad anmarga gurgin akar-akar uksamalad, gwensak igar-soggwensik, baiddina igar-baidsikmo.
46007008	Degisoggu, abirgined-niksurmaladga, degi, ei-sui-burgwismaladga an sogsundo, ar nuedirdo, bemar anyob abirgined suli gudigumogar.
46007009	Ar na bemar geg na san-bargamalardi, bur be abirgined-nikumarsundo. ¿Ar bur-nabirsursi na abirgunagwar-nikumalar, bur be galagwensuli iskudiidbar?
46007010	Ar na be-abirgunagwar-nikumamaidgardi an bemarga igar-uked, ani an sogsulid, Bab-Jesús soged: “Ome mer e-sui-metoye.”
46007011	Ar ome sui-metele, mer bar sui-nikuodo. Ar gannar e-suise monaerdi, nabirdo. Degi, macheredmo, mer ome-metemogodo.
46007012	Baigangardi ani an soged, Bab-Jesús sogsulid, gwenad-wargwen, ome-Bab-Jesúsba-naisulid-nika-dibe, e-ome ar e-metebisulile, mer a-gwenad na e-ome-metodo.
46007013	Degine, ar ome-wargwen sui-Bab-Jesúsba-naisulid-nika-dibe, e-sui ar e-metebisulir, mer a-ome na e-sui-metodo.
46007014	Ar ade sui-Bab-Jesúsba-naisulid na e-omeba nugusiid, degi, ome-Bab-Jesúsba-naisulid na e-suiba nugusimogad. Ar degisulile, bemar-nusgana Bab Dummadgi iskanamardo, ar emigindi bemar-nusgana bato Bab Dummadgi nugusiid.
46007015	Ar dule-Bab-Jesúsba-naisulid, na ebo-nikumaidgi bangubi-dibe, Bab-Jesúsba-naid-dulegi banguodo. Ar gwenad-machered, degi, gwenad-bundor, a-duleba-nikumai degi-sadeguo-deeye ega igar-maisulid, ar Bab Dummad anmarse gochad, anmar dulemar-baid-ebo ulubgi-bogidik-itogedgi nanamalagar.
46007016	¿Omegwa, ar be wichi abakalegi, be-sui beba abonolealile? ¿Machered, ar be wichi, abakalegi be-ome beba abonolealile?
46007017	Ar degi-inigwele, na wala-walagwen ar igi anmar gudii Bab-Jesús anmarse gocha, anmar deyob gudigue-wilubmalad. Igi yo Bab-Dummad-amigua anmar gudigusa, deyob anmar gudigumarsun. Weyob bela Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-ambikunoni-damalad-abargi an odurdakdiid.
46007018	¿Bab Dummad bese gochagua, be abgan-duku-sikale? Ar degiile, deyob be gudigudo. ¿Bab Dummad bese gochagua, be abgan-duku-sikarsuli? Ar degiile, mer be abgan-duku be sikodo.
46007019	Be abgan-duku-sikar-dibe, igi, sikarsurbar-dibe, gwen akarsulid. Unnila igar-napiragwaddo, Bab-Dummad-igar-mamaidba nanaed.
46007020	Ar Bab Dummad bese gochagua, igi gudii bese gocha, amba deyob be dado.
46007021	¿Ar be dule-maiga-gudii Bab-Jesús bese gocha? Mer geg be itogo, baisur. Ar sunna dule-maiga-gudiidgi be noe-itogele, ar be nodo.
46007022	Ar deun maiga-be-gudii Bab-Jesús bese gochagu, be dule-maiga gudiid, ulubgi be ollorgunonikid. Amba deyobmodo, be dule-mai-sulid, na be-itoleged be gudiid, Bab-Jesús bese gornonigu, be Cristo-maiga gunonikid.
46007023	Bab Dummad mani-dummadgi be baksamalad, degisoggu, melle dule-baid-maiga be gumarsun.
46007024	Degisoggu gwenadgan, bemar wala-walagwen igi-gudii Bab Dummad bemarse gocha, ar deyob Bab Dummadga be damarsundo.
46007025	Ar yaganagardi Bab-Jesús-sogedba an sogsulid, suli, ani an soged, an nabir mag neg-itogedba, Bab-Dummad-wile-an-daknonikidba an soged.
46007026	Andi an itogua, neg-galagwensuli-gunaidba an sogsundo, dule ome-sulile, ome-nikusulir bur-nabir an itoye.
46007027	Ar be ome-nikale, mer be ome-metodo. Amba be ome-sulile, mer ome-nikuedgi be binsaodo.
46007028	Ar be ome-nikuele, gwen be iskuosulid. Ar yagwa-gwensak sui-nikuele, gwen iskuosurmogad. Degi-inigwele, na abirgunagwar-nikumaladdi we-napneggi igar-buled nikumaloed. Ar we-igargan-buled-nikubisuli an be-abemalanad.
46007029	Gwenadgan, we an-bega-sogmalad, ibagan-giakwasoggu, an bemarga sogsun, bemar-ome-nikamalad, ome-suliyob be nanamarsun.
46007030	Ar bemar-bodimalad, bodisurmaladyob be nanamarsun. Bemar-alledimalad, alledisurmaladyob be nanamar. Degi, bemar-ibmar-bakdimalad, we-ibmar begadsulidyob be nanamarsun.
46007031	Degi, we-napneggined-ibmarmargi be yeer itodimalad, we-napneggined-ibmarmargi yeer itodisulidyob be nanamarsun, ar ade we-napneg-daklegedi bergudoed.
46007032	Bitigi bemar mer bukib-binsadii gumalana-gadin. Dule ome-niksulidi Bab-Jesús-ibmarginbi binsadiid, igi Bab-Jesús yeer-weligwar-ito imako-dibeye binsadiid.
46007033	Ar dule ome-nikaddi, we-napneg-naid-ibmargi binsadiid, igi e-ome weligwar-ito imako-dibeye na binsadiid.
46007034	Amba deyobmodo, ome sui-nikad, yagwa-ebogwa wis akalad. Yagwadi unnila Bab-Jesús-ibmarginbi binsadiid, na e-san, degi, e-burba, swilidik guegar. Ar ome sui-nikaddi, we-napneg-ibmargi binsadiid, igi e-sui weligwar-ito imako-dibeye binsadiid.
46007035	We-an-bemarga-sogedi, bemarga igar-nuedga-guega an soged, bemar-idu igar-nollosur-mesega an sogsulid. Suli, agarsuli. An bemarga sogedi, adi bemar igar-napiragwadgi, igar-dule-yardaksulidgi, unnila Bab-Jesús-igargi binsanai-guega an soged.
46007036	Ar dule-wargwen binsa-dibe, e-sisgwa sui-nikued bur-nabirye. Ar bato wargwen sergumai dakele, ar sui-nikued bur-nabir dakele, nueddo, sui ega ukodo. Ega sui-uksale, akarsurdo, iskuosurdo.
46007037	Ar dule-baiddi, akarsur-itogele, na e-itogedba imakmogodo. Ar na e-gwagegi ito-dibe, e-sisgwaga sui-ukosurye, a-dule igar-nued imakmogodo.
46007038	Degisoggu, e-sisgwaga sui-ukele, igar-nued imakdo, ar baiddi e-sisgwaga sui-uksulile, a bur igar-nued imakodo.
46007039	Ome-sui-nikadi, e-sui amba dula gudiile, igar-maidba e-suigi alakwaa gudiguoed. Ar e-sui burgwisardi, a-ome e-itolegeddo ar doa na nikubie, unnila Bab-Jesúsba-naid nikued abelesunnad.
