46007040	Andi an itogua, a-ome bar sui-nikusulile, bur-weligwar gudigusar an itoged. We-an-bemarga-sogedi, Bab Dummad Burba Nuedba bemarga soge an itoged.
46008001	Emigindi bab-dummadga-imaklegedga mas-gulleged-ukmaladsik an bemarga sogbido. Ar nabir sogmardo, “Bela anmar we-igar wisidbimarye.” Dule-ibmar-wisid, na san dummarba imaked, ar sabgueddi, sunna ulubgi anmar-ogannoged.
46008002	Ar dule-wargwen na ibmar wisye gordiile, amba yo ibmar nue wisgu-gudido.
46008003	Ar dule Bab-Dummad-sabele, Bab Dummad na wisdo, we-dule e-sabed.
46008004	Nabirdo, bab-dummadga-imaklegedga mas-gulleged-uked-igar weyobdo. Anmar wisid, bab-dummadga-imakleged, we-napneggi bab-dummad-sunnadsulid, ar unnila Bab-Dummad-sunnad wargwenna gued.
46008005	Ar ibmar-baigan bab-dummadye biledimar-inigwele, igi, we-napneggined-dibe, igi, nibalid-dibe, amar bab-dummadsulid. Ar bab-dummad bukidarye sogmalad, degine, dule-dummagan-nug-nikamalad bukidarbarye,
46008006	ar anmargardi, unnila Bab-Dummad-sunnad wargwenna gued. A-Bab-Dummad anmar-Babad, aginbi bela ibmar danikid, degine, anmar Bab Dummadga dula gudimogad. Degine, Dule-Dummad wargwenna gubalid, Jesucristo, bela abarbi ibmar danibalid, degine, anmar aba dula gudimogad.
46008007	Ar degi-inigwele, we-ibmar dulemar bela wisidbisurmalad. Ar gwenna-gwennaa amba binsaed we-san bab-dummadga-imaklegedga uklesye, degisoggu, we-san bab-dummadga-imaklegedga-uksad gundogu, e-binsaed nollosoggu, iskuddasunnad.
46008008	Ar anmar-mas-gunnedba Bab Dummad anmar-abingasulid. Anmar-mas-gunnedba bur dule-nuedga anmar gunoni-dasulid, anmar-mas-gunsulidba bur dule-iskanaga gunoni-dasurbalid.
46008009	Unnila nue salakarmar, we be-akarsuli-itogedba na be mas-gunmaladi, mer gwenadgan-amba-ulubgi-nollomalad ichogega be imakmalo.
46008010	Ar we-igar bedi wisidba, bab-dummadga-imakleged-neggi, gwenad-wargwen mas gunsii be-dakalir, a-gwenad amba Jesúsgi bensulid nollogwale, ¿sunna a-gwenad bab-dummadga-imaklegedga-san-uklesad gunmogosur be insae? Gunmogodo.
46008011	Ar bedi mag neg-itoged-ular, be-nuggi we-gwenad-e-san-burba be oyogsaoed, ar a-gwenadga Cristo burgwismogad.
46008012	Ar degisoggu, gwenadgan-Jesúsgi-bensulid-amba-nollomalad iskuega be imakele, Cristogi be iskunaimodo.
46008013	Degisoggu, an san-gunnedba, an-gwenad-amba-nollogwad, iskuega an imakele, mer bur san an bar gunnodo, adi melle an-gwenad-iskuega an imakegar.
46009001	¿An Jesús-nuggi-barmilealidsuli? ¿An wargwen an-itogedba gudisuli? ¿Anmar-Dummad-Jesús, an daksasuli? ¿Ar Bab-Jesús-nuggi an arbaed-ular, bemar Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimaladga gunonisursi?
46009002	Ar dule-baiganga an Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilealidsulile, bemargardi an Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilealiddo. Ar bemar Bab-Jesúsgi bensuli-gunonikidba nue oyolenaid, an nue Jesús-nuggi-barmilealidye.
46009003	Ar dulemar-angi-sunmakdimalad-abin weyob an abinsa-daed.
46009004	¿Ar anmardi Bab-Jesúsga-arbaedgi geg mas gun be insae, degine, geg gobbar be insae?
46009005	¿Ar anmardi ome-Bab-Jesúsba-naid geg an nikumar be insae, degi, geg an sedabar be insae, igi Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilearmalad-baigan, Bab-Jesús-urbamar, degine, Cefas, Pedroye-nugbalid, amar na ome-nikamarmoga, degine, eba seddamarmogadyob? ¿Ar anmardi geg deyob imakmarmode?
46009006	An Bab-Jesús-igargi sunmaked-ular, ¿ibiga geg anmar Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilearmalad-baiganyob bennuklemarmoga? ¿Unnila Bernabé-anbo mas-gunned onogegar ibmar-baidgi arbaer-gebde, geb degine Bab-Jesús-igargi arbabali?
46009007	¿Ar doa sordaga arbadii be insae, degine, na dukin bennukbali? ¿Doa uva digdii be insae, degine, ar uva gunnosurbali? ¿Doa sibad-wawaad-edarbed, na e-sibad-wawaad-nunis gobdisur be insae?
46009008	¿We an-ibmar-soged, unnila we-napneggi-dulemar-sogedba an soge? ¿Ar Bab Dummad Moisésga-igar-uksadgi degi-sognaimosursi?
46009009	Ar Moisés-igar-mesisadgi narmakar igar sognaid: Moli-bebe-nikad ibmar-gwag egwirmaknair, mer e-gaya edinno, ar moli ibmar-gwag sunna maoed, na egwirmaknaidba. ¿Ar Bab Dummad unnila moli-bebe-nikad wile-dakedba deyob sogsa be insae?
46009010	Suli, degisuli. Anmargi sunmaknaimogad, we Bab-Dummad-igar-mesisad, anmar-ular deyob igar-mesisad. Ar dule napa imunair, degi, ibmar-gwag egwirmaknair, bato na ulubgi binsanaid, ibmar-gwag na egadga gumogoye.
46009011	¿Ar anmar bemar-abargi san-burbaledga ibmar digele, degite bemar-abargi geg anmar ibmar-sanaled wee be insae?
46009012	Ar baiganbela bemar ibmar edarbediid, anmar bursunna. Anmar bemar-ibmar sunna ebu-inigwele, anmar bemar-ibmar gwen ebudisulid, anmar bur wiledimalad, ar adi Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-Cristogi-soglesad mer bargalegegar.
46009013	¿Ar bemar wichursi, dule-Bab-Dummadse-goled-neggi-arbamaladi, a-neggi-mas-nikad gunmalad, degine, dulemar-Bab-Dummadga-ibmar-gummakar-uklemalad-galugi-arbamalad sunna ibmar-uklesad-e-san gunmogad?
46009014	Amba deyob Bab-Jesús sogsamogad, dulemar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi-sunmakdimalad, agi gudiguoye.
46009015	Degi-inigwele, andi we-igar-maidba an imaksasulid, degine, we-garda an bemarse narmaksisurbalid, adi bemar anga ibmar-ukmalagar. Bab-Jesús-igargi-sunmaked-ular be an-bennukmarye sogele, a-idu an burgwed bur-nabir an itoged, ar Bab-Jesús-igargi-sunmaked bur-weligwar an itoged, amba bemar anga ibmar-uksurmalar.
46009016	Ar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi an sunmakdiidba, wargwen geg na san dummarba an saed, ar ade deyob an sunmaker-gebed. ¡Ar igi an gusale, an Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmaksulilir!
46009017	Degisoggu, ar an yeer-itogedgi an Bab-Jesús-gaya-burba-nuedgi an sunmakdiile, bennukleged-nued an nikuodo. Ar istar-itogedgi an sunmakerdi, ar amba an egi sunmaker-gebed, ar ade deyob anga igar uklesad.
46009018	¿Degite, igi an bennuklesunna? An bennukleged wegiido: Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-Cristogi-soglesadgi an sunmakdiid, binsa, maniginsuli an egi sunmaked, wegi an yeer-itodiid. Ar an sunna Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmaked-ular mani-gae-wilubbin-inigwele, deyob an imakosulid.
46009019	Degisoggu, an-itoleged an gudisunnad, degi-inigwele, bela emar-maiga an gunonikid, adi dulemar bur-bukidar Bab-Jesúsba nagumalagar.
46009020	Judiomarga, Judio na san imaksad, adi Judiomar, Bab-Jesúsba nagumalagar. An Moisés-igar-mesisadba an dasulile, akarsur-inigwele, Moisés-igar-mesisadba an dae na san-imaksad, adi Moisés-igar-mesisadba-nanadimalad Bab-Jesúsba-nagumarmogagar.
46009021	Dulemar-Moisés-igar-mesisadba-dasurmalad-abargi, a-igarba dasuli an na san imaksabalid, adi Bab-Jesúsba nagumarmogagar. Ar Bab-Dummad-igar-maidba an dasurye an sogsulid, an soged, Cristo-igar-maidba an nanadimoye.
46009022	Dule-burba-nollomaladga na burba nollo an imasmogad, adi amar Bab-Jesús-igarba nagumarmogagar. Bela dulemar-damaladgii an na san imaksad, adi bela akar-akar-dulemar-bukwad abakalegi gwenna-gwenna Bab-Jesúsba naguarmalale.
46009023	Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-ular deyob an gudigusad, adi dulemar Bab-Jesúsba nagunonikir, an yeer-itogwichi gumogagar.
46009024	¿Ar bemar wichursi, bela abarmaked-neggi na bengunanair, bela abarmakedbimalad, degi-inigwele, unnila wargwennaa nakwisadbi ibmar-nued sued? Bemar abarmaked imakmar we-ibmar-nued suegar.
46009025	Bela dulemar-na-dodomaladgi-abarmakmalad, bela ibmar na e-bargaedi midamalad. Amar na deyob imakmalad, unnila nabir we-napneggi baisursunna olo-gurgin-berguedbina sognaid-ular. Anmardi olo-gurgin-geg-berguedbina alamaknaid.
46009026	Degisoggu, deyob an abarmaknaid, yogsaar an abarmaksulid, degi, deyob an urwenaibalid, daksuli an yogsaar sarsonaisurbalid.
46009027	Suli, degisuli. An na dukin na san-odurdaknaid, degine, an-san anba-ibmar-imaked an saed, adi melle iskuedse galakuegar, ar abakalegi degiile, an baigan-odurdakdii nanasad, ani an sorba mellealile.
46010001	Gwenadgan, bemar nue insamalo, igi Bab Dummad mogir-urba anmar-dadgan-semai-gusa, degi, igi Demar-Ginnid-nugad-abargi obaksamala, deun demar ega dinnaa imaksagu.
46010002	Degisoggu, bela anmar-dadgan mogirgine, degine, demargine, Bab-Dummad-digi-oglesmaladyob Moisés-igarba nagusmalad.
46010003	Deginbali, bela anmar-dadgan mas-burbaled guchadbimarbalid.
46010004	Degine, bela amar gobed-burbaled gobsadbimarbalid, ar ade akwa-burbaled eba nadap-gusad, agi dii-ainied gobsamalad. Ar we-akwa Cristo-sunnadid.
46010005	Ar degi-inigwele, anmar-dadgan bur-melu Bab-Dummad-yeer-ito imaksasurmalad, degisoggu, a-ular nega-dule-sulidganba anmar-dadgan burgwismarsunnad.
46010006	Ar we-ibmarmar-gusadi, anmar-odurdakega deyob gusad, adi anmar mer ibmar-iskanabina sogegar, igi anmar-dadgan ibmar-iskanabina sogsamaladyob.
46010007	Degine, melle binsa bab-dummadga-imaklegedse be gormalo, igi war-wargwen be-dadgan gusmaladyob. Weyob Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Dulemar ambikusmalad, orgi-moli-sobaledga mas guchamalad, degi, ega gobsamalad, geb a-sorba ega dodonanai-gusmarbalid.
46010008	Degine, melle na be abirgunagwarsuli na be neg-sichigi yoledigumalo, igi be-dadgan gwenna-gwenna degi-gusmala, deun a-ulale mili-dulagwen-gakapaa ibagwen burgwis-gusmalad.
46010009	Degine, melle Bab-Jesús-wilubdaknai-gumarbalo, igi gwenna-gwenna be-dadgan Bab-Dummad-wilubdakbi-guarmalana, deun a-ular naibe-buledgi bukidar warmaksamalad, degi, burgwis-gusmalad.
46010010	Degi, melle Bab Dummadgi urwar be sunmakmalo, igi be-dadgan wargwen-wargwen Bab Dummadgi urwar sunmaksamala, a-ular anger-dule-oburgwedse anmar-dadgan-oburgwiles-gusmalad.
46010011	Ar we-ibmar bela degi-gusadi, anmarga oyonaid, adi anmar mer deyob damalagar, degine, Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naibalid, adi anmarga sogegar, nue salakarmarye, anmar emi neg-dukumosadgi dula-gudidimaladgar.
46010012	Degisoggu, ar dule Bab-Jesús-igargi gannasgwaa na nanadii-itogele, nue salakar, mer iskued sao.
46010013	Be wilubdaklear sogele, be binsao, we-wilubdaklegedgi, baigan wilubdaklesmogad. Ar Bab Dummad gwen galakumaisursoggu, anmarga-wilubdakleged-nagumaid ise-anmargi obichaa-imaked imakosulid. Wilubdakleged anmargi noni-sogele, Bab Dummad anmarga igar-egabaloed, adi anmar wilubdaklegedgi wakinnegar, mer ese galakuegar.
46010014	Degisoggu gwenadgan, an na be-sabemalad, bab-dummadga-imaklegedse-goledgi be wakinmarsun.
46010015	Bemar binsaed-nue-nikaa damaladsoggu, an-ibmar-bega-soged, na be-sunnad egi nue be binsamarmogoed, wede ib-nued-dibe, igi, wede ib-iskana-dibe.
46010016	Anmar uva-nis gobbalile, Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsale, ¿ar wede soglesursi, Cristo-abe-milesadba anmar bato Cristogadmoye? Deginbali, anmar madu-gunnega burwi-burwi mimmialile, ¿ar wede soglesursi, bato anmar Cristogadye?
46010017	Anmar ichesur gumar-inigwele, unnila madu-wargwennaa an guchamalad. Debayobi, anmar ichesulid, san-wargwennaa Cristogi anmar gunonimarmogad.
46010018	Emi Israel-dorgan be dakena, Bab-Dummadga-galugi-ibmar-gummakar-uksamalad guchamalar, ¿oyonaisursi, Bab-Dummadba-mesa akanonimarye?
46010019	Emide, ¿igi an sogsunna? ¿An sogsi, binsa bab-dummadga-imakleged, we gangued-nikaye? ¿An sogsi, binsa bab-dummadga-imaklegedga ibmar-gummakar-ukleged we ib-nuedye? Suli, degi an sogsuli.
46010020	An sognaido, Judiosurmalad ibmar-gummakar-ukmalad, we niaga ukmarye, Bab Dummadgarsurye. An bemar-abesurdo, niaba bemar akanai-gued.
46010021	Ar geg bemar Bab-Jesús-nog gobnai, degi, nia-nog gobnai-gubalid. Degine, Bab-Jesús-mesagi mas-gunsii, degi, nia-mesagi mas-gunsii geg bemar gumarbalid.
46010022	¿Ar ade bemargi Bab Dummad nobgubi be abemarsi? ¿Ar ade anmar Bab Dummadba bur dutusursi? Suli, degisuli.
46010023	Belagwapa sunna ibmar an saed, degi-inigwele, belagwapa ibmar-nueganbisulid. Belagwapa sunna ibmar an saed, degi-inigwele, belagwapa ibmar-nueganbi anga guosulid.
46010024	Melle na be dukin begadbi-ibmar-nued-imakedgi be binsamalo, suli, aimar-baigangi be binsamarmogoed.
46010025	San-ukleged-neggi bela san-ukleged be gunmar, mer be egismar wede binsa bab-dummadga-imaklegedga we-san ukles sogeye, adi be-ulubgi mer be ichakwa be itogegar.
46010026	Ar ade we-napneg-naid, degine, bela egi ibmar-bukwadi, Bab Dummadgadid.
46010027	Dule-wargwen-Bab-Jesúsba-naisulid mas-gunnega bese gochale, be nabiele, be naoed. Bela bega mas-gunned ukalile, be gunnoed, mer be egisoed, we bab-dummadga-imaklegedga ukles sogeye, ar adi mer ichakwa ulubgi be itogegar.
46010028	Ar dule-wargwen bega sokalirdi: “We-mas, bab-dummadga-imaklegedga uklesye,” adi mer be gunnoed, ar dule bega sogsad-ular, degine, ulubgi egi be binsaed-ular. Ar ade we-napneg-naid, degine, bela egi ibmar-bukwadi Bab Dummadgadid.
46010029	An sogedi, be-ulubgi-binsaed-ular an sogsulid. Suli, dule-baid-ulubgi-binsaed-ular an soged. Dule-wargwen sunna sogdagoed: “¿Ibiga an wargwen yeer-itodiid dule-baid angi akar-binsaed-ular angi ichakwa sunmakledagoe?
46010030	Ar Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye mas-gunned-idu an sogele, ¿ibiga degite angi ichakwa sunmakledabalosunna, ar mas-gunned-iduar dog-nuedye Bab Dummadga an sogsasursi?”
46010031	Degisoggu, be mas gun-dibe, igi, be gob-dibe, ibu be imak-dibe, bela Bab-Dummad-nug-odummogega imaked be sae.
46010032	Judiomar-dibe, degi, Judiosurmalad-dibe, igi, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-dibe, mer be-nuggi iskuega be imakoed.
46010033	Andi an gudigu, bela an ibmar-saedi, dulemar-baigan yeer-ito an imakbied, unnila anginbi an binsabisulid, adi bukidar Bab-Jesúsba abonolemarmogagar.
46011001	An-daedba be damar, igi an Cristo-daedba gudimoga.
46011002	Gwenadgan an be-nug ogannomar, ar bemar an-iedisurmalad, degine, igi an be-odurdaksamala, amba bemar deyob nue ganimalad.
46011003	Bemar nue-wisgubi an be-abemardo, Cristo we bela-machergan-e-nonoga gued, degine, machergan, omegan-nonoga gumogad, degine, Bab Dummad Cristo-nonoga gusimogad.
46011004	Bela dule-machergan nonogi-gurgin-sii Bab Dummadse golele, igi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba barsogele, gwen nabirsurdo, e-nonogi istar binsananaiyobdo, Cristogi-dodonaiyob gunaido.
46011005	Ar omedi nono-dunwesuli Bab Dummadse gorgwichile, igi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-barsoggwichile, gwen nabirsulid, e-nonogi istar binsananaiyob gunaido, ar sailagia-gwiri na isayobdo.
46011006	Ar ome-wargwen na e-nono dunwesulile, bur bela saila-gwiri-siked nabirid. Ar ome na saila-siked binge-itogele, igi, nono-gwiri-saed binge-itogele, ar degirdi na nono dunwesundo.
46011007	Ar machereddi nono-dunwed abelesulid, ar ade Bab-Dummad-yopiraa-dakleged-wilub na san-sediid, degine, dule-macheredba Bab-Dummad-nug ogannolegoed. Machereddi e-omeba nug ogannolemogoed.
46011008	Ar machered omegi danisulid, ome macheredgi danikid.
46011009	Deginbali, Bab Dummad, machered omega obinnissulid, Bab Dummad, ome macheredga obinnisad.
46011010	Degisoggu, a-ulale ome e-nono dunwer-gebed, adi mag daklegegar, machered-urbalii daed, deginbali, angermar dakmogagar, ome machered-urbalii nanadiiye.
46011011	Degi-inigwele, anmar Bab-Jesús-nuggindi, machergan omegansuli geg gued, degi, omegan machergansuli geg gumogad.
46011012	Ar igi ome macheredgi daniki, deyob machered omegi gwalulenonimogad. Ar degite belagwapa Bab Dummadgi danimalad.
46011013	Bemar-sunnad nue itomarmogana, ¿ar wede nabiri ome Bab Dummadse nono-dunwarsuli goled?
46011014	¿Ar macherganga gusgu igar maisursi, sailagia-suitigwar gwen nabiridsurye, na wargwen binged amiedye?
46011015	Ar omegangardina sailagia-suitii-saed bur nabirid, ar sailagia ega uklesad, nono edugegar.
46011016	Ar degite, dule-wargwen we-igargi abin-abin sunmakbiele, unnila an bemarga sogdo, anmar igar-baidgi gwen odurdakdisurye, degi, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad danar-ambikunoni-damalad, Bab Dummadse goledsik, igar-baid nikasurbarye.
46011017	We-ibmar an bemarga sogsokalidsikdi, an bemar-nug gwen odummosurmardo. Ar bemar ambikualile, an itogua, gwen ibmar-nuedga be ambikusurmalad, ibmar-ichogega be imakde-damalad.
46011018	Anga sogmardo, bemar Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad danar ambikunonikile, na be danar-danar abinsabukwa-gud-damarye. An insagua, ar bemar abala deyob gubuk an insado.
46011019	Ar dakargua, bemar-abargi na danar-danar ambikuer-gebed, adi mag daklegegar, doamar nue Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-sunnadi.
46011020	Ar bemar danar ambikunonimalale, bemar Bab-Jesús-burgwisad e-binsaega mas-gunye sogmalan-inigwele, gwen aga be ambikunoni-dasurmalad.
46011021	Ar bemar mas-gunned-wachi mosale, gwenna-gwenna na eginbi binsamarsoggu, abala amba ukumada besdamalad, abala, doggusadba, mungud-damalad.
46011022	¿Ar bemar neg-niksursi, na be-neggi mas gunmalagar, degi, be-neggi na be gobmalagar? Ar bemar degi-daed-ulale, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-Bab-Dummadse-golega-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-e-nug bemar ichobukmalad, degine, gwenadgan-wilemalad obingesabukmalad. ¿Igi an bemarga sogo be insae, an be-nug odummomaloe? Suli, wesikdi geg an be-nug odummomalad.
46011023	Bab-Jesús-sunnad anga uksad, a an bemar-odurdaksamarmogad: Dummad-Jesús darba-uklesad mutik, madu susa-gusad,
46011024	Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogsad-sorba, madu biske-biske imaksad, degi, sogded: “Be gunmar, we an-san, bemar-ular weyob ichimaksad. Weyob be imakdii-gumalo, adi bemar an-insamalagar.”
46011025	Mas-guchad-sorba Jesús amba deyob nog susbar. Geb sogdebar: “We-gobeddina an-abegi Bab Dummad dulemar-ebo igar-bini-mesisad-e-wilubganad. Gobed-irba weyob be gobmaloed, adi angi be binsamalagar.”
46011026	Degisoggu, we-madu be gunnarmalale, degi, we-gobed be gobbarmalale, Bab-Jesús-burwisad-igar bemar oyonaid, Bab-Jesús-gannar-danikoed-ibase.
46011027	Degisoggu, doa-dule igarsuli, dodoakwaa we-madu guchale, degi, igarsuli gobed gobsale, a-dule Bab-Jesús-abegi, degi, e-sangi nue iskusdo.
46011028	Degisoggu, a-ulale wargwen-wargwen na be dukin ulubgi dakmar, na be iskudii-dibe, geb a-sorba madu gunnoed, degi, geb a-sorba be goboed.
46011029	Ar dule-wargwen iskued-nika we-madu gunnele, degi, gobele, Bab-Jesús-sangi binsasulid-ular, na dukin san wiononikoed.
46011030	A-ulale bemar bukidar ueledimalad, degi, yegus be itodimalad, deginbali, bukidargus burgwemarsunnad.
46011031	Ar an na dukin-dukin ulubgi na dakmalana, Bab-Jesús sabsur anmar-odurdaknai-gussuliled.
46011032	Ar Bab-Jesús anmar wilub-daker, anmar iskus-dibe, igi, iskussur-dibe, anmar-odurdaknonisunnoed, adi mer anmar dule-baigan-Bab-Jesúsba-naisurmaladba degi-sadegu sabsur odurdaklesii-gumogagar.
46011033	Degisoggu gwenadgan, bemar danar mas-gunnega ambikunonikile, na be muchub-muchub edarbemar.
46011034	Ar dule-wargwen ukurba-itogele, na e-neggi mas gundo, adi mer Bab Dummad bemar-sabsur-odurdakmalagar, bemar danar ambikumalar. Igar-baigandi an modapile, an bemarga nudakdapoed.
46012001	Gwenadgan, Bab-Dummad-anmarga-gurgin-burbaled-uked gwen wichuli gudigubisur an be-abemardo.
46012002	Ar bemar nue wismalad, amba bemar Bab-Jesús-wichuli gudimargu, bab-dummadga-imakleged-geg-sunmaked, ase bemar ebipiledii-gusmarmoga.
46012003	Emigindi nue wisgubi an be-abemardo, Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-ganguedba dule geg Bab-Jesús-ukabsaed, degine, na e-itolegedba geg sogbalid, “Jesús, Bur-Dule-Dummadye,” ar Bab Dummad Burba Nued ega soger-gebed, degi-be-sogye.
46012004	Nabir, gurgin-burbaled akar-akar nika-inigwele, unnila Bab Dummad Burba Nueddi wargwennaa gued.
46012005	Ar Bab-Dummadga-arbaed akar-akar nika-inigwele, unnila Bab-Jesúsdi wargwennaa gued.
46012006	Ar Bab-Dummadga-arbaed-imaked akar-akar nika-inigwele, ar Bab Dummaddi bela-anmargi-ibmar-imaked unnila wargwennaa gued.
46012007	Ar Bab Dummad Burba Nued gurgin-burbaledba anmarga oyoged, ede nue anmarba gudiiye, adi gwenadgan bela egi nabir bendaklemalagar.
46012008	Dule-wargwenga, Bab Dummad Burba Nued, binsaed-nikaa-sunmaked ega uked. Baidgardi, nue-ibmar-wisid ega ukmogad, ar Bab Dummad Burba Nueddi wargwennado.
46012009	Ar amba Bab Dummad Burba Nued dule-baidga, nue Jesúsgi-bensuli-nanaed ega uked. Degi, baidgardi, dule-uelemalad-sunna-nudaked ega ukmogad.
46012010	Bab Dummad Burba Nued baidgardi, ibmar-dakledisurmalad-sunna-imaked ega uked. Baiddi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-barsoged. Baidmoga, nabir mag itoged, we Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nuedgad-dibe, igi, we burbamar-iskanagad-dibe. Degine, baidgarmoga, nabir gaya-baid-baid sunmaked, deginbali, baidmoga, nabir gaya-baid oduloged.
46012011	Ar bela we-gurgin-burbaled-akar-akar-nikad-mimmiedi unnila wargwennaa gued, Bab Dummad Burba Nuedbi. Degine, na e-itolegedba ukbalid, doamarga we-gurgin-burbaled na nue ukbiedba.
46012012	Ar igi anmar-sana wargwennaa gue, degite eba-akanimalad bukidar gued. Eba-akanimalad bukidar-gue-inigwele, sandi unnila wargwennaa gued, amba Cristo deyobmogad.
46012013	Ar anmar bela unnila Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-wargwennaa-guedgi oglesmalad, agi anmar bela san-wargwennaa gunonikid, igi, Judio-dibe, igi, Judiosur-dibe, igi, mai-dibe, igi, maisur-dibe, bela anmargi Bab Dummad Burba Nued ubosadbimalad.
46012014	Deginbali anmar-sangi-akananaid unnila wargwennaa gusulid, suli, bukidar egi akananaid.
46012015	Ar mali sokar-dibe: “Ar an argansursoggu, an san-sordasurye.” Ar degi-sogedba, soglesurdo, mali, san-sordasurye.
46012016	Ar uaya sokar-dibe: “Ar an ibya-sursoggu, an san-sordasurye.” Ar degi-sogedba, soglesurdo, uaya, san-sordasurye.
46012017	Ar bela anmar-san ibyabiile, ¿igi anmar itosarsunna? Ar bela anmar-san uayabiile, ¿igi anmar ibmar usarsunna?
46012018	Ar Bab Dummad emigindi na e-itolegedba anmar-sangi na eba-akananaid nasiksad.
46012019	Ar belagwapa anmar-sangi-akananaid emarbina, ¿bia anmar-san nagusarsunna?
46012020	Ar emigindi anmar-sangi-akananaid bukidar-inigwele, unnila anmar-sandi wargwennaa gued.
46012021	Geg ibya arganga soged: “An be-abesurye, an wargwen unniye.” Degi, nono geg malimarga sogmogad: “An be-abesurmarye, an wargwen unniye.”
46012022	Ar anmar-sangi-akananaid bur-nollo-daklemalad, amar bur-nue abelemalad.
46012023	Anmar-sangi-akananaid bur-baisurdaklemalad, a bur anmar ega nue mor yodamalad, degi, anmar-abgan-daklebisur-abeleged, a anmar odukuar, ise ega mor-yoigu sedidamalad.
46012024	Ar anmar-san-odukuarsulir-baisur-dakleged, adi ega mor-yosulir akarsulid. Bab Dummad ibiyobi anmar-san imaksa, bur baisur-dakleged, aka-bur-nue akwega anmar-imaksad, ega nue-mor-yoe anmar-imaksad.
46012025	Adi melle anmar-sangi-akananaid na muchub-muchub ega sogmalagar, an-bur nue abelegedye. Bela anmar-sangi-akananaid na bela bendakedbimalad.
46012026	Degisoggu, anmar-sangi-akananaid-gwensak, ibmar nunmak-itogele, bela eba nunmaked itodamarmogad. Ar gwensak ega nug odummolenaile, bela eba weligwar itodamarmogad.
46012027	Ar degisoggu, bemar Cristo-sanga gumarsunnad, degi, eba gwenna-gwenna akananaidga gumarbarsunnad.
46012028	Bab Dummad, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-abargi gwenna-gwenna nug imaksad: Gebe, Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilearmalad, a-sorba, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemalad, degine, odurdaked-sailamar, a-sorba, ibmar-dakledisulid-imakmalad, degine, sunna dule-gegumair-nudakmalad, degine, dulemar-gadi-bendakmalad, dulemar-neg-akwemalad, degine, dulemar gaya-baid-baid-nabir-sunmakmalad.
46012029	¿Ar ade bela Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilealidbimarsi? ¿Ar ade bela Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-berbemaladbimarsi? ¿Ar ade bela odurdaked-sailabimarsi? ¿Ar bela ibmar-dakledisurmalad-imakedbimarsi?
46012030	¿Ar bela dule-gegumair-nudakedbimarsi? ¿Ar ade bela gaya-baid-baid-sunmakedbimarsi? ¿Ar bela sunna gaya-baid-baid-odulogedbimarsi? Suli, degisuli.
46012031	Degisoggu, gurgin-burbaled-nued bur be amimarsun. Emigindi, andi bemarga bur igar-birigined-nued oyomaloed.
46013001	Igi-dibe, sunna dulemar-gaya-baid-baid-sunmakmalad an sunmak-dibe, degine, angermar-gaya an wisbar-dibe, ar degite, sabedgi an imaksulile, an binsa esnon ee oimakeyob, degine, bormo-matargana na abin-abin sarsolenaiyob an gudiido.
46013002	Igi, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba an abingasad, an baiganga uk-dibe, degine, bela ibmarmar-dukuar-mamaid an wisbar-dibe, degine, ibmarmar-bela-sunna-wisguleged an wisgunonibar-dibe, degine, bela ulubgi bensulidba sunna yarmar an onnirbar-dibe, ar sabedgi an imaksulile, binsa an gudiido.
46013003	Igi, an bela-ibmar-nuegan-an-nikad an bela wileganga uk-dibe, degine, an-san-ogumaklegegala an ukbar-dibe, ar sabedgi an imaksulile, bela we ibmarmar-binsaleddo.
46013004	Dulemar-sabguedi weyobid: Na urwed bargaed, nued-binsaedgi dulemar-bendaked, geg nobgued, geg na san dummarba itoged, degine, geg baiganba dummarba na san imaked.
46013005	Geg gwinni-gwinni daed, ibmar imakalir, geg eginbi binsaed, geg gwae-gwae urwed, degine, dule egi nosale geg bar ebinsaed, egi nosad nossulidyob dakde-daed.
46013006	Dule-baigan-iskuedgi geg wergued, unnila igar-napiragwadginbi wergued.
46013007	Dulemar sabguedi bela ibmar-nunmaked-abin burdi-daed, bela ibmar bensur-daed, bela bensulidgi edarbedii-daed, degine, bela ibmar-naibid-abin burdi-daed.
46013008	We sabgued-igar geg bergued, degi-sadeguoed. Ibagan-danikoed, yo-ibmar-guoedgi-sunmaked-igardi bergudoed, gaya-baid-baid-sunmaklemalad bar sunmaklegosulid, degine, ibmar-nue-wisi-gumalad bergudmogoed.
46013009	Ar emigindi abala ibmar an wismalad, degi, iche-iche yo-ibmar-guoedgi an sunmakmalad.
46013010	Ar bela ibmar-napiramalad nonikirdi, we-ibmar-amba-akuarmalad bergudoed.
46013011	An bipigwaunni, bipiganayob an sunmaksad, bipiganayob an binsasad, bipiganayob ibmar an daksad. An dule-macheredga an gunonigu, bar mimmiganayob an dae-gussulid.
46013012	Emigindi ispe-sunnasulidgi ibmar bole-bole dakeyob Bab-Dummad-ibmar an dakmalad. Ibagan danikoed, anmar na dule nue-asabin na dakeyob Bab-Dummad-ibmar daknonikoed. Emigindi bukidar amba an wichurmalad, igi Bab Dummad an-wisi, yoedsedi deyob an Bab-Dummad-wisgunonimogoed.
46013013	Emigindi, Bab-Dummad-bensulid-igar, nue-bensulidgi Bab-Jesúsgi ibmar-nuegan edarbediid-igar, degine, sabgued-igar, wemar-sogbaagwadi, na sadeguoed. Ar degite, wemar-sogbaagwad, sabgued-igar bur emargi obinsiid.
46014001	Degisoggu, bela-bela dulemar-baigan-sabgudii be nanamarsun. Degine, gurgin-burbamalad Bab-Dummad-uked, abina bur-bule be sogmar. Bur-bule Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-barsogedbina be itoge-wilubmalad.
46014002	Ar dule gaya-baid-baid sunmakele, Bab Dummadga sunmaked, dulemarga sunmaksulid, ar dulemar aku e-itoged, ar Bab Burba Nuedba ibmar-dukuar-maidgi sunmaked.
46014003	Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasadgi sunmakerdi, adi dulemarga sunmakdo, dulemar-odurdakegar, dulemar-ogannogegar, degi, dulemar-bukib-binsadiid yeer-ito imakegar.
46014004	Ar gaya-aku-an-itomalad dule sunmakele, unnila we-dule na dukin e-burba-ogannogega sunmaked, dule Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasadgi sunmakerdi, adi Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad danar-ambikunoni-damalad-e-burba-ogannogega sunmak-daed.
46014005	Degisoggu, bitigi bemar belagwable gaya-baid-baid sunmakmalana-gadin, degi-inigwele, bur-bule bemar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasadgi sunmakega gumalana-gadin. Ar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasadgi-sunmaked bur-sunsogedid, dule-gaya-baid-baid-sunmakedba, degine, odulobalirdi nabirdo, adi nabir Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-e-burba ogannogegar. Ar deyob be imakerdi, geb ebo emar gunonikoed.
46014006	A-ulale, gwenadgan, ar bemarse an ataknadele, bemar gaya-itodisulidgi an sunmakdele, ¿ar wede ib-nuedga bemarga guosi? Suli, ib-nuedga bemarga guosuli. Ar Bab-Dummad-bemar-ibmar-wisgubi-abemaidgi an bemarga sunmakerdi nabirdo, ibmar-nue-wisidgin-dibe, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba an abingasadgin-dibe, bemar-odurdakedginbar-dibe, amardi nueddo. Ar degisulile, binsa an bemarga gaya-baidgi sunmakdapo-itole.
46014007	Ar garmar-sunna-ogorlemaladse-bakar sunna gormalad, gammu-dibe, igi, gar-duba-nikad-dibe, ar nue gorsulile, ¿igi mag be itogoe igid gar gornai?
46014008	Deginbali, gar-trompeta goter, sordamarga-sogegar ibi-imakmaloe, we-gar-goled aku itolegele, ¿ibi-saega gornai, doa-sordamar urwenaega guagwar ambikusarsunna? Guagwar ambikussurmalale.
46014009	Ar amba bemar deyobmodo, ar be-gaya-sunmakedba ibmar-bied aku-itolegele ¿igi mag itolegosunna ibu be obare? Ar unnila binsa ee burwaga be sunmakodo.
46014010	We-napneggi bukidar-gaya-baid-baid-sunmakleged nika an insado, degine, bela mag itolegedbido ibi na obarmala.
46014011	Ar dule-anga-sunmaked mag an itosulir, a-dule-anbo-gaya-emar-sunmaksuliyobdo.
46014012	Ar bemarga amba deyobmodo. Ar bemar gurgin-burbarmalad nue abebuksoggu, bemar gurgin-burbaled nabir Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-ogannomalad-bina bur-bule be sogmarsundo.
46014013	Degisoggu, dule-wargwen gaya-dule-aku-itoged sunmak-dibe, Bab Dummadse egisbardo, nabir gaya oduloged-igar.
46014014	Ar gaya-dulemar-itodisulidgi Bab Dummadse an gor-dibe, an-san-burbadi Bab Dummadse gornaido, ar an-mag-itogedgindi gwen an gannalegosurdo.
46014015	¿Degite, igi an saosunna? Burbar Bab Dummadse an golodo, degine, mag-itogedgi an Bab Dummadse gorbalodo. An namaker, burbar an namakodo, degine, mag-itogedgi an namakbalodo.
46014016	Ar Bab-Dummad-nug unnila burbar be oganno-gwichile, ¿igi dule-be-abargi-gwichid, “Degina-nabirinye” sogosunna? Ar aku be itoged, ibi be sogsa.
46014017	Ar bedi na dog-nuedye Bab Dummadga sognaido, dule-baiddi gwen Bab-Dummad-nuggi gannalegosulid.
46014018	Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye an sogdo, ar bemarba bur-bule gaya-baid-baid an sunmakgu.
46014019	Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-abargindina unnila giakwasaar an sunmakoed, mag an-ito sunmakgwichi an gued bur-nabirid, agi gwenadgan-odurdakgwichi, bur suitii gaya-aku-itogedba sunmakgwichi-guedba.
46014020	Gwenadgan, bemar-binsaedgi mer mimmiganyob be binsamar. Iskuedsikdi mimmiganyob be damardo, be-binsaedgindi, dule-machergan-binsaedyob na be binsamardo.
46014021	Moisés-igargi-narmakar naid: Bab Dummad soged: “We Israel-dulemarga, gaya-baidgi, degine, gwabin-baidgi an sunmakoed, ar degite gwen an-itogosurmalad.”
46014022	Degisoggu, gaya-baidgi-sunmakedi, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimaladgarsulid. Oyoged, dulemar-Bab-Jesúsgi-amba-bengudimaladgar. Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-barsogeddi, dule-Bab-Jesúsgi-amba-bengudimaladgarsulid. Oyoged, dulemar-Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimaladgar.
46014023	Ar ade Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad Bab-Dummadse-golega bela danar ambikunonikile, bela gaya-baid-baid sunmakedbimalale, dule-yogsaled-dibe, igi, dule-Bab-Jesúsba-naisulid-dibe, bemar-abargi dognonikile, ¿bemargi sogosur be insae, bemar goelle bukmarye?
46014024	Ar bela bemar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad barsogedbimalale, degi, dule-wargwen-Bab-Jesúsba-naisulid-dibe, igi, dule-binsaled-dibe, dognonikile, bemar-ibmar-sogedba e-iskudiid mag na itogoed.
46014025	E-gwage-ulubgi-iskued-dukuar-naid sanar oyolenonikoed, degi, na yokorgi sindigar Bab-Dummad-asabin signonikoed, Bab-Dummad-nug odummogegar. Geb degi sogdagoed: “Nue-napiragwad bemar-abargi Bab Dummad gudiiye.”
46014026	Degite gwenadgan, ¿igi an bemarga sogosunna? Ar bemar danar ambikunonikile, bemar nikadamalad, gwenna-gwenna namaked, baiddi sunna Bab-Jesús-igargi odurdaked, baiddi sunna gaya-baid-baidgi sunmaked, baiddi sunna gaya-baid-baidgi-sunmaked oduloged, degi, baiddi sunna Bab-Dummad-ibmar-dukuar-bukwad odaloged. Ar bela bemar wemar imake-wilubmalad, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad ogannogegar.
46014027	Ar bemar gaya-baid-baidgi sunmakele, unnila warbo, igi, warbaa-dibe, sunmake-wilubbid, degine, baid-sunmaksad-sorba geb baid sunmake-wilubmogad. Deginbali, gwensak ega oduloge-wilubbalid, wede ibu obare.
46014028	Ar dule-e-oduloged sulile, mer bur Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunonimalad-abargi sunmakodo, unnila na dukin egarbi ibmar sogodo, degine, Bab Dummadgarbibar.
46014029	Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-berbemalad amba deyobmodo, unnila warbo, igi, warbaa-dibe, sunmakoed, baigandi nue bar itogoed, bule-nue nabir soggwis-dibeye.
46014030	Ar dule-gwensak-siidgala Bab Dummad ibmar-soggwen oyononi-dibe, dule-sunmakgwichid mer bar sunmakodo, adi dule ibmar-soggwen Bab-Dummad-ega-ibmar-oyosad sogegar.
46014031	Ar bela bemar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba sunna wargwen-wargwen baid-sunmaksad-sorba sogedbimalad, adi bela bemar durdakmalagar, degi, bela bemar na burba ogannomalagar.
46014032	Ar ade Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-berbemalad na e-burba bargae-wilubmalad.
46014033	Ar Bab Dummad dule-ibmar-obured-dule-sulid, suli, Bab Dummad dule ibmar inikii saed-duled. Ar igi Jesucristogi-akananaimalad danar-ambikunoni-damalad bela damaladyob,
46014034	bemar danar ambikunonimalale, omegan bogidik sigmalo, mer sunmakmalo. Ar omegan Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunonimaladgi sunmaked ega igar maisulid, ar Moisés-igar deyob narmakar sogmaimogad, omegan machergan-urbaligwaa nanaoye.
46014035	Ar omegan ibmar wisgubiele, e-neggi e-suise na egisoed. Ar ade sunnasur-dakleged, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunonimaladgi omegan sunmaked.
46014036	An wisdo, an-bemarga-ibmar-sogedba yapa be imakmaloed. ¿Ar bemarbi akarguode? ¿Ar bemargi Bab-Dummad-gaya-burbade ainiarsi? ¿Ar unnila bemarsebi Bab-Dummad-gaya-burbade warmaksasi?
46014037	Ar dule-gwensak na Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-berbeged itogele, igi, na gurgin-burbaled-nika itogele, we an-bemarse-narmaked mag-itoge-wilubdo, ar we Bab-Dummad-igar-uked-sunnadye.
46014038	Ar we an-bemarga-sogedi, a-dule abingabisulile, mer bemar e-ibmar-soged abingamogodo.
46014039	Degisoggu gwenadgan, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-abingasad-berbeged bur be imakbi be itomardo. Deginbali, mer be bargamar, ar dule gaya-baidgi sunmakbier.
46014040	Ar degi-inigwele, bela igar-nikaa, nuekwaa be ibmar-imakmardo.
46015001	Gwenadgan, emigindi an bemarga sogbar, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi an bemarga sunmakapidgi, bemar A-gaya-burba-nued abingasmalad, emigi amba agi bemar nanadimalad.
46015002	Deginbali, ar an bemarga sunmakapidgi, ar bemar amba a-gaya-burba-nuedgi nue nanadiile, bemar agi abonolesmardo, ar unnila askinbi bemar bengussurmalar.
46015003	Igi an odurdaklesmoga, ayob an bemar-odurdaksamarmogad: Cristo anmar-iskued-ular burgwisad, igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naidyob, deyob gunonikid.
46015004	Cristo napa-urba diglesad, degine, ibapaagi gannar durgusad, igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naidyob, deyob gunonikid.
46015005	Cristo gannar durgusgu, Cefasse na magarosad. A-Cefasde Pedroye-nugbalid. A-sorba Cristo e-ambe-gakabogwadse na magarosbalid.
46015006	A-sorba gwenadgan-e-dula-ataled-ilatar-gwena-bukwadse magarosbalid, a-gwenadgan amba bukidar dula gudidiid, abar bato burgwismarbalid.
46015007	A-sorba Santiagose Jesús na magarosad, a-sorbali e-nuggi-barmilesmaladse na magarosbalid.
46015008	Geb a-sorba, napidgi, Cristo anse magarosmogad, an dule-wargwen igar-suli yo-e-ibagan-moe gwalulesayob an gunonikid.
46015009	Ar ani an Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilesmalad-e-solabalid an itodo. Deginbali, an Jesús-nuggi-barmilealidye nugsalege-wilubsulinad, ar ade Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-Bab-Dummadse-golega-danar-ambikunoni-damalad baregindii an gusad-duled.
46015010	Ar Bab Dummad nabir angi binsae-wilubsulinad, ar emigindi nabir angi binsanonikid. A-ular weyob an gudisunnad. Binsa Bab Dummad nabir angi binsassulid, ar ade emarba an bur-bule arbasad. Ar ani an arbassulid, Bab Dummad nabir angi binsasadba an deyob arbasad.
46015011	Degisoggu, an-dibe, igi, Jesús-nuggi-barmilearmalad-baigan-dibe, anmar bemarga weyob Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmaksamalad, degine, bemar weyob A-gaya-burba-nued abingasmalad.
46015012	Ar Cristogi sunmaklediir, Cristo burgwisgu, gannar durgusye, ¿ar degite ibiga bemar-abargi gwen-gwen sogsunna, dule burgwisar, geg gannar bar durguye?
46015013	Ar dule burgwisar, geg gannar bar durguele, Cristo burgwisgu, gannar bar durgussurmodo.
46015014	Ar Cristo gannar durgussulile, binsa Bab-igargi anmar sunmakdido, degine, bemar binsa Cristogi bensuli-gudimardo.
46015015	Degisoggu, anmar gakanba binsa Bab-Dummad-barsogdimarsundo, ar ade anmar sogdiid, “Bab Dummad Cristo-burgwisad gannar odulosye.” Bab Dummad Cristo-odulossurdo, ar burgwismalad gannar durgusulir.
46015016	Ar burgwismalad geg gannar durguele, Cristo gannar durgussurmodo.
46015017	Ar Cristo gannar durgussulile, binsa bemar Jesúsgi bensuli-gudimardo, ar degisoggu, amba bemar be-iskuedgi gudimarsundo.
46015018	Ar degisoggu, Cristoba-nai-burgwismalad abonolessurmarmosundo.
46015019	Ar Cristo unnila we-napnegginedginbi anmarga ibmar-nuedga guele, anmar bela dulemar-we-napnegginmaladba nue wiledimardo.
46015020	Emigindi Cristo dule-burgwismalad-abargi gannar durgusad. Cristo gannar durgusadgi, dule-burgwismalad-iduedga gunonisunnad.
46015021	Ar dule-wargwengi burgwed-igar nonisoggu, dule-wargwengi gannar-durgued-igar nonibardo.
46015022	Ar igi bela dulemarga Adángi burgwed-igar noniki, debayobi bela dulemar Cristogi durgunonimaloed.
46015023	Dule-burgwismalad Bab-Dummad-igar-mesisadba gannar durgunonimaloed: Cristo-inse durgusad, geb a-sorba Cristoba-nanaimalad gannar durgunonikoed, Cristo na eba-nanaimalad sudanikir.
46015024	Degi geb neg-bergued nonikoed, bela burbar-dummagan-neg-semamaid, bela burbar-sailaganga-gumaid, degine, bela burbar-gandikidba-gangued-nikmalad osulosar, geb degi Cristo na e-ganguedba neg-dakmaid, e-Bab, Bab-Dummadga-gumaidga na uknonikoed.
46015025	Ar Cristo neg-semai guer-gebed, bela e-istarmalad-birgi nakwedse.
46015026	Cristo solaba e-istarad-napi-osulogoedi, burgwed.
46015027	Ar bela Bab Dummad Cristo-nag-urba ibmar-urbisad. Degisoggu, mag itoledo, Bab Dummaddi Cristo-urbaligwaa gunonisulid, ar ade Bab Dummad bela Cristo-urba ibmar urbisad.
46015028	Ar bela ibmar Cristo-urba urbilesale, geb Cristo na e-sunnad, na Bab-Dummad-Machi, Bab-Dummad-urbaligwaa na nanadoed, ar ade Bab Dummad bela Cristoga ibmar uksad. Geb agi bela Bab-Dummad-sogedba ibmar gunonisunnoed.
46015029	Ar deginbali, ¿degite ibiga burgwemalad-anar Bab-Jesús-digi-ogleged-igar imakmarsunna, ar dule-burgwarmalad gannar durgusulir? ¿Ar ibiga degite burgwemalad-anar Bab-Jesús-digi-ogleged-igar imakmarsunna?
46015030	¿Ar degite ibiga anmar wachi-iliba boni-abargi gudimarsunna?
46015031	Gwenadgan, napira an bemarga soged, ar igi weligwar an itoge, bemar Dummad-Jesucristoba-naidba, ayob an napira an bemarga sogbalid, an bane-bane burgwednaga gudibalid.
46015032	Ar unnila dule-macheredyob Efesogi achu-sapurbarmaladba an gar-itodii-gusale, ¿ar ibi-nued an egi amissunna, ar burgwarmalad gannar durgusulir? Ar burgwarmalad gannar durgusulir, degiir dulemar-sogmaladyob an damarmosundo: An wergumarsundo, An mas gunmarsundo, degi, an gobmarsundo, ar ade bane an burgwemaloed.
46015033	Mer be yardaklemar: “Dulemar-nuegan dulemar-iskanaba akaele, iskuddamalad.”
46015034	Nue be binsamar, mer be bar iskumar, iskuedgi be nomar. Bemar-obingesaegala an bemarga soged, ar bukidar amba Bab-Dummad-wichuli gudimalad.
46015035	Ar gwenna-gwenna sunna egisdamaloed, degite: “¿Dule-burgwismalad igi gannar durguoe? ¿Igi e-san daklegosunna?”
46015036	Ibmar-wichurmaladyob be gudimalad: Ar ibmar-gwag niegala be digedi, ¿bina ibmar-gwag-e-uka burgwe dasursi?
46015037	Ibmar be digedi, sapi-sunnad be digsulid, e-gwag be diged, ibu-gwag be digo-dibe, oros-gwag-sunnaa-dakleged-dibe, oros-gwag-dibe.
46015038	Ar Bab Dummad ega e-san ukeddi na igi-dakle ega ukbiedba ega uked. Degine, ibmar-gwaggala na egad-egad e-san ega uked.
46015039	Ar sanmar belagwapa emarbi daklesulid. Dulemar-san akar dakleged, ibdula-sanmar akar daklemogad, ibmar-gukuarmalad-san akarmogad, degine, uamar-san akarmogad.
46015040	Amba deyobmodo, nibneggined san-nikmogad, degine, napneggined san-nikmogad. Nibneggined-e-san-e-dakleged, degi, napneggined-e-san, eba akar dakleged, degine, yeer-dakleged eba akarbalid.
46015041	Dad-ibeler-gaed, nii-gaed-ebo, akalad, degine, niskwamar-gaed amba akarmogad. Ar na niskwamar na akar-akar gamalad.
46015042	Amba deyobmodo, dule-gannar-durguedsik. Dule-burgwisar diglesar, e-san nungudoed, ar gannar-durgusad-sorbardi bar nunguosulid.
46015043	Degi, dule-san istar-daklegedgi digleged. Durgunonikogudi, yeer-dakle durgunonikoed. Dule-san nollogwadgi digleged. Durgunonikir, nollosulidgi durgunonikoed.
46015044	Degine, dule burgwisar, e-san-we-napneggined digleged. Durgudagogudi, bato san gwagsado, san-burbaledse. We-napneggined-san nikad, degine, burbaled-san nikmogad.
46015045	Ar weyob Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaid: Adán, gebesaila we-napneggi dule-aidenonikid, dulasaila gunoniye. Adán-sorbaliddina, a-sogleged, Cristo, adina dulega burba-oduloged uked.
46015046	Ar dule-burbaled-insarsulid, san-we-napneggined-insa nonikid, geb a-sorba burbaled nonikid.
46015047	Dule gebe-we-napneggined-aideged, unnila we-napnegginedid. Dule sorba-nonimogad, we Bab-Jesús, wedi nibnegginedid.
46015048	Adán-san-nikusmaladyob we-napnegginmalad san-nikmarmogad, ar Cristoba-nanaimaladdi Cristoyob san-nikumarmogoed, ar adi nibneggi danikid.
46015049	Ar igi anmar dule-we-napnegginedgii daklemala, deyob anmar dakledapmogoed, dule-nibneggi-danikid daklegedyob.
46015050	Gwenadgan, we an bemarga sogdo, ar san-we-napneggined, geg Bab-Dummad-neg-dakmaidse doged. Deginbali, ar ibmar-nunguoed nibneg-nunguosulidse geg dogbalid.
46015051	Ar degi-inigwele, igar-dukuar-maid an bemarga sogodo: Bela anmar burgoedbisurmalad, ar degi-inigwele, bela anmar-san gwagoedbiid.
46015052	Ar napi gala-goloedgi, anmar-san ukiar, anmar ibya-muru-sade-daedyob gwagoed. Ar ade gar goloed, geb agi dulemar-burgwismalad durgudagogu, bar e-san nunguosurmalad, degine, anmarmoga, anmar-san gwagmarmogoed.
46015053	Ar ade we anmar-san-nabir-nunguedi, gwager-gebed, geg san-nunguedse, degi, anmar-san-nabir-berguedi, gwager-gebed, geg san-berguedse.
46015054	We anmar-san-nabir-nunguedi geg nunguedse gwagsa sogele, anmar-san-sunna-berguedi geg berguedse gwagsa sogele, geb agi Bab-Dummad-Garda narmakar naidba gunonisunnoed: Burgwed-igargi-nakwilesadba, burgwed-igar bergussunye. Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaibalid:
46015055	Burgwedde, ¿emigindi bia be-bonigandi nadsunna? Degite, burgwedde, ¿bia be-nakoedde nadsunna?
46015056	Ar iskued, burgwed-e-boniganad, degine, Moisés-igar-mesisad iskuedga gangued uksad.
46015057	Anmar emigindi Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogmarsundo, ar anmarga anmar-Dummad-Jesucristoba burgwed-igargi nakwega anmar-imaknonigu.
46015058	Degisoggu gwenadgan, an na be-sabemalad, gatik gannaa be imakmar, degi, mer be akumalo, gatik Bab-Jesús-igargi arbanai be gumar. Ar bemar wisid, emi bemar Bab-Jesús-igargi arbananaid, binsa be alamaknanaisulid, bemarga igar-nuedga gumaloed.
46016001	Gwenadgan, Jesucristogi-akananaimaladga mani welegedsik, an bemarga sogdo, igi Bab Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-Galaciagi-bukmaladga an sogsa, ayob bemar imakmarmogodo.
46016002	Itoged-iliba gebe-iba-nagudedgi bemar mani na wis urbemar, ar igi na be mani wis onosmaladba, adi mer geb an monadapir, bemar mani wenai-gumalagar.
46016003	An bemarse modapile, ar bemar dulemar Jerusalénse-mani-sedega na be susmalad garda-nikaa an barmidoed.
46016004	Ar an-sunnad an namogo an dakele, dulemar-Jerusalénse-mani-sedmaloed anba namalodo.
46016005	An Macedoniase-arbid-sorba, an bemarse nadapoed, ar Macedoniase-naed anga igar maid.
46016006	An bemar-walik undarsaar-meger megodo, sulirdi, di-wied-nii-berguedse an bemar-abargi mego an insado. Geb a-sorba bemar an-barmidoed, an nabiedba.
46016007	Ar emigindi unnila sikwas an bemar-dakbisurdo, wis undarsaar bemar-abargi an gudi-sabied, ar Bab Dummad degi-abeger.
46016008	Ar emigindi Pentecostés-Ibagan-naguedse Efesogi an mai-guoed.
46016009	Ar ade an daked bela-bela nabir Bab-Jesús-igargi an sunmako an daked, degi-inigwele, bukidar Bab-Jesús-igar-istar-dakmalad nikbalid.
46016010	Bemarse Timoteo modapile, nue akwemalo, adi weligwar bemar-abargi gudiguegar, ar Bab-Dummadga-arbadimogad-duled, igi an arbadimogadyob.
46016011	Degisoggu, mer Timoteo ibgwensur be dakmalo. Anse nue bogidikidgi barmidaged be imakmalo, ar ade gwenadgan-baiganmala anmar Timoteo-edarbedii-gumaloed.
46016012	Gwenad-Apolosdi, yapa emiskwadi bemarse nae-gusad, ar an egi wilenaigusando, gwenadgan-baiganmala bemarse ataknaegar. Apolos bemarse ataknadapo an insado, nabir ega igargan argader.
46016013	¡Nue atakmar, mer gabmar, salakarmar, Bab-Jesúsgi-bensulidgi! Dobsuli na be nanamar, gannargwaa na be imakmar.
46016014	Bela bemar ibmar-imakedi, sabedgi be imakmar.
46016015	Gwenadgan, bemar wisid, Estéfanas-negginmalad-inse Acayagi Bab-Jesús-abingasad, emigindi amar Jesucristogi-akananaimalad-bendakdimalad.
46016016	Degisoggu, an be-abemarsundo, bemar dulemar-weyob-damalad-urbalii gudigued, degine, dulemar-gadi-arbamalad, degi, dulemar-Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-gadi-bendakmalad-urbalii bemar gudigumarsundo.
46016017	An yeer itodo, Estéfanas, Fortunato, degine, Acaico anse nonimargu, ar ade amar bemar-nuggi an-bendaknonimalad.
46016018	A-dulemar burbar nue an-ogannononimalad, degine, burbar bemar-ogannosmarmogad. Dulemar-degi-damalad bemar a-dulemar mag-dake nanae-wilubmalad.
46016019	Asia-yargi Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad, bemar nued sogeye, bemarga sogsimalad. Aquila, Priscila-ebo, degi, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-e-neggi-danar-ambikunoni-damalad, Bab-Jesús-nuggi, bemar nued sogeye, bemarse gorsimogad.
46016020	Gwenadgan bela bemarse gorsimalad, bemarde nued sogeye. Na be muchub-muchub bela angaagwale na be nued sogeye, na ga be sogmar.
46016021	Ani Pablo, an-argan-sunnadgi we an bemarga narmakdo, bemar nued sogeye.
46016022	Ar dule-gwensak Dummad-Jesucristo-sabsulile, a-dule bato ukabsaleged nabirid. ¡Anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo, be dage!
46016023	Anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo bitigi bemargi nued binsamalana-gadin.
46016024	An Cristo-Jesúsgi bemar-sabed, bela bemarba gudiguena-gadin. Be itomargua.
47001001	Ani Pablo, Bab-Dummad-sogedba Cristo-Jesús-nuggi an barmilealidid, degine, gwenad-Timoteo, a-anbo bemar Corintogi Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-Bab-Dummadse-golega-danar-ambikunoni-damaladse, degine, bela bemar Jesucristogi-akananaimalad bela Acaya-yalagi-bukmaladse anmar garda narmakmalad.
47001002	Bab Dummad, anmar-Baba, degi, Dummad-Jesucristo, amar bitigi bemargi nued binsamalana-gadin, degine, ulubgi bogidik bemar-itogega imakbalina-yerban.
47001003	Bab Dummad, anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo-e-Bab, wile anmar-dakmaid, degine, we-Bab-Dummad bela dulemar-gwage-armaked. A-Bab-Dummad-e-nug anmar odummomarsun.
47001004	We-Bab-Dummad bela anmar-wilediidgine anmar-gwage armaked, adi dulemar-baigan-wiledimalad-e-gwage anmar armakmogagar, igi Bab Dummad anmar-gwage armakmogadyob.
47001005	Ar Cristo naibigusadyob anmar bukidar-wiledimogad, degi-inigwele, Cristoba anmar-gwage armakledibalid.
47001006	Ar anmar wilediile, adi bemar-gwage armaklegegalad, degine, abonolegegarbalid. Ar anmar-gwage ogannolegele, adi bemar-gwage ogannolegegarmogad, degine, bemar abonolegegarbalid, ar bemar anmar-sunnaa amba wiledimarmogad.
47001007	Degine, anmar bemar-bensurmalad, anmar be-wismardo, igi bemar wiledimala, amba deyob bemar gwage-armakedgine anmarba gannalemogoed.
47001008	Gwenadgan, bemar wichuli gudigubi an abesurmardo, igi Asia-yalagine anmar wilesad. Asiagi anmar nue-dummad wilesad, nue angi ise-obinar, anmar burgoye an na bimalanad.
47001009	An itomalad, anmar bato burgwaledyob. Deyob gusdo, adi melle anmar na wargwen na san unniye sogmalagar, adi Bab Dummadgi anmar atakmalaga, ar abi unnila sunna gannar-dule-odurgued maid.
47001010	Ar Bab Dummadbi unnila burgwedgi anmar abonosad, ar abi unnila burgwedgi anmar-abonoged. Degine, unnila aginbi anmar bensulid, we burgwedgi anmar-abonogoed.
47001011	Ar bemar anmar-ular Bab-Dummadse-gornaidba, bukidar Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogmaloed, Bab Dummad ibmar-nued anmarga imakedba.
47001012	Anmar wegine nug-dummarba an itomardo: Ulubgine anmarga sognaido, anmarde nued we-napneggi nanasmarye, degine, bemar-abargi bur-bule nued nanasmarbarye. Anmar nanasmalad, na san-dummarba na imakedginsulid, gwage-inikigwadgi, Bab Dummad nabir anmargi binsaedba, dulemar-binsaed-nikaa daedbarsulid.
47001013	Anmar unnila bese garda narmakdo, sunna mag be absomaloed, degi, mag be itomarbaloedbi. We-garda bitigi bela bemar mag ittos-namalana-gadin.
47001014	Ar igi emi bemar abala mag itosmala, anmar begi nug-dungumalad, igi bemar anmargi nug-dungumarmogoe Dummad-Jesús-danikoed-ibagangi.
47001015	An wegid wisidbali, bese anmar naoye sogsad, adi ilabo an bemarse atakega, agi bemar weligwar itogwichi gumalagar.
47001016	Macedonia-yarse an nadapidgi bemarse ataknaoye an sogsad, degine, Macedoniagi an danikir, bemarse gannar dogee-dagoye, adi a-sorba bemar Judea-yarse an berbenamalagar.
47001017	Degisoggu, deyob an bemarga sogsadi, ¿ibmar gwae-gwae sogsa be an insae? ¿Ar an-ibmar-imakbiedi, an na wargwen na dukin imakbiedba an imakbi be insae, adi ani an sognai guegar eyeye, degine, a-sorba sogbaligar surye? Suli, degisuli.
47001018	Ar Bab Dummad geg gakansasoggu, anmar bemarga ibmar-soged eyeye sogsurdo, geb sorba, surye sogsurbardo, unnila irgwen-sogar anmar imaked.
47001019	Ar Bab-Dummad-Machi Jesucristo, bemar-abargi egi sunmaklesad, an egi sunmaksamogad, Silvano, degine, Timoteo, egi sunmaksamarmogad, egi sunmaklessurdo, eyeye, degine, a-sorba surye soglessurdo. Ar egi sunmaklesdo, unni irgwen sogar, eyeye.
47001020	Ar Bab Dummad na ibmar-nuegan imakoye sogsad, Jesucristogi unnila eyeye sogleged. Ar a-ular Bab-Dummad-nug anmar ogannodele, Jesucristo-nuggi anmar sog-dasunnad, deyob gusunye.
47001021	Degine, Bab-Dummad-sunnad, bemar, degi, anmar, Cristogi gantik gwisguega anmar-imaksad, degine, anmar-susbalid ega arbaegar.
47001022	Degine, Bab Dummad e-wilub anmarga nasisbalid, anmarga E-Burba-Nued anmar-gwagegi nasiknonigu, oyogega, anmarde egadye, degine, anmarga bur-bule ibmar-nuegan imakbaloye.
47001023	Napiragwad an bemarga soged, mer bemarse urwemalagala, Corintose an nadsurgusad. Bab Dummad nue wisid we an-bemarga-sogedi napiragwadid.
47001024	Ar an sogsurdo, an ise-sogar bemarga sogmaloye ibu be Jesucristogi bensurmalar-gebye, ar bato bemar Jesucristogi-bensulidgi nue akananaid. Ar anmar-ibmar-imakedi, adi gatik bur-weligwar be itomalagalad.
47002001	Ar a-ular mer bemarse bar naoye an sogsad, adi melle wile-itogedgine an bemarse warmakegar.
47002002	Ar bukib-ito an be-imaksamalale, degite, ¿doa weligwar-ito an-imakosunna? Ar dule-baid sated, unnila bemarbido, bemar bukib-ito-an-be-imaksamalad, bemar weligwar-ito an-imakoed.
47002003	A-ular an bemarse garda narmaksad, adi an bemarse modapile, weligwar-itogwichi an guegar, mer bukib an itogegar, ar bemar weligwar anmar-saoed. An nue wisdo, an-weligwar-itogedbali, bela bemar weligwar anba itomogoed.
47002004	An we-garda bese narmaksimargua, bukib-itogedba, degine, gwagegine nue-wile an itogedba, boed-abalagine an bese narmaksamalad. We an-bemarga-sogedi, bukib bemar-obinsaegala an sogsulid, an-bemarga-sogedi, adi bemar wisguegar, bule nue be-sabmar be an-dake.
47002005	Ar dule-wargwen bukib-ito an-imaksad, anbi wile-ito an-imaksasulid, bela bukib-binsa bemar-imaksad. We an-bega-sogedi an dogdar obulossulid, napira an bemarga soged, bela bukib-ito bemar-imaksaye.
47002006	A-dulega odurdaked-igar bemar mesisad, we-a-dule bato unnitiba odurdaklesdo.
47002007	Ar degisoggu, emigindi, bemar a-dulega soge-wilubdo, be iskussuliyob anmar be-dakye. A-e-gwage bemar armake-wilubmalad, ar abakalegi degile, a-dule dogdar-bukib-binsadii-gualile.
47002008	Degisoggu, a-ulale nue-ise-wilegar an bese egismarsundo, emigindi, a-dule be nue sabgumarsunye.
47002009	A-ular iduar-garda an bese narmaksamalad, be-dakmalagar, bule bemar bela an-ibmar-sogedba imakdamar-dibeye.
47002010	Ar dule-iskusadga, bar be-iskusadgi an binsaosurye ega be sogsamalale, a-dulega an sogmogoed, ar bato a-dulega deyob an sogsamogad. An deyob imaksadi, bemar-ular Cristo-asabin an deyob imaksad.
47002011	Adi melle nia-saila-Satanás anmar-birgi obinegar, ar anmar nue wismalad, nia-saila daed.
47002012	Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-Cristogi-soglesadgi sunmakegala, Troas-neggweburse an modapgu, Bab Dummad na E-gaya-burba-nuedgi nabir bela-bela sunmakega an-imaksa-inigwele,
47002013	Tito anmar-gwenad, a-neggweburgi an daksulidbali ulubgi surbinsa an itosad. Degisoggu, gwenadgangi an bangudgu, Macedonia-yarse an nade-gusad, Tito-aminaegar.
47002014	Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye an sogsunnad, ar Cristo-Jesúsgi Bab Dummad bela nakwega anmar-imaked, degine, ibmar-wawadik yeer-yapanned bela neg-gaedyob, anmarba Cristo-Jesús-nug bela dulemar wisgumamaid.
47002015	Ar anmar Bab Dummadgala Cristo-ibmar-wawadik-nued-yapannedyobi gued, we-dulemar-abonolemaladga, degine, dulemar-abonolesurmaladgala amba deyob yapanlebalid.
47002016	Ar wemar-abonolesurmaladgala, wemargardi dule-burgwismalad sunnasur-yapannedyobi gued, ar dulemar-abonolemaladgardi, adi dule-dula-gudiguedyob yapannedyob gued. Ar we-ibmarmargala, ¿doa degite unniguar na gudiguosunna? Anmardi unnido.
47002017	Anmardi bukidar-dulemar-baigan-imakedyobi imaksulid, baigandi ogwadmalad, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burbagi mani-onodimalad. Anmardi nue-napiragwadgi Bab-Dummad-nuggi, degi, Bab-Dummad-asabin anmar Cristogi sunmakdimalad.
47003001	¿Degite, anmar na dukin san-ogannoged guarmarsii? Ar igi baigan imakdamala, e-daed-barsognaid-garda na sesdamala, ¿deyob an bese sedabi be an-abemarsunde, igi, be-garda deyob baiganse sedbi be an-abemarsunde?
47003002	Ar bemar anmar-gardayob gumalad, bemar anmar-gwagegi narmakar nanaid. Bela mag be-dakmalad, degine, bela-dulemar be-absogedbimalad, anmar bemar-odurdakdiid bela nueganbi gumarye.
47003003	Ar bemar Cristo-garda-narmaksad gumalad, anmar we-garda-uksamalad, we-narmaklesad tintagi narmaklearsulid. Narmakaledi, Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-dula-maidgi narmakaled. Akwagi epenne igi narmaklesa, deyob narmaklearsurbalid. Narmakaledi, dulemar-gwage-dula-naidgi.
47003004	Ar we-ibmar anmar Bab-Dummad-asabin Cristoba bensulid, we-an-bemarga-sogedi, napiragwadid.
47003005	Anmar bela an na sunna ibmar dukin imakmar-deeye an sogsurdo. Suli, degisuli. Bab-Dummad-anmarga-gangued-ukmaidba sunna bela anmar ibmar-imaked.
47003006	Degine, Bab Dummad na e anmarga uksad, igar-binid-megisad e-maiga sunna anmar guega, ibmar-narmaklealidbarsurdo, suli, burbaledbardo. Ar epenne garda-sanar-narmaklesaddi sunna dule-oburgwed, ar igar-biniddi burbaledid, adi dule-odulogedid.
47003007	Ar we-igar-gebed dule-oburgwed-inigwele, uklesgu, gandikidba-gae uklesad, deun we-igar akwagi-narmakar uklesgu, degisoggu, Israel-dulemar Moisés-e-wagar geg-dake-gusmalad, ar ade Moisés-wagar gandikidba-dakar-maked-ular geg e-wagar dake-gusmalad, ar wedi berguoen-inigwer.
47003008	Degisoggu, we-igar-burbaled-bursunna, bur-bule yeer-daklegedba nued uklesdo.
47003009	Ar we-igar dule-sabsur-odurdaked yeer-daklegedba uklesadde, ar igar dule-iskussulidyob-imaked-bursunna, bur-bule yeer-dakle uklesdo.
47003010	We-igar-yeer-daklegedba ukles-inigwele, degite nued barsurdo, we bur nue-yeer-dakle-danikoed-ebo be dakder, danikoedi bur-bule nue-yeer-dakle-danikoed.
47003011	Ar ibmar-sunna-bergued nue-yeer-daklegedba nabir gusadde, ar ibmar-degi-sadeguoed-bursunna, bur-bule nue-yeer-daklegedba guodo.
47003012	Ar degisoggu, degi anmar bensulidgine edarbedisoggu, inikigwadba anmar dobsuli ibmar sogsundo.
47003013	Anmar Moisésyob imaksulid, adi e-wagar-idu dunwed nasik-daed, adi melle Israel-dulemar e-wagar-dakarmaknaid-bergumaid dakegar.
47003014	Ar Israel-dulemar ibmar-aku-ito nadmalad, amba emise-bakale, idu-igar-megisad absodmalale, dunwe-e-idu nasiklesadyob amba e-idu naid, ar ade Cristobi a-dunwed unnila osuloged.
47003015	Amba emi-ibase, Israel-dulemar Moisés-igar-mesisad absodmalale, amba e-gwage-idu dunweyob naid.
47003016	Ar we Israel-dulemar Bab-Jesúsba-nagunonimalardi we-dunweyob-naid ega surgunoni-daed.
47003017	Ar Bab-Jesúsde Burba-Nuedid. Degisoggu, bia Bab-Jesús-Burba gudii, agine, dulemar bela-ibmargi ollorgunoni-dasunnad.
47003018	Degisoggu, bela anmar-wagar-idu ibmar bar naisursoggu, anmar ispeyobsundo, Bab-Jesús-e-gandik-gaed anmar oyonaisundo. Degisoggu, anmar gatik Cristoyob dakledanisunnad, ar a-e-yeer-dakleged bur-bule anmar nikumaidba. Weyob Bab-Jesús-Burba-Nued ibmar saed.
47004001	Degisoggu, we-arbaed Bab Dummad wile-anmar-dakedba anmarga uksasoggu, mer galakued an imakmarsun.
47004002	A-ulale ibmar-dukuar-imakleged-igar, degine, ibmar-dule-obingesaed-igar an metemarsun. An dulemar-gwen-yardakdisurmalad, degine, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba gwen an ogwadimarsurbalid. Suli, deyob an gudisurmalad. Unnila napiragwadbi Bab-Dummad-asabin an dulemar ibmar-mag-itogega an imakdiid.
47004003	Ar anmar-Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued anba dulemarga dukuar maile, we-dulemar-amba-yoggus-gudidimaladga dukuar maido.
47004004	Ar amar we-gaya-burba-nued yapa abingamarsoggu, a-ulale bab-dummad-we-napneggined amar-binsaed-gassunnad, aku-ito imaksasunnad, adi Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-Cristo-yeer-daklegedgi-soglesadgi, a mer magar dakmalagar. We-Cristo Bab-Dummad-e-wilub-napiragwad-sunnadid.
47004005	Ar anmar na dukin anmargi na sunmaksurmalad, anmar-sunmakedi Jesucristogi an sunmakmalad, we-Jesucristo Dule-Dummadye, anmardi Jesús-sabed-ular be-maiga gumarsunye.
47004006	Ar Bab-Dummad-sunnad sogsad: Neg-sichidgi gwallu-mee gasunye. A-Bab-Dummad-sunnad gwallu-mee anmar-gwagegi oganonikid, adi a-gwallubali Bab Dummad e-yeer-dakleged-Jesucristo-e-wagargi-gaed-ganaid mag anmar wisgumalagar.
47004007	We-ibmar-nued anmar nikadi, anmar-san napsa-sobaledyobidgi we-ibmar-nued an sedimalad, adi mag dakmalagar, we-gangued-dummad Bab Dummadgi danikid, anmargi danisulid.
47004008	Degisoggu, anmar bonigan-abargi gudimar-inigwele, anmar geg egi nomar-deeye soglesulid. Anmar imbagwena suli-binsa-itononi-damar-inigwele, geg an bar guye gwen an sogdisurmalad.
47004009	Dulemar anmar-baregindimar-inigwele, Bab Dummad walagwen gwen an metedisurmalad. Anmar aimukud-damar-inigwele, gwen an-obelodisurmalad.
47004010	Ar anmar bia naoe, an wiledimaladgi anmar-sangi Jesús-burgwisad-e-wilubgan an sedigumalad, adi Jesús-dula-gudiid anmar-sangi mag daklegegar.
47004011	Anmar emi dula gudiidi, Jesús-nug-ulale anmar burgwed guagwar gudiid, adi anmar-san-sunna-berguedgi Jesús-dula-gudiid mag daklegegar.
47004012	Degisoggu, burgwed-abargi an gudiid, bemardi dula-gudiguega gunonisunnad.
47004013	Degi-inigwele, amba anmar Bab-Dummadgi-bensulid emalad. Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi sognaid: Bab Dummadgi an bengussulid, a-ular an sunmaknonikid. Debayobi an bengusurmosoggu, a-ular an sunmakmosunnad.
47004014	Anmar wisid, Bab Dummad, Dummad-Jesús-odulosad, a-Jesúsba Bab Dummad anmar-odulomogoed, degine, bemarmala Bab Dummad na e-asabin anmar-sedoed.
47004015	Bela-anmar-wilesadi bemarga ibmar-nueganga guegala deyob gusad, adi dulemar mag dakega Bab Dummad dulemargi nabir binsamaid. Degisoggu, dulemar Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye sogdagoedba Bab-Dummad-nug bela-bela ogannoledii-guoed.
47004016	A-ulale, anmar gwen galakussurmalad. Ar we-anmar-san-sanaled mommolema-inigwele, anmar-burbadi bane-bane gangumaid.
47004017	Ar wegi-an-wiledimaladi, dogdarsulid, unnila ichesaar an wiledimalad, bergudoed. An-wiledimalad-ular Bab Dummad degi-sadegu anmar-nug ogannogoed, anmarga ibmar-nuegan bur-bule ukoed.
47004018	Ar we-ibmar-nabir-ibyagi-daklemalad, agi anmar binsasulid, bur anmar binsaed ibmar-aku-daklemaladgi. Ar wegi ibmar-nabir-ibyagi-daklemaladdi bergudoed, ar ibmar-geg-ibyagi-daklemaladdi, adi degi-sadeguoed.
47005001	Ar anmar nue wismalad, anmar-san-we-napneggined dordo-negyob-guedi surgusale, gwen akarsulid. Ar Bab Dummad anmarga neg-binidyob, san-gwapid nibneggi ukoed. We-san geg-bergued, dule-argangi-sobarsulidid, degi-sadeguoed-negad.
47005002	A-ulale anmar we-san-an-sedimaladgi an agigindimarsunnad, bitigi anmar-san-nibalid, an nikudapmaloedse nadena-gadinye an binsadimarsunnad,
47005003	adi anmar nibneggi megdapogua, anmar-san, mor-yolegedyob guegar, mer uka-swirigwadyob guegar.
47005004	Amba deyob we-san dordo-negyob-gued-an-sedimaladgi nunmakedba an agigindimalad. Ar anmarde uka-swiri gubisulid, san-binid bur an yobimalad, adi san-we-napneggi-sunna-bergued, burba-duladse berguegar, adi dula anmar degi-gudigu-sadeguegar.
47005005	Ar a-ular Bab Dummad anmar-obinnidsad, degine, anmarga E-Burba-Nued-iduakwaa-uksabalid, anmarga oyogegar, ede nue-napiragwad ibmar-nuegan anmarga imakoye.
47005006	Degisoggu, a-ulale anmar bensuli gudimarsunnad, ar anmar wisid, amba we-sangi an gudimalale, anmar Bab-Jesús-walikasurmalad.
47005007	Ar anmar Jesús-sanar-daksurmar-inigwele, degite Jesúsgi bensuli anmar nanadimalad.
47005008	Ar an nue wismalad, we-san-an-sedimaladgi an bangusmalana-gadinye binsadimalad, adi Bab-Jesús-walik an gudigumalagar.
47005009	Degisoggu, anmar bia gudii-dibe, sangin-dibe, sangi bangus gudii-dibe, Bab-Jesús bur-yeer-itoged an imakbimalad.
47005010	Ar ade anmar bela Cristo-igar-itogoed-asabin gwisgumaloed-biid, adi anmar na wala-walagwen anmar-sangi-ibmar-imaksadba nued imaksa-dibe, igi, ibmar-iskana imaksa-dibe, aba ibmar-abingamalagar.
47005011	Ar Bab-Dummad-dobee-nanaed anmar wissoggu, a-ular anmar dulemargi alamaknaimarsunnad, adi Jesúsba nagumalagar. Ar Bab Dummad nue-anmar-wisid anmar igi damala, degine, bemar nue-anmar-wisi-wilubmarmogad anmar igi damalad.
47005012	Anmar na dukin bemarga sogsurmalad, anmar dule-nuegan gumarye. We anmar bur imaked, bemar anmargi yeer-itoged, adi bemar dulemar-unnila-askinbi-ibmar-dakmalad, gwagegi-ibmar-daksurmalad-abinsaegar.
47005013	Ar akarguarye anmar-nik soglealile, we Bab Dummadga anmar deyob gudido. Anmar gwen akarsurye anmar-nik soglegele, we bemarga anmar deyobdo.
47005014	Ar Cristo anmar-sabgued deyob-dae-anmar-imaked. Anmar weyob binsaed, Cristo bela dulemarga burgwisale, bela anmar bato burgwismarmodo.
47005015	Cristo bela dulemarga burgwisad, adi dulemar-dula-gudimalad, melle na ega bar gudigumalagar, dule ega burgwisadga, ega durgusadga, aga dula gudigumalagar.
47005016	Degisoggu, a-ulale, we-napneg-igar-maid dakedyob dulemar bar an daksurmalad. Ar iduar we-napneg-igar-maidba an Cristo-daksamar-inigwele, emigindi bar deyob an Cristo-daksurmalad.
47005017	Degisoggu, dule-wargwen Cristogi akanonikile, dule-gwapidga gunoni-dasunnad. Ibmar-sergandi bela ega bato nassunnad, emigindi bela ibmar-biniganbi ega gunonisunnad.
47005018	We-ibmar bela Bab Dummadgi danikid, ar Bab Dummad na dukin anmarbo Cristogi igar-naboged-imaksad, degine, anmarga we-igar uksad, adi dulemar Bab-Dummad-ebo igar-nabogegar.
47005019	Bab Dummad Cristogi dulemar-we-napneggi-bukmalad-ebo igar nabosad, dulemar iskudimaladgi Bab Dummad bar binsa dasulid. Degine, Bab Dummad dulemar-ebo igar-nabogedgi sunmakega anmarga igar uksad.
47005020	Degisoggu, anmar Cristo-nuggi barmilealidga gunonisunnad. Bab Dummad anmarba dulemarse wilesakwaa egisnaiyob, anmar Cristo-nuggi bemarse wilesun: Bab-Dummad-ebo bemar igar-nabomarsunye.
47005021	Cristo-dule-iskussulid, dule-iskusadyob gunonikid, adi Bab Dummad iskussuliyob Cristogi-anmar-dakegar.
47006001	Degisoggu, anmar Bab-Jesúsba-mesa-arbamalad gumarsoggu, anmar bemarse wilenaisunnad: Ar Bab Dummad bemar-abonoge-wilubsulinad, degite bemar-abonosad. Degisoggu, a melle binsa ibmar-baisulidyob be dakmarsundo.
47006002	Ar Bab Dummad na E-Gardagi soged: Ibagan nabir-itolegedgi an be-itosad. Ibagan-nabir-abonolegedgi an be bendaksad. Emigindi iba-nued nagunonikid. Emigindi Bab Dummad be-abonoged-iba nagunonisunnad.
47006003	Anmar bemarga igar-iskana oyodisurmalad, adi melle dulemar anmar-Bab-Jesúsga-arbaedgi ichakwa sunmakmalagar.
47006004	Suli, degisuli. Anmar bur oyodimalad, anmar Bab-Dummadga-arbaed gumarye, anmar ise-burdigar nanadimaladgi, nue-naibi-itodimaladgi, nue-wilediidgi, nue-surbinsa-itodiidgi,
47006005	bibyolediidgi, eskaryagi-mellediidgi, anmargi bukidar oimaksamaladgi, arbaed-dummad-imakdiidgi, gabsuli-gudiidgi, ukumada gudiidgi.
47006006	Anmar Bab Dummadga arbaedye an oyomarbalid, gwage-swilidik nanaedgi, ibmar-wisii-daedgi, baisur-itogedgi, nued-binsaedgi-ibmar-imakedgi, Bab-Dummad-Burba-Nued-nikadgi, emar nue-napira-sabguedgi,
47006007	igar napiragwadgi sunmakedgi, Bab-Dummad-gangued-nikadgi. Anmar igar-inikigwadgi-nanaedba anmar igar-nikaa dulemarga sunmakmarsunnad, degisoggu, dulemar anmargi ibmar-soged satemarsundo.
47006008	Anmar Bab Dummadga arbaedye an oyomarbalid, ar ade ibagwengi dulemar anmar-nug odummomaladgi, baid-ibagi, anmar-nug ichomaladgi. Ibagwengi, anmargi nueganbi sunmakmaladgi, banedgine, anmargi ichakwabi sunmaknoni-damaladgi. Dulemar-yardakedyob anmar-daknoni-damalad, degi-inigwele, anmar ibmar-napiragwadbi sogdimaladgi.
47006009	Aku anmar-dake-gunoni-damaladgi, ar bela mag anmar-dakmar-inigwer. Burgwe-danikiyob anmar-daknoni-damaladgi, ar anmar emi dula gudi-inigwer. Anmar nue sabsur odurdaklediid, degite anmar oburgwiledisurmaladgi.
47006010	Anmar nue-bukib-binsadiid, degite nue anmar weligwar-itodimaladgi, nue-wilegedyob anmar gudimalad, degite bukidar-aimar nue-ibmar-nikaa an imakdimaladgi. Ibmar-sateyob an gudimalad, degite anmar bela ibmar-nika gudimaladgi. Bela weyob an gudimaladgi anmar oyodimalad anmar Bab-Dummadga-arbaed-sunnad gumarye.
47006011	Gwenadgan-Corintogi-bukmalad, anmar nue-be-sabmarsoggu, anmar bemarga bakar-bakar ibmar sogsamarsunnad.
47006012	Anmar nue bemar-sabsurdeeye sogsulid, ar bemardi nue anmar-sabsurmar-inigwer.
47006013	Ar anmar bemar-sabedyobi bemar anmar-sabgumogar-gebed. We-an-bega-sogedi be an-mimmimalad-ular deyob an bega sogmalad.
47006014	Melle dulemar Bab-Jesúsba-naisurmaladba akamalo, ar ade, ¿igar-inikigwad iskued-ebo sunna ailegosi? Degine, ¿igi neg-meegwad neg-sichigwad-ebo ailegosunna? Geg deyob gued.
47006015	Ar ade ¿Cristo nia-saila-ebo emarbi binsamalo be insae? ¿Dule-Bab-Jesúsba-naid, dule-Bab-Jesúsba-naisulid-ebo nabir nanao be insae? Suli, deyob geg gued.
47006016	¿Degine, Bab-Dummadse-goled-neg, bab-dummadga-imaklemalad-ebo sunna balibi guo be insae? Suli, degisuli. Ar ade bemar Bab-Dummad-Dula-Maidse, ase-goled-negga gumalad, igi Bab Dummad na sogsa-gusa: Amar-abargi an gudiguoed, degine amarba an nanadioed. Ani an E-Bab-Dummadga an guoed, degine, emar an-dulemarga gumogoed.
47006017	A-ulale Bab Dummad sogbalid: Dulemar-an-wichurmalad-abargi-bemar-gudiid ainidamar, egi bemar bangumarsun. Ibmar-iskana mer ebumalo, geb degiir an be-abingamaloed.
47006018	Bab-Dummad-Gandikidba-Maid weyob sogbalid: “Ani an bemar-Babga guoed, bemardi an-masmalaga, degi, an-bunamalaga gumarmogoed.”
47007001	Degisoggu gwenadgan, an na be-sabemalad, weyob anmarga ibmar-nuegan uklegoye soglessoggu, bela ibmar-iskana anmar-sangi, degi, anmar-burbagi-nanaid osulomarsun, Bab-Dummad-dobegwaa, gatik gwage-swilidik-gumai anmar gumarsun.
47007002	Bemar nue-anmar-abingae-wilubbid: Ar ade an bemar-naibi-imaksasurmalad, gwen an bemar-ichossurmarbalid, gwen an bemar-yardaksasurmarbalid.
47007003	We an-bemarga-sogedi, bemar-ichogega an sogsulid, ar bato iduar an bemarga sogsamalad, anmar nue be-sabmarye, dula gudii-dibe, igi, burgwar-dibe, an na dare gudigumaloye.
47007004	Ar bemarga an ibmar-sogedi bakar-buud an soged. Bemargi yeer an itomalad. Nue be an-gwage mumaksamalad. Wile-itoged-abargi bela-bela nue weligwar an itomalad, nue be an-ogannosmalad.
47007005	Ar nue napiragwad, anmar Macedonia-yarse nonigu, anmar obunnoged gwen nika-gussulid, anmar bela iba-bulegangi gudigusad, dulemar anmargi urwedii-gusmalad, anmar a-dulemar ulubgi-dobee-itodigusmalad.
47007006	Ar Bab Dummad, dule-wile-itodimalad e-gwage armaksoggu, Tito anmarse-nonikidba Bab Dummad anmar-gwage armaknonikid.
47007007	Unnila Tito-nonikidba anmar yeer itossulid. Anmar yeer itosbalid, ar ade Tito-e-gwage bemar yeer-ito imaksamogad. Tito anmarga sognonikid, bemar nue anmar-sabye, bemar nue bosye, degine, bemar angi nue binsamarye. Degisoggu, a-ulale nue-weligwar an itononisunnad.
47007008	Ar garda-an-bese-narmaksamaladgi bukib-binsa an be-imaksamar-inigwele, gwen akar an itosulid, ar an garda-narmaksagudii bukib an itosad. Ar ade garda-an-bese-narmaksamalad unnila wis sikwas bukib-ito an bemar-imaksad.
47007009	Emigindi weligwar-an-itogedi, bukib-binsa bemar-imaksadbarsulid. An weligwar itoged, bemar bukib-itosad, iskuedgi-banguegala bemar imaknonikidba. Ar Bab-Dummad-sogedba bemar bukib-itosmalad, adi gannar Bab Dummadse bemar dagmalagar. Anmar gwen be-ichossurmalad.
47007010	Ar bukib-binsaed Bab-Dummad-sogedbalile, iskuedgi-banguegar-daed, adi abonolemalagar. A-bukib-binsaedga nunmak anmar itosurmalad. We-napneggined-bukib-binsaeddi, adi burgwedgar-daed.
47007011	Bemar bukib-itosad Bab-Dummad-sogedbardo, emigindi deyob-bemar-gusad be dakmalana, bemar napira Bab Dummadga ibmar imaknonimalad, na be san-arsodmalad, nue-be-oulusmalad, nue-dobee-ito be-imaksamalad, degine, sorbali nue be an-dakbi be guarmarbalid. Degine, dule-ibmar-noar-imaksad sabsur-odurdakega guakwaa be ambikunonimarbalid. Bela we-ibmarmargi be oyononimalad, we-dule-deyob-iskusadgi bemar nued imaksamarye, bemar gwen iskussurmarye.
47007012	Degisoggu, an bemarse garda narmaksamargu, dule-nosad-ular, igi, dule-ichosad-ular an bemarse garda narmaksasulid. An narmaksadi, adi bemar dakegar, bemar Bab-Dummad-asabin nue anmargi binsadimarye.
47007013	Degisoggu, a-ular anmar yeer itononikid. Bur-bule weligwar an itomalad, Tito weligwar-itogedba, ar ade bela bemar Tito ulubgi nue ogannosmalad.
47007014	Inso Tito-asabin bemargi nug-dummaa an itosadi, gwen be an-obinge-imaksasurmalad. Ar bela ibmar an-bemarga-sogsad napiragwadid, amba bemargi bela an Titoga-ibmar-sogsad napiragwadga gunonibalid.
47007015	Tito bemargi binsaalir, bemargi sunmakar-daed, igi bemar uaya-nikaa-daedba belagwapa e-ibmar-sogsadba, dobed-abargi bela eba be ibmar imaksamala. A-ular Tito bur-bule bemar-sabgunonikid.
47007016	Degisoggu, weligwar an itosunnad, sunna bela bemargi an bensurgu.
47008001	Gwenadgan, bemar wisguegala an bemarga sogmarbardo, Bab Dummad Macedonia-yargi Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad nue bendaksado, nallesuli mani-ukegar.
47008002	Amar nue na naibi-itodid-abargi, nue-weligwar itosmalad, nue wilemalad-inigwele, mani-ibedyobi ichesur mani-uksamalad.
47008003	Napira an bemarga soged, wemar nue yeer-itogedgine, na e nikadba, degine, bur-bule ise-obinagwar mani uksamalad.
47008004	Gwenadgan-Macedonia-yargi-bukmalad anmarse ise-egisar gunai-gusmalad, emarde Jesucristogi-akananaimaladga mani-ukbimarmoye.
47008005	Ichesur-mani-ukosurye anmar biendo, ar ade na emar-inse Bab Dummadga na san uksamalad, geb degi anmarga na ukdemalad, Bab-Dummad-sogedba.
47008006	Degisoggu, Titoga an sogsundo, igi iduar bemar-abargi mani-wede, deyob emi bemar-abargi mani-weed imakbaloye, obelegedse.
47008007	Ar bela bemar yeer Bab-Jesús-igargi nanadimarsoggu, Bab-Jesús-bensulidgi, sunmakedgi, ibmar-nue-wisidgi, bela-bela Bab-Jesús-igargi-alamaknaidgi, degine, anmar-sabedgi, amba deyob we-mani-ukedgi gatik ise-obinagwar bemar ukmarbalodo.
47008008	Deyob be imakmarye an bemarga sogsulid. Unnila bemar wisgubi an abemalad, gwenadgan deyob imaksaye, adi bemar oyomogagar, bemar gwenadgan-nue-sabmarmoye.
47008009	Ar anmar-Dummad-Jesucristo-nabir-dulemargi-binsaed bato bemar wismalad: Bemar-sabed-ular, na bela-ibmar-nika-inigwele, na wilegedga na imaksad, adi e-wilegedgine bemar bela-ibmar-nika-gumalagar.
47008010	Degine, wegi bemarga an binsaed-ukmarsun, ar we bemarga ib-nuedid, igi birgagwendo, bemar-inse nuedgi mani-wedmala, unnila ibmar-imakedginbisulid, nue bina-sogedginbalid.
47008011	Emigindi, nued-obelogedse be imakmaloed, igi bemar onodgua, nue imakbiedgine be onodmaladyob, na be mani-nikadba be ukmaloed.
47008012	Ar na be ibmar-ukbi-itogele, Bab Dummad nued abinga-daed, ar ade na be ibmar-nikadba ukoed. Ar be ibmar sulile, geg be uked.
47008013	An sogsurdo, dule-baidga gatik ise-obinagwar be-ibmar-ukedba be a-inar bur sate guye.
47008014	Suli, degi-an-sogsulid. An sogdo, bemar emigi ibmar-obinegwaa-nikadi we-dulemar-ibmar-sulidga ukye, adi bemar ibmar-sate gunonikile, we-dule-ibmar-sulid sunna ibmar-nikadginele, bemarga ukmogoed, adi bela na yopiragwadbi gumalagar.
47008015	Ar igi Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar nai: Dule ibmar-ichesur wesadi, egi gwabgussulid. Dule ibmar-ichee wesadi, gwen ega akussurmogad.
47008016	Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye an sogdo, Tito-gwagegi an bemar-bina-nue-sogedyob nasiknonimogu.
47008017	An-ibmar-ega-sogsadba Tito imaksado, ar ade na e-sunnad bemar-bina nue sogmosoggu, bemarse na e-itolegedba nade-gusad.
47008018	Titobali gwenad-wargwen anmar barminadapid. We-gwenadgi bela Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad-abargi bela nueganbi egi sunmakmalad, wede Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi nued arbadiiye.
47008019	Unnila abisulid, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad, amar we-gwenad-susmalad, adi we-mani-welenaid anmarba berbenaegar. Anmar we-mani-nued-akwedimalad, adi Bab-Dummad-nug-ogannomalagar, degine, oyogegar, anmar nue gwenadgan-bendakbimarye.
47008020	Melle dulemar anmargi ichakwa sunmakegala, we-mani-melubaksaar-anmar-akwediid, we-gwenadgan anmarba we-mani dakdimosunnad.
47008021	Bela ibmar-nueganbi-imakdii anmar gubied, unnila Bab-Dummad-asabinbisurdo, dulemar-asabin ibmar-nued imakdii anmar gubibalid.
47008022	Amarba anmar-gwenad-baid anmar barmisibalid, we-gwenad anmarga nue oyodiid, ibmar-saedi nue na imakbi-daed. Emigindi bur-bule, ar we-gwenad bemar-bensulid be deyob imakmarmogoed.
47008023	Ar Titodi anbo-arbaedid, bemar-ular anba alamaknai-daed-duled. Gwenadgan-baigandina wedi Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damalad barmisimalad, degine, amar Cristo-nug ogannomarbalidid.
47008024	Degisoggu, we-dulemarga bemar oyogoed, degine, Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damaladga be oyobaloed, we-dulemar bemar nue sabmalad, degine, be oyomarbaloed, ibiga bemar-nuggine anmar dummarba-ito-daed.
47009001	Gwenadgan, Jesucristogi-akananaimaladga mani-weedgi dogdar bemarse garda narmaked be abesurmalad.
47009002	Ar an bemar-nue-wisid, bemar nue gwenadgan-bendakbi-damalad. Macedonia-yargi-bukmaladga bemar-nug nue an ogannodiid, an sogdiid, bemar-Acayagi-bukmalad bato birgagwengus mani-ukega guagwar bukmarye. Bemar nue-mani-ukbi-gudimaladba, bukidar-baigan bemarba gannaledmarmogad mani ukegar.
47009003	Degi-inigwele, gwenadgan an bemarse barmisad, adi an bemar-nug-ogannodiid melle binsa an bemar-nug ogannodii-guegar, adi bemar guagwar gudiguegar, an bemarga sogsa-gusadyob.
47009004	Ar abakalegi gwenadgan-Macedonia-yarginmalad anba danikile, bemargi nued an sunmakdimar-inigwele, degite, bemar guagwar buksuli, ukiar be imaknonimalale, bemar an-obingesagwichi gualile. Ar an insagua, bemar bur-bingegusmalar an insado.
47009005	Degisoggu, a-ular anmar gwenadganga sogsamalad bemarse nagwerye, adi guagwar bemar mani-ukoye-sogsad urbenaegar, adi daklegegar, na bemar mani-ukbiedbali uknaid, ani ise-sogar an bemar-imaknaisulid.
47009006	Wedi an bemarga sogdo: Ar dule ibmar-ichee digsale, ibmar-ichee wemogoed. Ar dule ibmar-ichesur digsale, ibmar-ichesur wemogoed.
47009007	Na wala-walagwen igi na e-gwagegi ibmar-ukbiedba ukoed. Nunmak-itogedgi, igi, dule ise-bega sogaledgi mer be ibmar-ukoed, ar ade Bab Dummad yeer dakdaed dule-weligwar-ibmar-uked.
47009008	Bab Dummad unnitiba gangu maisoggu, sunna bela bega ise-obinagwar ibmar ukoed, adi unnitiba ibmar be nika-guegar, degine, adi bela ibmar-nuegangi be gwenadgan-bendakegar.
47009009	Ar Bab-Dummad-Gardagi narmakar naid: Dule-wargwen wileganaga ise-obinagwar ibmar uksale, e-ibmar-nued-imaked degi-sadeguoed, geg bergued.
47009010	Bab Dummad dulemar-ibmar-digmaladga ibmar-gwag digega ega ukedi, degine, ega mas-gunned ukbalidi, a-Bab-Dummad bemar-ibmar-nuegan-imaked bemarga unnitiba ise-omelogar imakoed, ibmar-gwag imakedyob.
47009011	Geb degi bemar unnitibali bela-ibmar-nuegan be nikumaloed, adi melubaksaar bemar ibmar ukmarmogagar. Geb degi bemar-mani-weoedi, we-mani gwenadganga anmar bemar-nuggi ukogua, gwenadgan dog-nuedye Bab Dummadga sogdagoed.
47009012	Ar we-ibmar anmar Jesucristogi-akananaimaladga ukdogua, unnila ibmar-abedimaladbi ega uknai-guosulid, gwenadgan Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye-sogega an imakdemarbaloed.
47009013	Ar bemar wemar-gwenadgan-bendaknaidbali Bab-Dummad-nug ogannodmaloed, ar ade bemar wemar gwenadganga oyonaid igi bemar Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued-Cristogi-soglesadba nue nanadimala, degine, bemar-ibmar-uked ise-obinagwar be emarga, degine, bela-dulemarga be ukmaladba.
47009014	Deginbali, Bab Dummad bemargi ise-nabir-obinagwar binsasmaladba, gwenadgan bemar-nue-sabedgine, bemarga Bab Dummadse gotemaloed.
47009015	Bab Dummadga dog-nuedye anmar sogsunnad, na e-machi anmarga uksadba. We-e-machi dogdar dule-nuedid, geg sogle itolegedid.
47010001	Ani an Pablo, an bemarse wilesakwaa egismarsunnad, Cristo nue dulemar-sabedgi, degine, na san-dummarba na imaksulidgi. An-nik sogmalad: An bemar-abargi an gudiile, an yaisdikii sunmakye. An bemar-abargi daklesulirdi, ibmar sabsur an bemarga sogmarye.
47010002	Degisoggu, nue-wilesakwaa an bemarse egismalad, nue nanamarye, adi bitigi bemarse an mosale, melle ise-urwedgi an bemarga ibmar-sogegar. Ar dulemar-angi-sunmakmaladga ande dulemar-we-napneggi-nanadimaladyob nanadiiye, amarga sabsur ibmar-soged, egi gwisgued, guagwar an gudiid.
47010003	Ar anmar we-napneggined-inigwele, anmar we-napneggi-dulemar-urwemaladyob urwenanaisurmalad.
47010004	Ar anmar urwenaidi we-napneggi gingimar-bulegan-ebulemalad an ebusurmalad, anmar ebugedi, Bab-Dummadgi-gangued-nikad, adi, niamar-galu earegar.
47010005	Anmar Bab-Jesús-igar-sunmakedgi Bab-Dummad-igar-sunnadsulid an obelodimalad, degine, dulemar na-san-dummarbadgi Bab-Dummad-igar-mer-wisguega-imakdimalad an obelodimarbalid. Degine, dulemar-binsaed anmar ogwaega an alamaknanaimalad, adi Cristoba ibmar-imakmalagar.
47010006	Deginbali, dulemar-Bab-Dummadba-ibmar-imaksurmalad sabsur-odurdaked guagwar anmar gudimalad, ar bemar Bab-Dummad-sogedba bela be ibmar-imaksamalad-sorba.
47010007	Unnila askinbi bemar ibmar-dakmalad. Ar dule-wargwen na Cristogadye sogele, insaodo, igi na ede Cristogadi, deyob anmar Cristogadmogad.
47010008	Ar an-ganguedgi an dummarba amba an sunmak-inigwele, gwen an bingeguosulid, ar Bab-Jesús we-gangued anga uksad bemar-ogannogegar, bemar-obelogegarsulid.
47010009	Mer be binsamalo, an gardagi bemarse an urwesimarye, adi be-odobgumalagar.
47010010	Ar ade sogmalad, an gardagi ibmar sabsuli, degine, binnasuli an sogdaye. An bemar-asabin-gualirdi, an nolloo daye, degine, an-sunmakeddi gwen bai-itole dasurye.
47010011	We-dule-degi-soged nue insao, igi anmar bemar-asabin gwichisulile, gardagi ibmar sabsur-soge, deyob an bemar-asabin sunna an ibmar-imakbalid.
47010012	Dulemar na dukin na san-ogannoar sunmakdimaladyob geg an gumalad, degine, amar-ebo geg anmar bengumarbalid. Ar we-dulemar na dukin na emar-ebo wilubdakdimalad, na e-sangi na dukin wilubdakdimaladyob gumalad. We igar-binsaed-suli-damaladid, igar-nabiridsulid.
47010013	Ar anmar na-san-dummarba dogdar an na imakosurmalad, ar Bab Dummad anmarga igar-uksadba unnila an imakmaloed. Ar Bab Dummad bemarse warmakega anmar-imaksad.
47010014	Ar a-ular anmar wilub-obichaa gudisurmalad, bemarse mosasuliyob. Ar anmar-inse bemarga Cristo-gaya-burba-nuedgi sunmakapmalad.
47010015	Anmar dulemar-baid-arbaedgi na san dummarba imaksurmalad. Unnila anmar edarbedimalad bemar Jesúsgi-bensulid gatik nasgumai-gued, adi bemar-abargi gatik anmar igar-maidba arbaegar.
47010016	Degine, Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued bemar-neggwebur-obichaa an egi sunmaknaegar, yo dule-baid-ese-warmakedse, adi melle dule-baid-arbasadgi an na nug odummogegar.
47010017	Bab-Dummad-Gardagi soged: Ar dule na san dummarba na sabiele, bur Bab Dummadgi na san dummarba itoged nabirye.
47010018	Ar ade dule na dukin san ogannoged, a-dule Bab Dummad abingasulid. Bab Dummad na dule-nug ogannogoed, a-dule Bab Dummad abingaed.
47011001	¡Bitigi an sikwas-bina-gutuu-daedgi wis baisur be an-daksamalana-gadin! Eye, wis baisur be an-itomalo.
47011002	Ar Bab-Dummad-nobedyobi an bemargi nobmarmogad. Unnila sui-wargwennaga an be-uksamalad, yagwa-swilidiki sui-niku-sokalidyob Cristoga an be-ukbimalad.
47011003	An dobe itoged, igi epenne naibe binsaed-ibedsoggu, Eva-yardaksa, abakalegi deyob bemar yardaklearmogale, binsaed-galearmogale, degine, Cristo-bina nue-sogedgi bemar bangualile.
47011004	Ar Jesús-baidgi, anmar a-Jesúsgi bemarga sunmaksasulidgi dule bemarga sunmaknonikir, be abinga-damalad. Burba-baid, bemar-idu-abingasadba-akaladi bemar abinga-damalad. Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nued be abingasmaladba-akaladi be abinga-damarbalid.
47011005	Na sogmalad, ede Bab-Jesús-nuggi-barmilesmalad-dummaganye, an insagua, amarba an egesurmogad.
47011006	Ar an-sunmakedi dogdar-nued-sunmaksur-inigwele, an-ibmar-wisiddi bela-bela an wisid, an ibmar-bela-imakdiidgi an bela bemarga oyodiid.
47011007	Bab-Dummad-gaya-burba-nuedgi an bemarga sunmaksagu, an bemargi mani gassurmalad, degine, na san bipii imaksabalid, adi bemar bur dummaganga gumalagar. Ar weyob an na imaksadi, ¿wede ichakwaa an imaksa?
47011008	Gwenadgan-baigan Bab-Jesúsba-nanaimalad-danar-ambikunoni-damaladgi an mani egwachad, adi an bemar-abargi binsa arbaegar, ar ade bemar an-bennuke-wilubbinad.
